[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'dul ba ja pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b.2\]]gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dge 'dun gyis gnas mal 'bog pa dang /_zas la sko bar bskos pa'i tshe na dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor 
[\[1b.3\]]dang tshe rabs tshe rabs nas khon yod pas dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang lhan cig tu 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'khod pa na/_tshe dang ldan pa gyad 
[\[1b.4\]]bu nor phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /_de gnyis kyis nye dga' la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' gal te khyod kyang dge 'dun gyis gnas mal 'bog pa dang /_zas la sko bar bskos 
[\[1b.5\]]par gyur na/_khyod kyang kho bo cag la 'di lta ste/_dper na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor bzhin du mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de gnyis la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gnyis 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]khyed gnyis dge 'dun mthun pas dge slong gang gnas mal 'bog pa dang /_zas la sko bar bskos par shes bzhin du de la ngor 'phya'am/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_ci kho bo cag gnyis 'dur yang mi dbang ngam/_dge slong don nyung ngu 
[\[2a.2\]]dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun mthun pas dge slong gang gnas mal 'bog pa dang /_zas la sko bar bskos par shes bzhin du de la ngor 'phya bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong 
[\[2a.3\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis sam/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa de ngor 'phya ba'i grangs su chug shig_/
[\[2a.4\]]'di ltar grangs su gzhug par bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/_gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol bar bya ste/_
[\[2a.5\]]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes 'di gnyis 'tshal bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pas gnas mal 'bog pa dang /_zas la sko bar bskos pa tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor de la ngor 'phya na/_
[\[2a.6\]]gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes ngor 'phya ba'i grangs su stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyis dge slong 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis ngor 'phya ba'i grangs su bcug pa de'i tshe na de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang lhan cig gtam zer zhing 'dug pa na/_tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /_de gnyis kyis nye dga' la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' gal te khyod kyang dge 
[\[2b.2\]]'dun gyis gnas mal 'bog pa dang /_zas la sko bar bskos par gyur na/_khyod kyang kho bo cag la 'di lta ste dper na kha cig bzhin du mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de gnyis la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gnyis khyed gnyis dge 'dun mthun pas dge slong gang gnas mal 'bog 
[\[2b.3\]]pa dang /_zas la sko bar bskos par shes bzhin du de la gzhogs 'phyas byed dam/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_ci kho bo cag gnyis kyis 'ga' zhig gi ming ngam rus nas smos sam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_gal te ming dang rus ma smos par gzhogs 'phyas byed du 
[\[2b.4\]]gnang na/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kyang 'jig rten thams cad la ming dang rus mi smos par gzhogs 'phyas byas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun mthun pas/_dge slong gang gnas mal 'bog pa dang /_zas la sko bar bskos par shes bzhin du de 
[\[2b.5\]]la gzhogs 'phyas byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis 
[\[2b.6\]]sam/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa de gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i grangs su chug shig 'di ltar grangs su gzhug par bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun 
[\[2b.7\]]par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol bar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes 'di gnyis 'tshal bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pas gnas mal 'bog pa dang /_zas la sko bar bskos pa tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]gyad bu nor de la gzhogs 'phyas bgyid na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gzhogs 'phyas bgyid pa'i grangs su stsal to/_/'di ni gsol 
[\[3a.2\]]ba'o/_/gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyis dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes ngor 'phya ba dang /_gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i grangs su bcug pa de'i tshe na de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la ngor 'phya ba dang /_gzhogs 'phyas byed nas/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge 
[\[3a.3\]]slong dag dge 'dun mthun pas dge slong gang gnas mal 'bog pa dang /_zas la sko bar bskos par shes bzhin du de la ngor 'phya ba dang /_gzhogs 'phyas byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[3a.4\]]'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes 
[\[3a.5\]]bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis la rmas pa/_dge slong khyed gnyis shes bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pas gnas mal 'bog pa dang /_zas la sko bar bskos pa dge 
[\[3a.6\]]slong gyad bu nor de la ngor 'phya ba dang /_gzhogs 'phyas byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma 
[\[3a.7\]]yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_'phya 'am gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed do/_/'phya 'am gzhogs 'phyas byed na zhes bya ba ni 'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas bya ba'i bsam pas 
[\[3b.2\]]ngag dang /_tshig dang /_tha snyad dang /_skad dang /_rjod pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_tshig gi lam dang /_tshig gi sgra dang /_ngag gi lam dang /_ngag gi rnam par rig byed rjod pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_ngan 
[\[3b.3\]]song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la 
[\[3b.4\]]ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong dge 'dun gyis bgrangs shing /_de yang gang zag bcu gnyis su bskos pa sbyor ba ma btang ba dag la 'phya na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed du 'gyur 
[\[3b.5\]]ro/_/dge slong dge 'dun gyis bgrangs shing de yang gang zag bcu gnyis su bskos pa sbyor ba btang ba dag la 'phya na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dge 'dun gyis 
[\[3b.6\]]bgrangs shing de yang gang zag bcu gnyis su ma bskos pa sbyor ba ma btang ba dag la 'phya na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dge 'dun gyis bgrangs shing de yang gang 
[\[3b.7\]]zag bcu gnyis su ma bskos pa sbyor ba btang ba dag la 'phya na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dge 'dun gyis ma bgrangs shing de yang gang zag bcu gnyis su bskos 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]pa sbyor ba ma btang ba dag la 'phya na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dge 'dun gyis ma bgrangs shing de yang gang zag bcu gnyis su bskos pa sbyor 
[\[4a.2\]]ba btang ba dag la 'phya na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dge 'dun gyis ma bgrangs shing de yang gang zag bcu gnyis su ma bskos pa sbyor ba ma btang ba dag la 
[\[4a.3\]]'phya na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dge 'dun gyis ma bgrangs shing de yang gang zag bcu gnyis su ma bskos pa sbyor ba btang ba dag la 'phya na nyes byas su 'gyur 
[\[4a.4\]]ro/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/'phya ba'i ltung byed de bcu gnyis pa rdzogs 
[\[4a.5\]{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kau shAm+bI na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ltung ba chos bzhin du phyir mi byed nas/_de la dge slong don 'dod pa bde ba 'dod pa/_bde ba la reg par 'dod pa/_grub pa dang bde 
[\[4a.6\]]ba 'dod pa rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du phyir gyis shig_/des smras pa/_su la ltung ba byung ba de phyir byed par 'gyur ro/_/khyod la ltung ba byung ba su zhig phyir byed par 'gyur/_su 'gyod par 'gyur ba'o/_/khyod la ltung ba byung ba la su 
[\[4a.7\]]'gyod par 'gyur/_gal te tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag la ltung ba byung na kho bo'i mdun du ma 'chags par gzhan gyi mdun du shogs shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ni rigs sna tshogs dang /_rus sna tshogs dang /_khyim sna tshogs nas rab tu byung ba dag yin te/_'di lta ste dper na 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]shing ljon pa dag gi lo ma sna tshogs rlung gis blags pa dag gcig tu ltung zhing gcig tu 'dug pa de bzhin du khyed cag kyang rigs sna tshogs dang /_rus sna tshogs dang /_khyim sna tshogs nas rab tu byung ba dag yin gyi/_kho bo'i 'phags pas ni byang chub thugs su chud pa yin no 
[\[4b.2\]]zhes de dge slong rnams kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon par byed nas/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[4b.3\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong 'dun pa dang gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i grangs su chug shig_/'di ltar grangs su gzhug par bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te 
[\[4b.4\]]dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa 'di ltung ba byung yang chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid 
[\[4b.5\]]de/_'di la dge slong don 'tshal ba/_phan pa 'tshal ba/_bde ba 'tshal ba/_bde ba la reg par 'tshal ba/_grub pa dang bde ba 'tshal ba rnams kyis gzhi des glengs kyang dge slong rnams kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang 
[\[4b.6\]]bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i grangs su stsal to/_/'di ni gsol pa'o/_/gang gi tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i grangs su bcug pa de'i tshe na des bsams pa/_bdag la nyes pa gang byung ba de ni 
[\[4b.7\]]bdag gis de dag la tshig smras pa las gyur pa yin te/_gang gis/_skyes bu mkhas dang ldan pa yis/_/ngag rnams bzhi po bsrung bya ste/_/nags kyi nang du gong ma sreg_/sgra 'byin pas ni zin la ltos/_/zhes smras pa ni legs par smras pa yin no snyam nas/_
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]de dge slong rnams kyis smras pa na cang mi smra bas/_dge slong rnams kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon par byed nas/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams kyis smras pa na cang mi smra bas dge slong rnams kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon par byed ces 
[\[5a.2\]]smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong 'dun pa'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa de cang mi smra ba bsgo ba rna 
[\[5a.3\]]la gzon pa'i grangs su chug shig_/'di ltar gzhug par bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya ste/_dge 'dun 
[\[5a.4\]]btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa 'di ltung ba byung yang chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid de/_'di la dge slong don 'tshal ba/_phan pa 'tshal ba/_bde ba 'tshal ba/_bde ba la reg par 'tshal ba/_grub pa dang bde ba 'tshal ba rnams kyis gzhi des glengs 
[\[5a.5\]]kyang dge slong rnams la cang mi smra bas rna la gzon na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su stsal to/_/'di ni gsol pa'o/_/gang gi tshe dge 
[\[5a.6\]]'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang /_cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su bcug pa de'i tshe na dge slong rnams kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang /_cang mi smra bas rna la gzon par byed nas/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams 
[\[5a.7\]]kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang /_cang mi smra bas rna la gzon par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang /_
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dun pa 
[\[5b.2\]]la rmas pa/_dge slong khyod dge slong rnams kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang /_cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul 
[\[5b.3\]]dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs 
[\[5b.4\]]pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_bsgo ba rna la gzon na ltung byed do/_/bsgo ba rna la gzon na zhes bya ba ni 
[\[5b.5\]]bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i bsam pas ngag dang /_tshig dang /_tha snyad dang /_skad dang /_rjod pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_tshig gi lam dang /_tshig gi sgra dang /_ngag gi las dang /_ngag gi rnam par rig byed brjod pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_
[\[5b.6\]]dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do 
[\[5b.7\]]zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong dge slong gi gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis dge slong skra dang kha spu bregs nas ring po ma lon pa snam sbyar dmar ser dang lhung bzed zha nye'i dbyar 'dab kyis sbyar ba dang /_khar ba sbu bus dkris 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]pa dang /_zhun mar gyi lhung bzed dam/_'bru mar gyi lhung bzed dam/_sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed dam/_bu ram gyi dbu ba'i lhung bzed kyis 'ong ba mthong ngam zhes zer ba la/_des 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bos dge slong skra dang kha spu bregs nas ring po ma lon pa 
[\[6a.2\]]snam sbyar dmar ser dang lhung bzed zha nye'i dbyar 'dab kyis sbyar ba dang /_khar ba sbu bus dkris pa dang /_zhun mar gyi lhung bzed dam/_'bru mar gyi lhung bzed dam/_sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed dam/_bu ram gyi dbu ba'i lhung bzed kyis 'ong ba ni ma mthong gi/_'di ltar kho bos 
[\[6a.3\]]dge slong rkang pa gnyis kyis 'ong ba mthong ngo zhes smras na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dge slong gi gan du 'ongs te/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis dge slong ma skra bregs nas ring po ma lon pa snam sbyar dmar ser dang lhung bzed zha nye'i dbyar 'dab kyis sbyar ba dang /_
[\[6a.4\]]zhun mar gyi lhung bzed dam/_'bru mar gyi lhung bzed dam/_sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed dam/_bu ram gyi dbu ba'i lhung bzed kyis 'ong ba mthong ngam zhes zer ba la/_des 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bos dge slong ma skra bregs nas ring po ma lon pa snam sbyar dmar ser dang lhung 
[\[6a.5\]]bzed zha nye'i dbyar 'dab kyis sbyar ba dang zhun mar gyi lhung bzed dam/_'bru mar gyi lhung bzed dam/_sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed dam/_bu ram gyi dbu ba'i lhung bzed kyis 'ongs pa ni ma mthong gi_/'di ltar kho bos dge slong ma rkang pa gnyis kyis 'ong ba mthong ngo zhes smras na ltung 
[\[6a.6\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma dang dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin du ci rigs par sbyar ro/_/dge slong dge slong gi gan du 'ongs te/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa ji ltar khyim pa bu ram shing gi khur gyis sam/_smyig ma'i khur gyis sam/_'dam bu'i khur 
[\[6a.7\]]gyis sam/_shing gi khur gyis sam/_zhun mar gyi bum pas sam/_'bru mar gyi bum pas sam/_sbrang rtsi'i bum pas sam/_bu ram gyi dbu ba'i bum pas 'ong ba mthong ngo zhes zer ba la/_des 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bos khyim pa bu ram shing gi khur gyis sam/_
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]smyig ma'i khur gyis sam/_'dam bu'i khur gyis sam/_shing gi khur gyis sam/_zhun mar gyi bum pas sam/_'bru mar gyi bum pas sam/_sbrang rtsi'i bum pas sam/_bu ram gyi dbu ba'i bum pas 'ongs pa ni ma mthong gi_/'di ltar kho bos khyim pa rkang pa gnyis 
[\[6b.2\]]kyis 'ong ba mthong ngo zhes smras na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dge slong gi gan du 'ongs te/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa ji ltar khyim pa mo gos thams cad sngon pos sam/_thams cad ser pos sam/_thams cad dmar pos sam/_thams cad dkar pos sam/_zhun 
[\[6b.3\]]mar gyi bum pas sam/_'bru mar gyi bum pas sam/_sbrang rtsi'i bum pas sam/_bu ram gyi dbu ba'i bum pas 'ong ba mthong ngam zhes zer ba la/_des 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bos khyim pa mo gos thams cad sngon pos sam/_thams cad ser pos sam/_thams 
[\[6b.4\]]cad dmar pos sam/_thams cad dkar pos sam/_zhun mar gyi bum pas sam/_'bru mar gyi bum pas sam/_sbrang rtsi'i bum pas sam/_bu ram gyi dbu ba'i bum pas 'ong ba ni ma mthong gi_/'di ltar kho bos khyim pa mo rkang pa gnyis kyis 'ong ba mthong ngo zhes smras na 
[\[6b.5\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis ji tsam du gzhan 'dri ba la lan gzhan 'debs na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/rnam grangs de dag thams cad la cang mi smra bas rna la gzon na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gshed ma'i gsad par bya ba bros nas de dge slong gi gan du 
[\[6b.6\]]'ongs te 'phags pa ji ltar gsad par bya ba mthong ngam zhes 'dri na/_gal te grang ba'i dus yin na dge slong gis gshed ma la bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]me khang du zhugs la me 'de shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/gal te tsha ba'i dus yin na bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]je dpong sa'i khang par zhugs shig_/
[\[6b.7\]]je skom 'thung shig_/je ngal so shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/gal te des de skad ces bdag mi grang ngo /_/bdag mi tsha'o/_/bdag mi skom mo/_/bdag ma chad do/_/'di ltar bdag gsad par bya ba 'dri'o zhes zer na/_je sen mo la bltas te sen mo mthong ngo zhes brjod 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]par bya'o/_/nam mkha' la bltas te nam mkha' mthong ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te 'di skad ces bdag sen mo mi 'dri'o/_/bdag nam mkha' mi 'dri'o/_/'di ltar bdag gsad par bya ba 'dri'o zhes zer na/_dge slong des phyogs bzhir rnam 
[\[7a.2\]]par bltas te 'du byed thams cad bdag med pa yid la byas nas don dam par na sems can ma mthong ngo zhes brjod par bya ba la ltung ba med do/_/kha na ba dang /_khas sman 'dzin pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag 
[\[7a.3\]]gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi ngag mi nyan nas bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang /_cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su stsal ba la 
[\[7a.4\]]gzigs/_dge slong dag da ltar du ma zad kyi 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi ngag mi nyan nas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur te/_de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rdzing zhig na rus sbal gcig dang ngang pa gnyis 
[\[7a.5\]]shig 'khod de/_de nas dus gzhan zhig na lo bcu gnyis su than pa byung nas des rdzing de bskam par brtsams so/_/chos nyid kyis na 'jig rten gnas pa chags nas ring po ma lon pa'i tshe na dud 'gro dag kyang smra shes pas ngang pa gnyis kyis rus sbal la smras pa/_grogs po 
[\[7a.6\]]kho bo cag gnyis ni rdzing gzhan du 'gro'o/_/rus sbal gyis smras pa/_grogs po gnyis kho bo yang khrid de song shig_/ngang pa gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyod ji ltar khrid de 'gro bar bya/_rus sbal gyis smras pa/_kho bo shing gi dbus su khas gzung bar byas/_khyed gnyis kyis rtse 
[\[7a.7\]]mo gnyis nas zung la deng shig_/ngang pa gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyod smra 'dod pa yin pas tshig srung mi nus kyis kho bo cag gnyis khyer te mi 'gro'o/_/rus sbal gyis smras pa/_tshig bsrung bar bya'o/_/ngang pa gnyis kyis rus sbal de khyer te steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]ji tsam na ri brags zhig gi steng na phar song ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ltos shig ngang pa gnyis kyis rus sbal zhig khyer te song ngo zhes zer ba na/_rus sbal des kyang dang du blangs so/_/de nas ri brags gzhan zhig gi steng 
[\[7b.2\]]na phar song ba dang /_yang khye'u dang bu mo dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ltos shig_/ngang pa gnyis kyis rus sbal zhig khyer te song ngo zhes zer ba dang /_rus sbal des bsams pa/_bdag gis yun ji srid du mtho 'tsham pa mnags par bya snyam nas 
[\[7b.3\]]smras pa/_ngang pa gnyis kyis kho bo khyer ba ma yin gyis 'di ltar kho bo rang 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang /_shing shor nas de sa la lhung ste/_de dag gis bzung nas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar byas pa dang lhas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_mdza' bshes phan par 'dod 
[\[7b.4\]]rnams kyis/_/smras pa gang zhig mi 'dzin pa/_/rus sbal gyis ni shing btang ltar/_/de ni lhung zhing las par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na ngang pa ches rgan shos gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na ngang pa cig shos gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo 
[\[7b.5\]]yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rus sbal gang yin pa de ni 'dun pa 'di yin te/_'di de'i tshe na yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi ngag mi nyan pas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur la/_da ltar yang 'di tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi ngag mi nyan pas bsgo ba 
[\[7b.6\]]rna la gzon pa dang /_cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su bcug go/_/bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i ltung byed de bcu gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[7b.7\]]bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun ni bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]bsgrubs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu lngas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par sgrub par mdzad de/_lnga gang zhe na/_nang du yang dag 'jog la bzhed pa dang /_lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang /_nad 
[\[8a.2\]]pa la lta bar bzhed pa dang /_gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang /_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o/_/don 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang /_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 
[\[8a.3\]]'cha' bar bzhed pas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par sgrub par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas lde mig bsnams te kun dga'i ra ba nas kun dga'i ra bar 
[\[8a.4\]]gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du/_khang khyim nas khang khyim du/_'chag sa nas 'chag sa dang /_gol bar gshegs shing mthar gyis gshegs pa na/_khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang zhig ga la ba der gshegs so/_/de'i tshe na khang pa chen po'i gtsug 
[\[8a.5\]]lag khang de na gnas mal rab tu mang po dag bla gab med par bzhag cing /_dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po yang 'dus par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang de na gnas mal rab tu mang po dag bla gab med par bzhag cing dus ma yin pa'i 
[\[8a.6\]]sprin chen po 'dus pa yang gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang e ma zhes gsung zhing smad nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis pags pa dang /_sha dang khrag dag btsir cing btsir cing sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag 
[\[8a.7\]]byed pa gang yin pa de la dge slong dag drod mi shes pa dang /_so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod do snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po de phyir dgag pa mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]gyis dgag pa mdzad pas de steng gi bar snang la chu lon lta bur gyur te/_mtha' na 'dug cing shas cher bcom ldan 'das la sdod cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas mal rab tu mang po de dag skyabs yod par brubs nas dbyar gyi na bza' ras chen 
[\[8b.2\]]bsnams te sku bsil bar bzhed nas bang rim na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po de dgag pa'i rdzu 'phrul de slar bsdu ba mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de slar bsdu ba mdzad nas 'brug grags shing char gyis 
[\[8b.3\]]gshong dang thang thams cad tshim par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dag bsil nas zhabs gnyis bsil te/_nang du yang dag 'jog gi slad du gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/de nas dge slong bsod snyoms sgrub pas bsod snyoms blangs nas/_
[\[8b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis bsod snyoms sgrub pa'i dge slong la/_dge slong ji lta zas bsod dam/_dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par byas sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas/_bcom 
[\[8b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis dge slong bsod snyoms sgrub pa la/_dge slong ji lta zas bsod dam/_dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par byas sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa dang /_des gsol pa/_btsun pa te por zas bsod cing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par bgyis so/_/
[\[8b.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas gtsug lag khang gi slad rol du zhabs gnyis bsil te/_nang du yang dag 'jog gi slad du gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/_dge slong 
[\[8b.7\]]gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas 'di na dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma lon par shes nas/_lde mig khyer te kun dga'i ra ba nas 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]kun dga'i ra bar/_gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du/_khang khyim nas khang khyim du/_'chag sa nas 'chag sa dang /_gol bar song zhing mthar gyis 'gro ba na/_khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang zhig ga la ba der phyin nas/_ngas khang pa 
[\[9a.2\]]chen po'i gtsug lag khang de na gnas mal rab tu mang po dag bla gab med par bzhag cing dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po 'dus pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang e ma zhes byas te smad nas/_'di snyam du bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis pags pa dang /_
[\[9a.3\]]sha dang khrag dag btsir cing btsir cing sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag byed pa gang yin pa de la dge slong dag drod mi shes pa dang /_so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod do snyam du dgongs kyis dge slong dag khyed kyis dad pas sbyin par bya ba la drod ran par 
[\[9a.4\]]yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_spang zhing yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_dus su yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_brtag cing yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_khad kyis yongs su longs spyad na legs so//_//bar sdom la/_drod ran pa dang spang ba dang /_/
[\[9a.5\]]de bzhin dus dang brtag pa dang /_/khad kyis yongs su spyad pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drod ran pa dang /_sbang ba dang /_dus dang /_brtag pa dang /_khad kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[9a.6\]]dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge 
[\[9a.7\]]slong gang dge 'dun gyi khri'am/_khri'u 'am/_stan nang tshangs can nam/_la ba'am/_sngas sam/_gor bu bla gab med par bting ngam 'ding du bcug nas ma bsdus sam/_sdud du ma bcug par de nas song na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad do/_/dge slong rab tu mang po dag don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur dong ba na ri brags shig tu phyin nas/_de dag gis ri brags der gnas bca' bar brtsams pa dang /_ri brags de na gtsug lag khang zhig 
[\[9b.2\]]yod nas de na de dag la mi zhig gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag gtsug lag khang du mi gnas sam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mi gnas te kho bo cag ni don mthun la rag las pa yin pas/_gal te kho bo cag gtsug lag khang du gnas par gyur na don mthun 
[\[9b.3\]]gyis kho bo cag bor te 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa dag bzhud la gtsug lag khang du gzims shig dang /_don mthun cha ba'i dus kyi tshe bdag gis 'phags pa dag bslang bar bgyi'o/_/de dag gtsug lag khang du dong ste gnas mal 
[\[9b.4\]]bshams nas nyal ba dang /_don mthun chas te/_glang tha ma bkal zin pa dang /_de nas mi de sad nas de song ste dge slong rnams la smras pa/_'phags pa dag don mthun chas kyis myur du spyon cig_/de dag ji srid du lag pa dag bsnyal bar byed/_so shing 
[\[9b.5\]]dag 'dor bar byed/_gnas mal dag gtong bar byed pa de srid du don mthun thal bar gyur nas/_de dag phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'dong ba na chom rkun pa dag gis bcom par gyur nas de dag mthar gyis gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang /_de dag dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[9b.6\]]mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so/_/ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bde bar brgyus re skan/_ci nyes/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong 
[\[9b.7\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'khod pa dag la bcol bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'khod pa dag la bcol bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_mnyan yod na khyim bdag gnyis 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]shig 'khod pa de gnyis phan tshun khon yod cing gcig ni dad pa dang ldan pa yin la/_gcig ni ma dad pa yin nas/_dad pa can gyis bsams pa/_khon spel bas ci bya ste/_khon zhi bar byas song la rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas de rgyal byed kyi 
[\[10a.2\]]tshal du song ste dge slong gi gan du rab tu byung ngo /_/khyim bdag ma dad pa shos des mi zhig la dris pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyim bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba de gar song /_des smras pa/_rab tu byung ngo /_/gang du/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi nang du'o/_/ci de mi 
[\[10a.3\]]'jigs pa'i grong khyer yin nam/_kho bo der yang song la de la gnod par bya'o/_/'jig rten ni mdza' bshes dang /_dgra bo dang /_tha mal pa yin pas gzhan zhig de'i gan du song ste smras pa/_khyod la khyim bdag de gshe'o/_/des bsams pa/_bdag 
[\[10a.4\]]nyes dmigs gang gis rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs de nyid kyis rjes su 'brel to snyam nas de mkhan po'i drung du song ste/_smras pa/_mkhan po bdag nyes dmigs gang gis rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs de nyid kyis rjes su 'brel bar gyur gyis mchi'o/_/bu gang 
[\[10a.5\]]du 'gro/_/rgyal po'i khab tu'o/_/de ltar gyis shig_/de rgyal po'i khab tu 'phags pa dang /_khyim bdag de yang rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs nas dge slong la dris pa/_'phags pa khyim bdag 'di zhes bgyi ba de ci rab tu byung ngam/_rab tu byung ngo /_/de gar mchis/_
[\[10a.6\]]rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo /_/des bsams pa/_ci de mi 'jigs pa'i grong khyer yin nam/_bdag der yang song la de la mtshams gcad par bya'o snyam nas de yang rgyal po'i khab tu 'phags so/_/dge slong ni dus su 'gro zhing dus ma yin par mi 'gro la/_khyim pa ni 
[\[10a.7\]]dus su yang 'gro/_/dus ma yin par yang 'gro bas dge slong de ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig tu zhugs pa dang /_khyim bdag des mthong nas des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis 'di la cung zad smra ba'i rigs na 'di'i grogs dge slong dag mang bas bdag la gnod pa 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]byed par 'gyur gyis bdag gis sang 'di shes par bya'o snyam mo/_/dge slong de yang nang par sngar langs te dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag 'gros gnas mal 'de re zhes gnas mal gtad pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod 
[\[10b.2\]]gar 'gro/_/rgyal po'i khab tu'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa lam 'di ni dogs pa dang bcas pa yin gyis 'di nas ma 'gro shig_/'di ni lam gzhan yin gyis de nas song zhig_/de lam de nas song ba dang /_khyim bdag de yang nang par sngar langs nas gtsug lag 
[\[10b.3\]]khang du song ste dge slong la dris pa/_'phags pa dge slong 'di zhes bgyi ba gar mchis/_rgyal po'i khab tu'o/_/shul gang nas/_che ge mo zhig nas so/_/de de'i phyi bzhin song ba dang /_dge slong des de mthong nas des de la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khon 
[\[10b.4\]]zhi bar gyur cig_/des smras pa/_da zhi bar bya'o zhes khyim bdag des dge slong de shin tu brdeg brdeg nas lhung bzed kyang bcag_/chos gos dag kyang dral te tha ma ma shi tsam byas te btang nas/_dbugs de'u chad pa las sos te phyir log nas gtsug lag 
[\[10b.5\]]khang de nyid du phyin pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/_des skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod nas yang smras pa/_gal te kho bos tshe dang ldan pa dag gis bstan pa ltar 
[\[10b.6\]]ma byas na kho bo gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 
[\[10b.7\]]'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi khri'am/_khri'u'am/_stan nang tshangs can nam/_la 
[\[11a.2\]]ba'am/_sngas sam/_gor bu bla gab med par bting ngam/_'ding du bcug nas ma bsdus sam/_sdud du ma bcug gam/_dge slong 'khod pa la ma bcol bar de nas song na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/
[\[11a.3\]]dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o/_/khri zhes bya ba ni khri nyid do/_/khri'u zhes bya ba ni khri'u nyid do/_/stan nang tshangs can zhes bya ba ni shing bal can no/_/la ba zhes bya ba ni la ba nyid do/_/sngas zhes bya ba ni sngas su 
[\[11a.4\]]gzhug pa'o/_/gor bu zhes bya ba ni gru bzhi'o/_/bla gab med par zhes bya ba ni ma g.yogs par ro/_/bting ngam zhes bya ba ni rang gis so/_/'ding du bcug nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/_/ma bsdus sam zhes bya ba ni rang gis so/_/sdud du ma bcug gam zhes bya 
[\[11a.5\]]ba ni gzhan no/_/dge slong 'khod pa la zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang 'dug pa la'o/_/ma bcol bar zhes bya ba la bcol ba ni rnam pa lnga ste/_gtsug lag khang 'de re zhes bya ba dang /_gtsug lag khang ltos shig ces bya ba'am/_gnas mal 'de re zhes bya ba 
[\[11a.6\]]dang /_gnas mal sdus shig ces bya ba dang /_sgo lcags chug shig ces bya ba nyid ni lnga pa'o/_/gal te dge slong med na dge tshul la bcol bar bya'o/_/gal te dge tshul med na khyim bdag la bcol bar bya'o/_/gal te khyim bdag med na phyogs bzhir 
[\[11a.7\]]rnam par bltas te lde mig sbas nas 'gro bar bya'o/_/gal te lam kar dge slong mthong na kho bos phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu lde mig sbas kyis long shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de nas song na zhes bya ba ni nyen kor spangs na'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong gi gnas mal gyi nyen kor gang lags/_nye ba 'khor ngas bram ze gro bzhin skyes la a mra'i sdong po shin tu me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_yal ga'i tshogs 
[\[11b.2\]]phun sum tshogs pa 'dom bdun gyis bar du chod pa'i a mra'i sdong po bdun po gang dag yin pa de dag la 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yod par bstan pa de ni dge slong gi gnas mal gyi nyen kor yin no/_/de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag 
[\[11b.3\]]ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes pa ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor 
[\[11b.4\]]ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal bla gab med par bzhag ste de nas song na ji srid du nyen kor ma spangs 
[\[11b.5\]]kyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_nyen kor spangs na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te lam kar bdag gi dge 'dun gyi gnas mal shos 'di lta bu zhig tu gzhag go snyam du dran zhing /_gal te de 'di snyam du bdag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa dag 
[\[11b.6\]]sdud par 'gyur ro snyam na dge slong des phyin cad de ltar mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya ste ltung ba de yang chos bzhin du phyir bya'o/_/gal te lam kar dge slong der 'gro ba mthong zhing /_gal te de 'di snyam du 'dis sdud par 'gyur 
[\[11b.7\]]ro snyam na de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bos dge 'dun gyi gnas mal phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu bzhag pa de sdus shig ces brjod par bya zhing dge slong des phyin cad de ltar mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya ste ltung ba de yang chos 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]bzhin du phyir bya'o/_/dge slong des kyang dge slong de la khas blangs nas gus par bya ste bsdu bar bya'o/_/gal te sdud par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gal te der son nas bdag gis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal phyogs 'di lta bu zhig 
[\[12a.2\]]tu gzhag go snyam du dran zhing gal te de 'di snyam du bdag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa dag sdud par 'gyur ro snyam na/_dge slong des phyin cad de ltar mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya ste ltung ba de yang chos bzhin du phyir 
[\[12a.3\]]bya'o/_/gal te der son nas dge slong der 'gro ba mthong zhing /_gal te de 'di snyam du 'dis sdud par 'gyur ro snyam na de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bos dge 'dun gyi gnas mal phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu bzhag pa de sdus shig ces brjod par bya zhing dge slong des 
[\[12a.4\]]phyin cad de ltar mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya ste ltung ba de yang chos bzhin du phyir bya'o/_/dge slong des kyang dge slong de la khas blangs nas gus par bya ste bsdu bar bya'o/_/gal te sdud par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[12a.5\]]slong gis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal bla gab med par bzhag nas gtsug lag khang du 'dir bdag gis sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnyam par gzhag go snyam pa'am/_sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnam par grol bar bya'o snyam pas nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir 
[\[12a.6\]]'jug par byed cing /_de ting nge 'dzin de las mtshan mo'i thun dang po'am/_thun phyed na ldang bar byed na gal te gnas mal phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur la/_gal te phan phun du gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal bla gab 
[\[12a.7\]]med par bzhag nas gtsug lag khang du 'dir bdag gis sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnyam par gzhag go snyam pa'am/_sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnam par grol bar bya'o snyam pas nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir 'jug par byed cing de ting nge 'dzin de 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]las mtshan mo'i gung thun nam/_thun tha ma'am/_skya rengs ma shar ba'am/_skya rengs shar ba'am/_nyi ma ma shar ba'am/_nyi ma shar ba'am/_nyi ma'i brgyad cha shar ba'am/_nyi ma'i bzhi cha shar ba'am/_phyed ma yol ba'am/_phyed yol ba'am/_nyi ma'i bzhi 
[\[12b.2\]]cha lus pa'am/_nyi ma'i brgyad cha lus pa'am/_nyi ma ma nub pa'am/_nyi ma nub pa'am/_rgyu skar dag ma shar ba'am/_rgyu skar dag shar ba na ldang bar byed na/_gal te gnas mal phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur la/_gal te phan phun du gyur na ltung byed du 
[\[12b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa gnas mal gyi phan phun du mchis/_nye ba 'khor gnyis te/_rlung gi phan phun dang /_char pa'i phan phun no/_/rlung gi phan phun gang zhe na/_rim pa gcig nas rim pa 
[\[12b.4\]]gnyis pa'i bar du bzlog par gyur pa'o/_/char pa'i phan phun gang zhe na/_rim pa gcig nas rim pa gnyis pa'i bar du thal bar gyur pa'o//_//bar sdom la/_chos bstan pa dang mgron 'bod dang /_/gtsug lag khang dang chos nyan dang /_/'dug pa dang 
[\[12b.5\]]ni gnyis po dang /_/sku gzugs dang ni nad pa dang /_/stan dang lnga dang gcig la gnyis/_/phyi bzhin 'gro dang grogs bya dang /_/kha ton pa dang zhu ba dang /_/stan bkur ba dang zan bcad dang /_/brub pa dang ni bcol ba dang /_/me dang chu yang de bzhin no/_/bram ze 
[\[12b.6\]]dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong dag gi gan du 'ongs te smras pa/_'phags pa dag chos bstan du gsol/_dge slong dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di na bzhugs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du deng shig dang /_bcom ldan 'das ston par 
[\[12b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa dag ston pa nyag gcig lags pas re zhig lha rnams la chos ston tam/_'on te klu rnams la'am/_'on te gnod sbyin rnams la'am/_'on te dri za rnams la'am/_'on te mi rnams la chos ston sus 'tshal gyis khyed kyis kyang ston cig_/
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis dge slong rnams kyis kyang chos bstan par 
[\[13a.2\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis kyang chos bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag 'greng bzhin du chos ston par byed pa na de dag skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis 
[\[13a.3\]]smras pa/_'di dag skyes 'bul ba dag 'ongs pa yin nam ci zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dug ste chos bstan par bya'o/_/dge slong dag rang rang gi stan dag thogs te 'dong ba na ma 
[\[13a.4\]]dad pa dag gis mthong nas rol mo ltar 'dong ngam ci zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis dge 'dun gyi stan dag nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[13a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi stan dag nye bar gzhag par rjes su gnang ba khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas/_des dge 'dun la khri lnga brgya phul ba dang /_de dag thams cad chos ston par byed pa na ca cor gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[13a.6\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gcig gis chos bstan par bya'o/_/de dag gis gang gis bstan par bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nas bzung ste/_dge 'dun gyi gsar bu'i 
[\[13a.7\]]bar gyis chos bstan par bya'o/_/gal te gsar bu'i mtha' dag chos ston par byed pa na/_rgan pa'i mtha' dag mi brjid par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste chos bstan par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]mi brjid par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgan pa'i mtha' logs su stan gnyis sam gsum bzhag ste chos bstan par bya'o/_/der yang chos ston pa mi brjid par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgan pa'i mtha' 
[\[13b.2\]]logs su stan gnyis sam gsum bzhag ste seng ge'i khri bsham par bya'o/_/chos ston pa 'dzeg dka' nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te phyogs nges pa yin na so phag dag gis them skas bya'o/_/gal te phyogs nges pa ma yin na shing dag 
[\[13b.3\]]gis them skas bya'o/_/de mchil ma 'dor bas yid du mi 'ong bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mchil ma'i snod gzhag par bya'o/_/der sbrang bu dag 'du nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gcal blug par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[13b.4\]]ci zhig blug pa mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bye ma'am thal ba blug par bya'o/_/de dri nga bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dus dus su sbyang ba dang bskam par bya'o/_/de dag gral tshar gcig kho nar ring por shom par byed 
[\[13b.5\]]pa na gzhon pa'i mtha' dag gis mi thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas mal rnam pa gnyis su bsham par bya ste/_zla gam gyi rnam pa lta bu'am/_rdzing bu'i rnam pa lta bur ro/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis dge slong rnams khyim 
[\[13b.6\]]gzhan du mgron du bos pa na dge slong dag dang du mi len nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe na ni mu stegs can dag sbyin gnas lags mod/_da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 
[\[13b.7\]]du byung bas khyed cag sbyin gnas lags te/_gal te khyed cag dang du mi bzhes na/_ci bdag cag dge ba'i shul rgyags ma mchis par 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi bar bgyi 'am zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dang du blang bar bya'o/_/de dag stan dag g.yar po byed pa na dge slong rnams kyis mi ster nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stan dag brnyan par bya'o/_/dge slong dag zan zos nas/_stan de dag 
[\[14a.2\]]khyer te 'dong ba na de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed bzhud cig dang bdag cag gis 'tshal te mchi'o zhes zer ba na/_dge slong dag 'gyod pas mi 'jog nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhag par bya'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags 
[\[14a.3\]]pa dag skom mnabs te bzhud kyi bar du re zhig gzhes shig ces zer ba na dge slong dag mi sdod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bsdad par bya'o/_/de dag la de lta bu'i rkyen byung nas des na stan de dag mi skyel nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[14a.4\]]pa/_blang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas de dag gis gang gis blang ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas pa dag gis gaN+DI chung ngu brdungs te blang bar bya'o/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa 
[\[14a.5\]]can dag gtsug lag khang du lhags te dge slong dag mgron du 'bod pa na dge slong dag dang du mi len nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dang du blang bar bya'o/_/de dag dge slong dag zan zos nas stan dag g.yar po byed pa na dge slong dag gis mi ster nas de dag 
[\[14a.6\]]gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag ni khyed la bshos gsol ba lags na/_khyed kyis bdag cag la stan dag mi g.yar ram zhes zer nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stan dag brnyan par bya'o/_/de dag gis de nyid du bor te dong ba na de dag ma byin par len 
[\[14a.7\]]pa dag gis brkus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bsrung ba'i dge slong gzhag par bya'o/_/de de dag gi nang nyid du zhugs pa dang de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa ci yang bzhed dam/_des smras pa/_kho bo mi 'dod de/_'di ltar kho bo stan dag srung ngo /_/
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa ci bdag cag khyed kyi gdan dag rku snyam mam/_gal te thugs mi ches na snoms te bzhud cig ces zer nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i nang du 'jug par mi bya bar mtha' gcig tu 'dug ste/_gal te kha ton pa 
[\[14b.2\]]yin na ni des kha ton bya zhing de la yang sems gtad par bya'o/_/gal te spong ba pa yin na ni des kyang mtha' gcig tu 'dug ste yid la bya ba bskyed par bya zhing de la yang sems gtad par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe dong bar gyur pa de'i tshe na brub par bya'o/_/de dag chang gi tshigs 
[\[14b.3\]]ma dang /_snum dang /_bshang ba dang /_gci bas ma rung bar gyur pa na dge slong dag 'dor bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag dor bar mi bya bar gang dag chang gi tshigs mas ma rung bar gyur pa de dag ni chu dag gis sbyang bar bya'o/_/gang dag 
[\[14b.4\]]snum gyis ma rung bar gyur pa de dag ni chal gyis sbyang bar bya'o/_/gang dag bshang ba dang gci bas ma rung bar gyur pa de dag ni sa'am/_'dag rdzas sam/_lci bas sbyang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mnyan par bya'o/_/zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong 
[\[14b.5\]]dag bla gab med par byed pa na nyi ma tsha nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bla re gdags par bya'o/_/rlung dang char byung nas de dag gis gnas mal bor te 'dong bas de ma rung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_brub par bya'o/_/de 
[\[14b.6\]]dag gis sus brub pa mi shes te/_su gang la la 'dug pa des de 'brub par byed pa na rgan pa'i mtha' dag la gzhi bzang po bshams pa de dag dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis brub par mi nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgan pa'i mtha' 
[\[14b.7\]]dag gi ni gzhon pa rnams kyis brub par bya zhing /_gzhon pa'i mtha' dag gi ni rgan pa rnams kyis brub par bya'o/_/brubs nas tshoms gcig tu byed pas de dag ma rung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mthun pa dang mthun par gzhag par 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]bya'o/_/de dag phyis chos mnyan pa mi byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_g.yogs pa'am/_bla gab med par bya'o/_/de ltar chos nyan pa na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis nor bus spras pa dang /_gser dang dngul gyis 
[\[15a.2\]]brgyan pa'i gos dag gis seng ge'i khri bshams pa dang /_dge slong dag 'gyod pas mi 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim pa'i gos dag yin par bya ste/_mi rtag pa nyid yid la bya bas zil gyis mnan nas 'dug par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod 
[\[15a.3\]]par mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal mi 'brub cing de nyid du 'dor ba na de dag ma rung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag kyang brub par bya'o/_/khyim bdag gcig la gtsug lag khang dgon pa dang /_grong mtha' pa 
[\[15a.4\]]gnyis yod nas de'i gtsug lag khang grong mtha' pa na ni gnas mal mang du yod la/_gtsug lag khang dgon pa na ni gnas mal nyung ngo /_/dus gzhan zhig na dgon pa'i gtsug lag khang du dus ston byung nas/_dge slong dgon pa pa dag gi grong mtha'i gtsug 
[\[15a.5\]]lag khang nas gnas mal g.yar ba dang /_dge slong grong mtha' pa dag gis ma ster nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_brnyan par bya'o/_/gal te char 'bab bam/_char 'bab du dogs na brnyan par mi bya'o/_/lam kar rlung dang /_char bab pas de 
[\[15a.6\]]dag ma rung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shing ljon pa'i drung ngam/_rtsig drung du bcer te rdzas gcig gis g.yog par bya'o/_/de dag rdzas bzang pos g.yog par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdzas ngan pas g.yog par 
[\[15a.7\]]bya'o/_/dus ston zin nas de dag gtsug lag khang 'di yang khyim bdag de'i yin no snyam nas phyir mi 'bul nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mthus dgug par bya'o/_/ngo mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas mal 'di ni khyim 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]bdag che ge mo zhig gi dgon pa'i gtsug lag khang gi yin no/_/'di ni grong mtha'i gtsug lag khang gi yin no zhes yi ge bri zhing gnas mal ji ltar nges par byas pa bzhin du longs spyad par bya'o/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste 
[\[15b.2\]]phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bgres pa'i mtha' 
[\[15b.3\]]logs na bzhugs pa de'i tshe na bgres pa'i mtha' brjid par gyur cing /_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bgres pa'i mtha' logs na mi bzhugs pa de'i tshe na bgres pa'i mtha' mi brjid par gyur na/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis 'dzam bu'i grib 
[\[15b.4\]]ma la bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs bgyid du stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnang gis byed du chug shig_/des 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug ste/_de rgan pa'i mtha' logs su bzhag go/_/rlung dang char pa byung nas 
[\[15b.5\]]dge slong rnams kyis de bor te dong ba dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag khyed kyis ston pa yang bor ro zhes smod par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim pa'am/_dge tshul gyis spyan drang bar bya'o/_/khyim pa yang med/_dge tshul yang 
[\[15b.6\]]med nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams kyis ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed de spyan drang bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag na bar gyur nas de dag la su yang mi lta nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nad pa dus gsum du blta bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[15b.7\]]'das kyis nad pa dus gsum du blta bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag gis gang gis blta bar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nas bzung ste dge 'dun gyi gsar bu'i bar gyis blta bar bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis nad pa blta bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag nad pa lta bar byed pa na/_de dag 'greng bzhin du nad pa lta bar byed pas nad pa dag nyam nga bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dug 
[\[16a.2\]]ste nad pa blta bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dug ste nad pa blta bar bya'o/_/zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag rang rang gi stan dag khyer te 'dong ba na ma dad pa dag 'phags pa dag rol mo ltar 'dong ngam ci zhes mtho 'tsham pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[16a.3\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stan dag khyer te 'dong bar mi bya bar 'di ltar nad g.yog gis stan dag bsham par bya'o/_/drug sde dag nad pa ltar dong ba na de dag de nyid na 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis yun ring du 'khod nas nad g.yog rnams 
[\[16a.4\]]kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag nad pa'i bya ba yongs su nyams par gyur gyis deng shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_de yang gyis la gnas mal yang ltos shig dang de ltar na nad pa shi ba'i yo byad drug 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang khyed nad pa'i bya ba yongs su 
[\[16a.5\]]nyams par ma byed par deng shig dang kho bo cag gis blta bar bya'o/_/nad g.yog de dag gis nad pa la ma bcol bar dong ba dang /_drug sde dag kyang dong nas rlung dang char pa dag byung ba na nad pas gnas mal rtul ma nus nas de dag ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de dge 
[\[16a.6\]]slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lnga po 'di dag la bcol bar mi bya ste/_ngo tsha med pa dang /_nad dang bcas pa dang /_rgas pa 'khogs shing nyam chung ba dang /_na ba sbyor mi bzod pa dang /_
[\[16a.7\]]rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa thams cad la'o//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa khri gcig la dge slong gnyis mchis na de gang dag gis 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]brub par bgyi/_gang phyis langs pas so/_/gnyis ka dus gcig tu langs na gzhon pas so/_/gnyi ga gzhon na gnyi gas brub par bya'o/_/slob dpon dang mkhan po dag 'chag tu dong ba na dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas gtsug lag khang na 'khod pa na de 
[\[16b.2\]]dag chu med pa nas ut+pa la bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phel nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag gis slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag gi phyi bzhin 'gro bar bya'o/_/slob dpon dang /_mkhan po 
[\[16b.3\]]dag stan dag khyer te 'dong zhing lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag lag pa brkyang ste 'gro nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag gis slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag gi stan dag khyer te 'gro bar bya'o/_/
[\[16b.4\]]slob dpon dang mkhan po de dag 'chags na phyag dar byed pa na lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag lag pa brkyang ste 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag gis phyags ma blangs te/_slob dpon dang /_mkhan 
[\[16b.5\]]po dag snying las chung ngur bya'o/_/mkhar lan byed par bskos na ni ltung ba med do/_/slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag gos dag 'tshem pa na lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag snying las chung ngur 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhan cig gnas pa 
[\[16b.6\]]dang /_nye gnas dag gis khab blang zhing /_slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag snying las chung ngur bya'o/_/tshem 'drub par bskos na ni ltung ba med do/_/lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag gis slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag gi lung mnos te de dag nyid kyi mdun na 
[\[16b.7\]]klog nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong kha ton slob pa dag gis lung mnos nas thos pa'i nyen kor spangs te snang ba'i nye 'khor du 'dug nas lung phog la bklag par bya'o/_/dge slong spong ba pa dag gis gdams ngag mnos nas mtha' gcig tu song ste 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]yid la bya ba bskyed par bya'o/_/lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas de dag las su bskos par 'gro ba na de dag slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag la zhus te song ba na/_der song ba de dag la las gzhan byung nas de dag yang phyir 'ong zhing zhu bar byed nas 
[\[17a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te der dong ba rnams la las gzhan byung na de dag gis yang dang yang du phyir 'ongs te zhu bar mi bya bar de nyid du las bya ste/_de dag gis sngar zhus pa de nyid kyis thams cad zhus pa yin no/_/de dag gis der stan dag khyer ba phyir khyer 
[\[17a.3\]]te mi 'ong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis stan khyer te 'ong bar bya'o/_/de dag gis ches sngar stan dag khyer te dong ba dang /_slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag la gang gis de dag mi 'gro ba de 'dra ba'i rkyen byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[17a.4\]]stsal pa/_de dag gis slob dpon dang mkhan po dag la 'chag tu 'gro 'am mi 'gro zhes zhu bar bya zhing gal te 'gro'o zhes zer na stan dag bskur bar bya'o/_/gal te mi 'gro zhes zer na stan dag bskur bar mi bya'o/_/khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong 
[\[17a.5\]]gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du bshos la spyan drangs pa na/_gzhon nu zhig dge ba'i phyogs la shin tu brtson nas des bsams pa/_deng bdag bsod snyoms la 'jug mi dgos pas ji srid du gdugs tshod la bab par ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du dge ba'i phyogs la tron bya'o 
[\[17a.6\]]snyam nas/_de stan khyer te phyi rol du song ba dang /_dge slong rnams dus snga ma tshogs su gtsug lag khang gi sgo bcad de dong ngo /_/des kyang dus shes par byas te 'ongs pa dang /_ji tsam na gtsug lag khang gi sgo bcad pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag zan bcad pa 
[\[17a.7\]]ni bla'i bdag ltung ba dang bcas na mi rung ngo snyam nas de zan bcad pa byas pa dang /_de'i lus la ji srid du mdangs yod pa de srid du des dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas so/_/gang gi tshe lus las mdangs yal ba de'i tshe na glos phab ste nyal ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gal te zan gzhan gyi yin zhes te lto yang gzhan gyi yin snyam mam/_ci na khyed ci tsam gyis dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed kyang mi nus pa de tsam za'am/_sus zos/_khyod kyis ma zos sam/_ma zos so/_/ci'i phyir/_des skabs de dge slong 
[\[17b.2\]]rnams la brjod nas/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams kyis dus snga ma tshogs su khyim gzhan du 'jug par mi bya bar dus shes par byas te gaN+DI brdungs nas 'jug par bya'o/_/slob 
[\[17b.3\]]dpon dang /_mkhan po dag gis kyang rang rang gi 'khor la blta bar bya'o/_/blo bur du 'ongs pa 'ga' zhig yod na de ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis blta bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong sgo bcad par 'ongs na des stan de rtsig pa'i drung ngam shing ljon pa'i drung du bzhag ste 
[\[17b.4\]]'gro bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis gya tshom du zan gcad par mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis gya tshom du zan gcod par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te/_de dag stan dag la 'dug 'dug nas de nyid du bor 
[\[17b.5\]]te dong nas/_de dag sus kyang ma brubs pas de nyid du ma rung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gis mthong ba des brub par bya'o/_/dge slong rgan po 'khogs pa nyam chung ba dang /_nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa dag gis de dag bla gab med par bzhag 
[\[17b.6\]]pa mthong zhing de dag gis 'brub par mi nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis dge skos la brjod par bya zhing /_des kyang gus par bya ste brub par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis gnas mal dag bla gab med par bting nas dge slong gcig pu zhig la 
[\[17b.7\]]bcol nas bsod snyoms la zhugs shing gzhan gyis kyang de nyid la bcol/_gzhan gyis kyang de nyid la bcol te bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_rlung dang char byung ste des brub par ma nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab tu mang po dag gis dge slong gcig 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]la bcol bar mi bya'o/_/gal te de lta bu'i rkyen byung na des gaN+DI brdung bar bya zhing de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis gus par bya ste brub par bya'o/_/de dag gis kyang gaN+DI thos nas gus pas 'gro bar bya'o/_/nags kyi nang na gtsug lag khang 
[\[18a.2\]]'dug pa la me shor nas mes grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_yul 'khor yang tshig la thug_/spyod yul dang spyod yul gyi lam dang /_'chag sa dang /_dag ra dang /_sgo khang dang /_gtsug lag khang yang tshig la thug pa na/_dge slong 
[\[18a.3\]]rnams kyis rang rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos dag ni phyung /_dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dag ni tshig nas khyim bdag 'ongs te dge slong rnams la dris pa/_'phags pa dag ci dag ma tshig gam/_ci yang ma tshig go/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dag ga re/_tshig go/_/
[\[18a.4\]]ci yang ma tshig pa de/_de 'dra 'am/_kho bo cag gi ci yang ma tshig go/_/des smras pa/_kye ma'o dge 'dun gyi gnas mal tsam 'byin kyang ma phod ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[18a.5\]]pa/_dge 'dun gyi gnas mal yang dbyung bar bya'o/_/de dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal 'byin pa na de dag gi gang zag gi gnas mal dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dag tshig nas/_de dag phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[18a.6\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zag ni phongs par 'gyur la/_dge 'dun ni mi 'gyur bas je dang por gang zag gi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dbyung bar bya zhing de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyi dbyung bar bya'o/_/de dag phyung ba na ma 
[\[18a.7\]]byin pa len pa dag gis brkus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der srung ma dge slong gzhag par bya'o/_/de dag mthu dang ldan pa 'jog par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mthu chung ngu gzhag par bya'o/_/de dag me mi bzod 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]par 'jug par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te me mi bzod pa yin na 'jug par mi bya ste/_gal te tshig na yang de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/ser che ba'i dbus na gtsug lag khang 'dug cing /_steng gi ri kha nas char pa'i rgyun sbom po bab 
[\[18b.2\]]pa na/_gtsug lag khang du chu byung zhing grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_yul 'khor yang khyer la thug_/spyod yul dang spyod yul gyi lam dang /_dag ra dang /_sgo khang dang /_gtsug lag khang yang khyer la thug pa na/_dge slong rnams kyis rang rang 
[\[18b.3\]]gi lhung bzed dang chos gos dag ni phyung /_dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dag ni khyer nas/_khyim bdag 'ongs nas dge slong rnams la dris pa/_'phags pa dag ci dag ma khyer ram/_ci yang ma khyer ro/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dag ga re/_khyer ro/_/ci yang ma 
[\[18b.4\]]khyer ba de de 'dra'am/_kho bo cag gi ci yang ma khyer ro/_/des smras pa/_kye ma'o dge 'dun gyi gnas mal tsam 'byin kyang ma phod ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun 
[\[18b.5\]]gyi gnas mal yang dbyung bar bya'o/_/de dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal 'byin pa na de dag gi gang zag gi gnas mal dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dag khyer nas de dag phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[18b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zag ni phongs par 'gyur la/_dge 'dun ni mi 'gyur bas je dang por gang zag gi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dbyung bar bya zhing /_de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyi dbyung bar bya'o/_/de dag phyung ba na ma byin par len pa dag gis 
[\[18b.7\]]brkus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der srung ma dge slong gzhag par bya'o/_/de dag mthu dang ldan pa 'jog par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mthu chung ngu gzhag par bya'o/_/de dag chu mi bzod par 'jug par byed nas/_bcom 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te chu mi bzod pa yin na 'jug par mi bya ste/_gal te khyer na yang de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/
[\[19a.2\]]gnas mal gyi ltung byed de bcu bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//bar sdom la/_lho lam dang ni ma bor dang /_/ma dris 'dor dang mthus 'dor dang /_/khron pa dang ni blang ba dang /_/dag ra dang ni 'chag sa dang /_/lci ba gzhag pa tha ma yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[19a.3\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/lho lam nas dge slong rgan pa dang /_gzhon pa gnyis shig bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mnyan yod du 'ongs nas/_rgan shos kyi gtsug lag 
[\[19a.4\]]khang ni gnas mal dang bcas pa zhig tu bskos/_gzhon pa shos kyi gtsug lag khang ni gnas mal med pa zhig tu bskos pa dang /_gzhon pa shos de sgrub phod pa zhig yin pas des rtswa mang po dag blangs nas pus mo nub tsam gyi gding ba bshams so/_/rgan pa 
[\[19a.5\]]des bsams pa/_gzhon nu de'i gtsug lag khang ji lta bu zhig tu bskos pa je bltas 'gro'o snyam nas de der song ba dang /_ji tsam na gding ba bzang po bshams pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag ji srid du gnas mal phyir gtod par byed pa de srid du sang 'gro ba 
[\[19a.6\]]'phyis par 'gyur gyis 'di nyid du 'dug go snyam nas/_des gnas mal dang bcas pa'i gtsug lag khang de dge slong gnas mal 'bog pa la phyir gtad nas/_de gnyis gtsug lag khang der mtshan mo gnas nas nang par sngar langs te dong ngo /_/phyogs de sa 
[\[19a.7\]]snum zhing dngar ba yin pas rtswa bting ba dag la sril dag chags nas gtsug lag khang de'i phyi nang bcas pa thams cad sril gyis khyab par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]spyan drangs pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun ni bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrubs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par 
[\[19b.2\]]bsgrub par mdzad de/_lnga gang zhe na/_nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed pa dang /_lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang /_nad pa la lta bar bzhed pa dang /_gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang /_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar bzhed pa'o/_/
[\[19b.3\]]don 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang /_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar bzhed pas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 
[\[19b.4\]]'dun song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas lde mig bsnams te kun dga'i ra ba nas kun dga'i ra bar gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du/_khang khyim nas khang khyim du/_'chag sa nas 'chag sar dang /_gol bar gshegs shing mthar gyis gshegs 
[\[19b.5\]]pa na/_gtsug lag khang de ga la ba der gshegs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang de sril dag gis phyi nang thams cad khyab par gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang e ma zhes gsungs shing smad nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bram ze dang khyim 
[\[19b.6\]]bdag dad pa can dag gis pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag dag btsir cing btsir cing sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag byed pa gang yin pa de la dge slong dag drod mi shes pa dang /_so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod do snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[19b.7\]]ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag gis ci nas kyang sril dag logs shig tu 'gyur zhing /_sa dag kyang logs shig tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang sril dag 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]kyang logs shig tu 'gyur zhing sa dag kyang logs shig tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung gi lcags kyu dag dang 
[\[20a.2\]]ldan pa'i phyag dra bar 'brel pa/_bsod nams brgya phrag du ma las 'khrungs pa gnyis kyis sril de dag legs par bsdus te bsil ba'i phyogs su gzhag pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang de chag chag btab ste phyag dar mdzad nas 
[\[20a.3\]]nyal nyil gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du bor te phyag dang zhabs gnyis bsil nas nang du yang dag 'jog gi slad du gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/de nas dge slong bsod snyoms sgrub pas bsod snyoms blangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/
[\[20a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis bsod snyoms sgrub pa'i dge slong la dge slong ji lta zas bsod dam/_dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par byas sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas bcom ldan 
[\[20a.5\]]'das kyis dge slong bsod snyoms sgrub pa la dge slong ji lta zas bsod dam/_dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par byas sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa dang /_des gsol pa/_btsun pa zas te por bsod cing dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par bgyis so/_/de nas 
[\[20a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas/_gtsug lag khang gi slad rol du zhabs gnyis bsil te/_nang du yang dag 'jog gi slad du gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/_dge slong gi dge 
[\[20a.7\]]'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di na ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma lon par shes nas lde mig khyer te kun dga'i ra ba nas kun dga'i 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]ra bar/_gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du/_khang khyim nas khang khyim du/_'chag sa nas 'chag sar dang /_gol bar song shing mthar gyis 'gro ba na gtsug lag khang zhig ga la ba der phyin nas ngas gtsug lag khang de sril dag gis phyi nang thams cad khyab par 
[\[20b.2\]]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang /_e ma'o zhes byas te smad nas 'di snyam du bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag dag btsir cing btsir cing sbyin pa dag sbyin bsod nams dag byed pa gang yin pa de la dge slong dag drod mi shes pa dang /_so sor 
[\[20b.3\]]mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod do snyam du dgongs kyis/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dad pas sbyin par bya ba la drod ran par yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_spang zhing yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_dus su yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_brtag cing yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_khad 
[\[20b.4\]]kyis yongs su longs spyad na legs so//_//bar sdom la/_drod ran pa dang spang ba dang /_/de bzhin dus dang brtag pa dang /_/khad kyis yongs su spyad pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drod ran pa dang /_spang ba dang /_dus dang /_brtag pa dang /_khad kyis yongs su 
[\[20b.5\]]longs spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 
[\[20b.6\]]'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du rtswa'i gding ba'am/_lo ma'i gding ba bting ngam/_'ding du bcug nas ma bsdus sam sdud du ma bcug par de nas song na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba 
[\[20b.7\]]la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/_/dge slong rab tu mang po dag don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'dong ba na ri brags shig tu phyin nas/_de na de dag khyim bdag gi gan du song ste/_khyim bdag kho bo cag la gnas g.yor cig ces gnas brnyas 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]pa dang /_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_dam tshig gis g.yar bar bgyi ste/_gal te bdag gi bsod snyoms gsol te gshegs na g.yar ro/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag kho bo cag ni don mthun la rag las pa yin pas/_gal te don mthun sdod 
[\[21a.2\]]na bza' bar bya'o/_/khyim bdag 'di na khri'am/_khri'u lta yod dam/_'phags pa dag ma mchis so/_/dge slong de dag la khyim pa dang /_dge tshul mang du yod pas de dag gis rtswa mang po blangs te pus mo nub tsam gyi gding ba bshams so/_/don mthun nam ma nangs pa nyid du 'phags 
[\[21a.3\]]nas/_dge slong de dag gis kyang gding ba ma bor bar dong ngo /_/khyim bdag gis bsams pa/_gal te 'phags pa dag bzhugs na de dag gi gdugs tshod sta gon byas je blta'o snyam nas de song ba dang /_ji tsam na dge slong de dag nam ma nangs pa kho nar dong ba mthong ngo /_/khyim 
[\[21a.4\]]bdag de chung ma dang bcas pas gding ba de dag 'dor ba na snga dro ril gyis yol bar gyur to/_/dge slong rab tu mang po gzhan dag don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur dong ba na ri brags de nyid du phyin nas/_de na de dag khyim bdag gi gan du song ste khyim bdag kho bo cag la gnas g.yor 
[\[21a.5\]]cig ces gnas brnyas pa dang /_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag dam tshig gis g.yar bar bgyi ste/_gal te khyed cag ran gyi gding ba mi 'ding na g.yar bar bgyi'o/_/khyim bdag 'di na gang du kho bo cag nyal bar bya ba'i khri'am/_khri'u lta yod dam/_'phags pa dag ma 
[\[21a.6\]]mchis so/_/khyim bdag sa sgre bo la ji ltar nyal bar bya/_'phags pa dag khyed cag nyid kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag lhags par gyur nas/_de dag gis ran gyi gding ba bting nas ma bor bar dong nas bdag mchis 'brang dang bcas pa de 'dor ba na snga dro ril gyis yol bar gyur to/_/
[\[21a.7\]]dge slong de dag sa sgre bo la mtshan mo 'da' bar byas nas nang par sngar langs te dong ngo /_/de dag mthar gyis rgyu zhing dong ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas/_dge slong rnams kyis de dag mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so/_/ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]ji ltar bde ba brgyus/_sa sgre bo la mtshan thog thag 'gre ldog pas 'da' ba byas so/_/khyod cag ri brags gang du zhag_/ga ge mo zhig tu'o/_/khyim bdag gang gi sdum par/_che ge mo zhig gi'o/_/de na dge slong kha cig gis smras pa/_kho bo cag ni khyim bdag de'i sdum par gding ba 
[\[21b.2\]]la nyal te 'ongs so/_/khyod cag gis gding ba de gang du bor/_de nyid du bor ro/_/de'i phyir khyim bdag de smod par byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim gzhan nas kyang gding ba dor bar 
[\[21b.3\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim gzhan nas kyang gding ba dor bar bya'o/_/zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong rab tu mang po dag don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'dong ba na ri brags shig tu phyin to/_/ri brags de na khyim bdag cig gis dge sbyong dang /_bram ze blo bur du lhags pa 
[\[21b.4\]]rnams kyi don du thag ring po nas rtswa mang po dag blangs te gding ba bshams so/_/dge slong de dag khyim bdag de'i gan du song ste/_khyim bdag kho bo cag la gnas g.yor cig ces gnas brnyas pa dang /_khyim bdag des smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag gis dge sbyong dang /_bram 
[\[21b.5\]]ze blo bur du lhags pa rnams kyi don du thag ring po nas rtswa mang po blangs te gding ba 'di bshams kyis 'dir gzims shig_/de dag der nyal nas nam ma nangs pa kho nar khyim bdag la ma dris par gding ba bor te dong ngo /_/khyim bdag de nang par sngar langs nas/_de bor te dong ba mthong nas 
[\[21b.6\]]khyim bdag des bsams pa/_ltar 'gro'o/_/gal te phyogs gtsang mar bor bar gyur na yang blang ngo /_/snyam nas de ltar song ba dang /_ji tsam na phyogs mi gtsang bar bor ba mthong nas des de ma blangs so/_/dge slong rab tu mang po gzhan dag don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'dong ba na 
[\[21b.7\]]ri brags de nyid du phyin nas/_de dag khyim bdag de'i gan du song ste/_khyim bdag kho bo cag la gnas g.yor cig ces gnas brnyas pa dang /_khyim bdag des smras pa/_'phags pa dag bzhugs su gsol/_khyim bdag 'di na khri'am/_khri'u dag yod dam/_'phags pa dag ma 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]mchis so/_/khyim bdag sa sgre bo 'di la ji ltar nyal bar bya/_'phags pa dag bdag gis dge sbyong dang bram ze blo bur du lhags pa rnams kyi don du thag ring po nas rtswa mang po blangs te gding ba bshams par gyur pa las/_khyed cag nyid kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 
[\[22a.2\]]dag lhags par gyur te/_de dag der nyal nas nam ma nangs pa kho nar bdag la ma dris par gding ba de dag phyogs mi gtsang bar bor te dong ngo /_/de dag der sa sgre bo la nyal te dong ngo /_/de dag mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'dong ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas/_dge slong rnams kyis de dag mthong nas 
[\[22a.3\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_ji ltar bde bar brgyus/_sa sgre bo la mtshan thog thag 'gres ldog ste/_nam nangs so/_/khyed cag ri brags gang du zhag_/ga ge mo zhig tu'o/_/khyim 
[\[22a.4\]]bdag gang gi sdum par/_che ge mo zhig gi'o/_/de na dge slong kha cig gis smras pa/_kho bo cag ni khyim bdag de'i sdum par gding ba la nyal te 'ongs so/_/khyed cag gis gding ba de gar bzhag_/phyi rol du bor ro/_/de'i phyir khyim bdag de smod do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong 
[\[22a.5\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag 'dug pa la dri bar bya ste/_gal te 'or cig ces zer na dor bar bya'o/_/gal te ma dor cig ces zer na dor bar mi bya'o/_/ri brags shig na gtsug lag khang gnas 
[\[22a.6\]]mal med pa zhig yod pa der/_dge slong rnams kyis dge slong blo bur du lhags pa rnams kyi don du thag ring po nas rtswa mang po dag blangs te gding ba bshams so/_/dge slong rab tu mang po dag don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na ri brags der phyin nas/_de dag gtsug lag 
[\[22a.7\]]khang der zhugs nas de dag gis/_dge slong rnams la dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na gnas mal cung zad yod dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_yod de 'di ltar kho bo cag gis/_dge slong blo bur du lhags pa rnams kyi don du/_thag ring po nas rtswa mang po blangs te gding ba bshams 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]kyis 'dir nyol cig_/de dag der nyal nas nang par sngar langs te gding ba de bor bar brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gding ba 'di ma dor cig_/kho bo cag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa blo bur du lhags pa rnams kyi don du thag 
[\[22b.2\]]ring po nas rtswa mang po blangs te bting ba yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag gis re zhig bdag nyid ltung ba dang bcas par byas so/_/kho bo cag gis ji ltar bdag nyid ltung ba dang bcas par byas/_de dag gis de dag spyos te gding ba de dag mthus bor 
[\[22b.3\]]nas dong ngo /_/dge slong rab tu mang po gzhan dag don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'dong ba na gtsug lag khang de nyid du phyin nas de dag gis dge slong de dag la gnas mal brnyas pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis dge slong de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gtsug lag khang 
[\[22b.4\]]'di gnas mal med pa yin nam/_kho bo cag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa blo bur du lhags pa rnams kyi don du thag ring po nas rtswa mang po dag blangs te gding ba bshams par gyur pa las tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag cig don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'dong ba
