[\[22b.5\]]na gtsug lag khang 'dir lhags te de dag de la nyal nas nang par sngar langs te gding ba de bor bar brtsams pa dang /_kho bo cag gis ma dor cig ces byas na/_de dag gis kho bo cag spyos te mthus bor nas dong ngo /_/de dag kyang der sa sgre bo la nyal nas nang par sngar langs te 
[\[22b.6\]]dong ngo /_/de dag mthar gyis ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas dge slong rnams kyis de dag mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so/_/ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_ji ltar bde bar brgyus/_mtshan 
[\[22b.7\]]mo thog thag sa sgre bo la 'gres ldog ste/_nam nangs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ri brags gang du zhag_/gtsug lag khang ga ge mo zhig tu'o/_/de na dge slong kha cig gis smras pa/_kho bo cag ni gtsug lag khang der gding ba la nyal te 'ongs so/_/khyed cag gis gding ba de 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]gar bzhag_/kho bo cag gis rgan zhugs de dag smras bzhin du mthus phyi rol du bor ro/_/de'i phyir tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag smod par byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[23a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du dor bar mi bya bar dge slong 'khod pa dag la dri bar bya'o/_/dge slong rab tu mang po dag don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na khron pa'i drung zhig tu mtshan mo zhag nas de dag gis rtswa mang po dag kyang blangs te rtswa'i gding ba bshams so/_/de dag 
[\[23a.3\]]dang ha cang thag mi ring ba na bram ze zhig kyang mtshan mo zhag go/_/dge slong dag don mthun dang bcas te nang par sngar langs te dong ba dang /_don mthun phyir 'gro ba yang 'ongs so/_/bram ze de don mthun de la don bsgrubs nas de don mthun de nyid dang lhan cig phyir log pa dang /_don mthun 
[\[23a.4\]]de yang khron pa'i drung de nyid du gding ba ji ltar bshams pa dag la mtshan mo nyal lo/_/don mthun de dang gcer bu pa dag lhan cig 'ongs pa de dag gding ba gang la dge slong dag nyal nyal ba'i gding ba de nyid la nyal ba dang /_de na gcer bu pa gcig gis smras pa/_shes pa can ji zhig 
[\[23a.5\]]gis zin no/_/gcer bu pa gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_khyod kyis chang gi tshigs ma mang du zos pas khyod 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pas zin no/_/des gding ba de la bltas pa dang /_ji tsam na sril dag mthong nas des smras pa/_gding ba 'di la su nyal bar gyur/_de dag dang ha cang thag 
[\[23a.6\]]mi ring ba na bram ze nyal ba des de smra ba thos nas des smras pa/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gding ba 'di la nyal bar gyur to/_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag 'jig rten la bdag nyid mkhas par bgrangs par byed na/_'di ltar dgon par gding ba dor bar bya 
[\[23a.7\]]ba de yang mi shes so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dgon par yang rtswa'i gding ba dor bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgon par yang rtswa'i gding ba dor bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]dge slong rab tu mang po dag don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na dgon pa'i gnas shig tu zhag pa dang don mthun de nam ma nangs pa nyid du 'phags nas/_dge slong de dag ji srid du gding ba 'dor bar byed pa de srid du don mthun thal nas/_de dag phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'dong 
[\[23b.2\]]ba na chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo/_/de dag mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'dong ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas dge slong rnams kyis de dag mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so/_/ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar 
[\[23b.3\]]brgyus/_kho bo cag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo/_/gang gis ji ltar gyur/_de dag gis skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thams cad kyi thams cad du dor bar mi bya bar 
[\[23b.4\]]'di ltar glongs te 'gro bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag tshon rtsi'i las byed pa na dag ra dag tu rtswa dag bkram ste gos dag skems par byed cing de dag rtswa de dag 'dor bar mi byed nas der sril dag byung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtswa dag dor bar bya'o/_/dge slong 
[\[23b.5\]]gzhan dag tshon rtsi'i las byed par 'dod nas de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag rtswa 'di dag ma dor cig dang kho bo cag gis kyang 'dir gos dag bskam par bya'o/_/de dag gis de dag la mi ster nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin par bya'o/_/de dag gis de 
[\[23b.6\]]dang de dag tu gos dag bskams nas kho bo cag gis ma bting ngo zhes rtswa de dag 'dor bar mi byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag la rtswa 'dor ram mi 'dor zhes dri bar bya zhing /_gal te 'dor ro zhes zer na sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te mi 'dor ro zhes zer na sbyin par mi 
[\[23b.7\]]bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'chag sa dag tu 'chags pa na de na sa rtsub pas de dag gi rkang mthil tsha nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der rtswa dag gding bar bya'o/_/rtswa dag bting ba dang der sril dag byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dor bar bya'o/_/de 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]dag nyi ma re re zhing 'dor bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyi ma re re zhing dor bar mi bya bar 'di ltar dus dang dus su so sor brtag par bya'o/_/gal te thams cad kyi thams cad du 'dong na de'i tshe bsdus te 'dong bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'chag 
[\[24a.2\]]sa dag tu rtswa'i chun po dag sa la 'jog par byed pa na der sril dag byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thag pas bcings nas shing ljon pa dag la dpyangs te gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong dag lci ba dag sa la 'jog par byed pa na de dag tu sril dag byung nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[24a.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gyo mor gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/_dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'brel 
[\[24a.4\]]ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni gnang ba yin te nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi 
[\[24a.5\]]gtsug lag khang du rtswa'i gding ba'am/_lo ma'i gding ba bting ngam 'ding du bcug nas ma bsdus sam/_sdud du ma bcug gam/_dge slong 'khod pa la ma bcol bar de nas song na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/dge 
[\[24a.6\]]'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o/_/gtsug lag khang du zhes bya ba ni gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba byar rung bar ro/_/rtswa'i gding ba zhes bya ba ni rtswa dag go/_/lo ma'i gding ba zhes bya ba ni 
[\[24a.7\]]lo ma dag go/_/bting ngam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/_/'ding du bcug nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/_/ma bsdus sam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/_/sdud du ma bcug gam zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/_/dge slong 'khod pa la zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang yod pa la'o/_/ma 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]bcol bar zhes bya ba ni ma gtad par ro/_/de nas song na zhes bya ba ni nyen kor spangs na'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa gding ba'i nyen kor gang lags nye ba 'khor ngas bram ze gro bzhin skyes la a mra'i sdong po shin tu 
[\[24b.2\]]me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_yal ga'i tshogs phun sum tshogs pa 'dom bdun gyis bar du chod pa'i a mra'i sdong po bdun po gang dag yin pa de dag la 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yod par bstan pa de ni gding ba'i nyen kor yin no/_/de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma 
[\[24b.3\]]gtogs te zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba 
[\[24b.4\]]de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du rtswa'i gding ba'am/_lo ma'i gding ba bting ngam/_'ding du bcug 
[\[24b.5\]]nas ma bsdus sam/_sdud du ma bcug gam/_dge slong 'khod pa la ma bcol bar de nas song na ji srid du nyen kor ma spangs kyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_nyen kor spangs na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te lam kar bdag gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du rtswa'i gding 
[\[24b.6\]]ba'am/_lo ma'i gding ba bting ngo snyam du dran zhing /_gal te de 'di snyam du bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa dag sdud par 'gyur ro snyam nas dge slong des phyin cad de ltar mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya ste/_ltung ba de yang 
[\[24b.7\]]chos bzhin du phyir bya'o/_/gal te lam kar dge slong der 'gro ba mthong zhing gal te de 'di snyam du 'dis sdud par 'gyur ro snyam na/_de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bos dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu rtswa'i gding ba'am/_lo ma'i gding ba bting ba 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]de sdus shig ces brjod par bya zhing /_dge slong des phyin cad de ltar mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya ste ltung ba de yang chos bzhin du phyir bya'o/_/dge slong des kyang dge slong de la khas blangs nas gus par byas te bsdu bar bya'o/_/gal te 
[\[25a.2\]]sdud par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gal te der son nas bdag gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du rtswa'i gding ba'am/_lo ma'i gding ba bting ngo snyam du dran zhing /_gal te de 'di snyam du bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa dag sdud par 'gyur ro snyam na/_
[\[25a.3\]]dge slong des phyin cad de ltar mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya ste/_ltung ba de yang chos bzhin du phyir bya'o/_/gal te der son nas dge slong der 'gro ba mthong zhing gal te 'di snyam du 'dis sdud par 'gyur ro snyam na/_de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho 
[\[25a.4\]]bos dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du rtswa'i gding ba'am/_lo ma'i gding ba bting ba de sdus shig ces brjod par bya zhing /_dge slong des phyin cad de lta bu mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya ste/_ltung ba de yang chos bzhin du phyir bya'o/_/dge slong des kyang 
[\[25a.5\]]dge slong de la khas blangs nas gus par byas te bsdu bar bya'o/_/gal te sdud par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du rtswa'i gding ba'am/_lo ma'i gding ba bting ngam 'ding du bcug nas ma bsdus sam/_sdud du ma bcug gam/_
[\[25a.6\]]dge slong 'khod pa la ma bcol bar gtsug lag khang du 'dir bdag gis sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnyam par gzhag go snyam pa'am/_sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnam par grol bar bya'o snyam pas nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir 'jug par byed cing /_de ting nge 'dzin de las mtshan 
[\[25a.7\]]mo'i thun dang po'am thun phyed na ldang bar byed na gal te phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur la gal te phan phun du gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du rtswa'i gding ba'am/_lo ma'i gding ba bting ngam 'ding du bcug nas ma bsdus sam/_sdud 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]du ma bcug gam/_dge slong 'khod pa la ma bcol bar gtsug lag khang du 'dir bdag gis sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnyam par gzhag go snyam pa'am/_sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnam par grol bar bya'o snyam pas nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir 'jug par byed cing /_de 
[\[25b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin de las mtshan mo'i gung thun nam/_thun tha ma'am/_skya rengs ma shar ba'am/_skya rengs shar ba'am/_nyi ma ma shar ba'am/_nyi ma shar ba'am/_nyi ma'i brgyad cha shar ba'am/_nyi ma'i bzhi cha shar ba'am/_phyed ma yol ba'am/_phyed yol ba'am/_nyi ma'i bzhi 
[\[25b.3\]]cha lus pa'am/_nyi ma'i brgyad cha lus pa'am/_nyi ma ma nub pa'am/_nyi ma nub pa'am/_rgyu skar dag ma shar ba'am/_rgyu skar dag shar ba na ldang bar byed na/_gal te phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur la/_gal te phan phun du gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[25b.4\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa gding ba'i phan phun du mchis/_nye ba 'khor gnyis te/_rlung gi phan phun dang /_sril gyi phan phun no/_/rlung gi phan phun gang zhe na/_rim pa gcig nas rim pa gnyis pa'i bar du bzlog par gyur pa'o/_/sril gyi phan phun 
[\[25b.5\]]gang zhe na/_rim pa gcig nas rim pa gnyis kyi bar du phan phun du gyur pa'o/_/sa gzhi rdo ba'i gzhi can dang /_bye ma'i gzhi can gang du nyes dmigs de lta bu mi 'byung ba la ni ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la 
[\[25b.6\]]ltung ba med do/_/gding ba'i ltung byed de [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu 
[\[25b.7\]]dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur shog_/ljongs rgyur 'dong dang der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya/_rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]lung dbog pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /_de dag gis slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag la zhus pa/_mkhan po bdag cag ljongs rgyur mchi'o/_/su dang lhan cig tu/_
[\[26a.2\]]btsun pa 'char ka dang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin pas khyed la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro/_/mkhan po btsun pa 'char ka ni bdag cag gi pha ma lta bur rnam par gnas pa lags pas ci'i slad du de bdag cag la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur zhes de dag gis 
[\[26a.3\]]de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par byas te de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'phags so/_/'char kas gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi mtshams 'das pa de'i tshe na smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ci'i phyir gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyur 'dong bar byed/_tshur shog gnas chos shig ces des de 
[\[26a.4\]]dag mdun du tsog pur 'dug du bcug ste gnas 'char bcug go/_/des de dag la la la gtur bu gtad la la la lhung bzed kyi snod gtad/_la la la bar bur snod gtad/_la la la phor bu gtad/_la la la ril ba spyi blugs gtad nas/_de lag pa gnyis brkyang ste/_rngul gzan 
[\[26a.5\]]las gzhan med par 'jig rten la mtho 'tsham zhing 'gro ba na/_de dag ri brags shig tu phyin nas de dag der khron pa zhig gi drung du ngal so bar byed pa na/_de na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der gaN+DI brdungs pa dang /_de dag gis thos nas smras pa/_slob dpon gtsug lag 
[\[26a.6\]]khang du gaN+DI brdungs kyis bzhud do/_/'char kas smras pa/_lhung bzed nag po can las med pa dag gis las kyi gaN+DI brdungs shing bdag cag ngal ba dag gis las bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/slob dpon rnyed pa'i gaN+DI ma lags sam/_de yin na bdag 
[\[26a.7\]]cag mtshams su phyin na 'thob bo/_/slob dpon ni grags pa bsod nams che ba lags pas 'thob kyi bdag cag sus stsol bar 'gyur/_deng la gal te rnyed pa yod na kho bo'i yang nos shig_/de dag dong ba dang ji tsam na der gnas mal gyi gaN+DI brdungs nas dge slong rnams 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal nos shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag las ches rgan pa yang yod do/_/su yin/_slob dpon 'char ka'o/_/de'i yang nos shig_/de dag gis gnas mal mnos so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang de na 'du 'dzi'i gtam 
[\[26b.2\]]gyis 'dug ste/_ri brags 'di su'i/_gtsug lag khang 'di su'i/_lha khang 'di su'i/_skyed mos tshal 'di su'i/_kun dga' ra ba 'di su'i/_khron pa 'di su'i/_zhing 'di su'i/_ba lang 'di dag su'i/_ma he 'di dag su'i zhes 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug go/_/de dag gis 
[\[26b.3\]]kyang bsams pa/_slob dpon 'char ka yun ring du thogs par 'gyur ro snyam nas de dag gis gcig la gcig zhus te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mal bshams nas rkang pa'i chu dang rkang pa bsku ba mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/_rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas me khang du zhugs te nyal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char 
[\[26b.4\]]ka yang ji srid du de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla yod pa de srid du 'dug 'dug nas/_gang gi tshe de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla med pa de'i tshe na mig lam chad pa'i dus kyi tshe gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa dag ces bod par brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la 
[\[26b.5\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'dam bu thibs po'i gseb tu zhugs pa bzhin du ci 'bod/_'char kas smras pa/_'di na kho bo'i gzhon nu dag cig 'khod na de dag las 'ga' zhig na bar ma gyur tam/_de dag gis de thos nas smras pa/_slob dpon ma 'bod cig_/gnas khang 'o 
[\[26b.6\]]nir gzims mal bshams te/_zhabs kyi chab dang /_zhabs bsku ba yang bzhag gis der gzims shig_/'char kas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis su la zhus te rkang pa dag bkrus/_slob dpon yun ring du thogs par gyur nas gcig la gcig zhus te sug pa dag 
[\[26b.7\]]bkrus so/_/'char kas spyos te smras pa/_gtsug lag khang nas phyir byung la/_gang 'di ltar gus pa med pa dang /_rje sa med pa dag la gnas sbyin par byed pa de'i gan du song la gnas chos shig ces des de dag gtsug lag khang nas phyi rol du bskrad do/_/de dag de na mtshan 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]thog thag bla gab med par lhags pas nyen par gyur to/_/de dag nangs par sngar langs te smras pa/_slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag cag mchi'o/_/gar 'dong /_mnyan yod du'o/_/sdod cig dang kho bos khyed cag na ba rnams kyi nad g.yog bya'o/_/slob 
[\[27a.2\]]dpon khyod kyis bdag cag mi na ba yang na bar byas pas na ba rnams kyi nad g.yog byas re skan zhes de dag mnyan yod du dong ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_ji ltar 
[\[27a.3\]]bde bar brgyus/_bdag cag slob dpon 'char kas mtshan thog thag lhags pas tho btsams so/_/ci'i phyir/_de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas dge slong skrod par byed ces smod par byed 
[\[27a.4\]]phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[27a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'char ka la rmas pa/_'char ka khyod dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas dge slong skrod pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/
[\[27a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas 
[\[27a.7\]]dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/_yi ma rangs nas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas dge slong skrod dam skrod du 'jud na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[27b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na sa'i gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa de na dge slong nad pa zhig 'dug nas/_ji tsam na sprin kha dog lnga pa 'dus nas dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sprin kha dog lnga pa 
[\[27b.3\]]'dus pas gtsug lag khang rdib par 'gyur srid kyis phyir byung zhig_/kho bo rang 'byung mi nus so/_/dge slong rnams 'gyod pas ma phyung nas char bab ste gtsug lag khang rdib nas des dge slong de non te dus la bab pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[27b.4\]]'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[27b.5\]]dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/_yi ma rangs nas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas dge slong skrod dam skrod du 'jug na de 
[\[27b.6\]]'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/_yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni khros shing khro ba'i zil gyis non nas so/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi 
[\[27b.7\]]dge 'dun gyi'o/_/gtsug lag khang nas zhes bya ba ni gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dag byar rung ba nas so/_/dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/skrod dam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/_/skrod du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/_/de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang 
[\[28a.2\]]ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam du khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/_yi ma rangs nas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag 
[\[28a.3\]]khang nas dge slong skrod dam skrod du 'jud na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/skrod pa'i ltung byed de bcu drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs 
[\[28a.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur shog_/ljongs rgyur 'dong dang der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par 
[\[28a.5\]]bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya/_rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing /_khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_lung dbog pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med 
[\[28a.6\]]par bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /_de dag gis slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag la zhus pa mkhan po bdag cag ljongs rgyur mchi'o/_/su dang lhan cig tu/_btsun pa 'char ka dang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin pas khyed la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[28a.7\]]mkhan po btsun pa 'char ka ni bdag cag gi pha ma lta bur rnam par gnas pa lags pas ci'i slad du de bdag cag la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur zhes de dag gis de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par byas te/_de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'phags so/_/'char kas gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi mtshams 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]'das pa de'i tshe na smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ci'i phyir gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyur 'dong bar byed/_tshur shog gnas chos shig ces des de dag mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste gnas 'char bcug go/_/des de dag la la la gtur bu gtad/_la la la lhung 
[\[28b.2\]]bzed kyi snod gtad/_la la la bar bur gtad/_la la la phor bu gtad/_la la la ril ba spyi blugs gtad nas de lag pa gnyis brkyang ste/_rngul gzan las gzhan med par 'jig rten la mtho 'tsham zhing 'gro ba na de dag ri brags shig tu phyin nas de dag der khron pa zhig gi drung 
[\[28b.3\]]du ngal so bar byed pa na de na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der gaN+DI brdungs pa dang /_de dag gis thos nas smras pa/_slob dpon gtsug lag khang du gaN+DI brdungs kyis bzhud do/_/'char kas smras pa/_lhung bzed nag po can las med pa dag gis las kyi gaN+DI brdungs 
[\[28b.4\]]shing bdag cag ngal ba dag gis las bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/slob dpon rnyed pa'i gaN+DI ma lags sam/_de yin na bdag cag mtshams su phyin na 'thob bo/_/slob dpon ni grags pa bsod nams che ba lags pas thob kyi bdag cag la sus stsol 
[\[28b.5\]]bar 'gyur/_deng la gal te rnyed pa yod na kho bo'i yang nos shig_/de dag dong ba dang ji tsam na der gnas mal gyi gaN+DI brdungs nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal nos shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag las ches rgan pa yang yod do/_/su 
[\[28b.6\]]yin/_slob dpon 'char ka'o/_/de'i yang nos shig_/de dag gis gnas mal mnos so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang de na 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug ste/_ri brags 'di su'i/_gtsug lag khang 'di su'i/_lha khang 'di su'i/_skyed mos tshal 'di su'i/_kun dga' ra 
[\[28b.7\]]ba 'di su'i/_khron pa 'di su'i/_zhing 'di su'i/_ba lang 'di dag su'i/_ma he 'di dag su'i zhes 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug go/_/de dag gis kyang bsams pa/_slob dpon 'char ka yun ring du thogs par 'gyur ro snyam nas de dag gis gcig la gcig zhus te/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]pa 'char ka'i mal bshams nas rkang pa'i chu dang /_rkang pa bsku ba mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/_rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas me khang du zhugs te nyal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang ji srid du de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla yod pa de srid du 'dug 'dug nas/_gang gi 
[\[29a.2\]]tshe de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla med pa de'i tshe na mig lam chad pa'i dus kyi tshe gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa dag ces bod par brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'dam bu thibs po'i gseb tu zhugs pa bzhin du ci 'bod/_
[\[29a.3\]]'char kas smras pa/_'di na kho bo'i gzhon nu dag cig 'khod na de dag las 'ga' zhig na bar ma gyur tam/_de dag gis de thos nas smras pa/_slob dpon ma 'bod cig_/gnas khang 'o nir gzims mal bshams te/_zhabs kyi chab dang /_zhabs bsku ba yang bzhag gis der 
[\[29a.4\]]gzims shig_/'char kas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis su la zhus te rkang pa dag bkrus/_slob dpon yun ring du thogs par gyur nas gcig la gcig zhus te sug pa dag bkrus so/_/'char kas spyos te smras pa/_kho bo khyed dang lhan cig bya ba cung zhig yod kyis sgo phye 
[\[29a.5\]]shig_/de dag gis sgo ma phye ba dang /_des spyos te sgo glegs la rdog pas brdabs nas des me khang thams cad 'gul bar gyur to/_/de dag skrag nas bsams pa/_'di stobs dang ldan pa yin pas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang rdib par gyur na mi rung gis sgo dbye'o snyam nas de dag gis 
[\[29a.6\]]sgo phye ba dang /_de nang du zhugs nas de dag gi dbus su bsgyel te/_des de dag kha cig la ni gru mos bsnun kha cig la ni pus mos bsnun nas de dag gis smras pa/_slob dpon bdag cag gnang ngo /_/bdag cag gnang ngo /_/'char kas smras pa/_su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[29a.7\]]ro/_/de dag gis gcig la gcig smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ni stobs dang ldan pa yin pas 'dis bdag cag thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang bral bar byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyis phyir 'byung bar bya'o zhes de dag phyir byung ngo /_/de dag de 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]na mtshan thog thag bla gab med pa na lhags pas nyen par gyur to/_/de dag nang par sngar langs te smras pa/_slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag cag mchi'o/_/gar 'dong /_mnyan yod du'o/_/sdod cig dang kho bos khyed cag na ba rnams kyi nad g.yog bya'o/_/slob dpon 
[\[29b.2\]]khyod kyis bdag cag mi na ba yang na bar byas pas na ba rnams kyi nad g.yog byas re skan zhes de dag mnyan yod du dong ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_ji ltar bde bar 
[\[29b.3\]]brgyus/_bdag cag slob dpon 'char kas mtshan thog thag lhags pas tho btsams so/_/ci'i phyir/_de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na dge slong dag snga na 'khod par shes bzhin du 
[\[29b.4\]]phyis 'ongs nas su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyid rkyen du byas te phyis gnon byed cing stan la nyal ba dang 'dug par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[29b.5\]]kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[29b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa/_'char ka khyod kyis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na dge slong dag snga na 'khod par shes bzhin du phyis 'ongs nas su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyid rkyen du byas te phyis gnon byas nas stan la nyal lam 'dug pa bden nam/_btsun 
[\[29b.7\]]pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]par smad nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 
[\[30a.2\]]'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na dge slong dag snga na 'khod par shes bzhin du phyis 'ongs nas su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyid rkyen du byas te phyis gnon byas nas stan la nyal lam 'dug na ltung byed do/_/
[\[30a.3\]]yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o/_/gtsug lag khang na zhes bya ba ni gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dag 
[\[30a.4\]]byar rung ba na'o/_/dge slong dag ces bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag go/_/snga na 'khod pa zhes bya ba ni snga na gnas par ro/_/shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang gis rig par gyur pa'am/_gzhan dag gis bstan pas so/_/phyis 'ongs nas zhes bya ba ni de'i 'og tu 'ongs nas so/_/su la gnod pa 
[\[30a.5\]]zhes bya ba ni su bde ba la reg par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/de 'gro bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni de de nas gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'o/_/de nyid rkyen du byas te zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o/_/phyis gnon byas nas zhes bya ba ni gnod pas zil gyis mnan nas so/_/stan la zhes bya ba ni gnas mal 
[\[30a.6\]]la'o/_/nyal na zhes bya ba ni lus bsnyal na'o/_/'dug na zhes bya ba ni rkub tshos bzhag na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed 
[\[30a.7\]]pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na dge slong dag snga na 'khod 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]par shes bzhin du phyis 'ongs nas su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyid rkyen du byas te phyis gnon byas nas stan la nyal lam 'dug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro//_//bar sdom la/_ngan dang bsod dang grang dro dang /_/chol zangs dang ni bkrus sman dang /_/
[\[30b.2\]]rnal 'byor mthun dang kha ton dang /_/'jigs dang bcas dang 'jigs med do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan 
[\[30b.3\]]pa dag tshur shog_/ljongs rgyur 'dong dang der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_lung dbog pa dang /_bklag 
[\[30b.4\]]pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /_de dag gis slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag la zhus pa/_mkhan po bdag cag ljongs rgyur mchi'o/_/su dang lhan cig tu/_btsun pa 'char ka dang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[30b.5\]]dag de ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin pas khyed la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro/_/mkhan po btsun pa 'char ka ni bdag cag gi pha ma lta bur rnam par gnas pa lags pas ci'i slad du bdag cag la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur zhes de dag gis de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par byas te de dang lhan cig 
[\[30b.6\]]ljongs rgyur 'phags so/_/'char kas gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi mtshams 'das pa de'i tshe na smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ci'i phyir gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyur 'dong bar byed/_tshur shog gnas chos shig ces des de dag mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste gnas 'char bcug 
[\[30b.7\]]go/_/des de dag la la la gtur bu gtad/_la la la lhung bzed kyi snod gtad/_la la la bar bur snod gtad/_la la la phor bu gtad/_la la la ril ba spyi blugs gtad nas de lag pa gnyis brkyang ste rngul gzan las gzhan med par 'jig rten la mtho 'tsham zhing 'gro ba na 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]de dag ri brags shig tu phyin nas/_de dag der khron pa zhig gi drung du ngal so bar byed pa na de na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der gaN+DI brdungs pa dang /_de dag gis thos nas smras pa/_slob dpon gtsug lag khang du gaN+DI brdungs kyis bzhud do/_/'char 
[\[31a.2\]]kas smras pa/_lhung bzed nag po can las med pa dag gis las kyi gaN+DI brdungs shing /_bdag cag ngal ba dag gis las bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/slob dpon rnyed pa'i gaN+DI ma lags sam de yin na bdag cag mtshams su phyin na 'thob bo/_/slob 
[\[31a.3\]]dpon ni grags pa bsod nams che ba lags pas 'thob kyi bdag cag sus stsol bar 'gyur/_deng la gal te rnyed pa yod na kho bo'i yang nos shig_/de dag dong ba dang ji tsam na der gnas mal gyi gaN+DI brdungs nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal nos shig_/
[\[31a.4\]]de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag las ches rgan pa yang yod do/_/su yin/_slob dpon 'char ka'o/_/de'i yang nos shig de dag gis gnas mal mnos so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang de na 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug ste ri brags 'di su'i/_gtsug lag khang 'di 
[\[31a.5\]]su'i/_lha khang 'di su'i/_skyed mos tshal 'di su'i/_kun dga' ra ba 'di su'i/_khron pa 'di su'i/_zhing 'di su'i/_ba lang 'di dag su'i/_ma he 'di dag su'i zhes 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug go/_/de dag gis kyang bsams pa/_slob dpon 'char ka yun ring 
[\[31a.6\]]du thogs par 'gyur ro snyam nas de dag gis gcig la gcig zhus te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mal bshams nas/_rkang pa'i chu dang /_rkang pa bsku ba mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/_gcig la gcig smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag deng bdag cag gis kha zas ngan pa dag zos 
[\[31a.7\]]pas kha ton mi nus kyis re zhig yid la byed pa bskyed par bya'o zhes de dag dpong sa'i khang par zhugs nas skyil mo krung bcas te bsam gtan bya bar brtsams so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang ji srid du de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla yod pa de srid du 'dug 'dug nas gang gi tshe de'i 'du 'dzi'i 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]gtam gyi zla med pa de'i tshe na mig lam chad pa'i dus kyi tshe gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa dag ces bod par brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'dam bu thibs po'i gseb tu zhugs pa bzhin du ci 'bod/_'char 
[\[31b.2\]]kas smras pa/_'di na kho bo'i gzhon nu dag cig 'khod na de dag las 'ga' zhig na bar ma gyur tam/_de dag gis de thos nas smras pa/_slob dpon ma 'bod cig_/gnas khang 'o nir gzims mal bshams te/_zhabs kyi chab dang /_zhabs bsku ba yang bzhag gis der gzims 
[\[31b.3\]]shig_/bdag cag deng kha zas ngan pa dag 'tshal bas kha ton rngo mi thog nas re zhig dpong sa'i khang pa 'dir bsam gtan bgyid do/_/'char kas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mi klog pa la shes rab med do zhes ma gsungs sam/_tshur sheg kha ton gyis shig 
[\[31b.4\]]ces des de dag zung du lhan cig bzhag ste/_mtshan thog thag kha ton byed du bcug go/_/de dag nang par sngar langs te smras pa/_slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag cag mchi'o/_/gar 'dong /_mnyan yod du'o/_/sdod cig dang kho bos khyed cag na ba rnams kyi nad g.yog 
[\[31b.5\]]bya'o/_/slob dpon khyod kyis bdag cag mi na ba yang na bar byas pas na ba rnams kyi nad g.yog byas re skan zhes de dag mnyan yod du dong ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_
[\[31b.6\]]ji ltar bde bar brgyus/_bdag cag slob dpon 'char kas mtshan thog thag tho btsams so/_/ji ltar tho btsams/_de dag gis skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod do/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag ched du bsams te dge slong rnams la mtho 'tsham par byed 
[\[31b.7\]]ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge slong la mtho 'tsham par byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro//_//
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur 
[\[32a.2\]]sheg_/ljongs rgyur 'dong dang der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya/_rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing /_khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_lung dbog pa dang /_
[\[32a.3\]]bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /_de dag gis slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag la zhus pa/_mkhan po bdag cag ljongs rgyur mchi'o/_/su dang lhan cig tu/_btsun pa 'char ka dang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[32a.4\]]pa dag de ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin pas khyed la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro/_/mkhan po btsun pa 'char ka ni bdag cag gi pha ma lta bur rnam par gnas pa lags pas ci'i slad du bdag cag la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur zhes de dag gis de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par byas te de dang 
[\[32a.5\]]lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'phags so/_/'char kas gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi mtshams 'das pa de'i tshe na smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ci'i phyir gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyur 'dong bar byed/_tshur sheg gnas chos shig ces des de dag mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste gnas 
[\[32a.6\]]'char bcug go/_/des de dag la la la gtur bu gtad/_la la la lhung bzed kyi snod gtad/_la la la bar bur snod gtad/_la la la phor bu gtad/_la la la ril ba spyi blugs gtad nas/_de lag pa gnyis brkyang ste/_rngul gzan las gzhan med par 'jig rten la mtho 'tsham zhing 
[\[32a.7\]]'gro ba na/_de dag ri brags shig tu phyin nas de dag der khron pa zhig gi drung du ngal so bar byed pa na de na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der gaN+DI brdungs pa dang /_de dag gis thos nas smras pa/_slob dpon gtsug lag khang du gaN+DI brdungs kyis bzhud do/_/'char kas smras pa/_
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]lhung bzed nag po can las med pa dag gis las kyi gaN+DI brdungs shing bdag cag ngal ba dag gis las bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/slob dpon rnyed pa'i gaN+DI ma lags sam/_de yin na bdag cag mtshams su phyin na thob bo/_/slob dpon ni grags pa 
[\[32b.2\]]bsod nams che ba lags pas 'thob kyi bdag cag sus stsol bar 'gyur/_deng la gal te rnyed pa yod na kho bo'i yang nos shig_/de dag dong ba dang ji tsam na der gnas mal gyi gaN+DI brdungs nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal nos shig_/de dag gis smras 
[\[32b.3\]]pa/_bdag cag las ches rgan pa yang yod do/_/su yin/_slob dpon 'char ka'o/_/de'i yang nos shig_/de dag gis gnas mal mnos so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang de na 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug ste ri brags 'di su'i/_gtsug lag khang 'di su'i/_lha khang 
[\[32b.4\]]'di su'i/_skyed mos tshal 'di su'i/_kun dga' ra ba 'di su'i/_khron pa 'di su'i/_zhing 'di su'i/_ba lang 'di dag su'i/_ma he 'di dag su'i zhes 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug go/_/de dag gis kyang bsams pa/_slob dpon 'char ka yun ring du thogs par 'gyur 
[\[32b.5\]]ro snyam nas de dag gis gcig la gcig zhus te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mal bshams nas/_rkang pa'i chu dang /_rkang pa bsku ba mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste gcig la gcig smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa deng bdag cag gis kha zas bsod pa dag zos pas re zhig zung gis 
[\[32b.6\]]lhan cig kha ton bya'o zhes de dag gis zung gis kha ton bya bar brtsams so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang ji srid du de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla yod pa de srid du 'dug 'dug nas gang gi tshe de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla med pa de'i tshe na mig lam chad pa'i dus kyi tshe gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te 
[\[32b.7\]]de dag la dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci byed/_slob dpon bdag cag gis deng kha zas bsod pa dag 'tshal bas re zhig zung gis kha ton bgyid do/_/'char kas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan mi byed pa la shes rab med do zhes ma 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gsungs sam/_tshur shog bsam gtan gyis shig ces des de dag dpong sa'i khang par btsud de skyil mo krung 'char bcug nas mtshan thog thag bsrel to/_/de dag nang par sngar langs te smras pa/_slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag cag mchi'o/_/gar 
[\[33a.2\]]'dong /_mnyan yod du'o/_/sdod cig dang kho bos khyed cag na ba rnams kyi nad g.yog bya'o/_/slob dpon khyod kyis bdag cag mi na ba yang na bar byas pas na ba rnams kyi nad g.yog byas re skan zhes de dag mnyan yod du dong ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[33a.3\]]ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_ji ltar bde bar brgyus/_bdag cag slob dpon 'char kas mtshan thog thag tho btsams so/_/ji ltar tho btsams/_de dag gis skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod do/_/
[\[33a.4\]]dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag ched du bsams te dge slong rnams la mtho 'tsham par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[33a.5\]]pa/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge slong la mtho 'tsham par byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag 
[\[33a.6\]]la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg_/ljongs rgyur 'dong dang der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya/_rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing /_khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_
[\[33a.7\]]lung dbog pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /_de dag gis slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag la zhus pa/_mkhan po bdag cag ljongs rgyur mchi'o/_/su dang lhan cig tu/_btsun pa 'char ka dang 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin pas khyed la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro/_/mkhan po btsun pa 'char ka ni bdag cag gi pha ma lta bur rnam par gnas pa lags pas ci'i slad du bdag cag la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur zhes de dag gis de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par 
[\[33b.2\]]byas te de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'phags so/_/'char kas gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi mtshams 'das pa'i tshe na smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ci'i phyir gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyur 'dong bar byed/_tshur shog gnas chos shig ces des de dag mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste 
[\[33b.3\]]gnas 'char bcug go/_/des de dag la la la gtur bu gtad/_la la la lhung bzed kyi snod gtad/_la la la bar bur snod gtad/_la la la phor bu gtad/_la la la ril ba spyi blugs gtad nas/_de lag pa gnyis brkyang ste rngul gzan las gzhan med par 'jig rten la mtho 
[\[33b.4\]]'tsham zhing 'gro ba na de dag ri brags shig tu phyin nas de dag der khron pa zhig gi drung du ngal so bar byed pa na/_de na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der gaN+DI brdungs pa dang /_de dag gis thos nas smras pa/_slob dpon gtsug lag khang du gaN+DI brdungs kyis bzhud do/_/'char 
[\[33b.5\]]kas smras pa/_lhung bzed nag po can las med pa dag gis las kyi gaN+DI brdungs shing bdag cag ngal ba dag gis las bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/slob dpon rnyed pa'i gaN+DI ma lags sam/_de yin na bdag cag mtshams su phyin na 'thob po/_/slob dpon 
[\[33b.6\]]ni grags pa bsod nams che ba lags pas thob kyi bdag cag la sus stsol bar 'gyur/_deng la gal te rnyed pa yod na kho bo'i yang nos shig_/de dag dong ba dang /_ji tsam na der gnas mal gyi gaN+DI brdungs nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal nos shig de dag gis smras 
[\[33b.7\]]pa bdag cag las ches rgan pa yang yod do/_/su yin/_slob dpon 'char ka'o/_/de'i yang nos shig de dag gis gnas mal mnos so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang de na 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug ste ri brags 'di su'i/_gtsug lag khang 'di su'i/_lha khang 'di su'i/_skyed 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]mos tshal 'di su'i/_kun dga' ra ba 'di su'i/_khron pa 'di su'i/_zhing 'di su'i/_ba lang 'di dag su'i/_ma he 'di dag su'i zhes 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug go/_/de dag gis kyang bsams pa/_slob dpon 'char ka yun ring du thogs par 'gyur ro 
[\[34a.2\]]snyam nas de dag gis gcig la gcig zhus te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mal bshams nas/_rkang pa'i chu dang /_rkang pa bsku ba mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste gcig la gcig smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag da ltar grang ba'i dus la bab kyis bdag cag me khang du zhugs te nyal lo zhes 
[\[34a.3\]]de dag me khang du zhugs te nyal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang ji srid du de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla yod pa de srid du 'dug 'dug nas gang gi tshe de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla med pa de'i tshe na mig lam chad pa'i dus kyi tshe gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa dag 
[\[34a.4\]]ces bod par brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'dam bu thibs po'i gseb tu zhugs pa bzhin du ci 'bod/_'char kas smras pa/_'di na kho bo'i gzhon nu dag cig 'khod na de dag las 'ga' zhig na bar ma gyur tam/_de dag 
[\[34a.5\]]gis de thos nas smras pa/_slob dpon ma 'bod cig_/gnas khang 'o nir gzims mal bshams te zhabs kyi chab dang /_zhabs bsku ba yang bzhag gis der gzims shig_/bdag cag da ltar grang ba'i dus la bab pas me khang du zhugs te mchis nyal lo/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[34a.6\]]pa dag khyed cag gal te khrag nad dam/_mkhris nad g.yos par gyur na kho bos yun de srid du khyed kyi nad g.yog byed par ga la nus phyir byung shig ces des de dag bla gab med par bton te chu grang mos btab nas mtshan thog thag bsil yab kyis g.yabs so/_/de dag gis mtshan mo'i 
[\[34a.7\]]nam nangs nas smras pa/_slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag cag mchi'o/_/gar 'dong /_mnyan yod du'o/_/sdod cig dang kho bos khyed cag na ba rnams kyi nad g.yog bya'o/_/slob dpon khyed kyis kho bo cag mi na ba yang na bar byas pas na ba rnams kyi nad g.yog byas re skan zhes de dag 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]mnyan yod du dong ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so/_/ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_ji ltar bde bar brgyus/_bdag cag slob dpon 'char kas mtshan thog thag tho btsams so/_/ji ltar tho btsams/_de 
[\[34b.2\]]dag gis skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod do/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag ched du bsams te dge slong rnams la mtho 'tsham par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[34b.3\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji tsam cung zad dge slong la mtho 'tsham par byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[34b.4\]]de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur shog_/ljongs rgyur 'dong dang /_der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya/_rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing /_khyed cag kyang lhung 
[\[34b.5\]]bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_lung dbog pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /_de dag gis slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dag la 
[\[34b.6\]]zhus pa/_mkhan po bdag cag ljongs rgyur mchi'o/_/su dang lhan cig tu/_btsun pa 'char ka dang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin pas khyed la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro/_/mkhan po btsun pa 'char ka ni bdag cag gi pha ma lta bur 
[\[34b.7\]]rnam par gnas pa lags pas ci'i slad du bdag cag la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur zhes de dag gis de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par byas te de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'phags so/_/'char kas gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi mtshams 'das pa de'i tshe na smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]cag ci'i phyir gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyur 'dong bar byed/_tshur shog gnas chos shig ces des de dag mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste gnas 'char bcug go/_/des de dag la la la gtur bu gtad/_la la la lhung bzed kyi snod gtad/_la la 
[\[35a.2\]]la bar bur snod gtad/_la la la phor bu gtad/_la la la ril ba spyi blugs gtad nas/_de lag pa gnyis brkyang ste/_rngul gzan las gzhan med par 'jig rten la mtho 'tsham zhing 'gro ba na/_de dag ri brags shig tu phyin nas de dag der khron pa zhig gi drung du ngal so bar byed 
[\[35a.3\]]pa na de na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der gaN+DI brdungs pa dang /_de dag gis thos nas smras pa/_slob dpon gtsug lag khang du gaN+DI brdungs kyis bzhud do/_/'char kas smras pa/_lhung bzed nag po can las med pa dag gis las kyi gaN+DI brdungs shing bdag cag 
[\[35a.4\]]ngal ba dag gis las bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/slob dpon rnyed pa'i gaN+DI ma lags sam/_de yin na bdag cag mtshams su phyin na 'thob bo/_/slob dpon ni grags pa bsod nams che ba lags pas 'thob kyi bdag cag la sus stsol bar 'gyur/_
[\[35a.5\]]deng la gal te rnyed pa yod na kho bo'i yang nos shig_/de dag dong ba dang ji tsam na der gnas mal gyi gaN+DI brdungs nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal nos shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag las ches rgan pa yang yod do/_/su yin/_
[\[35a.6\]]slob dpon 'char ka'o/_/de'i yang nos shig_/de dag gis gnas mal mnos so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang de na 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug ste ri brags 'di su'i/_gtsug lag khang 'di su'i/_lha khang 'di su'i/_skyed mos tshal 'di su'i/_kun dga' ra ba 
[\[35a.7\]]'di su'i/_khron pa 'di su'i/_zhing 'di su'i/_ba lang 'di dag su'i/_ma he 'di dag su'i zhes 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug go/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_slob dpon 'char ka yun ring du thogs par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de dag gis gcig la gcig zhus 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]te tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mal bshams nas rkang pa'i chu dang /_rkang pa bsku ba mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste gcig la gcig smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag da ltar dro ba'i dus la bab kyis bdag cag dpong sa'i khang par zhugs te nyal lo zhes de dag dpong sa'i khang par zhugs 
[\[35b.2\]]te nyal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang ji srid du de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla yod pa de srid du 'dug 'dug nas gang gi tshe 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla med pa de'i tshe na mig lam chad pa'i dus kyi tshe gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa dag ces bod par brtsams pa dang /_
[\[35b.3\]]dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'dam bu thibs po'i gseb tu zhugs pa bzhin du ci 'bod/_'char kas smras pa/_'di na kho bo'i gzhon nu dag cig 'khod na de dag las 'ga' zhig na bar ma gyur tam/_de dag gis de thos nas smras pa/_slob dpon ma 
[\[35b.4\]]'bod cig_/gnas khang 'o nir gzims mal bshams te zhabs kyi chab dang /_zhabs bsku ba yang bzhag gis der gzims shig_/bdag cag da ltar dro ba'i dus la bab pas dpong sa'i khang par zhugs te nyal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag gal te rlung ngam/_
[\[35b.5\]]bad kan g.yos par gyur na kho bos yun de srid du khyed kyi nad g.yog byed par ga la nus/_byibs shig ces des de dag nang du btsud nas skar khung dag bcad de me sbar nas sgo bcad de/_la ba ji snyed yod pa dag gis dkris te steng du mnan nas 'dug go/_/de dag gis mtshan mo'i 
[\[35b.6\]]nam nangs nas smras pa/_slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag cag mchi'o/_/gar 'dong /_mnyan yod du'o/_/sdod cig dang kho bos khyed cag na ba rnams kyi nad g.yog bya'o/_/slob dpon khyed kyis bdag cag mi na ba yang na bar byas pas na ba rnams kyi nad g.yog byas re 
[\[35b.7\]]skan zhes de dag mnyan yod du dong ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_ji ltar bde bar brgyus/_bdag cag slob dpon 'char kas mtshan thog thag tho btsams so/_/
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]ji ltar tho btsams/_de dag gis skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod do/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag ched du bsams te dge slong rnams la mtho 'tsham par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i 
[\[36a.2\]]skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis ji tsam du cung zad dge slong la mtho 'tsham par byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi 
[\[36a.3\]]tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur shog_/ljongs rgyur 'dong dang der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya/_
[\[36a.4\]]rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_lung dbog pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o/_/khyed cag na ba dag gi nad g.yog 
[\[36a.5\]]kyang bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /_de gang gi tshe na dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na 'ga' yang de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba med nas/_de gcig pu ljongs rgyur song ba na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig 
[\[36a.6\]]tu phyin to/_/gtsug lag khang de na bshang ba'i skyabs kyang med/_gci ba'i skyabs kyang med de de na dge slong dag gis gyo mo dag bzhag ste/_der bshang ba dang gci ba dag byas nas 'dor bar byed do/_/'char ka gtsug lag khang der zhugs pa na dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas 
[\[36a.7\]]ngan len kun du spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar de shes nas dge slong 'gas kyang de mkhos su ma phab pa dang /_des bsams pa/_lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag mi dga' bar bya'o snyam nas de gtsug lag khang de'i steng du 'dzegs pa dang /_ji tsam na des de na gyo mo dag bzhag pa 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]mthong nas/_des smras pa/_ci gtsug lag khang 'di chol zangs can yin nam zhes gyo mo de dag rkang pa'i mthe bos bzung ste phyi rol du bor ro/_/dge slong dag mtshan mo langs pa dang ji tsam na gyo mo dag mi snang nas de dag gis wa'i khar bshang ba dang /_gci ba byas so/_/de 
[\[36b.2\]]nas mtshan mo'i nam langs pa na bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag lhags pa dang /_des de dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ji ltar lhung bzed nag po can gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa dag gis gtsug lag khang thams cad bshang ba dang /_gci bas ma rung 
[\[36b.3\]]bar byas pa la ltos zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge slong la mtho 'tsham par byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[36b.4\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg_/ljongs rgyur 'dong dang der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par 
[\[36b.5\]]bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya/_rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_lung dbog pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med par 
[\[36b.6\]]bya'o/_/khyed cag na ba dag gi nad g.yog kyang bya'o/_/zhes spro bar byas pa dang /_de gang gi tshe na dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na 'ga' yang de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba med nas de gcig pu ljongs rgyur 
[\[36b.7\]]song ba na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig du phyin to/_/'char ka gtsug lag khang der zhugs pa na dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar de shes nas dge slong 'gas kyang de mkhos su ma phab pa dang /_des bsams pa/_lhung bzed nag po can 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]'di dag mi dga' bar bya'o snyam nas des bkru sman gyi ril du zos nas me khang du zhugs te 'dug pa na der des 'khru bar brtsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis nad pa dus gsum du blta bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/_dge slong gnas brtan gnas 
[\[37a.2\]]brtan dag de'i nad 'drir lhags nas/_de dag gis de la dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rung ngam/_des smras pa/_rung ngo /_/gnas brtan dag yud tsam zhig 'khod nas 'dong bar brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_gnas brtan dag re zhig yud tsam zhig gzhes shig_/
[\[37a.3\]]de dag gis yud tsam zhig 'khod nas dong bar brtsams pa dang /_des yang smras pa/_gnas brtan dag da dung yang yud tsam zhig gzhes shig_/tshe dang ldan pa ched du bsams te mtho 'tsham par mi byed dam/_lhung bzed nag po can khyed de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o zhes 
[\[37a.4\]]zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge slong la mtho 'tsham par byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal 
[\[37a.5\]]byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg ljongs rgyur 'dong dang /_der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa 
[\[37a.6\]]yang bsgrag par bya/_rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing /_khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_lung dbog pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o/_/khyed 
[\[37a.7\]]cag na ba dag gi nad g.yog kyang bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /_de gang gi tshe dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin no/_/zhes bya bar shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na 'ga' yang de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba med nas de gcig pu ljongs rgyur song ba na ri 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin to/_/gtsug lag khang de na dge slong spong ba pa sha stag 'khod do/_/'char ka gtsug lag khang der zhugs pa na dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar de shes nas/_dge slong 'gas kyang de mkhos 
[\[37b.2\]]su ma phab pa dang /_des bsams pa/_lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag mi dga' bar bya'o snyam zhing gtsug lag khang de yang phyed byas zin par 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka khyim bdag de'i gan du song ste phyin nas smras pa/_khyim bdag ci'i phyir gtsug lag khang 
[\[37b.3\]]zin par mi byed/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_myur bar dge la 'jug bya zhing /_/sdig las sems kyang bzlog par bya/_/bsod nams bul bar byed gyur na/_/yid ni sdig la dga' bar 'gyur/_/zhes ma gsungs sam/_'phags pa bdag la kAr ShA pa 
[\[37b.4\]]Na dag ni mchis na gla mi dag ma mchis so/_/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis mkhar lan bya'o zhes ma gsungs sam/_gal te 'phags pas mkhar lan bgyid du stsal na legs so/_/'char kas gtsug lag khang du song ste gaN+DI brdungs so/_/
[\[37b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gaN+DI bsu bar bya'o zhes bsngags pas dge slong rnams kyis gaN+DI bsu ba dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas so phag dag gdeg par brtsams pa mthong nas dge slong de dag gis kyang so phag dag gdeg par brtsams so/_/'char kas dge 
[\[37b.6\]]slong de dag nyin thog thag so phag dag skyed du bcug pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gtsug lag khang 'di sngon ni rnal 'byor dang mthun par gyur na/_da ni mkhar lan dang mthun par gyur gyis mnyan yod du 'dong ngo zhes de dag mnyan yod du dong ba dang /_
[\[37b.7\]]dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/kho bo cag khyed mthong bar ni dga'i 'ongs par ni mi dga'o/_/gtsug lag khang de rnal 'byor dang mthun pa yin na khyed cag ci'i phyir gtsug lag khang de 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]bor te 'dir 'ongs/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gtsug lag khang de sngon ni rnal 'byor dang mthun par gyur na da ni mkhar lan dang mthun par gyur to/_/ji ltar gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka der 'ongs nas mkhar lan phyung ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[38a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge slong la mtho 'tsham par byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' 
[\[38a.3\]]ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg ljongs rgyur 'dong dang /_der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya/_rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing /_
[\[38a.4\]]khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_lung dbog pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o/_/khyed cag na ba dag gi nad g.yog kyang bya'o zhes spro bar 
[\[38a.5\]]byas pa dang /_de gang gi tshe na dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na 'ga' yang de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba med nas de gcig pu ljongs rgyur song ba na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin to/_/gtsug 
[\[38a.6\]]lag khang de na dge slong kha ton pa sha stag 'khod do/_/'char ka gtsug lag khang der zhugs pa na dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar de shes nas dge slong 'gas kyang de mkhos su ma phab pa dang /_des bsams pa/_lhung bzed nag 
[\[38a.7\]]po can 'di dag mi dga' bar bya'o snyam zhing gtsug lag khang de yang phyed byas zin par 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka khyim bdag de'i gan du song ste phyin nas smras pa/_khyim bdag ci'i phyir gtsug lag khang zin par mi byed/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_myur bar dge 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]la 'jug bya zhing /_/sdig las sems kyang bzlog par bya/_/bsod nams bul bar byed gyur na/_/yid ni sdig la dga' bar 'gyur/_/zhes ma gsungs sam/_'phags pa bdag la kAr ShA pa Na dag ni mchis na gla mi dag ma mchis so/_/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[38b.2\]]kyis dge slong dag gis mkhar lan bya'o zhes ma gsungs sam/_gal te 'phags pas mkhar lan bgyid du stsal na legs so/_/'char kas gtsug lag khang du song ste gaN+DI brdungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gaN+DI bsu bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas dge slong rnams 
[\[38b.3\]]kyis gaN+DI bsu ba dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas so phag dag gdeg par brtsams pa mthong nas dge slong dag gis kyang so phag dag gdeg par brtsams so/_/'char kas dge slong de dag nyin thog thag so phag dag skyed du bcug pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe 
[\[38b.4\]]dang ldan pa dag gtsug lag khang 'di sngon ni kha ton dang mthun par gyur na da ni mkhar lan dang mthun par gyur gyis mnyan yod du 'dong ngo zhes de dag mnyan yod du dong ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/
[\[38b.5\]]kho bo cag khyed cag mthong bar ni dga'i 'ong bar ni mi dga'o/_/gtsug lag khang de kha ton dang mthun pa yin na khyed cag ci'i phyir gtsug lag khang de bor te 'dir 'ongs/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gtsug lag khang de sngon ni kha ton dang mthun par gyur na da ni mkhar lan dang mthun par gyur to/_/ji 
[\[38b.6\]]ltar gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka der 'ongs nas mkhar lan phyung ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge slong la mtho 'tsham par byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 
[\[38b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg ljongs rgyur 'dong dang /_der bdag cag gis rgol ba 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya/_rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing /_khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_lung dbog pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha 
[\[39a.2\]]ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o/_/khyed cag na ba dag gi nad g.yog kyang bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /_de gang gi tshe na dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na 'ga' yang de dang 
[\[39a.3\]]lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba med nas de gcig pu ljongs rgyur song ba na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin to/_/gtsug lag khang de chom rkun pas 'jigs pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/'char ka gtsug lag khang der zhugs pa na dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa 
[\[39a.4\]]yin no zhes bya bar de shes nas dge slong 'gas kyang de mkhos su ma phab pa dang /_des bsams pa/_lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag mi dga' bar bya'o snyam nas des sgo phye ste sgo khang du 'dug pa dang /_dge skos kyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka kho bo sgo gcod par byed kyis khyod phyogs 'dir 
[\[39a.5\]]'dug shig 'char kas smras pa/_khyod rang gi gnas khang gi sgo legs par chod la 'dug shig ces des sgo gcod du ma ster to/_/dge slong de dag 'jigs pa dang bcas par gtsug lag khang gi sgo ma bcad pas mtshan thog thag tron byed byed nas mtshan mo'i nam nangs par gyur pa'i skabs 
[\[39a.6\]]de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge slong la mtho 'tsham par byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med 
[\[39a.7\]]zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg ljongs rgyur 'dong dang /_der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya/_rnyed 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing /_khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_lung dbog pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o/_/khyed cag na ba dag gi nad 
[\[39b.2\]]g.yog kyang bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /_de gang gi tshe na dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na 'ga' yang de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba med nas/_de gcig pu ljongs rgyur song ba na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin to/_/
[\[39b.3\]]gtsug lag khang de ni 'jigs pa med pa yin no/_/'char ka gtsug lag khang der zhugs pa na dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar de shes nas dge slong 'gas kyang de mkhos su ma phab pa dang /_des bsams pa/_lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag mi 
[\[39b.4\]]dga' bar bya'o snyam zhing gtsug lag khang de yang 'jigs pa med pa yin pas de na dge slong dag phyi rol du bshang ba dang /_gci ba byed du 'dong nas 'char kas sgo bcad de sgo khang du mal bshams nas nyal lo/_/dge slong dag mtshan mo bshang ba dang /_gci ba dag byed du 'dong 'dong nas 
[\[39b.5\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka kho bo cag phyi rol du 'dong gis khyod phyogs 'dir nyol cig_/'char kas smras pa/_khyed cag rang rang gi gnas khang gi glo phug la phyi rol du deng shig_/dge slong de dag bshang ba dang /_gci ba bdo bas kha cig gis ni khyams su bshang ba dang /_
[\[39b.6\]]gci ba byas/_kha cig gis ni rdzing drung du bshang ba dang /_gci ba byas so/_/de nas mtshan mo'i nam nangs pa na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang /_'char kas de dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ji ltar lhung bzed nag po can gnas 
[\[39b.6\]]ngan len kun du spyod pa 'di dag gis gtsug lag khang thams cad bshang ba dang /_gci bas ma rung bar byas pa la ltos zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]slong la mtho 'tsham par byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang drug po 'di dag ni bsko bar mi bya ste/_drug gang zhe na/_sgo khang dang /_them skas kyi gzhi dang /_khyams dang /_dpong sa'i khang pa dang /_me khang dang /_bkad sa'o/_/
[\[40a.2\]]las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/phyis gnon gyi ltung byed de bcu bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[40a.3\]]bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg ljongs rgyur 'dong dang /_der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya/_rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing /_khyed cag 
[\[40a.4\]]kyang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_lung dbog pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o/_/khyed cag na ba dag gi nad g.yog kyang bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /_de gang 
[\[40a.5\]]gi tshe na dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na 'ga' yang de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba med do/_/bsod snyoms pa zhig gis smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' kho bo khyod dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro'o/_/dge slong rnams 
[\[40a.6\]]kyis bsod snyoms pa de la smras pa/_bsod snyoms pa de ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin pas khyod la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro/_/bsod snyoms pas smras pa/_kho bo ni lo 'das pa yin pas kho bo de la gnas bca' ba dang /_lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton 
[\[40a.7\]]dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba'i rag lus pa cung zad kyang med pas des kho bo la ci byar yod ces des dge slong de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par byas te de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur song ngo /_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi mtshams 'das pa de'i tshe na smras pa/_bsod 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]snyoms pa gtur bu 'di re zhig khyer cig_/btsun pa nye dga' ci khyod kyis sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun ma mthong ngam/_yo byad don med pa 'dis ci bya/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bsod snyoms pa khyod re zhig mi khyer ba 'di yus na/_ci khyod kho bo bas kyang 
[\[40b.2\]]mkhas pa yin snyam mam/_ci na khyod kho bo la de skad zer/_bsod snyoms pas smras pa/_mkhas pa ma yin yang rigs pa tsam smra'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_bsod snyoms pa 'di mi dga' bar bya'o snyam nas/_de gnyis mthar gyis ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na de gnyis 
[\[40b.3\]]ri brags shig tu phyin nas/_de gnyis der khron pa zhig gi drung du ngal so bar byed pa na de na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der gaN+DI brdungs pa dang /_bsod snyoms pa des thos nas smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' gtsug lag khang du gaN+DI brdungs kyis 'dong ngo /_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]
[\[40b.4\]]smras pa/_bsod snyoms pa lhung bzed nag po can las med pa dag gis las kyi gaN+DI brdungs shing bdag cag ngal ba dag gis las bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa nye dga' rnyed pa'i gaN+DI ma yin nam/_bsod snyoms pa de yin na bdag cag 
[\[40b.5\]]mtshams su phyin na 'thob po/_/btsun pa nye dga' ni grags pa bsod nams che ba yin pas 'thob kyi/_kho bo sus byin par 'gyur/_bsod snyoms pa song la gal te rnyed pa yod na kho bo'i yang nos shig_/de song ba dang ji tsam na der gnas mal gyi gaN+DI brdungs nas dge slong rnams 
[\[40b.6\]]kyis smras pa/_bsod snyoms pa gnas mal nos shig_/des smras pa/_kho bo las ches rgan pa yang yod do/_/su yin/_btsun pa nye dga'o/_/de'i yang nos shig_/des gnas mal mnos so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' yang de na 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug ste/_ri 
[\[40b.7\]]brags 'di su'i/_gtsug lag khang 'di su'i/_lha khang 'di su'i/_skyed mos tshal 'di su'i/_kun dga' ra ba 'di su'i/_khron pa 'di su'i/_zhing 'di su'i/_ba lang 'di dag su'i/_ma he 'di dag su'i zhes 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug go/_/bsod snyoms pas 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]kyang bsams pa/_btsun pa nye dga' yun ring du thogs par 'gyur ro/_/snyam nas/_des khang thog tu de'i mal bshams nas rkang pa'i chu dang /_rkang pa bsku ba mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/_gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas 
[\[41a.2\]]'og khang du mal bshams par zhugs te nyal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' yang ji srid du de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla yod pa de srid du 'dug 'dug nas gang gi tshe de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla med pa de'i tshe na mig lam chad pa'i dus kyi tshe gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te/_bsod snyoms 
[\[41a.3\]]pa bsod snyoms pa zhes bod par brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' 'dam bu thibs po'i gseb tu zhugs pa bzhin du ci 'bod/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_'di na kho bo'i grogs po bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug na/_de na bar ma gyur 
[\[41a.4\]]tam/_bsod snyoms pas de thos nas smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' ma 'bod cig_/kho bos khyed kyi mal khang thog tu bshams te rkang pa'i chu dang /_rkang pa bsku ba yang mtha' gcig tu bzhag gis der song la nyol cig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bsod snyoms pa 'tham pa 
[\[41a.5\]]chung zhig yod kyis je sgo phye shig_/btsun pa nye dga' kho bo chad kyis sang 'tham mo/_/bsod snyoms pa kho bo khyod dang ji srid mtshan thog thag zad par 'gyur ba de srid du 'tham par bya'o/_/btsun pa nye dga' kho bo chad kyis khyod la sgo mi dbye'o/_/nye dga' khang thog tu 'dzegs nas rkang pa 
[\[41a.6\]]gnyis bkrus te gnas khang du zhugs nas bsod snyoms pa zhes bos pa dang /_bsod snyoms pas btsun pa nye dga' ci zer zhes byas so/_/nye dga' sgra la mkhas pas des bsod snyoms pa'i dpral ba'i thad kar khri rkang gtad de ci nas kyang khri rkang gis khang thog brtol nas bsod snyoms pa de'i 
[\[41a.7\]]dpral bar 'bab par 'gyur ba de ltar shugs drag pos mnan pa dang /_des bsod snyoms pa de'i dpral bar phog ste dpral ba zhom mo/_/bsod snyoms pas smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' kho bo gnang ngo /_/kho bo gnang ngo /_/kwa'e bsod snyoms pa ci zer/_bsod snyoms pas 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]bsams pa/_gal te skad phyung na 'dis rgan rims kyis bdag gi khri yang phrogs par 'gyur ro/_/snyam nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nang par sngar langs te smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' phyag 'tshal lo/_/kho bo 'gro'o/_/bsod snyoms pa gar 'gro/_mnyan 
[\[41b.2\]]yod du'o/_/bsod snyoms pa sdod cig dang /_kho bos khyod na ba'i nad g.yog bya'o/_/btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis kho bo mi na ba yang na bar byas pas na ba'i nad g.yog byas re skan zhes de mnyan yod du song ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bsod 
[\[41b.3\]]snyoms pa 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus/_btsun pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bdag gi dpral ba bcom mo/_/ji ltar bcom/_des skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod do/_/dge slong 
[\[41b.4\]]don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du ljid kyis phab ste 'dug pa dang nyal bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs 
[\[41b.5\]]de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[41b.6\]]ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du ljid 
[\[41b.7\]]kyis phab ste 'dug pa dang nyal bar byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga 
[\[42a.2\]]ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du ljid kyis phab ste 'dug gam nyal na ltung byed do/_/yang 
[\[42a.3\]]dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o/_/gtsug lag khang gi zhes bya ba ni gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_
[\[42a.4\]]nyal ba dag byar rung bar ro/_/steng gi nam mkha' la zhes bya ba ni khang steng gi nam mkha' la'o/_/thog bor bar zhes bya ba ni rtswa'i thog gam/_lo ma'i thog bor bar ro/_/khri zhes bya ba ni khri nyid do/_/khri'u zhes bya ba yang khri'u nyid do/_/rtsa ba 'byung ba la zhes bya ba ni rkang pa 
[\[42a.5\]]'byung ba la'o/_/shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am/_gzhan dag gis brjod pas so/_/ljid kyis phab ste zhes bya ba ni mthus mnan te'o/_/'dug gam zhes bya ba ni rkub tshos 'jog par byed pa'o/_/nyal na zhes bya ba ni lus bsnyal na'o/_/
[\[42a.6\]]ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams 
[\[42a.7\]]la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am/_khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du ljid kyis phab ste 'dug 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]gam/_nyal na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/spang leb kyis g.yogs pa dang /_spang leb chung ngus g.yogs pa dang /_shing leb kyis g.yogs pa dang /_shing leb 'bur can gyis g.yogs pa dang /_byin gyis gzhol ba la ni ltung ba med do/_/rkang 
[\[42b.2\]]rten btsugs pa dang /_bkan pa byas pa la yang ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug pa'i ltung byed de [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas 
[\[42b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kau shAm+bI na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chus rtswa dang /_lci ba dang sa la 'debs par byed/_'debs su 'jug par byed nas dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa
