[\[83b.3\]]smras pa/_rte'u bzang po zhig ste shes bzhin du 'gro bar byed do/_/dus gzhan zhig na rdza mkhan de sgro ba thogs te sa len du song ba dang /_rte'u de yang de'i phyi bzhin thog thag 'brang zhing 'ongs so/_/rdza mkhan des sas sgro ba bkang ba dang /_rte'u des rgyab bzed nas/_rdza mkhan des 
[\[83b.4\]]sa'i sgro ba de rte'u de'i rgyab tu bkal nas des de khrid de khyim du 'ongs nas rdza mkhan des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo rte'u bzang po zhig ste/_kho bos phyin chad sa bskur dgos par mi 'gyur ro/_/kho bos der sa dgal bar byas khyod kyis 'dir phog shig chung ma de legs so zhes rte'u de 
[\[83b.5\]]la phub ma dang sran phub dag byin no/_/de'i tshe na bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba/_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_'khrug long dang /_nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang 
[\[83b.6\]]nad dang bral ba/_sA lu dang /_bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go/_/de'i rta cang shes dus la bab nas nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs byin gyi rta cang shes 
[\[83b.7\]]dus la bab po zhes thos pa dang /_de dag gis de la yang na ni sgyu dpya 'jol cig yang na ni bA rA Na sI'i phyi rol gyi skyed mos tshal du ma byung shig_/de lta mi byed na gnya' ba nas btags te bkri'o zhes phrin spring ngo /_/rgyal po tshangs byin de dag la sgyu dpya 'jal bar yang mi byed/_'jigs pas 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]phyi rol gyi skyed mos tshal du yang 'byung bar mi byed cing 'dug go/_/ded dpon de yang mthar gyis bA rA Na sIr phyin pa dang /_rgyal po tshangs byin gyis byang lam nas ded dpon zhig gis zong rta lnga brgya ded de bA rA Na sIr phyin ces thos nas des blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes 
[\[84a.2\]]ldan dag ngas yun ji srid cig tu 'dir zhugs te 'dug par bya/_deng la rta cang shes tshol cig_/de dag ded dpon de'i gan du dong ste de dag gis rta de dag mthong nas gcig la gcig smras pa/_shes ldan dag rta 'di dag ni rta cang shes kyis btul ba sha stag yin na 'di na rta cang shes ni 
[\[84a.3\]]'ga' yang mi snang ngo /_/de dag gis rgod ma de mthong nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgod ma 'di las rta cang shes 'brangs na de ni mi snang ngo /_/de dag ded dpon gyi gan du song ste dris pa/_ded dpon khyod kyis rta 'ga' zhig btsongs pa'am/_gzhan la byin pa yod dam/_ded dpon 
[\[84a.4\]]gyis smras pa/_btsongs pa ni 'ga' yang med de/_'di ltar kho bos mchod gyur gyi gnas su rte'u zhig bkra mi shis so snyam nas rdza mkhan zhig la byin pa ni yod do/_/de dag gis gcig la gcig smras pa/_shes ldan dag ded dpon 'di ni blun po zhig yin te/_snying po gang yin pa 
[\[84a.5\]]bor nas snyigs ma dag ded de 'dir 'ongs so/_/de dag gis rgyal po la zhus te mchod gyur du dong nas de dag rdza mkhan de'i drung du dong ste dris pa/_khyod la rte'u 'dis ci bya/_rdza mkhan gyis smras pa/_'di kho bo'i sa dgal lo/_/de dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag gis khyod la bong 
[\[84a.6\]]bu sbyin gyis khyod kyis kho bo cag la 'di byin cig_/rdza mkhan gyis smras pa/_kho bo la 'di nyid mkho'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_glang bzhi dang ldan pa'i shing rta sbyin no/_/rdza mkhan gyis smras pa/_kho bo la 'di nyid mkho'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyod deng gros gyis shig 
[\[84a.7\]]dang kho bo cag sang yang 'ong ngo zhes zer te dong ngo /_/chos nyid kyis na 'jig rten gnas pa chags nas ring po ma lon pa'i tshe na dud 'gro dag kyang smra shes pa yin pas rte'u des rdza mkhan de la smras pa/_de dag ci 'dod/_khyod 'dod do/_/ci'i phyir sbyin par mi byed/_ci khyod kyi snying 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]lam na kho bo ji srid 'tsho'i bar du khyod kyi sa khal byed cing phub ma dang sran phub za snyam mam kho bos rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba bkur bar bya zhing gser gyi snod nas bzang chas zil dngar gyis bcin pa dag bza' bar bya dgos so/_/de dag rte'u zhes zer na de dag la rta cang shes 
[\[84b.2\]]zhes zer du ngo tsha 'am ci zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te rin gyi phyir byin cig ces zer na de dag la yang na gser 'bum byin cig_/yang na 'di'i brla g.yas pas gser ji tsam 'dren nus pa de tsam byin cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/phyi de nyin bar de dag 'ongs te rdza mkhan la dris pa/_kwa'i nang 
[\[84b.3\]]rje khyod kyis gros byas sam/_gros byas so/_/'o na rte'u 'di byin cig khyed rta cang shes zhes zer du ngo tsha'am ci/_de dag gis bsams pa/_glen pa 'dis 'di rta cang shes yin nam ma yin ci shes te/_'di ltar rta 'di nyid byas pa gzo ba yin pas 'di nyid kyis 'di la smras par gyur gor ma 
[\[84b.4\]]chag snyam nas de dag gis smras pa/_rta cang shes yin yang rung /_rte'u yin yang rung gis rin gyi phyir byin cig_/rdza mkhan gyis smras pa/_yang na gser 'bum byin cig_/yang na 'di'i brla g.yas pas gser ji tsam 'dren nus pa de tsam byin cig_/de dag gis bsams pa/_'di 
[\[84b.5\]]mthu dang ldan pa yin pas chos mang po dag 'dren par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas smras pa/_gser 'bum sbyin no/_/de dag gis rgyal po tshangs sbyin la gser 'bum gyis rta cang shes khugs so zhes spring pa dang /_rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis de 
[\[84b.6\]]dag la rin ji tsam gyis khug pa de tsam gyis long shig ces spring ngo /_/de dag gis gser 'bum gyis blangs nas de dag rta cang shes de khrid de bA rA Na sIr lhags nas de dag gis de rta bres kyi dang por btags te de la rtswa dang chas byin na de de mi za nas rgyal pos smras pa/_khyed kyi rta cang shes 
[\[84b.7\]]nad pa zhig khrid de 'ongs sam/_ci de dag gis smras pa/_'di bro 'tshal ba ma lags te/_'di ltar je 'di la rma'o zhes de nas 'dul sbyong bas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_mgyogs 'gro gang tshe ran chas chu med pa'i/_/rdza mkhan bres na mgo skams rus lpags tsam/_/rang sos 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]gtubs pa'i rtsa dag za ba soms/_/de tshe mang pos khyod la bsams ma gyur/_/'di na mgyogs 'gro stong gi thog 'dren cing /_/rgyal pos chibs ran mchog dag nyer bstabs pa/_/ci'i phyir mi za dris pa bdag la smros/_/de nas rab mgyogs drang po brtan 
[\[85a.2\]]ldan pa/_/mi bzod 'khrugs bcas mgyogs 'gro mchog gis ni/_/de las nyer zhi legs par bsams byas nas/_/'dul sbyong blo ldan mi mchog de la smras/_/'dir khyod kho bo'i yon tan de nyid shes/_/kho bo ji bzhin khyod kyis ma rig min/_/mkhas pas brnyas na sa steng mi rgyu zhing /_/
[\[85a.3\]]kho bo 'dir ni myur du shi yang bla/_/skye bo ngan pas yun ring brnyas gyur kyang /_/gal te yon tan khyod ldan de brnyas min/_/skye bo mdzangs pas skad cig brnyas gyur na/_/zhi ba gal te yon tan de brnyas yin/_/'dul sbyong bas rgyal po la smras pa/_lha 'di ni bro 'tshal ba ma lags kyi 'di ltar 
[\[85a.4\]]rim pa ma bgyis pas de'i slad du 'di ran dang chas mi 'tshal lo/_/'di'i rim pa ji ltar bya/_lha shul dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad mdzes par bgyi zhing grong khyer yang mdzes par bgyi/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pas 
[\[85a.5\]]bsu bar bgyi/_phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de zangs ma'i glegs bu dag gis g.yog par bgyi/_rgyal po'i sras bu thu bos mgo'i steng du gdugs srog shing brgya pa gzung bar bgyi/_rgyal po'i sras mo thu mos rnga yab gser can nor bus spras pas sbrang ma dag bskyab par bgyi/_rgyal 
[\[85a.6\]]po'i btsun mo dam pas gser gyi snod nas zil dngar gyis bcin pa'i bzang chas kyi zas bstabs par bgyi/_rgyal po'i blon po dam pas gser gyi chol zangs kyis rtug pa dor bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de lta na 'di rgyal po yin gyi nga rgyal po ma yin no/_/'dul sbyong bas smras pa/_
[\[85a.7\]]lha 'di la dus thams cad du bsnyen bkur de ltar bgyi mi 'tshal te/_'di ltar dgung bdun gyi bar du bgyi'o/_/dgung bdun 'das nas bka' nyan par 'gyur ro/_/'das pa gang lags pa de da bgyi bar mi spyod kyang lhag ma gang lags pa de mdzad du gsol/_rgyal pos phyogs gang 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]du gzhag pa'i phyogs de zangs ma'i glegs bu dag gis kyang g.yogs/_rgyal po'i bu thu bo yang mgo'i steng du gdugs srog shing brgya pa 'dzin du bcug_/rgyal po'i bu mo thu mo yang rnga yab gser can nor bus spras pas sbrang ma dag skyob tu bcug_/rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa yang 
[\[85b.2\]]gser gyi snod nas zil dngar gyis bcin pa'i bzang chas kyi zas stobs su bcug_/rgyal po'i blon po dam pa yang gser gyi chol zangs kyis rtug pa 'dor du bcug go/_/sa bdag 'dul sbyong bcas pa de la chags/_/shin tu dri zhim byug pa mchog 'chang zhing /_/sa bdag btsun mo 
[\[85b.3\]]zil dngar bzang chas kyis/_/snod bkang mgyogs 'gro mchog phyir 'dzin par byed/_rgyal po skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro bar 'dod pa la rta cang shes phul ba dang /_des rgyab smad nas rgyal pos 'dul sbyong ba la rmas pa/_'di rgyab mi na'am/_des smras pa/_lha bro mi 'tshal te/_
[\[85b.4\]]'di ltar rgyal po bcibs dka' bar 'gyur snyam nas de'i slad du 'dis rgyab smad do/_/rgyal pos zhon te song ba dang /_de 'gro ba na chu byung nas de de la mi rgal ba dang /_rgyal pos 'dul sbyong ba la rmas pa/_'di mi 'jigs sam/_lha mi 'jigs te 'di ltar rnga ma'i chab kyis rgyal po 
[\[85b.5\]]gsher bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pas de'i slad du rgal bar mi bgyid do/_/rgyal pos de'i rnga ma gser gyi sbubs su bcug pa dang de de las rgal to/_/rgyal po de skyed mos tshal du song ste bag med par 'dug pa dang /_nyi 'og gi rgyal po dag gis rgyal po tshangs byin skyed mos tshal du song ngo 
[\[85b.6\]]zhes thos nas/_de dag lhags nas grong khyer gyi sgo dag bzung ngo /_/rgyal po tshangs byin gyis nyi 'og gi rgyal po dag gis grong khyer gyi sgo dag bzung ngo zhes thos nas de rta cang shes la zhon pa dang /_bA rA Na sI dang skyed mos tshal gyi bar du rdzing bu tshangs ldan zhes bya ba ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_
[\[85b.7\]]ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos khebs pa zhig gis chod nas rta cang shes kyis bsams pa/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba/_gnod pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_phongs par gyur pa bdag gis yal bar dor ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas/_rta cang 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]shes des pad ma'i 'dab ma dag gi steng du rkang pa bzhag ste sge'u cung nas bA rA Na sIr zhugs pa dang /_rgyal po dga' nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i srog phyung ba de la ci sbyin/_lha rgyal 
[\[86a.2\]]srid kyi phyed do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'di ni dud 'gro yin pas 'di la rgyal srid kyi phyed kyis ci bya ste/_'di ltar 'di las rten te zhag bdun du sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag bya zhing dus ma yin par ku mu da'i dus ston bya'o snyam nas/_rgyal po de las rten te zhag bdun du sbyin 
[\[86a.3\]]pa dag sbyin pa dang /_bsod nams dag bya bar brtsams shing zhag bdun du dus ma yin par ku mu da'i dus ston dag byas pa dang /_ded dpon des mi dag la dris pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir dus ma yin par ku mu da'i dus ston 'di byung bar gyur/_de dag gis de la smras pa/_rgyal 
[\[86a.4\]]pos mchod gyur ces bya ba'i gnas de nas rdza mkhan zhig las gser 'bum gyis rta cang shes nyos te 'dir 'ongs nas des rgyal po 'di'i srog phyung nas/_rgyal pos de las rten te zhag bdun du sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag byed cing dus ma yin par ku mu da'i dus ston 
[\[86a.5\]]byas so/_/ded dpon gyis bsams pa/_ma la rte'u de cang shes su ma gyur tam je song la de blta'o snyam nas de'i gan du song ba dang /_rta cang shes des smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje khyod kyis rta lnga brgya po dag gis ci thob/_gser 'bum mo/_/kho bo gcig pus kyang rdza mkhan de la gser 
[\[86a.6\]]'bum byin no/_/de brgyal te sa la 'gyel nas chu gdab pas srog phyir rnyed nas rta cang shes kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bzod pa gsol to/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon gang yin pa de ni 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rta cang shes 
[\[86a.7\]]gang yin pa de ni lam pa 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang des gang gi tshe de'i yon tan dag mngon par mi shes pa de'i tshe na de la gus pa ma yin pa la zhugs par gyur la/_gang gi tshe de'i yon tan dag mngon par shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bzod pa gsol bar gyur 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]la/_da ltar yang des gang gi tshe 'di'i yon tan dag mngon par mi shes pa de'i tshe na 'di la gus pa ma yin pa la zhugs la/_gang gi tshe yon tan dag mngon par shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bzod pa gsol bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge 
[\[86b.2\]]slong rnams kyis zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa lam pas las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems sgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang gis so/_/gang du smon lam 
[\[86b.3\]]btab/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung bar gyur pa na gang las rab tu byung ba'i mkhan po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sems sgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan to/_/de na 'dis 
[\[86b.4\]]tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod 
[\[86b.5\]]pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste/_bdag gis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs 
[\[86b.6\]]pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs 
[\[86b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed cing ji ltar mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sems sgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa shAkya'i seng ge shAkya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des sems sgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces gdab par 
[\[87a.2\]]brtsams pas smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sems sgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 
[\[87a.3\]]gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /_'dren ma rnams spangs te/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[87a.4\]]las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gcig pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 
[\[87a.5\]]na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma la 'doms shig_/dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma la rjes su ston cig_/dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas/_de nas ut+pa la'i mdog 'khor 
[\[87a.6\]]dge slong ma lnga brgya tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig du 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis bsams pa/_bud med kyi yul ni shes rab chung ba yin no snyam nas des de 
[\[87a.7\]]la don dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge mdor 'dus pa 'dus pa dag gis chos bstan to/_/de shes rab can yin pas gong nas gong du 'dri bar byed nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis lan btab cing /_des de la ji tsam na nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab pa de tsam gyi bar du chos bstan nas de dag gis 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te dong ba dang /_ji tsam na mnyan yod kyi sgo dag bcad par gyur nas dge slong ma rnams kyis sgo btsal ba dang /_sgo bas smras pa/_sgo bcad lags so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_phye shig lde mig dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 
[\[87b.2\]]'tshal to/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_'di nyid du 'khod do snyam nas mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba na kun dga' ra ba zhig 'dug pa der de dag dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shing ljon pa yang rgan rims kyis bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas de dag gis shing ljon pa dag 
[\[87b.3\]]rgan rims kyis bsko bar brtsams pa dang /_de na de dag shing ljon pa dag sgo ba rnams la a y+ye a y+ya ha De a ga e a ga ha De zhes 'bod pa'i sgra mthon po dang /_sgra chen po byung ngo /_/g.yon can lnga brgya tsam mnyan yod 'joms par 'dod pa dag lhags pa de dag gis sgra mthon 
[\[87b.4\]]po dang /_sgra chen po de thos nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag mnyan yod na re zhig sdod cig_/shes ldan dag rje btsun mo'i 'khor gyis ma thos par 'di dag gzhom par bya'o/_/ut+pa la'i mdog gis bsams pa/_mi mdzes pa 'ga' zhig rig par mi 'gyur 
[\[87b.5\]]ram snyam na/_ji tsam na 'joms par 'dod pa'i g.yon can lnga brgya tsam po de dag mthong nas des 'phags skyes po'i dpung sprul te rnga pa Ta ha brdungs pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag 'phags skyes po'i dpung gis bskor te bdag cag zin par gyur na mi rung gis 
[\[87b.6\]]'bros par bya'o zhes de ltar rig nas de dag bros so/_/ut+pa la'i mdog gis dge slong ma de dag la smras pa/_phu nu mo dag g.yon can 'joms par 'dod pa lnga brgya tsam 'dir lhags nas kho mos de dag bsdigs nas bros kyis/_khad kyi dal bu dal bus lag brdas sgo phye shig_/de 
[\[87b.7\]]dag nang par sngar langs te mnyan yod du zhugs pa dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyis chos 'dre ba dang /_lhag par 'dre zhing tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed pa bzang ngo /_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]slong dag nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang 
[\[88a.2\]]skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la 
[\[88a.3\]]rmas pa/_dga' byed khyod nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi brtson pa dang mi sbyor ba dang /_ma brtags par spyod pa rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson pa dang /_
[\[88a.4\]]sbyor ba dang brtags te spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan 
[\[88a.5\]]thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong dge 'dun gyis bskos kyang nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed do/_/dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 
[\[88a.6\]]'dun gyis so/_/bskos kyang zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis so/_/nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du zhes bya ba ni nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab par ro/_/dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o/_/ston na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang /_lhag pa'i sems dang /_
[\[88a.7\]]lhag pa'i shes rab bo/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gi nyi ma nub pa la nyi ma nub par 'du shes pas dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi nyi ma nub pa la yid gnyis za bas 
[\[88b.2\]]dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nyi ma ma nub pa la nyi ma nub par 'du shes pas dge slong ma la ston na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi nyi ma ma nub pa la yid gnyis za bas dge slong ma la ston na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mtshan thog thag chos nyan par gyur pa 
[\[88b.3\]]dang /_gtsug lag khang gi sgo drung du ston pa dang /_sgo ma bcad par 'dug pa dang /_grong khyer gyi nang na gtsug lag khang ngam/_dbyar khang 'dug pa dang /_khyim gzhan du song ste ston pa la ltung ba med do/_las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag 
[\[88b.4\]]gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa ut+pa la'i mdog gis dge slong ma lnga brgya g.yon can gyi 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyabs pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[88b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar du ma zad de/_'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis don mthun mang po seng ge'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyabs par gyur te de nyon cig dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brags shig na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam 
[\[88b.6\]]pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo kho bo zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'gro'o/_/chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag kyang mchi'o/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_
[\[88b.7\]]lam du khyod kyi g.yog sus byed par 'gyur/_khyod 'di nyid du 'dug shig chung mas bdag mi khrid do snyam nas ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis khyim bdag la dris pa/_jo bos ci'i slad du 'di ngur stsal/_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_mi khrid do snyam nas so/_/de dag gis 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]smras pa/_ci'i slad du mi bkri/_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_der 'di'i g.yog su byed par 'gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_der bdag cag gis 'di'i g.yog bgyi'o/_/khyim bdag des de khrid de song nas don mthun de dag dgon pa'i lam zhig tu mtshan 
[\[89a.2\]]mo btab pa dang /_don mthun de dag lam gyis dub pas nyal nas/_khyim bdag gi chung ma de mel tshe byed do/_/ji tsam na der seng ge 'ongs nas des mgal dum thogs te de bsdigs pa dang bros par gyur nas lhas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_gang phyir bya ba thams cad la/_/skyes pa 
[\[89a.3\]]'ba' zhig mkhas pa min/_/de dang de la bud med kyang /_/zin la mkhas pa nyid du 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gi chung ma gang yin pa de ni ut+pa la'i mdog 'di nyid yin la/_de'i tshe de'i dus na don mthun lnga brgya gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong ma lnga brgya 'di dag 
[\[89a.4\]]yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'dis don mthun mang po seng ge'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyabs par gyur la/_da ltar yang 'dis dge slong ma lnga brgya g.yon can gyi 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyabs so/_/nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[89a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma la thoms shig dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma la rjes su ston cig dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma rnams la chos dang 
[\[89a.6\]]ldan pa'i gtam gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'khor dge slong ma lnga brgya dang tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa dga' 
[\[89a.7\]]byed kyis de la don dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge zab pa zab pa dag gis chos bstan to/_/bud med kyi yul ni shes rab 'chal pa'i phyir brda mi phrad cing 'jigs pa'i phyir 'dri mi nus so/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis smras pa la mngon par dga' 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas te tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas stan las langs te song nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig 
[\[89b.2\]]tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'phags pa dga' byed kyis dge slong ma rnams la don dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge zab pa zab pa dag gis chos bstan na/_bud med kyi yul ni shes rab 'chal pa'i slad du brda 
[\[89b.3\]]mi mjal cing /_'jigs pa'i slad du 'dri ba'i rngo mi thog ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu lags so zhes bka' stsal na/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bgyi'o/_/bcom 
[\[89b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta na gnong gis dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag gis ji ltar bya 
[\[89b.5\]]ba dag mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bca' ba lnga po rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dag dang /_bza' ba lnga po 'bras chan dang /_zan dron dang /_'de gu dang /_sha dang /_snum khur dag dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_
[\[89b.6\]]dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_shur bu dang /_lcag phod dang /_shur bu phre'u dang /_rgya cang dag gis bya'o/_/dge slong ma zhig gis 'o thug khyer te rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa la yang 
[\[89b.7\]]chos bstan par bya/_rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam nas/_drug sde las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas nye dga' nang par sngar langs te so shing bor nas snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]dge slong ma de mthong nas de la dris pa/_khyer te 'ongs pa 'di ci/_'o thug go/_/su la blud/_'phags pa dga' byed do/_/gal te nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kyang 'o thug rnyed par 'gyur na rtag pa kho nar dge slong ma la ston par 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[90a.2\]]bzhin du dge slong ma kha cig gis ni zho thug khyer te 'ongs/_kha cig gis ni hwags kyi la du khyer te 'ongs pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_kho bo ko tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed chos bzang po'i chos kyis dge slong ma la ston snyam gyi/_kho bo ko tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge 
[\[90a.3\]]slong ma la ston snyam mi sems so/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dag zas [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma rnams la ston par byed ces zer zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[90a.4\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste 
[\[90a.5\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dag ni zas [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston to zhes zer ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[90a.6\]]'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal 
[\[90a.7\]]pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dag zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston to zhes zer na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams la'o/_/'di skad ces 
[\[90b.2\]]zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o/_/dge slong dag ces bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag go/_/zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang /_bza' ba lnga'i phyir ro/_/dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o/_/ston to zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang /_lhag 
[\[90b.3\]]pa'i sems dang /_lhag pa'i shes rab bo/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma 
[\[90b.4\]]bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad tsam dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dag zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston to zhes zer na thams cad du 
[\[90b.5\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/zas [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston pa bden na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[90b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na tshong dpon zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/
[\[90b.7\]]de rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nye du zad par gyur cing nor zad pa dang /_longs spyod zad par gyur nas des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo kho bos da nor sgrub par mi nus kyis kho bo rab tu 'byung du 'gro'o/_/chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de ltar gyis shig 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]ces des chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI'i gan du khrid de smras pa/_'phags ma bdag gi mchis 'brang 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal na 'phags mas 'di rab tu dbyung du gsol/_rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad du gsol/_
[\[91a.2\]]skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs de rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so/_/des tshong dpon la smras pa/_rje'i sras bud med kyi yul ni srid pa spyad pa lags kyis dus dang dus su spyon cig_/tshong dpon de yang rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste dge slong gi gan du rab tu byung ngo /_/mnyan 
[\[91a.3\]]yod pa'i tshong dpon rab tu byung ngo zhes de grags shing bsod nams che bas des de'i chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_na ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag grub po/_/de dus gzhan zhig na snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te dge slong ma de'i dbyar khang du song ba dang /_
[\[91a.4\]]dge slong ma des de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_mdun du 'dug nas des de'i snam sbyar de la yang dang yang du rtog nas dge slong des smras pa/_sring mo snam sbyar 'di 'dod dam/_des smras pa/_lha'i gnas kyi lhag ma bzhin du'o/_/des bsams pa/_bdag gi 'di 
[\[91a.5\]]la snam sbyar 'di sbyin par bya zhing bdag gis snam sbyar gzhan btsem par bya'o snyam nas/_des de la snam sbyar de byin te song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs 
[\[91a.6\]]pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong 
[\[91a.7\]]rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/_zhi ba 'khor 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]zhi ba dang ldan pa/_grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/_dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/_thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/_dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/_mdzes pa 
[\[91b.2\]]'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_glang po che ltar glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[91b.3\]]bskor ba/_nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sa mkhan ltar lam du 
[\[91b.4\]]zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi 
[\[91b.5\]]tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs 
[\[91b.6\]]su bskor ba/_mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_thags zangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs 
[\[91b.7\]]su bskor ba/_tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/_spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/_chu gter ltar ting nge ba/_sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/_glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/_skyes 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/_'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/_
[\[92a.2\]]stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_'od srung dang /_kun 
[\[92a.3\]]dga' bo dang /_nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po dag dang /_gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos bskor te ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs so/_/chos nyid kyis na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ljongs rgyur gshegs pa na 'ga' zhig chos gos stod g.yogs smad 
[\[92a.4\]]g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyu bar mi 'gyur ram snyam pas sku thams cad kyis g.yas phyogs nas glang po che'i lta stangs kyis rnam par gzigs pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro ba gzigs 
[\[92a.5\]]so/_/gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong dbyar gnas pa dag gis chos gos kyi rnyed pa ma grub bam/_bcom ldan 'das grub bo/_/kun dga' bo 'o na ci'i phyir dge slong 'di chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs 
[\[92a.6\]]dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos dag sbyin nam/_btsun pa stsal 
[\[92a.7\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa ni 'di snyam du 'di'i chos gos gsum tshang ngam/_'on te ma tshang snyam du mi sems par 'di ltar thob bo cog len par byed kyi nye du la ni byin yang len par mi byed do/_/de nas bcom 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[92b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la rmas pa/_dge slong khyod dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos sbyin pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa 
[\[92b.3\]]de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnams grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi 
[\[92b.4\]]bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos sbyin na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/
[\[92b.5\]]dge slong ma zhes bya ba yang chos 'di pa'o/_/nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_mes po dang /_phrugs las brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/_/gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_du gu 
[\[92b.6\]]la'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_ko tam pa'i gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o/_/sbyin na zhes bya ba ni bslang mi dgos par ro/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro 
[\[92b.7\]]dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]na/_dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos byin na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas gos byin na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma 
[\[93a.2\]]yin par 'du shes pas gos byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par yid gnyis za bas gos byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/bor brlag byung ba la sbyin pa dang /_legs par smra ba la sbyin pa dang /_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la gos kyi 
[\[93a.3\]]sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_rdzogs par bsnyen par byed pa la sbyin pa dang /_rin gyi phyir sbyin pa dang /_brje ba'i phyir sbyin pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/gos sbyin pa'i ltung byed 
[\[93a.4\]]de nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bzhi bcu dgu pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong ma sbed ma'i chos gos lnga ngan cing snam sbyar yang 
[\[93a.5\]]rnyings nas/_des ras yug chen cig rnyed pa dang de su zhig bdag gi chos gos tshem par 'gyur snyam du sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa na/_dge slong ma rnams kyis de la smras pa/_sbed ma khyod ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/phu nu mo dag kho mo chos gos lnga ngan cing 
[\[93a.6\]]snam sbyar yang rnyings nas kho mos ras yug chen zhig rnyed na/_kho mo'i chos gos su 'drub par 'gyur mi shes so/_/sbed ma khyod gser gyi snod kyis slong mo la rgyu'am/_khyod kyi dge slong 'phags pa 'char ka rab tu bshes pa yin no/_/sbed mas smras pa/_des kho mo'i chos gos 
[\[93a.7\]]drubs par mi 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyis de la lan 'ga' bcol ba yod dam/_lan 'ga' yang bcol ba med do/_/ci khyod chu sgra grags pas lham 'bud dam/_song la chol cig dang 'drub par 'gyur ro/_/sbed ma 'char ka'i gan du song ste/_de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]'tshal nas mdun du 'dug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i ras yug chen mthong nas de la smras pa/_sbed ma gang la ras yug chen 'di lta bu yod pa des ras sar pa las snam sbyar nyi rim byas te snying las chung ngus dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas par 'gyur ro/_/sbed mas 
[\[93b.2\]]smras pa/_'phags pa bdag khyod la ras yug chen mi 'bul ba ni ma lags na 'di ltar bdag gi chos gos lnga ngan cing snam sbyar yang rnyings pas khyod kyis bdag gi snam sbyar tshems te stsol cig_/'char kas bsams pa/_gal te re zhig btsem par byar yang bcu gnyis sde dag 
[\[93b.3\]]las gang dang gang dag la chos gos btsem par bya ba byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi gan du khyer te 'ong bas de snyed cig btsem par yang ji ltar nus/_gal te mi btsem du ni tshig pa'i g.yar tshus kyang mi ster bar 'gyur bas 'di ltar ci nas kyang shing gi snod du bskol 
[\[93b.4\]]ba bzhin du dang po gang yin pa de nyid tha mar 'gyur ba de ltar btsem par bya'o snyam nas des de la smras pa/_zhog la song shig_/sbed mas bzhag ste song ba dang /_drug sde dag der dong nas de dag gis ras yug chen de mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka ras yug chen 
[\[93b.5\]]'di su'i/_las bdag gir bya ba de'i'o/_/gang gi sbed ma'i'o/_/'o na 'khod de ci rung btsem par bya'o/_/de ltar gyis shig_/de dag gis ras yug chen de brgyangs te dras shing drubs nas 'char kas snam sbyar de dang tshon sna lnga'i skud pa khyer te 'chag tu song nas/_des 
[\[93b.6\]]der song ste snam sbyar de la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bdag nyid sbed ma'i mgul nas 'khyud de 'dug pa zhig skud ris su btsem nas de gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te snam sbyar de bltab nas chos gos kyi gdang la bkal te bzhag pa dang /_sbed ma yang 'ongs nas 'char kas smras pa/_
[\[93b.7\]]sbed ma kho bos kyang snam sbyar btsems na khyod kyang 'ongs so/_/des snam sbyar de bltab bzhin du sbed ma'i phrag pa la bkal te smras pa/_re zhig ji srid du tshon gyis ma bcal ba de srid du ma dbye shig_/ltung ba dang bcas par gyur ta re/_sbed mas snam sbyar de de bzhin bltab 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]bzhin kho nar dbyar khang du 'phags pa dang /_de la dge slong ma khrims zlas smras pa/_sbed ma 'phags pa 'char kas snam sbyar ji ltar btsems pa bltas 'on cig_/sbed mas de la smras pa/_'phags pa 'char ka na re re zhig ji srid du tshon gyis ma bcal 
[\[94a.2\]]ba de srid du ma dbye shig_/ltung ba dang bcas par gyur ta re zhes zer ro zhes ltar ma ster ro/_/sbed ma dbyar khang du song ba dang /_de la dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_sbed ma 'phags pa 'char kas snam sbyar ji ltar btsems pa bltas 'on cig_/sbed mas smras pa/_'phags 
[\[94a.3\]]pa 'char ka na re re zhig ji srid du tshon gyis ma bcal ba de srid du ma dbye shig_/ltung ba dang bcas par gyur ta re zhes zer ro/_/dge slong ma grogs mo dag gis 'di la ltung bar 'gyur ba ci yod ces de'i rgyab logs su 'dug ste snam sbyar hur ces phrogs nas phye ste bltas pa dang /_
[\[94a.4\]]dge slong ma rnams kyis de la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas 'char ka sbed ma'i mgul nas 'khyud de 'dug pa skud ris su btsems pa mthong nas rta gad kyis btab ste smras pa/_sbed ma khyod la 'phags pa 'char kas yun ring mo zhig gis gzod 'khyud do/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta 
[\[94a.5\]]mIs thos nas des smras pa/_nu mo dag khyed mgo phyi zhing mchan khung spun pa yin na ci dgod/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags ma ji lta ji ltar 'phags pa 'char kas mi mdzes pa bgyis pa la gzigs/_nu mo dag drug sde gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa dag gis 'drums pa 
[\[94a.6\]]ltung bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod nas/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la 
[\[94a.7\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa/_'char 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]ka khyod dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa'i gos byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par 
[\[94b.2\]]smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs 
[\[94b.3\]]pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa'i gos byed na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge slong 
[\[94b.4\]]ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/nye du ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_mes po dang /_phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/_de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/_/gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_du gu la'i gos 
[\[94b.5\]]dang /_rab bal gyi gos dang /_ko tam pa'i gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o/_/byed na zhes bya ba ni 'tshem na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba 
[\[94b.6\]]dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis dge slong ma 
[\[94b.7\]]nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas gos byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos byed na nyes byas su 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la yid gnyis za bas gos byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/gos byed pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu lnga 
[\[95a.2\]]pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni rkang pa spre'u zhag gis bskus te 'gro na yang 'gro bar chas pa'i 
[\[95a.3\]]rnyed pa sgrub par byed/_'ong na yang blo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed cing /_skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/yu bu cag ni khron pa'i rus sbal dang 'dra bar gar yang mi 'dong /_gang nas kyang mi 'ong bas rnyed pa 'thob pa dang /_skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /_
[\[95a.4\]]yid du 'ong bar ga la 'gyur gyis/_yu bu cag kyang 'dong ngo /_/gang du 'dong /_ljongs rgyur 'dong ngo /_/je sring mo dag blta'o zhes de dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de dag dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du dong ste bcu 
[\[95a.5\]]gnyis sde dag gi gan du song nas smras pa/_sring mo dag khyed cag bltas kyis kho bo cag ljongs rgyur 'dong ngo /_/de dag ngus pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_sring mo dag ngur ci yod/_gal te khyed cag ljongs rgyur bzhud na bdag cag la rgyal byed kyi tshal stongs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[95a.6\]]drug sde dag gis smras pa/_sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang bzhugs na khyed cag bdag cag la rgyal byed kyi tshal stongs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ram/_de dag gis smras pa/_lhung bzed nag po can dag bdag cag mthong bar yang mi dga' na mchi ba dang /_
[\[95a.7\]]stan 'ding ba dang /_chos ston par lta ga la 'gyur/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_sring mo dag 'o na lhan cig 'dong ngo /_/sbom dga' mos smras pa/_dge slong ma dag dge slong rnams dang lhan cig mchir rung ngam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_legs par rung ngo shin tu rung ngo gang du bkag 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]sus bkag lam rgyags mang po dag sta gon gyis shig_/de dag gis lam rgyags mang po dag sta gon byas so/_/drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_de dag mnyan yod du bsod snyoms brgyus nas dge 
[\[95b.2\]]slong ma'i dbyar khang du dong ba dang /_de dag la bcu gnyis sde dag gis smras pa/_jo bo cag je zhal tshus gsol cig_/de dag gis g.yar tshus byas byas pa na de dag gis lam rgyags sbyar ba thams cad zos nas de dag gis smras pa/_sring mo dag khyed kyis lam rgyags ji snyed 
[\[95b.3\]]sta gon byas pa bltas 'on cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyed kyis gsol ba de dag lags so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_lam rgyags de tsam gyis ljongs rgyur ji ltar nus/_'di ltar lam kar lhag par bkres par 'gyur gyis lam rgyags mang du sta gon gyis shig_/de dag 
[\[95b.4\]]gis lam rgyags mang po dag sta gon byas te drug sde dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'phags so/_/bsod snyoms pa zhig kyang de dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'phags pa dang dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_bsod snyoms pa 'di dag ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin gyis khyod 
[\[95b.5\]]'di dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur ma 'gro shig_/khyod la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro/_/bsod snyoms pas smras pa/_kho bo lo 'das pa yin pas 'di dag la lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_yongs su dri ba dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba 'ga' yang rag 
[\[95b.6\]]ma las pas 'di dag gis kho bo la tho btsam du ci yod ces des de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par byas te drug sde dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'phags so/_/de dag gis/_gang gi tshe mtshams kyi phyi rol tu son pa de'i tshe na smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag gis yun ji srid du gzhan 
[\[95b.7\]]gyi spyod lam gyis 'khod par bya/_tshur sheg bdag cag rang rang gi spyod lam gyis 'khod par bya'o zhes dang por dga' bo 'dug nas de'i 'og tu dga' mo 'dug_/de'i 'og tu dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug_/de'i 'og tu dga' mo'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug_/de'i 'og tu dga' 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]bo'i dge tshul 'dug_/de'i 'og tu dga' mo'i dge tshul 'dug go/_/de bzhin du nye dga' dang /_gtsug dga' mo la sogs pa yang spel mar bkod de dong ngo /_/don mthun de dang bram ze zhig 'gro ba des de dag mthong nas des smras pa/_'di ni dge sbyong yin/_de'i 
[\[96a.2\]]chung ma ni 'di yin/_de'i bu ni 'di yin/_de'i mna' ma ni 'di yin/_de'i tsha bo 'di yin/_de'i tsha bo'i chung ma ni 'di yin par shes so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]thos nas des smras pa/_bkren pa khyod kyi gnya' ba rdog pas mnan nas 'di ni kho bo'i chung ma yin/_'di ni kho'i bu yin/_'di 
[\[96a.3\]]ni kho'i mna' ma yin/_'di ni kho bo'i tsha bo yin/_'di ni kho bo'i tsha bo'i chung ma yin/_bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa bdag shi ba ni bla'i gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa 'di dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo snyam nas de phyir log ste rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_dge 
[\[96a.4\]]slong rnams kyis de mthong nas smras pa/_bsod snyoms pa ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus/_drug sde gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa dag gis 'drums pa ltung bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par byed do/_/ci byas/_des skabs de 
[\[96a.5\]]dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod pa dang /_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas 'gron lam du 'jug par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom 
[\[96a.6\]]ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa 
[\[96a.7\]]ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas 'gron lam du 'jug pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/_/zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal 
[\[96b.2\]]pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge 
[\[96b.3\]]slong gang dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas 'gron lam du 'jug na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med 
[\[96b.4\]]zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag rgyal po'i khab tu dge slong ma'i dbyar khang rgyal po'i kun dga' ra bar dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas de dag dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal 
[\[96b.5\]]du mnyan yod du 'phags nas de dag gis mnyan yod du 'gro ba'i don mthun btsal bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na de dag gis dge slong dang bcas pa'i don mthun mthong nas smras pa/_phu nu mo dag don mthun 'di ni dge slong dang bcas pa yin gyis/_dge slong med pa'i 
[\[96b.6\]]don mthun gzhan btsal bar bya'o/_/zhes de dag gis dge slong med pa'i don mthun gzhan btsal bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na dge slong med pa'i don mthun ma rnyed nas de dag gis smras pa/_phu nu mo dag bdag cag gis shin tu yun ring por bsdad na yang dge slong med 
[\[96b.7\]]pa'i don mthun ma rnyed kyis don mthun 'di nyid dang mgo snang tsam gyis 'dong bar bya'o/_/zhes de dag don mthun de dang lhan cig mgo snang tsam gyis 'phags so/_/don mthun de shin tu rings par song nas de dag phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro ba na chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas de 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]dag mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin te dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du dong ba dang dge slong ma rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_phu nu mo dag ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_ji ltar bde bar brgyus/_bdag cag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo/_/phu nu mo dag ji ltar 
[\[97a.2\]]bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su btang ba de ltar ni ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug po dag gis kyang bud med kyi yul 'ga' yang yongs su ma btang ngo /_/zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[97a.3\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na/_dus ma gtogs so/_/dge slong dag don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'dong ba na de dag bsod snyoms kyis phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[97a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lam rgyags bskur bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lam rgyags bskur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas de dag gis sus bskur bar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtse rgod kyis bskur bar bya'o/_/rtse rgod 
[\[97a.5\]]med na rtse rgod mos bskur bar bya'o/_/rtse rgod mo med na dge tshul gyis bskur bar bya'o/_/dge tshul med na dge tshul mas bskur bar bya'o/_/dge tshul ma med na dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma'i lam rgyags bskur bar bya zhing /_dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams 
[\[97a.6\]]kyi lam rgyags bskur bar bya ste/_dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma rnams kyi byin len bstab par bya zhing /_dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams kyi byin len bstab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na na bar gyur nas dge slong ma dag gis de dag 
[\[97a.7\]]bor te dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma rnams kyis kyang dge slong dag bkur bar bya'o/_/dge slong ma dag rkang pa logs nas 'dzin cing dge slong dag mgo logs nas 'dzin pa na dge slong ma dag 'dod chags skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis rkang pa logs nas gzung bar bya zhing /_dge slong ma dag gis mgo logs nas gzung bar bya'o/_/de dag grong du phyin nas thams cad sdod pa na/_de dag bsod snyoms kyis phongs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[97b.2\]]thams cad kyis bsdad par mi bya bar de na ba'i sman dang zan legs par sbyar te dge slong gcig bzhag nas lhag ma rnams 'dong bar bya'o/_/dge slong ma rnams la yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_
[\[97b.3\]]bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni 
[\[97b.4\]]gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas 'gron lam du 'jug na dus ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/de la dus ni 'di yin te/_lam don mthun gyis 
[\[97b.5\]]bgrod par bya ba dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa/_'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa/_'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa zhig na de la de ni dus yin no/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[97b.6\]]dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/'thams nas zhes bya ba ni brda' byas nas so/_/'gron lam du zhes bya ba ni dgon pa'i lam du'o/_/'jug na zhes bya ba ni 'gro na'o/_/dus ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dus bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya 
[\[97b.7\]]ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la dus ni 'di yin te lam don mthun gyis bgrod par bya ba zhes bya ba ni don mthun med par bgrod mi nus pa'o/_/dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni chom rkun pa dang g.yon 
[\[98a.2\]]can gyis 'jigs par grags pa'o/_/'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni seng ge dang /_stag dang /_gung gis 'jigs par grags pa'o/_/'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa zhig na zhes bya ba ni sha sbrang dang /_sbrang 
[\[98a.3\]]bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa zhig na'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas 'gron lam du 
[\[98a.4\]]'jug na rgyang grags phyed phyed du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/rgyang grags re rer ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas grong nas dgon pa'i 'gron lam du 'jug na grong rgyang grags kyis bar du chod pa bdun po dag gi rgyang grags 
[\[98a.5\]]phyed phyed du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rgyang grags re rer ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas dgon pa nas grong gi 'gron lam du 'jug na grong rgyang grags kyis bar du chod pa bdun po dag gi rgyang grags phyed phyed du nyes byas 
[\[98a.6\]]su 'gyur la/_rgyang grags re rer ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'jug pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[98a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni rkang pa spre'u zhag gis bskus te/_'gron na yang 'gro bar chas pas rnyed 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]pa sgrub par byed/_'ong na yang blo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed cing /_skye bo mang po dag dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/yu bu cag ni khron pa'i rus sbal dang 'dra bar gar yang mi 'dong /_gang nas kyang mi 'ong bas rnyed pa thob pa dang /_skye bo mang 
[\[98b.2\]]po dag dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong bar ga la 'gyur gyis yu bu cag kyang 'dong ngo /_/gang du 'dong /_ljongs rgyur 'dong ngo /_/je sring mo dag blta'o zhes de dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de dag dge 
[\[98b.3\]]slong ma'i dbyar khang du dong ste bcu gnyis sde dag gi gan du dong nas smras pa/_sring mo dag khyed cag bltas kyis kho bo cag ljongs rgyur 'dong ngo /_/de dag ngus pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_sring mo dag ngur ci yod/_gal te khyed cag ljongs rgyur bzhud na bdag 
[\[98b.4\]]cag la rgyal byed kyi tshal stongs par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang bzhugs na/_khyed cag bdag cag la rgyal byed kyi tshal stongs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ram de dag gis smras pa/_lhung bzed nag po can 
[\[98b.5\]]dag bdag cag mthong bar yang mi dga' na/_mchi ba dang stan gding ba dang /_chos ston par lta ga la 'gyur/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_sring mo dag 'o na lhan cig 'dong ngo de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 
[\[98b.6\]]'thams nas 'gron lam du 'jug na dus ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba ma mdzad dam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_de ni skam sa'i lam du bca' ba mdzad pas bdag cag gru'i lam du 'dong ngo /_/sbom dga' mos smras pa/_dge slong ma dag dge 
[\[98b.7\]]slong dag dang lhan cig gru'i lam du mchir rung ngam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_legs par rung ngo /_/shin tu rung ngo /_/gang du bkag_/sus bkag_/lam rgyags mang po dag sta gon gyis shig_/de dag gis lam rgyags mang po dag lta gon byas so/_/drug sde dag 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_de dag mnyan yod du bsod snyoms brgyus nas dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du dong ba dang /_de dag la bcu gnyis sde dag gis smras pa/_
[\[99a.2\]]jo bo cag je zhal tshus gsol cig_/de dag gis g.yar tshus byas pa na de dag gis lam rgyags sbyar ba thams cad zos nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_sring mo dag khyed kyis lam rgyags ji snyed sta gon byas pa bltas 'on cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyed 
[\[99a.3\]]kyis gsol pa de dag lags so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_lam rgyags de tsam gyis ljongs rgyur ji ltar nus/_'di ltar lam kar lhag par bkres par 'gyur gyis lam rgyags mang du sta gon gyis shig_/de dag gis lam rgyags mang po dag sta 
[\[99a.4\]]gon byas te drug sde dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'phags so/_/bsod snyoms pa zhig kyang de dag dang ljongs rgyur 'phags pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_bsod snyoms pa 'di dag ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin gyis 'di dag dang lhan 
[\[99a.5\]]cig ljongs rgyur ma 'gro shig_/khyod la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro/_/bsod snyoms pas smras pa/_kho bo lo 'das pa yin pas 'di dag la lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_yongs su dri ba dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba 'ga' 
[\[99a.6\]]yang rag ma las pas 'di dag gis kho bo la tho btsam du ci yod ces des de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par byas te/_drug sde dag dang lhan cig grur 'jug tu 'phags so/_/de dag gis gang gi tshe mtshams kyi phyi rol du son pa de'i tshe na smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' 
[\[99a.7\]]bdag cag gis yun ji srid du gzhan gyi spyod lam gyis 'khod par bya/_tshur gshegs bdag cag rang rang gi spyod lam gyis 'khod par bya'o/_/zhes dang por dga' bo 'dug nas/_de'i 'og tu dga' mo 'dug_/de'i 'og tu dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]pa 'dug_/de'i 'og tu dga' mo'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug_/de'i 'og tu dga' bo'i dge tshul 'dug_/de'i 'og tu dga' mo'i dge tshul ma 'dug_/de bzhin du nye dga' dang /_gtsug dga' mo la sogs pa yang spel mar bkod de dong ngo /_/don mthun de 
[\[99b.2\]]dang bram ze zhig lhan cig 'gro ba des de dag mthong nas des smras pa/_'di ni dge sbyong yin de'i chung ma ni 'di yin de'i bu ni 'di yin de'i mna' ma ni 'di yin/_de'i tsha bo ni 'di yin/_de'i tsha bo'i chung ma ni 'di yin par shes so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]thos nas des smras 
[\[99b.3\]]pa/_bkren pa khyod kyi gnya' ba rdog pas mnan nas 'di ni kho bo'i chung ma yin/_'di ni kho bo'i bu yin/_'di ni kho bo'i mna' ma yin/_'di ni kho bo'i tsha bo yin/_'di ni kho bo'i tsha bo'i chung ma yin no/_/bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa bdag shi ba ni bla'i 
[\[99b.4\]]gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa 'di dag dang lhan cig grur zhugs te 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de phyir log ste rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas smras pa/_bsod snyoms pa ji lta bde bar brgyus sam/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[99b.5\]]dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus/_drug sde gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa dag gis 'drums pa ltung bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par byed do/_/ci byas/_des skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod pa dang /_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong 
[\[99b.6\]]dag dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas gru gcig tu 'jug par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_
[\[99b.7\]]gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas gru gcig tu 'jug pa bden nam btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun 
[\[100a.2\]]pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/_/zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de 
[\[100a.3\]]lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong 
[\[100a.4\]]gang dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas gru gcig tu 'jug cing gyen du 'gro'am/_thur du 'gro na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[100a.5\]]mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag cig gis chu klung gnas can gyi pha rol thi ba can gyi kun dga' ra bar dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang byed du bcug nas/_des gtsug lag khang de 
[\[100a.6\]]dbul ba'i phyir gnyis ka'i dge 'dun spyan drangs so/_/dge slong ma zhig dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par gyur pa des bsams pa/_deng bdag gis bsod snyoms la brgyu mi dgos pas ji srid du gdugs tshod la nye bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du dge ba'i phyogs la 
[\[100a.7\]]tron bya zhing /_de'i 'og tu dus shes par byas te 'gro'o snyam nas des ji srid du gdugs tshod la nye bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas nas/_de'i 'og tu dus shes par byas te chu klung gi 'gram du song ba dang /_ji tsam na dge slong dag grur 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]zhugs nas gru pas smras pa/_'phags ma grur zhugs shig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]je song shig dang /_gru gzhan bkang ba na 'gro'o/_/gru pa des yang dang yang du 'ongs te smras pa/_'phags ma grur zhugs shig_/des kyang smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]je song shig 
[\[100b.2\]]dang /_gru gzhan bkang ba na 'gro'o/_/gru pa de song nas chu klung gi pha rol du gru phur pa la brtod de/_skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi nang du zhugs shing 'dug go/_/dge slong ma des yang dang yang du bos pa dang /_gru pa des tshig kyang ma ster nas de de na sdod sdod nas 
[\[100b.3\]]ji tsam na gdugs tshod yol nas/_de'i 'og tu dbyar khang du phyir log ste de ji srid du lus las mdangs ma yal ba de srid kyi bar du dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas nas/_gang gi tshe lus las mdangs yal ba de'i tshe na glos phab ste nyal ba dang /_dge slong ma rnams 
[\[100b.4\]]lhags te de la smras pa/_'phags ma gal te zas gzhan gyi yin zhes te lto yang gzhan gyi yin snyam mam/_ci byas/_ji tsam gyis glos phab ste nyal bar gyur pa de tsam gyis zas zos so/_/sus zos/_khyod kyis so/_/kho mos ma zos so/_/'o na ci'i phyir glos 
[\[100b.5\]]phab ste nyal/_des skabs de rgyas par dge slong ma rnams la brjod nas dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod do/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na thad 
[\[100b.6\]]kar pha rol du 'gro ba ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/_dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i 
[\[100b.7\]]chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]slong gang dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas gru gcig tu 'jug cing gyen du 'gro'am/_thur du 'gro na thad kar pha rol du 'gro ba ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu 
[\[101a.2\]]gang yin pa'o/_/dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni chos 'di pa'i'o/_/'thams nas zhes bya ba ni brda byas nas so/_/gru gcig tu zhes bya ba ni sho gam gcig pa dang /_la gcan gcig pa dang /_gru btsas gcig par ro/_/'jug cing zhes bya ba ni 
[\[101a.3\]]zhon zhing ngo /_/gyen du 'gro 'am zhes bya ba ni rgyun las bzlog phyogs su 'gro ba'o/_/thur du 'gro na zhes bya ba ni rgyun phyogs su 'gro na'o/_/thad kar pha rol du 'gro ba ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni thad kar pha rol du 'gro ba bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ni sems can 
[\[101a.4\]]dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing /_so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par 
[\[101a.5\]]byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas gru gcig tu 'jug cing gyen du 'gro'am/_thur du 'gro na rgyang grags phyed phyed du nyes byas su 'gyur 
[\[101a.6\]]la/_rgyang grags re rer ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas grong nas dgon par gru gcig tu 'jug cing gyen du 'gro'am/_thur du 'gro na grong rgyang grags kyis bar du chod pa bdun po dag gi rgyang grags phyed 
[\[101a.7\]]phyed du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rgyang grags re rer ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas dgon pa nas grong du gru gcig tu 'jug cing gyen du 'gro'am/_thur du 'gro na grong rgyang grags kyis bar du ma chod pa bdun po 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]dag gi rgyang grags phyed phyed du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rgyang grags re rer ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/yo ba las bzur ba dang /_gtib chad pa las bzur ba dang /_dba' klong las bzur ba dang /_ru skya chag pa dang /_gdos pa chag pa dang /_ru skya 'dzin pa mi nyan pa 
[\[101b.2\]]la ltung ba med do/_/'gram gnyis na bar chad brgyad po dag las gang yang rung ba nye bar gnas na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong ma dang lhan cig grur 'jug 
[\[101b.3\]]pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs 
[\[101b.4\]]te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas mthar gyis mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo /_/khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang tshe dang 
[\[101b.5\]]ldan pa 'char ka'i phyir stan shom par byed cing 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/btsun pa 'char ka tshur spyon btsun pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/_/btsun pa 'char ka gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka kha nang du bltas te 'dug go/_/
[\[101b.6\]]khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma yang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te kha phyir bltas te 'dug go/_/'char kas de la ji tsam pa de tsam gyis chos bstan nas sngon bgad pa dang /_rtses pa dang /_dga' ba byas pa dang /_dga' mgur spyad pa dag dran 
[\[101b.7\]]par bya bar brtsams te/_sbed ma khyod kyis bdag cag gnyis skyed mos tshal dang /_'dun sa dang /_lha'i gnas ga ge mo zhig tu bca' ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'chos pa dang /_bza' ba 'di dang 'di lta bu zos pa dang /_btung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'thungs pa 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]dang /_gnas mal 'di dang 'di lta bu bshams pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me 'di dang 'di lta bu btsugs shing der bdag cag gnyis kyis 'di dang 'di lta bu byas pa dran nam/_sbed mas smras pa dran no/_/bsod snyoms pa zhig snga dro sham thabs 
[\[102a.2\]]bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_de mthar gyis mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ba dang khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed mas de mthong nas des bsams 
[\[102a.3\]]pa gal te langs te/_bsod snyoms phul bar gyur na btsun pa 'char ka'i gtam spangs par 'gyur ro snyam nas des lag pas song shig ces brda byas so/_/'char kas sbed ma lag brda byed pa mthong nas des smras pa/_sbed ma khyod kho bo 'dug bzhin du mdun 
[\[102a.4\]]du skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig lag brda byed dam sbed mas smras pa/_'phags pa bdag skyes pa gzhan dang lag brda mi bgyid de/_'di ltar bsod snyoms pa zhig mchis nas bdag gis bsams pa gal te langs te/_bsod snyoms phul bar gyur na 'phags pa'i 
[\[102a.5\]]bka' mchid spangs par 'gyur ro snyam nas bdag gis de la mchis shig ces lag brda bgyis so/_/'char kas smras pa sbed ma khyod kyi snying lam na kho bos khyod la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i gtam byas snyam mam ci 'di ltar kho bos lag pas bcal ba brgya dag 
[\[102a.6\]]gis longs spyod dag bsgrubs na khyod kyis sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byed kyang mi nus sam/_sbed mas bsod snyoms pa de bos te bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste byin nas des de khyer te song ngo /_/tshe dang 
[\[102a.7\]]ldan pa 'char ka zas kyi bya ba byas te gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /_bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa/_btsun pa 'char ka la gtam bya zhing thos nas mchog tu dga' ba bskyed par bya'o snyam nas des de la smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka mchog tu 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]dga' ba skyed cig_/deng don gyis na bdag gis khyod kyi bsod snyoms zos so/_/bsod snyoms pa shes te des dang por khyod bos snyam mam ci des khyod song shig ces lag brda byas nas kho bos de'i 'og tu de'i phyir 'bod du bcug go/_/ci byin/_bca' ba dang bza' 
[\[102b.2\]]ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste byin te btsun pa 'char ka de ni khyod kyi yin no/_/de'i tshe na btsun pa 'char ka de nyid na 'dug par gyur tam 'dug go/_/khyod bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu cig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug tu 
[\[102b.3\]]rung ngam rung yang srid mi rung yang srid de kho bo de ltar 'dug go/_/bsod snyoms pa khyod kyi deng de ltar kho bo'i bsod snyoms zos shing gal te mi bzod na kho bo las brten te bslab pa'i gzhi 'char chug shig_/ci de kho bos yal bar bor du re'am zhes zer ba'i 
[\[102b.4\]]skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod pa dang /_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu cig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs 
[\[102b.5\]]de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 
[\[102b.6\]]mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa 'char ka khyod bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu cig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug 
[\[102b.7\]]par byed pa bden nam btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/_zhes bya ba la 
[\[103a.2\]]sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu cig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes 
[\[103a.3\]]bya ba ni 'char ka'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/bud med kyi yul dang zhes bya ba ni bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa sprod pa las byung ba'i chos sten nus pa dang ngo /_/lhan cig ces bya ba ni de dang lhan cig go/_/gcig pu cig dang zhes bya ba ni 
[\[103a.4\]]de dang ngo /_/dben pa zhes bya ba ni gang na bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning gzhan 'ga' yang med pa'o/_/skyabs yod pa zhes bya ba ni lngas bskyabs pa na ste/_rtsig pas bskyabs pa dang /_rib mas bskyabs pa dang /_yol bas bskyabs pa dang /_thibs pos bskyabs pa 
[\[103a.5\]]dang /_mtshan mos bskyabs pa na'o/_/stan la zhes bya ba ni gzhi la'o/_/'dug na zhes bya ba ni 'dom gang gi nang du rkub tshos 'jog par byed na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log 
[\[103a.6\]]par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na dge 
[\[103a.7\]]slong gis ji tsam cung zad bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu cig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sgo khang na 'dug pa dang sman 'thag tu 'jud pa dang sgo ma bcad par 'dug pa dang /_gzhan dag 'jug cing gzhan 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]dag 'byung na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/gcig pu 'dug pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon 
[\[103b.2\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe sbed ma rab tu byung nas de dge skos byed pa na dge slong ma rnams snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bsod snyoms la dong ba na sbed ma gtsug lag khang na phyag dar byed cing 'dug go/_/tshe 
[\[103b.3\]]dang ldan pa 'char ka yang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ga la ba der song ngo /_/sbed ma dge slong ma'i dbyar khang na phyag dar byed cing
