[\[145b.6\]]bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/zas zos zin cing spangs pa las zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byas pa las so/_/lhag por ma byas par zhes bya ba ni lhag mar ma byas 
[\[145b.7\]]shing ma bor yongs su ma btang bar ro/_/bca' ba'am bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga po dag go/_/'cha' ba'am za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar 
[\[146a.2\]]ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis spangs pa la spangs par 'du shes pas lhag por ma byas par bca' ba'am/_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis spangs pa la yid gnyis za bas lhag por ma byas par bca' ba'am/_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na 
[\[146a.3\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis ma spangs pa la spangs par 'du shes pas lhag por ma byas par bca' ba'am/_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis ma spangs pa la yid gnyis za bas lhag por ma byas par bca' ba'am/_bza' ba 'cha' 
[\[146a.4\]]'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa thug pa ji lta bu spangs par bgyi 'tshal/_nye ba 'khor gang la kha gzar gyen du 'greng ba'o/_/btsun pa skyo ma ji lta bu spangs par bgyi 'tshal/_nye ba 'khor 
[\[146a.5\]]gang la sor mo lnga mngon pa'o/_/nye ba 'khor mgul du btung ba la ni spangs pa med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed de sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[146a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod 
[\[146a.7\]]par byed do/_/de rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nye du zad pa dang /_nor zad pa dang /_longs spyod zad par gyur nas des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo kho bos rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nor bsgrub par mi nus kyis rab tu 'byung du 'gro'o/_/rje'i sras de bzhin mdzod cig_/de rgyal byed kyi 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]tshal du song ste/_dge slong gi gan du song ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung gis rab tu dbyung du gsol/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo rab tu byung nas gsar bu yin pas kho bos rab tu 'byin du mi rung ngo /_/des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[146b.2\]]pa bdag dang po kho nar khyod kyi gan du mchis pas/_khyod kyis bdag dge slong 'ga' zhig la gtad du gsol/_dge slong de'i mkhan po spong ba pa dgon pa na bsam gtan byed pa zhig yod nas des de khrid de mkhan po'i gan du song nas smras pa/_mkhan po rigs kyi bu 'di legs par 
[\[146b.3\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal na/_mkhan po thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di rab tu dbyung du gsol/_rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad du gsol/_mkhan pos smras pa/_bu bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag shan pa'i gnas su gtang ba ni bla'i rab tu phyung 
[\[146b.4\]]zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par byas nas 'doms par mi byed/_rjes su ston par mi byed pa ni mi rung ngo zhes bka' stsal to/_/des smras pa/_mkhan po rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa 'ba' zhig mdzod cig dang /_bdag gis 'di klog pa dang /_slob tu stsal to/_/dge 
[\[146b.5\]]slong des de rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par byas nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di khyod kyi slob dpon yin pas klog pa dang /_slob tu 'jud par 'gyur gyis kun du spyad pa gang yin pa de 'di la dris te gyis shig_/des de klog pa dang /_slob tu 'jud pa na rgan zhugs de brjed ngas 
[\[146b.6\]]pas yang dang yang du ltung ba 'byin nas/_des de mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste ltung ba 'chags su 'jud par byed do/_/rgan zhugs des bsams pa/_bdag gi slob dpon 'dis bdag rtag tu mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste ltung ba 'chags su 'jud pas/_bdag gis 
[\[146b.7\]]kyang 'di mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste ltung ba 'chags su gzhug pa'i thabs ci yod snyam mo/_/khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gshegs te/_bcom 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis gdugs tshod gsol nas khyim bdag de la chos bstan par brtsams so/_/dge slong des rgan zhugs de la smras pa/_rgan zhugs tshur shog_/khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag ltar 'dong ngo /_/de gnyis khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag tu dong ba dang /_de dag 
[\[147a.2\]]gis smras pa/_'phags pa gnyis gdugs tshod gsol cig_/khyim bdag kho bo cag gnyis zan zos zin to/_/des smras pa/_snoms te bzhud la lhag por mdzod de gsol cig_/des rgan zhugs kyi gdong du bltas te smras pa/_rgan zhugs 'dod dam/_'tshal lo/_/
[\[147a.3\]]de gnyis kyis byin len byas te dong nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang /_dge slong des smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod chu 'tshag gam/_'on te gtsug lag khang du song ste lhag por byed du 'jud/_rgan zhugs kyis smras pa/_lhag por bgyid du stsal to/_/dge slong des chu btsag par 
[\[147a.4\]]brtsams pa dang /_rgan zhugs kyis bsod snyoms khyer te gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas/_des bdag nyid kyis bsod snyoms la lhag por byed du bcug cing de'i bsod snyoms la lhag por byed du ma bcug go/_/dge slong des chu btsags te/_gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas smras pa/_rgan 
[\[147a.5\]]zhugs lhag por byed du bcug gam/_des smras pa/_bgyid du stsal to/_/dge slong des 'dug ste zos pa dang /_rgan zhugs kyis smras pa/_slob dpon je skabs phye shig_/phye'o/_/rgan zhugs kyis smras pa/_khyod la ltung ba byung gis/_chos bzhin du slar mdzod cig_/des 
[\[147a.6\]]smras pa/_ltung ba ma mthong ngo /_/rgan zhugs kyis smras pa/_khyod kyis lhag por ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba zos so/_/des smras pa/_kho bos khyod la lhag por byed du bcug gam zhes ma dris sam/_rgan zhugs kyis smras pa/_bdag gis bdag nyid kyi bgyid du 
[\[147a.7\]]stsal to/_/des smras pa/_rgan zhugs kho bo ltung ba mi 'chags kyi 'di ltar khyod nyid ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro zhes des dge slong rnams la brjod pa dang /_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du dge slong zas 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]zos zin cing spangs pa la skabs tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'cho shig_/'di zo shig ces lhag por ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba dus kyis stobs par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha 
[\[147b.2\]]zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[147b.3\]]rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la rmas pa/_dge slong khyod shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa la skabs tshol zhing /_ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar 
[\[147b.4\]]bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'cho shig_/'di zo shig ces lhag por ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba dus kyis stobs pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung 
[\[147b.5\]]ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs 
[\[147b.6\]]pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa la skabs tshol zhing ci 
[\[147b.7\]]nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'cho shig_/'di zo shig ces lhag por ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba dus kyis stobs na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/shes bzhin du 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis reg pa'am/_gzhan dag gis brjod pas so/_/dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/zas zos zin cing spangs pa la zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byed pa la'o/_/skabs tshol zhing zhes bya ba ni klan ka tshol 
[\[148a.2\]]zhing ngo /_/ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa zhes bya ba ni ci nas kyang dge slong 'di ltung ba dang bcas par byas par 'gyur ro snyam pa'o/_/de nyid rkyen du byas nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'cho shig_/'di zo shig ces bya ba ni bca' 
[\[148a.3\]]ba dang bza' ba'o/_/lhag por ma byas pa'i zhes bya ba ni lhag mar ma byas shing ma bor yongs su ma btang ba'o/_/bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga po dag go/_/dus kyis stobs na zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du stobs na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni 
[\[148a.4\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par 
[\[148a.5\]]byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam na cung zad shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa la skabs tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[148a.6\]]'di 'cho shig_/'di zo shig ces lhag por ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba dus kyis stobs na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/spangs pa la stobs pa'i ltung 
[\[148a.7\]]byed de sum bcu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na lhas byin dge slong rab tu mang po dag dang lhan cig 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]kun dga' ra ba'i nang na 'dus shing za ba za nas dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag kun dga' ra ba'i nang na 'dus shing za ba za bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[148b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs 
[\[148b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas byin la rmas pa/_lhas byin khyod dge slong rab tu mang po dag dang lhan cig kun dga' ra ba'i nang na 'dus shing za ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_
[\[148b.4\]]rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa/_de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag 
[\[148b.5\]]par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_'dus shing za na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan 
[\[148b.6\]]thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/_/dge slong rab tu mang po na ba dag sman pa'i gnas su dong ste/_de dag gis de mthong nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo cag la je sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa dag zhal tshus gsol cig_/sus sbyin 
[\[148b.7\]]par 'gyur/_bdag gis gsol lo/_/ci dge 'dun thams cad dam/_ma lags te dge slong bsnyung ba ji snyed pa dag go/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus shing za ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/_/'phags pa dag khyed kyi ston pa thugs rje can 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]lags pas de nyid rkyen du mdzad nas gnang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas mchis so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na na ba'i dus ma gtogs so/_/dge slong dag 
[\[149a.2\]]gis dge 'dun gyi dang /_mchod rten gyi las dag byas nas/_de dag bkres pas glos phab ste nyal zhing dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed par mi nus pa na/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gtsug lag khang du lhags nas/_de dag gis dris pa/_'phags pa dag bstan 
[\[149a.3\]]pa la gcig tu brtson par bgyi ba lags na/_ci'i slad du glos phab ste gzims shing dge ba'i phyogs la tron mi mdzad/_de dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag bkres so/_/ci'i slad du zhal tshus mi gsol/_sus sbyin par 'gyur/_bdag cag gis gsol lo/_/ci 
[\[149a.4\]]dge 'dun thams cad gsol lam/_ma lags te khyed cag kho na gsol lo/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus shing za ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[149a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na las kyi dus ma gtogs so/_/dge slong dag don mthun dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'dong ba na/_ji tsam na ri brags shig tu phyin nas de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag kho bo cag ri brags su bsod snyoms la rgyu'i bar du 
[\[149a.6\]]re zhig yud tsam zhig sdod cig_/don mthun dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag shul 'di na chom rkun pa'i 'jigs pa mchis kyis/_tshur gshegs dang bdag cag nyid kyis bsod snyoms gsol lo/_/ci gcig gis thams cad sbyin nam/_ma lags te la las bzhi 
[\[149a.7\]]la'o/_/la las lnga la'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus shing za ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do zhes dge slong de dag gis shas cher zan bcad par byas pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na lam gyi dus ma gtogs so/_/dge slong rab tu mang po dag don mthun dang lhan cig grur zhugs te ljongs rgyur 'dong ba na ri brags shig tu phyin nas de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag kho bo cag ri brags su bsod snyoms la rgyu'i bar du re zhig 
[\[149b.2\]]yud tsam zhig sdod cig_/don mthun dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gru'i shul 'di na chom rkun pa'i 'jigs pa mchis kyis tshur gshegs dang bdag cag nyid kyis bsod snyoms gsol lo/_/ci gcig gis thams cad sbyin nam/_ma lags te la las bzhi la'o/_/
[\[149b.3\]]la las lnga la'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus shing za ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do zhes dge slong de dag gis shas cher zan bcad par byas pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[149b.4\]]stsal pa/_de lta bas na grur zhugs pa'i dus ma gtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug phud kyi dus ston dang /_dus ston chen po dang /_lo lnga'i dus ston bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de na dge slong rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po byung bar gyur nas bram ze dang /_khyim 
[\[149b.5\]]bdag dad pa can dag gis dge slong rnams la smras pa/_'phags pa dag tshur gshegs gdugs tshod gsol cig_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_ci dge 'dun thams cad gsol lam/_'phags pa dag bdag cag la dge 'dun thams cad gsol ba'i 'byor pa 
[\[149b.6\]]gang lags pa de lta bu ga la mchis te/_'di ltar la las nyi shu gsol lo/_/la las sum bcu gsol lo/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus shing za ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[149b.7\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na 'dus pa chen po'i dus ma gtogs so/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bden pa dag ma mthong ba de'i tshe na 'od ma'i tshal kun du 'tsho dag la phul bar gyur to/_/gang gi tshe bden pa 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]dag mthong ba de'i tshe 'od ma'i tshal kun du 'tsho dag las phrogs te bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la phul lo/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zhang po kun du 'tsho dag gi nang du rab tu byung nas/_rgyal pos smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'di bdag gi 
[\[150a.2\]]zhang po lags kyis ji srid du 'gyur ba sten par mi bgyid kyi bar du 'di gcig pu gzhag tu gsol/_gang gi tshe 'gyur ba sten par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na bdag gis 'di yang bskrad par bgyi'o zhes rgyal po gzugs can snying pos kun du 'tsho de la kha zas kyi mkho ba stobs par byed do/_/dge 
[\[150a.3\]]slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa de dag kun du 'tsho des mthong nas de shin tu dang ba skyes te/_des dge slong rnams la smras pa/_bdag gis kyang dge slong rnams kyi gdugs tshod bgyi'o/_/de ltar gyis shig_/ci dge 
[\[150a.4\]]'dun thams cad kyi byed dam/_ma lags te bdag gis rgyal pos zhal zas kyi mkho ba stobs par bgyid pa ltar bdag la dge 'dun thams cad kyi gdugs tshod bgyi ba'i 'byor pa gang lags pa de lta bu ma mchis te/_'di ltar dge slong nyi shu'am/_nyi shu rtsa lnga'i gdugs tshod 
[\[150a.5\]]bgyi'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus shing za ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge sbyong gi zas 
[\[150a.6\]]kyi dus ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[150a.7\]]bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_'dus shing za na dus ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]de la dus ni 'di yin te/_na ba dus so/_/las dus so/_/lam dus so/_/grur zhugs pa dang /_'dus pa chen po dang /_dge sbyong gi zas dus te/_de la de ni dus yin no/_/'dus shing za na zhes bya ba ni mi mthun par za na'o/_/dus ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dus bzhag ste'o/_/
[\[150b.2\]]ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams 
[\[150b.3\]]la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la dus ni 'di yin te/_na ba dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong na ba zas gcig gis 'tsho bar mi nus pa'o/_/las dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi'am/_mchod rten gyi las 
[\[150b.4\]]tha na phyag dar re lde tsam mam/_dkyil 'khor ba mal tsam byas pa'o/_/lam dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong dpag tshad phyed du song ba'am/_de'i phyed du song ste phyir 'ongs pa'o/_/grur zhugs pa dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong grur zhugs te dpag tshad phyed du 
[\[150b.5\]]song ba'am/_de'i phyed du song ste phyir 'ongs pa'o/_/'dus pa chen po dus so zhes bya ba ni spags pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi zas dus te zhes bya ba ni 'di las phyi rol pa'i rab tu byung ba dag 'khod na de yang dge sbyong zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/de la de ni dus yin no zhes bya ba ni de la de ni mthun pa'i chos 
[\[150b.6\]]yin pa'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes pas 'dus shing za ba za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mtshams kyi nang du yid gnyis za bas 'dus shing za ba za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mtshams kyi 
[\[150b.7\]]phyi rol du mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes pas 'dus shing za ba za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mtshams kyi phyi rol du yid gnyis za bas 'dus shing za ba za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gnas gnyis po gzhi'i gnas dang /_khang khyim gyi gnas de gnyis yod na de na gang dag 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]gzhi'i gnas su za ba de dag gis khang khyim nas dge slong dag 'ongs sam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gang dag khang khyim du za ba de dag gis kyang gzhi'i gnas nas dge slong dag 'ongs sam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par za na ltung byed du 'gyur 
[\[151a.2\]]ro/_/gsum za zhing gcig la byed pa dang /_gsum rdzogs par bsnyen cing gcig rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang /_zas brim pa tha na lan tshwa pho tshums gang ngam/_ldam ldum srang gcig tsam 'ongs pa dang /_gnas so sor nges pa dang /_sbyin bdag na re gang dag 'di na 'khod pa de dag 
[\[151a.3\]]la sbyin no zhes zer na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/'dus shing za ba'i ltung byed de sum bcu rtsa drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal 
[\[151a.4\]]byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po nye ba 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par byas pa de'i tshe na/_de dag snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung 
[\[151a.5\]]bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/bud med kyi yul ni sred pa spyad pa yin pas/_bud med kyis de dag mthong nas brang brdungs te smras pa/_'di dag skyed pa gang dag gis 'di dag skyes ma thag gi kha lan tshwas 'gengs par ma nus pa dang /_brla 
[\[151a.6\]]phrag tu khron pa bcug ste 'brangs par mi nus pa de dag gis ci thob/_bcu bdun sde dag nyam nga bar gyur nas smras pa/_bdag cag gis zan bcad par gyur pa ni bla'i tshig ngan pa rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thos par gyur pa ni mi rung ngo zhes de dag de nyid nas phyir log ste de dag gis zan bcad pa byas nas/_de 
[\[151a.7\]]dag gis ji srid du lus la mdangs yod pa de srid du dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas nas/_gang gi tshe lus la mdangs yal bar gyur pa de'i tshe na glos phab ste nyal ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de dag mthong nas smras pa/_e ma'o bcu bdun sde dag ci gal te zas gzhan gyi yin zhes te lto yang gzhan 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]gyi yin snyam mam/_ci byas ji tsam gyi dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed kyang mi nus pa de tsam gyi zas zos so/_/sus zos/_khyod kyis so/_/kho bo cag gis ma zos so/_/'o na ci'i phyir glos phab ste nyal/_de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod do/_/grong khyer gyi sgabs mo can 
[\[151b.2\]]dag ni skyed mos tshal la dga' bas de dag bza' ba dang /_btung ba khyer te mnyan yod kyi phyi rol rgyal byed kyi tshal du dong nas 'cha' bar byed/_za bar byed/_'thung bar byed pa na bcu bdun sde dag gis de dag mthong nas lto ba nyug par byed cing /_tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/_mgon 
[\[151b.3\]]po khyod kyi legs gsungs mang po dag_/rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten 'di na spyod/_/bkres mnyam lus kyi tshor ba ma mchis pa/_/thub pa de ni khyod kyi legs gsungs mchog_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gsol na bzhed dam/_'dod do/_/de dag gis bcu bdun sde 
[\[151b.4\]]dag la bza' ba dang /_btung ba byin pa dang /_de dag gis longs spyad nas de dag gis zung du bsdebs te 'chag cing kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de dag kha ton byed pa mthong nas smras pa/_kye ma'o bcu bdun sde dag gis shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams so/_/btsun pa nye 
[\[151b.5\]]dga' bcom ldan 'das kyis bden chos mngon par rjod par byed do/_/sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gis len pa po la zas sbyin pa na gnas lnga sbyin par byed de/_tshe sbyin pa dang /_kha dog sbyin pa dang /_stobs sbyin pa dang /_bde ba sbyin pa dang /_spobs pa sbyin pa ni bde bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[151b.6\]]zhes bka' stsal pa ni legs par gsungs pa yin te/_zos na spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur gyi ma zos na mi 'gyur ro/_/khyed kyis zos sam/_zos so/_/khyed dus ma yin par zar rung ngam/_gal te dus su ma rnyed na kho bo cag gis ltogs te 'chi bar bya'am ci/_dge 
[\[151b.7\]]slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dus ma yin par bca' ba dang /_bza' ba za bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[152a.2\]]kyis dge slong bcu bdun sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed dus ma yin par bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha' zhing za ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang 
[\[152a.3\]]mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos 
[\[152a.4\]]rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dus ma yin par bca' ba'am/_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong 
[\[152a.5\]]gang zhes bya ba ni bcu bdun sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dus ma yin par zhes bya ba ni dus ma yin pa gnyis te/_skya rengs ma shar ba dang /_phyed yol bar ro/_/bca' ba'am bza' ba zhes bya ba ni/_bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga po dag go/_/'cha' 'am 
[\[152a.6\]]za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags 
[\[152a.7\]]shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis dus ma yin pa la dus ma yin par 'du shes pas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]slong gis dus ma yin par yid gnyis za bas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dus su dus ma yin par 'du shes pas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dus su yid gnyis za bas bca' 
[\[152b.2\]]ba dang /_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dus ma yin par za ba'i ltung byed de sum bcu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[152b.3\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i kun du spyod pa ni grong ngam/_grong rdal gang na nye bar rten cing gnas pa na/_de snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te grong ngam/_grong rdal de 
[\[152b.4\]]nyid du lus shin tu bsrungs pa dang /_dbang po rnams kyi shin tu bsdams pa dang /_dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag pas bsod snyoms la 'jug cing /_gal te 'bras chan gsher ba rnyed na ni lhung bzed kyis len par byed/_gal te 'bras chan skam po rnyed na ni lhung bzed kyi snod kyis len 
[\[152b.5\]]par byed de/_de grong ngam/_grong rdal der bsod snyoms la brgyus nas gtsug lag khang du song ste/_'bras chan gsher ba ni za bar byed/_'bras chan skam po ni bskams nas rdza ma so btang ba bkang ste 'jog par byed cing /_de rlung ldang ba'am/_yul ngan 'byung ba'am/_char 
[\[152b.6\]]pa 'bab pa'am/_lhags pa 'byung ba gang dag byung bar gyur pa na/_rlung langs pa'am/_yul ngan byung ba'am/_char pa 'bab pa'am/_lhags pa byung ba de lta bu'i tshe 'bras chan skam po chu dron mos sbangs te zos nas bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[152b.7\]]'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing bzhugs la gson zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'dul bar gyur pa'i skye bo la rjes su thugs brtse bas/_dus dang dus su sems can dmyal ba rgyur gshegs pa 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]dang /_dud 'gro rgyu ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgyu ba dang /_lha rgyu ba dang /_ljongs rgyu ba dang /_chu klung rgyu ba dang /_ri rgyu ba dang /_dur khrod rgyu ba dang /_gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs pas don 'dir ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs par bzhed nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[153a.2\]]bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu gtsug lag khang rgyur 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces gyis shig_/tshe 
[\[153a.3\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs kyis/_khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig gtsug lag khang rgyur 'gro bar 
[\[153a.4\]]spro ba des chos gos dag long shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te gtsug lag khang rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/_tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i gtsug lag khang ga la ba der gshegs so/_/de'i tshe na 
[\[153a.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i gtsug lag khang na 'bras chan skam po rab tu mang po dag bting zhing 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i gtsug lag khang na 'bras chan skam po rab tu mang po dag bting zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[153a.6\]]dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'bras chan skam po rab tu mang po bting ba 'di dag su'i/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i kun du spyod pa ni grong ngam/_grong rdal gang na nye bar rten cing gnas pa na/_de snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te 
[\[153a.7\]]grong ngam/_grong rdal de nyid du lus shin tu bsrungs pa dang /_dbang po rnams kyang shin tu bsdams pa dang /_dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag pas bsod snyoms la 'jug cing /_gal te 'bras chan gsher ba rnyed na ni lhung bzed kyis len par bgyid/_gal te 'bras chan skam po 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]rnyed na ni lhung bzed kyi snod kyis len par bgyid de/_de grong ngam/_grong rdal der bsod snyoms la brgyus nas/_gtsug lag khang du mchis te 'bras chan gsher ba ni 'tshal bar bgyid/_'bras chan skam po ni rdza ma so btang ba bkang ste 'jog par bgyid cing /_de bser ma ldang 
[\[153b.2\]]ba'am/_yul ngan 'byung ba'am/_dgung char 'bab pa'am/_dgung lhags 'byung ba gang dag byung bar 'gyur ba na/_bser ma langs pa'am/_yul ngan byung ba'am/_dgung char bab pa'am/_dgung lhags byung ba de lta bu'i tshe 'bras chan skam po chab dron mos sbangs te 
[\[153b.3\]]'tshal nas bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar bgyid do/_/kun dga' bo dge slong dag gsog 'jog byas pa za'am/_btsun pa 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng 
[\[153b.4\]]gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan 
[\[153b.5\]]pa nag po la rmas pa/_nag po khyod bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gsog 'jog byas pa za ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi brtson pa dang /_mi sbyor ba dang /_ma brtags par spyod pa rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[153b.6\]]kyis brtson pa dang /_sbyor ba dang /_brtags te spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma 
[\[153b.7\]]bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gsog 'jog byas pa 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni tshe dang ldan pa nag po'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]pa'o/_/bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang /_bza' ba lnga po dag go/_/gsog 'jog byas pa zhes bya ba ni gsog 'jog byas pa rnam pa gnyis te/_snga dro byin len byas pa phyi dro'i bar du gsog 'jog byas pa dang /_phyi dro byin len byas pa thun tshod 
[\[154a.2\]]las yol bar gsog 'jog byas pa'o/_/'cha' 'am za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_
[\[154a.3\]]ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis gsog 'jog byas pa la gsog 'jog byas par 'du shes pas bca' ba 
[\[154a.4\]]dang /_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gsog 'jog byas pa la yid gnyis za bas bca' ba'am/_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gsog 'jog ma byas pa la gsog 'jog byas par 'du shes pas bca' ba 
[\[154a.5\]]dang /_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gsog 'jog ma byas pa la yid gnyis za bas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lhung bzed dang /_lhung bzed chung ngu dang /_kha gzar dang /_khar phor 
[\[154a.6\]]dang /_tshwa khug dang /_lhung bzed kyi snod dang /_gos dang /_man shel dang /_khri dang /_khri'u dang /_khar ba dang /_bum pa dang /_ril ba dang /_lde mig dang /_lde mig kyog po gsog 'jog byas pas 'bags pa za na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[154a.7\]]dge slong gis gsog 'jog byas pa'i kha dang /_gsog 'jog byas pa'i lag pa dag gis bca' ba dang /_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis me tog dang 'bras bu gsog 'jog byas pa dang /_dge slong gis ji tsam du gsog 'jog byas pa za 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis kha ma bkrus par skom 'thung na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/gsog 'jog gi ltung byed de sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa 
[\[154b.2\]]rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po ni thams cad dur khrod pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de'i lhung bzed kyang dur khrod pa yin/_chos gos 
[\[154b.3\]]kyang dur khrod pa yin/_bsod snyoms kyang dur khrod pa yin/_gnas mal yang dur khrod pa yin no/_/ji ltar lhung bzed dur khrod pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nye du dag gis shi zhing dus la bab pa'i rdze'u dur khrod du 'dor bar byed pa de tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen pos gyo mo kha 
[\[154b.4\]]bzhogs te bsregs nas lhung bzed du byin gyis brlabs shing 'chang bar byed de/_de ltar lhung bzed dur khrod pa yin no/_/ji ltar chos gos dur khrod pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nye du dag gis shi zhing dus la bab pa'i gos dag dur khrod du 'dor bar byed pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[154b.5\]]nag po chen pos bkrus te drubs shing kha bsgyur nas chos gos su byin gyis brlabs shing 'chang bar byed de/_de ltar chos gos dur khrod pa yin no/_/ji ltar bsod snyoms dur khrod pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nye du dag gis shi zhing dus la bab pa'i zas lnga dur khrod du 'dor bar byed pa 
[\[154b.6\]]de dag tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen pos blangs shing za bar byed de/_de ltar bsod snyoms dur khrod pa yin no/_/ji ltar gnas mal dur khrod pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po dur khrod na gnas par byed de/_de ltar gnas mal dur khrod pa yin no/_/gang 
[\[154b.7\]]gi tshe skye bo phal po che la mi ngas byung ba de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po tsho ba dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag rgyas par gyur cing de yang dang yang du grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par mi byed la/_gang gi tshe skye bo phal po che la mi ngas ma byung ba de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nag po 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]chen po rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_skam pa dang /_lus ma thob par gyur cing /_de yang dang yang du grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed do/_/sgo ba de mtshan mar bzung nas/_'phags pa nag po chen po 'di gang gi tshe skye bo phal po che la mi 
[\[155a.2\]]ngas byung ba de'i tshe na tsho ba dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag rgyas par gyur cing 'di yang dang yang du grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par mi byed la/_gang gi tshe skye bo phal po che la mi ngas ma byung ba de'i tshe na 'phags pa nag po chen po 'di rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_
[\[155a.3\]]skam pa dang /_lus ma thob par gyur cing 'di yang dang yang du grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed pa las na 'phags pa nag po chen po 'di mi sha mi za 'am snyam mo/_/thams cad du yang 'phags pa nag po chen po mi sha za'o zhes sgra grags so/_/mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug 
[\[155a.4\]]pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i bu mo zhig byung nas bsrings shing bskyed de chen mor gyur to/_/dus gzhan 
[\[155a.5\]]zhig na bram ze de dus la bab nas nye du rnams kyis gos sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dag gis khyogs spyil brgyan nas dur khrod du khyer te/_bsregs shing dong nas de'i chung ma dang /_bu mo gnyis mtha' gcig tu dong ste bsdad pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nag 
[\[155a.6\]]po chen po de'i gdong du lta zhing sdod do/_/bu mo des 'phags pa nag po chen po de'i gdong du lta zhing sdod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ma la smras pa/_yum 'phags pa nag po chen po 'di bya rog mo zhar ma bzhin du nges par rtog cing sdod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[155a.7\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze'i bu mo zhig smras pa dang /_nye bar smras par gyur te/_des nyan thos chen po ri rab dang 'dra ba la ngag gi las rtsub po smras pas bram ze'i bu mo de tshe rabs lnga brgyar bya rog mo zhar mar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]bram ze'i bu mo de tshe rabs lnga brgyar bya rog mo zhar mar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to zhes sgra grags so/_/bram ze mo des bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi bu mo tshe rabs lnga brgyar bya rog mo zhar mar 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes thos so/_/de nas bram ze mo des bu mo de khrid nas bcom ldan 
[\[155b.2\]]'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bu mo 'di la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_'dis rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis ngag gi las rtsub po ma smras 
[\[155b.3\]]so/_/bram ze mo ci ngas 'ga' zhig la mna' 'dor bar bya'am/_gal te bu mo 'dis rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis ngag gi las rtsub po smras par gyur na sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/mnyan yod na bram ze'i khye'u dag gis 
[\[155b.4\]]'phags pa nag po chen po mi sha za'o zhes thos nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci yang dag pa yin nam/_'on te de yang dag pa ma yin pa bdag cag gis 'phags pa nag po chen po bgam par byas/_bdag cag las gcig shi ba'i cha lugs su byas pa de bdag 
[\[155b.5\]]cag gis dur khrod du bkur bar bya'o/_/bdag cag las gang zhig shi ba'i cha lugs su bya/_khyod shi ba'i cha lugs su gyis shig_/des smras pa/_kho bo mi zos sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag gis khyod bsrung bar bya'o/_/des shi ba'i cha lugs su byas pa 
[\[155b.6\]]dang /_de dag gis de yang ba dang /_'bru mar gyis bskus te khyogs spyil du bzhag nas mnyan yod nas phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po yang mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/_des de mthong nas bsams pa/_bdag dgang dka' ba 
[\[155b.7\]]'di'i don du grong du bsod snyoms la zhugs te ci rung /_phyir log la zas lnga po 'di dag nyid bza' bar bya'o snyam nas de phyir log go/_/bram ze'i khye'u des de dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'phags pa nag po chen po 'di phyir log pas kho bo zos par mi 'gyur ram/_de 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag 'khod bzhin du ji ltar za bar 'gyur/_de dag gis de dur khrod du bor te mtha' gcig tu dong nas tshang tshing dang lhab lhub dag gi nang du mgo bsrings te bsdad do/_/der wa zhig gis bgrod par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nag 
[\[156a.2\]]po chen pos bsams pa/_was zas lnga po dag zos shing bdag gi zan chad par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du rig nas des myur ba myur bar 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /_bram ze'i khye'u de skrag ste kho bo zos kho bo zos zhes ngu bar brtsams so/_/bram ze'i khye'u de dag dbyug pa thogs te 
[\[156a.3\]]myur ba myur bar dong nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa drang srong gi rgyal mtshan thogs shing sdig pa'i las rtsub po 'di dang 'di lta bu lhag par spyod dam/_des smras pa/_ci byas mi sha za'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag ci khyed kyis kho bo mtshon thogs te sha gcod cing za ba 
[\[156a.4\]]mthong ngam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'o na ci'i slad du myur ba myur bar byon/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag kho bo la blo skyes pa/_wa 'dis zas lnga po dag zos shing bdag gi zan chad par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du rig nas myur ba myur bar 'ongs so/_/'phags pa zas lnga po dag gsol 
[\[156a.5\]]lam/_mi sha gsol ni ma 'tshal gyi/_'di ltar thams cad du 'phags pa nag po chen po mi sha gsol zhes sgra grags par gyur to zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nyes dmigs 
[\[156a.6\]]gang cung zad byung ba de ni dge slong dag byin len byed du ma bcug par za ba las gyur pa yin pas de lta bas na/_dge slong rnams kyis byin len byed du bcug ste za na de nyid dpang por 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis byin len byed du bcug ste 
[\[156a.7\]]bza' bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis byin len byed du bcug ste/_bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag gis byin len du yod mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byin len ni rnam pa lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_lus kyis 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]lus su dang /_lus dang 'brel bas lus su dang /_lus kyis lus dang 'brel bar dang /_lus dang 'brel bas lus dang 'brel bar dang /_gzhag pa'i cho ga nyid ni lnga pa'o/_/ji ltar lus kyis lus su zhe na/_lus kyis sbyin par byed cing lus su len par byed pa ste/_de 
[\[156b.2\]]ltar lus kyis lus su'o/_/ji ltar lus dang 'brel bas lus su zhe na/_lhung bzed kyis sbyin par byed cing lus su len par byed pa ste/_de ltar lus dang 'brel bas lus su'o/_/ji ltar lus kyis lus dang 'brel bar zhe na/_lus kyis sbyin par byed cing lhung bzed du len par 
[\[156b.3\]]byed pa ste/_de ltar lus kyis lus dang 'brel bar ro/_/ji ltar lus dang 'brel bas lus dang 'brel par zhe na/_lhung bzed kyis sbyin par byed cing lhung bzed du len par byed pa ste/_de ltar lus dang 'brel bas lus dang 'brel bar ro/_/ji ltar gzhag pa'i cho ga nyid ni lnga pa yin 
[\[156b.4\]]zhe na/_dge slong dag smad pa zhes bya ba'i yul gyi mi dag yod de/_de dag ma yang smod par byed/_pha yang smod par byed/_phu nu dang bu sring yang smod par byed de/_dge slong gang der 'gro ba des dkyil 'khor byas te 'dir zhog shig ces brjod par bya zhing /_de dag gis der gang 
[\[156b.5\]]bzhag pa de byin len byed par brjod par bya zhing /_byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi dus byin gyis brlabs te bza' bar bya zhing 'di la 'gyod par mi bya ste/_de ltar gzhag pa'i cho ga nyid ni lnga pa yin no/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis dge slong rnams la shing tog dag 'bul bar 
[\[156b.6\]]byed pa na dge slong rnams de dag mi len nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma gshegs pa de'i tshe na ni gzhan mu stegs can dag sbyin gnas lags mod/_da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du gshegs pas khyed cag sbyin gnas 
[\[156b.7\]]lags na/_gal te khyed cag mi bzhes na ci bdag cag dge ba'i shul rgyags dang bral ba dag gis 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi bar bgyi'am/_bzhes shig ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang rung bar byas te bza' bar bya'o/_/de dag gis rung ba du yod mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rung ba ni rnam pa lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_mes rung ba dang /_mtshon gyis rung ba dang /_sen 
[\[157a.2\]]mos rung ba dang /_rnyings pas rung ba dang /_ne tsos rma phyung bas rung ba nyid ni lnga pa'o/_/gzhan yang rung ba lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_phyung ba dang /_gshegs pa dang /_bcad pa dang /_phug pa dang /_sa bon gyi chos med pa nyid ni lnga pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shing 
[\[157a.3\]]tog dag byin len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas de dag gis byin len du yod mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag pa bkan par byin len lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_man shel dang /_khri dang /_khri'u dang /_thu ba dang /_lhung 
[\[157a.4\]]bzed kyi gzhi nyid ni lnga pa'o/_/dge slong rnams shing tog dag re re nas rung bar byed du 'jug pas yun ring du thogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phung po byas te mes gnas gnyis sam/_gsum du reg par byas na thams cad du rung bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshon dang /_
[\[157a.5\]]sen mos ni re re nas so/_/khyim pa rnams shing tog dag mi snyoms par 'brim par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge tshul dag 'brim du gzhug par bya'o/_/dge tshul dag kyang mi snyoms par 'brim par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[157a.6\]]slong dag gis lag pa dag bsnyal te byin len byas nas brim par bya'o/_/'on kyang ma snyoms par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_brim par bya ba gces pa dang /_bar ma dang /_tha ma dag so sor bya'o/_/gang dag 'brim par byed pa de dag gis phyis 
[\[157a.7\]]thams cad kyis tha chad dag thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'brim par byed pa'i skal ba ni mkhan po dang slob dpon dag gis mnod par bya'o/_/de dag gis bzang po dag thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gi drung na 'dug pa dag gis 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]mnod par bya'o/_/de dag langs shing langs shing rab tu mang po dag gi skal ba dag byin len byed du 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stan las ma 'phags pas ji tsam nus pa de tsam dag byin len byed du gzhug go/_/'brim pa na de dag yang byin len 
[\[157b.2\]]byed du 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stan las ma 'phags pas gang dag len nus pa de dag ni byin len byed du bcug zin par brjod par bya'o/_/stan las ma 'phags pas gang dag len mi nus pa de dag ni yang byin len byed du gzhug par bya'o/_/khyim 
[\[157b.3\]]bdag na re 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis kyang brim par bgyi'o zhes zer ba na dge slong dag mi btub nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'brim du gzhug par bya'o/_/de dag dang por 'dzin cing dge slong dag phyis 'dzin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[157b.4\]]slong dag gis dang por gzung bar bya zhing /_phyis khyim bdag gis gzung bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams dge slong dag las blangs pa gang dag yin pa de dag yang byin len byed du 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag las blangs pa gang dag yin pa de 
[\[157b.5\]]dag gi byin len ni de nyid yin no/_/khyim pa dag las blangs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni byin len byed du gzhug go/_/gtong ba na dang por khyim pa dag gis gtong zhing phyis dge slong dag gis gtong bar byed nas/_dge slong rnams de dag gsog 'jog byas pa yin no zhes 
[\[157b.6\]]'dor bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dang por dge slong dag gis gtang bar bya zhing phyis khyim pa dag gis gtang bar bya ste/_phyi de nyin par dge 'dun la brim par bya'o/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis dge 'dun la zhun mar gyi bum pa dang /_
[\[157b.7\]]'bru mar gyi bum pa dang /_sbrang rtsi'i bum pa dang /_bu ram gyi dbu ba'i bum pa dag 'bul ba na dge slong dag mi len nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blang bar bya zhing blangs nas dge 'dun la brim par bya'o/_/de dag gis chos gos dag snums par gyur nas bcom 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bar du rtswa'am lo ma dag bcug ste brim par bya'o/_/de dag bzung ste 'greng ba na ngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhag par bya'o/_/de dag gis gzhag pa dang 'dril nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[158a.2\]]stsal pa/_'og gzhi la gzhag par bya'o/_/de dag gis de dag zos nas de dag nyid la phyir sbyin nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag zhun mar dang /_'bru mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_bu ram gyi dbu ba dag phul na bum pa dag ma phul lam ci/_bum pa dag kyang khyed 
[\[158a.3\]]nyid snoms shig_/de dag gis mnos te 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag chu'i rdzing bu zab mo'i nang du zhag bdun nam/_brgyad gzhug par bya zhing /_gang gi tshe nya'am/_rus sbal lam/_sbal pa'am/_chu srin byis pa gsod dam/_nya 
[\[158a.4\]]khyi bdag gis ma lus par ldags par gyur pa de'i tshe na rung ba'i khang par bcug ste spyad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byin len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag gis ji ltar byin len byed du bcug pa dang /_ji ltar byin len byed du ma bcug pa mi 
[\[158a.5\]]shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam pa lngas ni byin len byed du ma bcug par brjod par bya la/_rnam pa lngas ni byin len byed du bcug par brjod par bya'o/_/rnam pa lnga po gang dag gis byin len byed du ma bcug par brjod par bya zhe na/_mtshams kyi phyi rol 
[\[158a.6\]]na 'dug pas dang /_mi 'thob pa'i phyogs nas dang /_glo nas dang /_rgyab nas dang /_lag pa khas phub pas byin len byed du 'jug pa ste/_rnam pa lnga po de dag gis ni byin len byed du ma bcug par brjod par bya'o/_/rnam pa lnga po gang dag gis byin len byed du bcug par 
[\[158a.7\]]brjod par bya zhe na/_mtshams kyi phyi rol ma yin pa na 'dug pas dang /_mi 'thob pa'i phyogs ma yin pa nas dang /_glo ma yin pa nas dang /_rgyab ma yin pa nas dang /_lag pa khas phub pa ma yin pas byin len byed du 'jud pa ste/_rnam pa lnga po de dag gis ni byin len 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]byed du bcug par brjod par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byin len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_drug sde dag byin len byed du bcug pa dang /_byin len byed du ma bcug pa yang za bar byed nas/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis byin 
[\[158b.2\]]len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_ci'i phyir dge slong dag byin len byed du bcug pa dang /_byin len byed du ma bcug pa yang za bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[158b.3\]]la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sog 
[\[158b.4\]]pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag ngas byin len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_khyed byin len byed du bcug pa dang /_byin len byed du ma bcug pa yang za ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/
[\[158b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas 
[\[158b.6\]]dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar 
[\[158b.7\]]gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang ma byin par kha nas mid pa'i zas za na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/_/dge slong dgon pa pa dgon pa na gnas pa rnams la chu dang so shing gi byin len stobs pa 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]med nas de dag gis dgon pa'i gnas mal dag bor te grong mtha'i gnas mal dag tu zhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' 
[\[159a.2\]]bo ci'i phyir dge slong dgon pa pa dag gis dgon pa'i gnas mal dag bor te grong mtha'i gnas mal dag tu zhugs/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang ma byin par kha nas mid pa'i zas za na ltung byed do zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' 
[\[159a.3\]]ba mdzad pas/_dge slong dgon pa pa dgon pa na gnas pa rnams la chab dang /_so shing gi byin len stobs pa ma mchis nas de dag gis dgon pa'i gnas mal dag bor te grong mtha'i gnas mal dag tu zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na chu dang so 
[\[159a.4\]]shing ma gtogs so/_/glang po che cang shes dang /_spre'u cang shes dang /_dom cang shes dag yod nas de dag gis dge slong rnams la shing tog dag 'bul ba na dge slong rnams 'gyod pas de dag mi len nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang la len pa yod pa de la 
[\[159a.5\]]stobs pa yang yod pas/_de lta bas na de dag gis bstabs pa ni byin len byas par brjod par bya ste/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge 
[\[159a.6\]]slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la 
[\[159a.7\]]bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang ma byin par kha nas mid pa'i zas za na chu dang so shing ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/ma byin par zhes bya ba ni de la skyes pa'am/_bud 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]med dam/_ma ning gang gis kyang ma sbyin par ro/_/kha nas mid pa'i zas zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang /_bza' ba lnga po dag go/_/za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o/_/chu dang so shing ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni chu dang so shing bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems 
[\[159b.2\]]can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_
[\[159b.3\]]des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis byin len ma byas pa la byin len ma byas par 'du shes pas bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis byin len ma byas pa la yid gnyis za bas bca' ba dang 
[\[159b.4\]]bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis byin len byas pa la byin len ma byas par 'du shes pas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis byin len byas pa la yid gnyis za bas bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha' 'am/_za 
[\[159b.5\]]na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen pos las ci bgyis na las 
[\[159b.6\]]de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung nas/_thams cad dur khrod pa dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis shing /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas yang dag pa ma lags pas skur par gyur/_bcom ldan 
[\[159b.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu nag po chen po nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/_nag po chen po nyid kyis las byas 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur 
[\[160a.2\]]gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/
[\[160a.3\]]'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rang sangs rgyas bla ma zhes bya ba zhig nye bar rten cing gnas pa de lha'i tshogs 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_dur khrod chen po'i dbus nas bA rA Na sIr bsod 
[\[160a.4\]]snyoms la zhugs so/_/dur khrod chen po de na gnod sbyin gdug pa zhig 'dug pa de de na mi ro myags pa za'o/_/gang gi tshe rang sangs rgyas bla ma dur khrod chen po der phyin pa de'i tshe na gnod sbyin gdug pa de lha'i mthus dur khrod chen po de nas bros pa dang /_de'i mi ro myags pa de 
[\[160a.5\]]dag wa la sogs pas zos nas gnod sbyin gdug pa des bsams pa/_rab tu byung ba 'di bdag gi lto'i bgegs su gyur gyis/_bdag gis 'di la bsnyen bkur ma yin pa bya'o snyam nas/_des de'i lhung bzed du mi'i lag pa bcug pa dang /_bA rA Na sIr thams cad 
[\[160a.6\]]du rab tu byung ba de mi sha za'o zhes sgra grags par gyur to/_/rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa/_gnod sbyin gdug pa nyon mongs pa 'di ha cang rmas pa dang /_nyams par gyur na mi rung gis 'di la la gnas drangs pa sbyin no snyam nas/_de de la snying brtse ba'i phyir 
[\[160a.7\]]des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char phab pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas gnod 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]sbyin gdug pa de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du 'gyel nas smras pa/_yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol/_mar gshegs su gsol/_nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal 
[\[160b.2\]]du gsol/_bdag gis khyod la yang dag pa ma lags pa'i bsngags pa ma lags pa brjod do/_/bA rA Na sI thams cad du yang rab tu byung ba de mi sha mi za'i/_'dis de la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mi bsngags pa brjod do zhes sgra grags par gyur to/_/rang sangs rgyas de 
[\[160b.3\]]gnod sbyin gdug pa de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs so/_/de nas gnod sbyin gdug pa des de'i lhung bzed nas mi'i lag pa sa la bor te rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam 'di skad ces/_bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di 
[\[160b.4\]]lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur par mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'di pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing thugs 'byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge 
[\[160b.5\]]slong dag de la de'i tshe de'i dus na gnod sbyin gdug pa gang yin pa de ni nag po chen po 'di yin te/_des rang sangs rgyas la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs mang po dag tu sems can dmyal ba rnams su gdungs nas/_las de 
[\[160b.6\]]nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang dag pa ma yin pas skur nas/_da ltar dgra bcom pa thob kyang yang dag pa ma yin pas skur to/_/mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni nga'i drung du rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[160b.7\]]spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing /_'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so/_/'di dur khrod de na gnas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i bag chags kyis da ltar yang thams 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]cad dur khrod pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na/_las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams 
[\[161a.2\]]kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//_//bar sdom la/_thams cad 
[\[161a.3\]]dur khrod ldan pa dang /_/sgo ba dang ni bu mo dang /_/bram zes bgams dang byin len lnga/_/shing tog la sogs gzhan lnga dang /_/chu dang so shing gnang ba dang /_/glang chen spre'u dom dang ni/_/sngon gyi tshul dang sbyar ba yin/_/byin len ma byas par za ba'i ltung byed de 
[\[161a.4\]]sum bcu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/_ser skya'i gnas su byon nas ser skya'i gnas na n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs 
[\[161a.5\]]so/_/shAkya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ser skya'i gnas su byon nas ser skya'i gnas na n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang ser skya'i gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[161a.6\]]song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya ming chen la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_
[\[161a.7\]]yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas shAkya ming chen stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 
[\[161b.2\]]'dun dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya ming chen la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas shAkya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos 
[\[161b.3\]]phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas zho shas 'tsho ba dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun shul gyis mnyel te gshegs kyis gdugs tshod snga rab tu zhal zas bsod pa sta gon 
[\[161b.4\]]gyis shig_/drug sde dag nang par sngar langs te smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' je khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag bltas 'dong ngo /_/de ltar bya'o zhes de dag khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag tu dong ba dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'di nyid du gdugs tshod gsol cig_/
[\[161b.5\]]drug sde dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag mgron du bos so/_/sus/_shAkya ming chen gyis so/_/'o na sang gdugs tshod gsol cig_/de ltar bya'o/_/de nas shAkya ming chen nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chu ra bzhag ste/_bcom ldan 'das la spyan 
[\[161b.6\]]'dren gyis btsun pa gdugs tshod g.yar dgongs 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol la lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs 
[\[161b.7\]]su bskor cing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_shAkya ming chen gyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bsham pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas shAkya ming chen gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed cing stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs 
[\[162a.2\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol cing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya ming chen la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' 
[\[162a.3\]]mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 
[\[162a.4\]]'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas shAkya ming chen re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin slad bzhin du zhabs 'bring du song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[162a.5\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir log ste/_de steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom par byed do/_/zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis kyang 
[\[162a.6\]]de'i gnas mal dag brtul cing kha zas dag bsdus so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' gdugs tshod la bab pas zan chad par gyur na mi rung gis 'dong ngo zhes de dag gis khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag tu zan drug bcu sbyor du bcug nas shAkya ming chen gyi khyim du dong 
[\[162a.7\]]ba dang /_ji tsam na de na kha zas sta gon byas pa yang med/_gnas mal bshams pa yang med par mthong nas drug sde dag gis zho shas 'tsho ba de dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs nas snying las chung ngur 'khod cing 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]gdugs tshod kyang sta gon mi byed/_gnas mal yang shom par mi byed na/_ji sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod gcod par byed dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag mnal bar gyur tam ci/_sangs rgyas la sogs 
[\[162b.2\]]pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te gshegs lags so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_ci kho bo cag gi zan gcad par bya'am/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gis shAkya ming chen la sbran gyi bar du re zhig yud tsam zhig gzhes shig ces 
[\[162b.3\]]de dag dong ste shAkya ming chen la smras pa/_'phags pa drug sde dag da gzod mchis te 'tshal ma slong ngo /_/shAkya ming chen gyis smras pa/_deng la lhag rol cung zad ci yod pa de byin cig_/de dag dong ste smras pa/_'phags pa dag bzhugs la gsol cig ces de dag 
[\[162b.4\]]gis brim par brtsams pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_shAkya ming chen gyis kha shin tu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyis sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[162b.5\]]spyan drangs na/_gal te zan 'di 'dra bas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drang du rung na ni/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kyang nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan 'dren par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar bkren pa 'di la ci bdog gis deng la khyim bdag 
[\[162b.6\]]che ge mo'i khyim nas 'o ma long shig_/che ge mo'i khyim nas zho long shig_/che ge mo'i khyim nas mar long shig_/che ge mo'i khyim nas nya sha long shig_/che ge mo'i khyim nas sha long shig_/che ge mo'i khyim nas sha skam dag long shig ces de dag gis bdag nyid 
[\[162b.7\]]kyi phyir zas bsod pa de lta bu dag gzhan gyi khyim dag nas bslangs te der zos nas dong ste gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis gang du zan zos/_de nyid du'o/_/khyed cag de na ma mthong ngo /_/drug sde dag 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]gis smras pa/_kho bo cag phyis lhags so/_/khyed cag gis zan ji lta bu zos/_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_nya sha dang /_sha dang /_sha skam dag go/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_kho bo cag gis zas de lta bu 
[\[163a.2\]]ma thob bo/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_bkren pa de la zas de lta bu ga la yod/_kho bo cag gis khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag nas blangs te der zos so/_/khyed cag bdag nyid kyi phyir zas bsod pa de lta bu dag gzhan gyi khyim dag nas bslangs te zar rung ngam/_rung yang 
[\[163a.3\]]srid mi rung yang srid de/_ci kho bo cag gis ltogs te 'chi bar bya'am/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag bdag nyid kyi phyir zas bsod pa de lta bu dag gzhan gyi khyim dag nas bslangs te 'cha' ba dang /_za bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_
[\[163a.4\]]kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[163a.5\]]ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag ngas dge slong rnams kyi zas bsod pa gang dag gsungs pa 'di lta ste/_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_
[\[163a.6\]]mar dang /_nya sha dang /_sha dang /_sha skam dag ste/_khyed kyis bdag nyid kyi phyir zas bsod pa de lta bu dag gzhan gyi khyim dag nas bslangs te zos pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su 
[\[163a.7\]]mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[163b.2\]]rnams kyi zas bsod pa gang dag gsungs pa 'di lta ste/_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_nya sha dang /_sha dang /_sha skam dag ste/_yang dge slong dag bdag nyid kyi phyir zas bsod pa de lta bu dag gzhan gyi khyim dag nas blangs te 'cha' 'am/_za na ltung byed do 
[\[163b.3\]]zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/_/dge slong na ba zhig gis sman pa la dris pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]je kho bo la sman ston cig_/'phags pa 'o ma gsol cig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo la 'o ma sus sbyin par gyur/_
[\[163b.4\]]'phags pa khyim dag nas slong shig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/_/'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can lags pas/_de nyid rkyen du mdzad nas gnang bar gyur pa gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[163b.5\]]zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na na ba'i dus ma gtogs so/_/de bzhin du dge slong gzhan la 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_nya sha dang /_sha dang /_sha skam dag 
[\[163b.6\]]khyim dag nas slong du gnang ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 
[\[163b.7\]]'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]dge slong rnams kyi zas bsod pa gang dag gsungs pa 'di lta ste/_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_nya sha dang /_sha dang /_sha skam dag ste/_yang dge slong gang mi na bar bdag nyid kyi phyir zas bsod pa de lta bu dag gzhan gyi khyim dag nas bslangs te 'cha' 'am za na 
[\[164a.2\]]ltung byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis so/_/dge slong rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyi'o/_/zas bsod pa gang dag bsod pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu bstan pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[164a.3\]]'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_nya sha dang /_sha dang /_sha skam dag ste zhes bya ba ni zas bsod pa dag go/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/mi na bar zhes bya ba ni na ba ma gtogs par ro/_/bdag nyid kyi phyir 
[\[164a.4\]]zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la bsngos te'o/_/zas bsod pa de lta bu dag ces bya ba ni 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_nya sha dang /_sha dang /_sha skam dag go/_/gzhan gyi khyim dag nas zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi khyim dag nas so/_/bslangs te zhes bya ba 
[\[164a.5\]]ni gsol te'o/_/'cha' 'am za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan 
[\[164a.6\]]yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis mi na bas slong zhing mi na bas za na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_za 
[\[164a.7\]]ba la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi na bas slong zhing na bas za na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_za ba la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis na bas slong zhing mi na bas za na de slong ba la ltung ba med la za ba la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis na bas slong zhing na 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]bas za na gnyis ka la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing khyim dag tu 'gro ba na bud med kyi yul zas thogs te phyir 'byung ba'i tshe dge slong cang mi smra bar sdod pa na/_bud med kyi yul na re 'phags pa ci bzhed ces 'dri na bstabs par brjod par bya ste/_ji 'dod pa de bslang 
[\[164b.2\]]bar bya ba la ltung ba med do/_/sbyin bdag gis ci bder byas pa la ltung ba med do/_/zho sbyin pa na chur khu dang /_dar ba slong ba la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/bsod pa 
[\[164b.3\]]slong ba'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom la/_srog chags bcas dang nyal sar 'dug_/'greng dang gcer bu dmag dang ni/_/zhag gnyis bshams dkrugs 'gro ba dang /_/rdeg dang gzas dang gnas ngan len/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[164b.4\]]kau shAm+bI na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod nas/_de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa khyod shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la ma spyod cig_/
[\[164b.5\]]des smras pa/_kho bo la 'ga' zhig gis bsgrangs te gtad dam ci/_shar gyi rgya mtsho chen por ci'i phyir mi 'gro/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang gi rgya mtsho chen por ci'i phyir mi 'gro/_'bab chu dang /_mtsho dang /_lteng ka dag tu ci'i phyir mi 'gro zhes zer nas dge slong don 
[\[164b.6\]]nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng 
[\[164b.7\]]gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]pa 'dun pa la rmas pa/_'dun pa khyod shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang 
[\[165a.2\]]mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan 
[\[165a.3\]]thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod na ltung byed do/_/yang dge 
[\[165a.4\]]slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am/_gzhan dag gis brjod pas so/_/srog chags dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ni srog chags dang bcas pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/_gang 
[\[165a.5\]]dag mig sngar snang bar gyur pa dang /_gang dag chu tshags kyis zin par gyur pa'o/_/chu la spyod na zhes bya ba ni chu'i spyad pa gnyis su ste/_nang gi dang phyi rol gyis so/_/nang gir spyad pa ni khrus byed pa dang /_'thung ba dang /_so shing 'dor ba dang /_lag pa dang rkang 
[\[165a.6\]]pa dag 'khrus pa'o/_/phyi rol gyir spyad pa ni lhung bzed 'khru ba dang /_lhung bzed chung ngu 'khru ba dang /_chos gos dag 'khru ba dang /_tshon gyi las byed pa dang /_gtsug lag khang du chag chag 'debs pa dang /_zhal zhal skud pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas nyug 
[\[165a.7\]]pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la srog chags dang bcas par 'du shes pas spyod na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 
[\[165b.2\]]srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la yid gnyis za bas spyod na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis srog chags med pa'i chu la srog chags dang bcas par 'du shes pas spyod na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis srog chags med pa'i chu la yid gnyis za bas spyod na nyes byas 
[\[165b.3\]]su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis srog chags dang bcas pa'i zhun mar dang /_'bru mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_bu ram gyi dbu ba dang /_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis srog chags dang bcas pa'i tshwa dang /_'bru'i tshwa dang /_zho 
[\[165b.4\]]ga chu dang /_rtsab mo 'thungs na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis srog chags dang bcas pa'i shing thog dang bca' ba 'cha' na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/
[\[165b.5\]]srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bsam pa'i nor bu'i rigs 
[\[165b.6\]]pa shes te/_snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/mnyan yod na spos 'tshong gi khye'u chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon pa zhig 'dug pa des zong bkram pa na/_bdag chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod 
[\[165b.7\]]du 'gro'o snyam pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa skyes nas des zong phyir bsdu bar brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de mthong nas bsams pa/_da ltar tshong pa gzhan dag zong 'grems par byed na/_spos 'tshong gi khye'u 'di zong sdud par byed pa ci'i phyir snyam 
[\[166a\]]
