[\[166a.1\]]nas des yang bsams pa dang /_'di chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon pas 'di chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'dod do snyam du shes nas der bdag song la re ba med par bya'o snyam nas/_de dang por de'i khyim du song ste stan la 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[166a.2\]]bu mo tshur shog 'dug shig dang chos bstan par bya'o/_/bu mo des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang /_des de la chos bstan par brtsams so/_/ji tsam na spos 'tshong gi khye'u de 'ongs nas des chung ma la smras pa/_'phags pa 'char 
[\[166a.3\]]ka la bsod snyoms phul la bzhud du gsol cig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bos bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par byas te 'ongs nas chos ston par byed na/_khyod chos nyan mi 'dod dam/_'dug la chos nyon cig ces des de nan gyis 
[\[166a.4\]]'dug tu bcug ste/_des ji tsam gyis de'i kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de tsam du chos bstan pa dang /_de shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/_'di ltar rang gi chung ma la yang dbang med do zhes smod par byed/_phyar 
[\[166a.5\]]ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed nas dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon byas te stan la 'dug par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[166a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par 
[\[166a.7\]]mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa/_'char ka khyod shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon byas te stan la 'dug pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas 
[\[166b.2\]]dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar 
[\[166b.3\]]gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon byas te stan la 'dug na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par 
[\[166b.4\]]gyur pa'am/_gzhan dag gis brjod pas so/_/nyal po byed par shom pa'i zhes bya ba ni bud med ni skyes pa'i nyal po bya ba yin la skyes pa ni bud med kyi nyal po bya ba yin no/_/khyim du zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du'o/_/phyis gnon byas te zhes bya ba ni phyis zhugs 
[\[166b.5\]]te'o/_/stan la zhes bya ba ni gzhi la'o/_/'dug na zhes bya ba ni 'dom gang gi nang du rkub tshos bzhag na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod 
[\[166b.6\]]par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad shes bzhin 
[\[166b.7\]]du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon byas te stan la 'dug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]byed de bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bsam pa'i nor bu'i rigs pa shes te/_de snga dro sham thabs 
[\[167a.2\]]bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/mnyan yod na spos 'tshong gi khye'u chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon pa zhig 'dug pa des zong bkram pa na bdag chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod du 'gro'o snyam pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin 
[\[167a.3\]]pa yid la byed pa skyes nas/_des zong phyir bsdu bar brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de mthong nas bsams pa/_da ltar tshong pa gzhan dag zong 'grems par byed na/_spos 'tshong gi khye'u 'di zong sdud par byed pa ci'i phyir snyam nas des yang bsams pa/_'di 
[\[167a.4\]]chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon pas 'di chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'dod do snyam du shes nas de bdag song la blta'o snyam nas de dang por de'i khyim du song ste sgo glegs kyi rgyab na mgo sri zhing 'greng ngo /_/de'i 'og tu spos 'tshong gi khye'u de 'ongs nas des chung ma khrid de gnas 
[\[167a.5\]]khang du zhugs pa dang /_bu mo des 'char ka dben pa na 'greng ba mthong nas des khyo la smras pa/_rje'i sras 'phags pa 'char ka sgo glegs kyi rgyab na 'greng ngo /_/spos 'tshong gi khye'us smras pa/_'phags pa 'char ka gtsug lag khang na bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar 
[\[167a.6\]]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong zhing 'greng ngo zhes des chung ma la dga' mgur spyad nas gang gi tshe de'i kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe na des 'char ka mthong ba dang /_de shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig 
[\[167a.7\]]go/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/_'di ltar rang gi chung ma la dbang med do zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed nas/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du dben pa skyabs yod par 'greng bar 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la 
[\[167b.2\]]sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa/_'char ka khyod shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i 
[\[167b.3\]]khyim du dben pa skyabs yod par 'greng ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa 
[\[167b.4\]]mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[167b.5\]]nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du dben pa skyabs yod par 'greng na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[167b.6\]]shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am/_gzhan dag gis brjod pas so/_/nyal po byed par shom pa'i zhes bya ba ni bud med ni skyes pa'i nyal po bya ba yin la skyes pa ni bud med kyi nyal po bya ba yin no/_/khyim du zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim 
[\[167b.7\]]du'o/_/dben pa zhes bya ba ni gang na bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_ma ning gzhan 'ga' yang med pa'o/_/skyabs yod par zhes bya ba ni lngas bskyabs par te rtsig pas bskyabs pa dang /_rib mas bskyabs pa dang /_yol bas bskyabs pa dang /_thibs pos bskyabs pa dang /_
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]mtshan mos bskyabs par ro/_/'greng na zhes bya ba ni 'dom gang du 'greng na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par lta ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung 
[\[168a.2\]]bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim 
[\[168a.3\]]du dben pa skyabs yod par 'greng na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[168a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs te/_de nas rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/
[\[168a.5\]]mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu 
[\[168a.6\]]dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu 
[\[168a.7\]]mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_rjes su yi rang ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas tshe 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/_yang dag par 
[\[168b.2\]]'dzin du 'jud par byed/_yang dag par gzengs stod par byed/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed do/_/rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar 
[\[168b.3\]]byas nas cang mi smra'o/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' 
[\[168b.4\]]bo bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas gang du gshegs par 'gyur/_shes ldan dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig_/btsun pa kun dga' bo/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsnyen par dka' ba dang /_bzod par dka' ba lags pas bdag cag 
[\[168b.5\]]gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i rngo mi thog go/_/shes ldan dag kho bo la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen par dka' ba dang /_bzod par dka' ba nyid yin pas kho bos kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar mi nus so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo gal te 
[\[168b.6\]]btsun pa kun dga' bo la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsnyen par dka' ba dang /_bzod par dka' ba lags pas btsun pa kun dga' bos kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar mi spro na/_btsun pa kun dga' bos mtshan ma'am/_bka' mchid kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[168b.7\]]dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas phyogs ga ge mor gshegs par 'gyur bar ji ltar mkhyen/_mtshan mas ni ji ltar mkhyen/_bka' mchid kyis ni ji ltar mkhyen/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas phyogs gang du gshegs par bzhed 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]pa'i phyogs de logs su bcom ldan 'das zhal gzigs shing bzhugs la de dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod par mdzad do/_/btsun pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das zhal gar gzigs shing bzhugs/_mi gang dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod par mdzad/_shes 
[\[169a.2\]]ldan dag bcom ldan 'das ko sa lar zhal gzigs shing bzhugs la/_mnyan yod pa'i mi dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod par mdzad do/_/de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_rjes su yi rang ba byas nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i 
[\[169a.3\]]rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te dong nas de dag gis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas mnyan yod du gshegs par 'gyur ro snyam nas de dag gis mnyan yod du 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas 
[\[169a.4\]]par zhal gyis bzhes te dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las 
[\[169a.5\]]gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/_dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag_/de 
[\[169a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis/_khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[169a.7\]]bos dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des/_chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo ba thos so/_/
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]thos nas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag 
[\[169b.2\]]la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par 
[\[169b.3\]]bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la 
[\[169b.4\]]ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas rgyal po'i khab nas mnyan yod kyi bar ji tsam bar bdag cag las na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung 
[\[169b.5\]]ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas 
[\[169b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_rjes su yi rang ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[169b.7\]]bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]bo bcom ldan 'das shul dag tu ji tsam du gshegs/_shes ldan dag 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po tsam du'o/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ji tsam du mchi/_shes ldan dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni 
[\[170a.2\]]lam dag tu rgyang grags bcur 'gro'o/_/de dag gis rgyang grags bcu bcur bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i tshogs dag bshams shing /_de dag gis zhal zas grang cha gang dag yin pa de dag ni de nyid kyi nyin mo sta gon byas/_drod bag gang dag yin 
[\[170a.3\]]pa de dag ni nyi ma re re zhing sta gon byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/_'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/_zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/_grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/_dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/_thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/_
[\[170a.4\]]dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/_mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis 
[\[170a.5\]]yongs su bskor ba/_seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sman 
[\[170a.6\]]pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi 
[\[170a.7\]]tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]bskor ba/_yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_thags 
[\[170b.2\]]zangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/_spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/_
[\[170b.3\]]chu gter ltar ting nge ba/_sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/_glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/_'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/_
[\[170b.4\]]nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun du bzang ba/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_rta thul dang /_bzang ldan dang /_
[\[170b.5\]]rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs pa nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te mnyan yod ga la ba de logs su 
[\[170b.6\]]ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs so/_/don mthun de dang shes pa can zhig lhan cig 'gro ba de phongs pa'i dus la bab cing bkres pas nyam thag par gyur nas/_des bsams pa/_bdag gang gis bkres pas nyam thag par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam nas/_des yang bsams pa/_
[\[170b.7\]]shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams la skyabs btsal na des bdag bde bar lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas de dge slong rnams kyi gan du song ste smras pa/_khyed cag gi ston pa ni bzang po la mos pa yin te/_de gser gyi gshol gyis zhing rmo bas des khyed cag la zas ro brgya pa 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]dang /_gos 'bum ri ba dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa lnga brgya pa yang rjes su gnang bas khyed cag ni re zhig tshe 'di nyid la yang bde ba la reg par gnas la/_'di nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kho bo cag gi ston pa ni ngan pa 
[\[171a.2\]]la mos pa yin te/_de til gyi tshigs ma'i gshol gyis zhing rmo bas des kho bo cag la gcer bu dang /_sgre byi dang /_sbrang zan dang /_yul rgyu ba dang /_sa la nyal ba las gzhan rjes su ma gnang bas kho bo cag ni re zhig tshe 'di nyid la yang sdug bsngal la reg par gnas shing 
[\[171a.3\]]'di nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/_shes pa can 'di dad par gyur to snyam nas de dag gis de la smras pa/_shes pa can ji ltar 'tsho/_dka' bas so/_/dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed 
[\[171a.4\]]kyi lhag ma 'dod dam/_shes pa can des bsams pa/_gal te dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed kyi lhag ma ma zos na ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des smras pa/_'tshal lo/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_shes pa can dge slong rnams zan za ba'i mig lam du 'dug 
[\[171a.5\]]shig dang /_dge slong rnams khyod la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/shes pa can de dge slong rnams zan za ba'i mig lam du 'dug pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma byin nas de'i slong phor khur bas byur bur byas so/_/de slong phor khur bas 
[\[171a.6\]]byur bur byas pa thogs te phyir byung ba ded dpon gyis mthong nas des smras pa/_shes pa can khyod la khur ba sus byin/_des smras pa/_khyod kyi yon gnas ni dge slong de dag yin la de dag gi yon gnas ni kho bo yin pas kho bo la de dag gis phul lo/_/ded dpon gyis smras pa/_
[\[171a.7\]]shes pa can dge slong rnams kyis khyod la snying rje bas byin na khyod de skad ces de dag gi yon gnas kho bo yin no zhes zer ram/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad par 'gyur ba 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod do/_/des smras pa/_ded dpon mad kyang bzhad gad bgyis so/_/lam de nas don mthun tshur 'ong ba dag cig lhags nas don mthun de dang lhan cig shes pa can zhig 'ong ba des de mthong nas smras pa/_shes pa can nyod pa nyod dam/_des smras pa/_
[\[171b.2\]]nyod do/_/gang nas/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag sgre byi 'di dag kho bo la mkho ba stobs par byed do/_/des smras pa/_shes pa can khyod ni byas pa mi shes pa yin te/_'di dag khyod kyi khyim bdag sgre byi dag yin nam/_'di dag las ni lnga brgya pa'i tshogs dag yongs su mya 
[\[171b.3\]]ngan las 'da' bar snang gis/_khyod kyis shes pa can ni gcig 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mthong ngam zhes des tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/_ngan pa ci phyir sa la 'bying mi byed/_/ci phyir lce yang tshal pa brgyar mi 'gas/_/khyod kyi lus la ci phyir gsang ba 
[\[171b.4\]]dag_/rdo rje'i ser ba mdung thung mda' mi 'phen/_/ji ltar seng ge'i lhag ma za ba'i wa/_/seng ge nyid la gsod par 'dod pa ltar/_/de bzhin khyod kyang stobs bcu'i 'khyos za zhing /_/stobs bcu nyid la smod byed ma 'phags pa/_/gang du gang la nye bar brten byas na/_/
[\[171b.5\]]mi ngan 'di 'dras 'tsho ba 'thob pa las/_/de nas nges par mdza' bshes dgra rnams la/_/mnyam mdzad blo ldan thams cad mkhyen pa yin/_/mi rnams gang dag byas pa mi shes pa/_/de dag khyi bas shin tu ngan par bsams/_/khyi yang mi la byas pa shes snang na/_/sbrul 
[\[171b.6\]]'dra'i mi dag dug ni gtong bar byed/_/'di ni re zhig byung ba yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon to/_/
[\[171b.7\]]mnyan yod na skyed mos tshal zhig na yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam dog pa 'khal zhing 'khod pa de dag gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis gzugs can brgyan cing gsal ba/_gzugs can lta bu chos dang ldan pa/_gser phyes 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]btab pa'i mi lta bu/_gser gyi snod na 'dug pa'i mar me lta bu/_gser gyi ri bo 'gro ba lta bu/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu/_grags pa dang /_gsal ba dang /_mi bsnyengs pa dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[172a.2\]]dag pa'i blo dang ldan pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang por sangs rgyas mthong ba na sems nyams bde ba skyed par byed pa de ltar ni lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyis sems goms par byas pa dang /_dbul pos 
[\[172a.3\]]gter mthong ba dang /_bu med pas bu thob pa dang /_rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba/_rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba yang sems nyams bde ba skyed par mi byed pas de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 
[\[172a.4\]]mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas ci nas kyang de dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste 
[\[172a.5\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/de dag gis bden pa dag mthong nas gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal 
[\[172a.6\]]pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_
[\[172a.7\]]rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge 
[\[172b.2\]]slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/_bdag cag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas skyabs su mchi'o/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_gal te bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs par gyur na der bdag cag 
[\[172b.3\]]gis skabs kyang mi rnyed kyis/_bdag cag gis 'di nyid du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sang gdugs tshod la spyan drang ngo snyam nas/_de nas rigs kyi bu mo de dag stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud 
[\[172b.4\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bdag cag gi gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu mo de dag la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rigs 
[\[172b.5\]]kyi bu mo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[172b.6\]]dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag cag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[172b.7\]]sang gdugs tshod la spyan drang na/_btsun pa kun dga' bo kAr ShA pa Na ji tsam gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod 'tshal bar 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgyas so/_/de dag gis kAr ShA pa Na re re 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]bsdus te smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bos bdag cag la snod spyad dang /_mi blas dang /_gnas mal gyi 'byor pa ma mchis na khyod kyis zhal zas sta gon mdzod cig dang /_bdag cag mchis te brim par bgyi'o/_/kAr ShA pa Na dag zhog shig_/de 
[\[173a.2\]]dag gis kAr ShA pa Na dag mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste dong ngo //_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon ces thos so/_/
[\[173a.3\]]thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag 
[\[173a.4\]]par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang 
[\[173a.5\]]dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[173a.6\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_khyim bdag nga de'i dang por khyim bdag mo lnga brgyas spyan drangs so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[173a.7\]]bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_rjes su yi rang ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/des kAr ShA pa Na de dag mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo kAr ShA pa Na 'di dag su'i lags/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_khyim bdag mo lnga brgya tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das dge 
[\[173b.2\]]slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas de dag gis kAr ShA pa Na 'di dag bzhag gis/_khyod kyis 'di dag dang bdag nyid kyi kAr ShA pa Na gzhan dag bsres te zhal zas bsod pa sta gon gyis la 'dir skur cig_/des kAr ShA pa Na de dag 
[\[173b.3\]]khyer te song nas des kAr ShA pa Na de dag dang bdag nyid kyi kAr ShA pa Na gzhan dag bsres te zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du bskur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de dag la zhal zas sta gon byas kyis tshur gshegs la sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 
[\[173b.4\]]'dun la brims shig ces springs pa dang /_de dag lhags te smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags kyis tshur spyon khyod kyis kyang brim du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos brims par brtsams pa dang /_der gcer bu ma gnyis 
[\[173b.5\]]shig 'ongs te/_de gnyis kyis khyim bdag mo de dag la zas bslangs pa na de dag gis smras pa/_zas 'di ni rgyal bu 'di'i yin no/_/gcer bu ma de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rgyal bu bdag cag gnyis ni sdug bsngal ba lags kyis bdag cag gnyis la zas stsol 
[\[173b.6\]]cig ces zas bslangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_'dug shig dang sbyin no/_/de gnyis 'dug go/_/de na gcig ni rgan mo zhig yin/_cig shos ni gzhon nu ma zhig yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ma bsams par brims pa dang /_
[\[173b.7\]]rgan mo de la ni khur ba gcig byin/_gzhon nu ma de la ni khur ba gnyis byin no/_/rgan mo des khur b+ba gcig po de zos nas des gzhon nu ma la smras pa/_khyod kyis khur ba du thob/_des smras pa/_gnyis thob bo/_/rgan mos smras pa/_rgyal bu des kho mo la ni 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]khur ba gcig byin la/_khyed la gnyis byin pa las na rgyal bu des khyod don du gnyer gyis sta gon gyis shig_/gzhon nu mas smras pa/_des btsun mo'i 'khor rgyas pa spangs te rab tu byung bas dri ma'i rdzab can kho mo lta bu don du gnyer bar ga la 'gyur/_rgan mos 
[\[174a.2\]]smras pa/_skyes pa dag ni bud med sna tshogs dag la bud med kyi 'dun pa yod pas rgyal bu 'dis khyod don du gnyer gyis sta gon gyis shig_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag gcer bu pa dang /_gcer bu ma kun du rgyu dang /_kun du rgyu mo la rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang /_
[\[174a.3\]]bza' ba sbyin par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba 
[\[174a.4\]]la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo khyod gcer bu pa dang /_gcer bu ma kun 
[\[174a.5\]]du rgyu dang /_kun du rgyu mo la rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba sbyin par byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi brtson pa dang /_mi sbyor ba dang /_ma brtags par spyod pa rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[174a.6\]]brtson pa dang /_sbyor ba dang /_brtags te spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma 
[\[174a.7\]]bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang gcer bu pa'am/_gcer bu ma kun du rgyu'am/_kun du rgyu mo la rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba sbyin na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]'di pa'o/_/gcer bu pa'am/_gcer bu ma kun du rgyu'am/_kun du rgyu mo la rang gi lag nas zhes bya ba ni lag pas lag par ro/_/bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'o/_/sbyin na zhes bya ba ni bsab mi dgos par ro/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni 
[\[174b.2\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par 
[\[174b.3\]]byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad gcer bu pa'am/_gcer bu ma kun du rgyu'am/_kun du rgyu mo la rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba sbyin na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nye 
[\[174b.4\]]du dang /_nad pa dang /_sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa las dbral bar 'dod pa yin na ltung ba med do/_/dum bur byas te sbyin pa dang /_gzhan sbyin du 'jug pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa 
[\[174b.5\]]la ltung ba med do/_/gcer bu pa la sbyin pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ri brags pa zhig log nas 
[\[174b.6\]]der ru pa gcig btang ba dang /_de bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs so/_/ru pa gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa btang ba dang de yang bcom bzhin rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs nas blon po rnams kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/_lha ri brags pa'i dpung ni skyes 
[\[174b.7\]]lha'i dpung ni nyams pas/_gal te lha nyid der rang ma gshegs na ri brags pa phebs dka' bar 'gyur na/_lhas rang nyid der gshegs par mdzad du gsol/_ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis nga'i yul na mtshon gyis 'tsho ba gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]'dong bar bya'o/_/gang mi 'gro ba des chad par kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya dbul bar bya'o zhes dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste/_rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'phags pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' gsus po che'i dpung gi 
[\[175a.2\]]tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ci 'dra bltas 'dong ngo zhes de dag lam kar dong ste 'khod pa dang /_ji tsam glang po che pa'i tshogs 'ongs nas drug sde dag gis de dag la rmas pa/_shes ldan dag gar 'dong /_'phags pa dag ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ri brags pa zhig 
[\[175a.3\]]log pa de 'bebs su mchi'o/_/bkren pa dag glang po che 'di lta bu dag gis ri brags pa phebs par 'gyur ram/_khyod kyi glang po che 'di dag ni phag 'dra la/_ri brags pa'i glang po che dag ni ri bo brtsegs pa 'dra bas/_khyed cag phar 'gro ba yod kyang phyir ldog pa med kyis phyir deng la 
[\[175a.4\]]pha ma dag la til gyi chu byin la gzod deng shig_/de dag mtha' gcig tu dong ste sems khong du chud cing 'khod do/_/de nas rta pa'i tshogs 'ongs nas drug sde dag gis de dag la rmas pa/_shes ldan dag gar 'dong /_'phags pa dag ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 
[\[175a.5\]]ri brags pa zhig log pa de 'bebs su mchi'o/_/bkren pa dag rta 'di lta bu dag gis ri brags pa phebs par 'gyur ram/_khyed kyi rta 'di dag ni bong bu 'dra la/_ri brags pa'i rta dag ni glang po che'i phru gu 'dra bas khyed cag phar 'gro ba yod kyang phyir ldog pa med kyis phyir deng la pha ma 
[\[175a.6\]]dag la til gyi chu byin la gzod deng shig_/de dag mtha' gcig tu dong ste sems khong du chud cing 'khod do/_/de nas shing rta pa'i tshogs 'ongs nas drug sde dag gis de dag la rmas pa/_shes ldan dag gar 'dong /_'phags pa dag ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 
[\[175a.7\]]ri brags pa zhig log pa de 'bebs su mchi'o/_/bkren pa dag shing rta 'di lta bu dag gis ri brags pa phebs par 'gyur ram/_khyod kyi shing rta 'di dag ni shing rta zhig pa 'dra la/_ri brags pa'i shing rta dag ni gzhal med khang 'dra bas khyed cag phar 'gro ba yod kyang phyir ldog pa 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]med kyis phyir deng la pha ma dag la til gyi chu byin la gzod deng shig_/de dag mtha' gcig tu dong ste sems khong du chud cing 'khod do/_/de nas dpung bu chung gi tshogs 'ongs nas drug sde dag gis de dag la rmas pa/_shes ldan dag gar 'dong /_'phags pa dag ko sa lar 
[\[175b.2\]]byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ri brags pa zhig log pa de 'bebs su mchi'o/_/bkren pa dag mi 'di lta bu dag gis ri brags pa phebs par 'gyur ram/_khyed kyi mi 'di dag ni rtswa mi 'dra la/_ri brags pa'i mi dag ni gnod sbyin gdug pa 'dra bas khyed cag phar 
[\[175b.3\]]'gro ba yod kyang phyir ldog pa med kyis phyir deng la pha ma dag la til gyi chu byin la gzod deng shig_/de dag mtha' gcig tu dong ste sems khong du chud cing 'khod do/_/ji tsam na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'ongs nas des smras pa/_khyed cag ci'i phyir mi 'dong bar 
[\[175b.4\]]mtha' gcig tu dong ste sems khong du chud cing 'khod/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha bdag cag rgyal bar ga la 'gyur/_'di ltar dge sbyong mgo reg ras yug chen glegs pa 'tshal ba 'di dag mi mchi dgu mchi'o/_/gang dag 'phags pa drug sde dag go/_/shes ldan dag 
[\[175b.5\]]de dag ni dge sbyong hral po dag yin pas de dag gis smras pas khyed la ci gnod deng shig_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/_'di dag yang dang yang du bdag la tho 'tsham par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas mi zhig la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje tshur shog_/bcom 
[\[175b.6\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der song la nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam/_kha 
[\[175b.7\]]na ma tho ba ma mchis sam zhes snyun gsol la 'di skad ces ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi mchid nas btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchis na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang gis 'phags pa dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchis 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]par mi 'gyur bar dran par bgyi ba chung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes gsol cig_/mi des lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[176a.2\]]kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 
[\[176a.3\]]'das la gnod pa nyung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis sam zhes snyun gsol lo/_/kwa'i nang rje ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang khyed bde bar gyur cig_/btsun 
[\[176a.4\]]pa ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi mchid nas/_btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchi na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang gis 'phags pa dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchi bar mi 'gyur bar dran par bgyi ba chung zhig bca' ba 
[\[176a.5\]]mdzad na legs so zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga 
[\[176a.6\]]nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang 
[\[176a.7\]]snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyod dmag chas pa la ltar 'gro ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba 
[\[176b.2\]]la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dmag chas pa la ltar 'gro na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug 
[\[176b.3\]]sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dmag ces bya ba la dmag ni yan lag gcig pa yang yod/_yan lag gnyis pa yang yod/_yan lag gsum pa yang yod/_yan lag bzhi pa yang yod/_dmag yan lag gcig pa gang zhe na/_glang po che 
[\[176b.4\]]pa'i tshogs so/_/dmag yan lag gnyis pa gang zhe na/_glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs so/_/dmag yan lag gsum pa gang zhe na/_glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs so/_/dmag yan lag bzhi pa gang zhe na/_glang 
[\[176b.5\]]po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs so/_/chas pa la zhes bya ba ni g.yul 'gyed par mngon par dga' ba la'o/_/ltar 'gro na zhes bya ba ni 'gro na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro 
[\[176b.6\]]dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes 
[\[176b.7\]]gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong ji tsam cung zad dmag chas pa la ltar 'gro na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na dmag 'gro ba dang /_gtsug lag khang lam ka na 'dug pa dang /_dmag gtsug lag 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]khang du 'ongs pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_zhang blon dang /_khrom gyi ru sna dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_ljongs kyi mis bkug pa la ltung ba med do/_/bar chad brgyad po dag las bar chad gang yang rung ba nye bar gnas par gyur pa la 
[\[177a.2\]]ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dmag la lta ba'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med 
[\[177a.3\]]zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ri brags pa de de lta na yang ma phebs nas/_rgyal pos de nyid du phru ma btab ste 'dug pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa can dbang che bar grags pa lags pas/_
[\[177a.4\]]gal te de mchis par gyur na/_de'i mthus ri brags pa 'di phebs par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur gda'o/_/rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la khyim bdag mthong bar 'dod do zhes yi ge spring ba dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[177a.5\]]der 'ongs so/_/de lta na yang ri brags pa de ma phebs nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/_khyim bdag khye'u dag mi dran nam/_lha khye'u dag ni mi dran te/_'di ltar 'phags pa dag mthong bar 'tshal lo/_/ko sa lar byung 
[\[177a.6\]]ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge 'dun la 'phags pa dag mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes yi ge springs pa dang /_dge skos kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su yi ge bklags te/_gang der 'gro bar spro ba des tshul shing long shig ces tshul shing brims pa dang /_dge slong gnas brtan 
[\[177a.7\]]gnas brtan dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag ni rgan po sbyor mi bzod pa dag yin pas der 'gro ni mi nus so/_/dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag gis smras pa/_der chos bstan par bya dgos na bdag cag ni thos pa nyung ba yin pas chos ston par ni mi nus na der chu brim par bya'am ci 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]bdag cag kyang der 'gro mi nus so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' ji srid du bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing bdag cag gson pa de srid du bstan pa gnas la/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing bdag cag dus la bab na bstan pa nub par brjod 
[\[177b.2\]]par bya ste/_ji srid du bdag cag gson pa de srid du bstan pa la gces pa bskyed par byas/_tshul shing blang ngo zhes de dag gis tshul shing blangs te/_der dong nas rgyal po la chos bstan pas rgyal po mngon par dad par byas so/_/btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dag dang /_zhang blon dang /_
[\[177b.3\]]khrom gyi ru sna dag la yang chos bstan pas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon par dad par byas so/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis blon po rnams la smras pa/_ri brags pa bskor du 'dong ngo zhes de dag 'phags pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bdag 
[\[177b.4\]]cag gis yun ji srid du gzhan gyi spyod lam gyis gnas par bya/_rang gi spyod lam gyis gnas par byas/_gsus po che'i dmag ci 'dra ba ltar 'dong ngo zhes de dag lam kar dong ste 'khod pa dang /_ji tsam na glang po che pa'i tshogs 'ongs nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag 
[\[177b.5\]]shul phye shig shul phye shig_/ci bya/_glang po che'i tshogs mchi'o/_/bkren pa dag 'di 'dra ba dag glang po che yin nam/_phag pa dag 'dra'o zhes de dag gis de dag gi mche ba dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro/_/ji tsam na rta pa'i tshogs 'ongs nas de dag gis 
[\[177b.6\]]smras pa/_'phags pa dag shul phye shig shul phye shig_/ci bya/_rta pa'i tshogs mchi'o/_/bkren pa dag 'di 'dra ba dag rta yin nam/_bong bu dag 'dra'o zhes de dag gis de dag gi mjug ma dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro/_/ji tsam na shing rta pa'i tshogs 'ongs 
[\[177b.7\]]nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag shul phye shig shul phye shig_/ci bya/_shing rta pa'i tshogs mchi'o/_/bkren pa dag 'di 'dra ba dag shing rta yin nam/_shing rta zhig pa dag 'dra'o zhes de dag gis de dag gi srog shing dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro/_/
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]ji tsam na dpung bu chung gi tshogs 'ongs nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag shul phye shig shul phye shig_/ci bya/_dpung bu chung gi tshogs mchi'o/_/bkren pa dag 'di 'dra ba dag mi yin nam/_rtswa mi dag 'dra'o zhes de dag gis de dag gi gnya' ba 
[\[178a.2\]]dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor nas de dag sems khong du chud cing 'khod do/_/ji tsam na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'ongs nas des smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir khyed cag mi 'dong bar sems khong du chud cing 'khod/_lha bdag cag rgyal bar ga la 'gyur/_'di 
[\[178a.3\]]ltar dge sbyong mgo reg ras yug chen glegs pa 'tshal ba 'di dag mi mchi dgu mchi'o/_/gang dag_/'phags pa drug sde dag go/_/shes ldan dag 'di dag ni dge sbyong hral po dag yin pas de dag gis smras pas khyed la ci gnod deng shig_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal 
[\[178a.4\]]rgyal gyis bsams pa/_'di dag bdag la yang dang yang du tho 'tsham par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas mi zhig la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje tshur shog_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 
[\[178a.5\]]'das la gnod pa nyung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis sam zhes snyun gsol la 'di skad ces/_btsun pa ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi mchid nas btsun pa 
[\[178a.6\]]'phags pa 'di dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchis nas shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas na kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang gis 'phags pa dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchis nas/_shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas par mi 'gyur bar bcom 
[\[178a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa rnams la dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes gsol cig_/mi des lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[178b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_gnod pa chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam/_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis sam zhes snyun gsol lo/_/kwa'i nang rje ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang khyod bde 
[\[178b.3\]]bar gyur cig_/btsun pa ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi mchid nas btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchis nas shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang gis 'phags pa dag 
[\[178b.4\]]dmag chas pa la ltar mchis nas shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas par mi 'gyur bar/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa rnams la dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/
[\[178b.5\]]de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[178b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed dmag chas pa la ltar song nas shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas pa 
[\[178b.7\]]bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos 
[\[179a.2\]]rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong la dmag chas pa la ltar 'gro ba de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na dge slong des dmag de'i nang du zhag gnyis tshun chad gnas par bya'o/_/de las lhag par gnas na ltung byed do/_/dge slong la zhes bya ba ni drug 
[\[179a.3\]]sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la'o/_/dmag ces bya ba la dmag ni yan lag gcig pa yang yod/_yan lag gnyis pa yang yod/_yan lag gsum pa yang yod/_yan lag bzhi pa yang yod do/_/dmag yan lag gcig pa gang zhe na/_glang po che 
[\[179a.4\]]pa'i tshogs so/_/dmag yan lag gnyis pa gang zhe na/_glang po che pa'i tshogs dang rta pa'i tshogs so/_/dmag yan lag gsum pa gang zhe na/_glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs so/_/dmag yan lag bzhi pa gang zhe na/_glang po 
[\[179a.5\]]che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs so/_/chas pa la zhes bya ba ni g.yul 'gyed par mngon par dga' ba la'o/_/ltar 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni rgyu gang gis so/_/de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na zhes bya ba ni rgyal po dang /_btsun 
[\[179a.6\]]mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_zhang blon dang /_khrom gyi ru sna dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_ljongs kyi mis bkug na'o/_/dge slong des zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/_/dmag de'i nang du zhes bya ba ni dmag chas pa de'i nang du'o/_/zhag gnyis tshun cad gnas par 
[\[179a.7\]]bya'o zhes bya ba ni zhag gnyis kyi mtha' tshun cad gnas par bya ba'o/_/de las lhag par gnas na zhes bya ba ni de las 'das par gnas na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]tu 'tshod par byed/_sreg par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji 
[\[179b.2\]]tsam du cung zad zhag gnyis las lhag par dmag gi nang na gnas na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_zhang blon dang /_khrom gyi ru sna dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_ljongs kyi mi na re 'dug shig ces zer ba la ltung ba med do/_/bar 
[\[179b.3\]]chad brgyad po dag las bar chad gang yang rung bas nye bar gnas par 'gyur na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i ltung byed de/_bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa 
[\[179b.4\]]rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ri brags pa de de lta na yang ma phebs nas/_ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/_khyim 
[\[179b.5\]]bdag khye'u dag mi dran nam/_lha khye'u dag ni mi dran te 'di ltar 'phags pa dag mthong bar 'tshal lo/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'phags pa dag mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes yi ge springs pa dang /_dge skos kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus 
[\[179b.6\]]su yi ge bklags te/_gang der 'gro bar spro ba des tshul shing long shig ces tshul shing brims pa dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag ni rgan po sbyor mi bzod pa dag yin pas der 'gro mi nus so/_/dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag gis smras pa 
[\[179b.7\]]der chos bstan par bya dgos na bdag cag ni thos pa nyung ba yin pas chos ston par ni mi nus na der chu brim par bya'am ci bdag cag kyang der 'gro mi nus so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' ji srid du bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing bdag cag gson pa de srid du bstan pa 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]gnas la/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing bdag cag dus la bab na bstan pa nub par brjod par bya ste/_ji srid du bdag cag gson pa de srid du bstan pa la gces pa bskyed par byas/_tshul shing blang ngo zhes de dag gis tshul shing 
[\[180a.2\]]blangs te der dong nas rgyal po la chos bstan pas rgyal po mngon par dad par byas so/_/btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dag dang /_zhang blon dang /_khrom gyi ru sna dag la yang chos bstan pas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon par dad par byas so/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po 
[\[180a.3\]]gsal rgyal gyis blon po rnams la smras pa/_deng la g.yul shoms shig dang ri brags pa bskor bar bya'o/_/de dag gis g.yul bsham par brtsams pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag gis yun ji srid du gzhan gyi spyod lam gyis 
[\[180a.4\]]gnas par bya/_rang gi spyod lam gyis gnas par byas/_gsus po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang /_dpung gi mchog dang /_g.yul bkod cing bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar byas 'dong ngo zhes de dag glang po che pa'i tshogs kyi gan du dong ste dris pa/_shes 
[\[180a.5\]]ldan dag ci byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bkod pa shom mo/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_bkren pa dag glang po che bcos ma 'di lta bu dag phyogs 'dir 'jog gam 'di sol cig ces de dag gis de dag gi mche ba dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro/_/
[\[180a.6\]]de dag rta pa'i tshogs kyi gan du dong ste dris pa/_shes ldan dag ci byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bkod pa shom mo/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_bkren pa dag rta theng po 'di lta bu dag phyogs 'dir 'jog gam 'di sol cig ces de dag gis de dag gi 
[\[180a.7\]]mjug ma dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro/_/de dag shing rta pa'i tshogs kyi gan du dong ste dris pa/_shes ldan dag ci byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bkod pa shom mo/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_bkren pa dag shing rta zhig pa 'di lta bu dag 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]phyogs 'dir 'jog gam 'di sol cig ces de dag gis de dag gi srog shing dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro/_/de dag dpung bu chung gi tshogs kyi gan du song ste dris pa/_shes ldan dag ci byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bkod pa shom mo/_/
[\[180b.2\]]drug sde dag gis smras pa/_bkren pa dag mi zhar ba'i 'di lta bu dag phyogs 'dir 'jog gam 'di sol cig ces de dag gis de dag gi gnya' ba dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro/_/drug sde dag de dag gi mdun logs su ri brags pa dang ha cang thag mi ring bar 'khod de blag 
[\[180b.3\]]cor gyis sgra phyung ba dang /_de dag gis bsams pa/_ri brags pa dag rdzong nas rlugs te byung ngo snyam du rig nas skrag cing sngangs te 'bros par brtsams pa dang /_drug sde dag myur ba myur bar dong ste/_khrom gyi ru sna'i mdun du 'khod nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 
[\[180b.4\]]'bros/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag ri brags pa dag rdzong nas rlugs te byung ngo /_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_bkren pa dag de ni kho bo cag gis ku re cung zhig byas pa yin te/_gal te ri brags pa dag gis khyed cag de ltar bred ngas par shes shing rig par 
[\[180b.5\]]gyur na nang par snga ba kho nar yang khyed cag gnya' ba dag nas btags te ri brags su khrid par 'gyur gyis ma 'jigs par phyir log shig_/de dag phyogs gcig tu dong ste sems khong du chud cing 'khod do/_/ji tsam na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'ongs nas des 
[\[180b.6\]]smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis da dung yang g.yul gyi bkod pa ma bshams sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha bdag cag rgyal bar ga la 'gyur/_'di ltar dge sbyong mgo reg ras yug chen glegs pa 'tshal ba 'di dag mchis nas bdag cag la tho 'tsham zhing 
[\[180b.7\]]mi mchi dgu mchi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_dge sbyong gang dag_/'phags pa drug sde dag go/_/shes ldan dag 'di dag ni dge sbyong hral po dag yin pas de dag gis smras pa khyed la ci gnod/_deng la g.yul gyi bkod pa shom shig_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/_
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]'di dag bdag la yang dang yang du tho 'tsham par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas mi zhig la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje tshur shog bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod 
[\[181a.2\]]pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis sam zhes snyun gsol la 'di skad ces btsun pa ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi mchid nas btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i tshe yang 
[\[181a.3\]]bshams pa 'khrug tu mchi zhing rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang /_dpung gi mchog dang /_g.yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar bgyid na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang gis 'phags pa dag shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i tshe 
[\[181a.4\]]yang bshams pa 'khrug tu mi mchi zhing /_rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang /_dpung gi mchog dang /_g.yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar bgyid par mi 'gyur bar dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes mchi'o zhes gsol cig_/mi des 
[\[181a.5\]]lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[181a.6\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par 
[\[181a.7\]]gnas sam/_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis sam zhes snyun gsol lo/_/kwa'i nang rje ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang khyed bde bar gyur cig_/btsun pa ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi mchid nas 'phags pa 'di dag shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]tshe yang bshams pa 'khrug tu mchi zhing /_rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang /_dpung gi mchog dang /_g.yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar bgyid na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang gis 'phags pa 'di dag shin tu yun ring por dmag gi 
[\[181b.2\]]nang na gnas pa'i tshe yang bshams pa 'khrug tu mi mchi zhing /_rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang /_dpung gi mchog dang /_g.yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar bgyid par mi 'gyur bar dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[181b.3\]]kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang ma gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di 
[\[181b.4\]]dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge 
[\[181b.5\]]slong dag khyed dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i tshe bshams pa 'khrug tu 'gro zhing /_rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang /_dpung gi mchog dang /_g.yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi 
[\[181b.6\]]tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[181b.7\]]dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong zhag gnyis dmag de'i nang na 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]gnas pa'i tshe yang gal te bshams pa 'khrug tu 'gro'am/_rgyal mtshan gyi mchog gam/_dpung gi mchog gam/_g.yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar byed na ltung byed do/_/dge slong zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[182a.2\]]zhag gnyis zhes bya ba ni zhag gnyis tshun chad do/_/dmag ces bya ba la dmag ni yan lag gcig pa yang yod/_yan lag gnyis pa yang yod/_yan lag gsum pa yang yod/_yan lag bzhi pa yang yod do/_/dmag yan lag gcig pa gang zhe na/_glang po che pa'i tshogs 
[\[182a.3\]]so/_/dmag yan lag gnyis pa gang zhe na/_glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs so/_/dmag yan lag gsum pa gang zhe na/_glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs so/_/dmag yan lag bzhi pa gang zhe na/_glang po che 
[\[182a.4\]]pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs so/_/de'i nang na gnas pa'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni 'dug pa'i tshe yang ngo /_/gal te bshams pa 'khrug tu 'gro'am zhes bya ba ni g.yul la chas pa 'khrug tu 'gro ba'o/_/rgyal mtshan 
[\[182a.5\]]gyi mchog ces bya ba ni rgyal mtshan rnam pa bzhi ste/_khyu mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang /_chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /_seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang /_klu'i rgyal mtshan no/_/dpung gi mchog ces bya ba ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ste/_glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_
[\[182a.6\]]rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs so/_/g.yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar byed na zhes bya ba la bshams pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_'bru'i kha lta bu dang /_shing rta'i dbyibs lta bu dang /_zla gam gyi rnam pa lta 
[\[182a.7\]]bu dang /_nam mkha' lding gi 'dab ma lta bu'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis glang po che go bskon pa'i bshams pa 'khrug par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/go ma bskon pa'i bshams 
[\[182b.2\]]pa 'khrug par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis rta go bskon pa'i bshams pa 'khrug par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/go ma bskon pa'i bshams pa 'khrug par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis shing rta bcas pa'i bshams pa 'khrug par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur 
[\[182b.3\]]ro/_/ma bcas pa'i bshams pa 'khrug par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dpung bu chung go bskon pa'i bshams pa 'khrug par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/go ma bskon pa'i bshams pa 'khrug par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong bshams pa 'khrug 
[\[182b.4\]]tu 'gro na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang /_dpung gi mchog dang /_g.yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar byed pa'i ltung byed kyang de bzhin no/_/bar chad brgyad po dag las bar chad gang yang rung ba nye bar gnas par gyur pa la ltung ba med do/_/
[\[182b.5\]]las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dpung gi yan lag nyams su myong bar byed pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi 
[\[182b.6\]]tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos nye ba 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu phyung /_rdzogs par bsnyen par byas pa de'i tshe na de dag drug sde dag la sten par byed/_
[\[182b.7\]]bsnyen par byed/_bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de nas 'char kas smras pa/_bcu bdun sde dag tshur sheg_/'di dang 'di gyis shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_ci khyod kho bo cag gi slob dpon yin nam mkhan po yin mi byed do/_/des glen pa dag khyed gzhan ci zhig byed ces de 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]dag las gcig brdegs pa dang /_de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag brdegs so/_/bdag cag brdegs so zhes phyis gan du 'gyel te ngu bar brtsams so/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ci'i phyir gzhon nu dag la rdeg par byed/_'char 
[\[183a.2\]]kas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bos gcig brdegs pa dang thams cad sa la 'gyel te ngu'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcu bdun sde dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gcig brdegs na ci'i phyir thams cad sa la 'gyel te ngu /_de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[183a.3\]]gal te ma ngus na thams cad rdeg par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la rdeg par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[183a.4\]]'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs 
[\[183a.5\]]pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa/_'char ka khyod khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la brdegs pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_
[\[183a.6\]]rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan 
[\[183a.7\]]yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]nas dge slong la rdeg na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni khros shing khro ba'i zil gyis non nas so/_/dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o/_/rdeg na zhes bya 
[\[183b.2\]]ba ni rdeg par byed na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags 
[\[183b.3\]]na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_nang gis zin pa dang /_phyi rol du 'phangs pa dang /_de gnyi ga dang ldan pas so/_/ji ltar nang gis zin pas she na/_dge slong khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma 
[\[183b.4\]]rangs nas dge slong la sor mo gcig gis rdeg par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sor mo gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_sor mo lngas rdeg par byed na ltung byed lngar 'gyur ro/_/khu tshur dang /_gru mo dang /_phrag pa dang /_mgo dang /_glo dang /_rgyab dang /_rked pa dang /_brla 
[\[183b.5\]]dang /_pus mo dang /_rje ngar dang /_tha na rkang pa'i mthe bos rdeg par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur te/_de ltar nang gis zin pas so/_/ji ltar phyi rol du 'phangs pas she na/_dge slong khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la mdas 'phen par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mdas 
[\[183b.6\]]ji lta ba de bzhin du lcags mda' dang /_mda' phyed lcags las byas pa dang /_mde'u ste'u ka ma dang /_mde'u be'u so lta bu dang /_mde'u zur bzhi ma dang /_mde'u ka ra bI ra'i 'dab ma lta bu dang /_mde'u bye'u snying ma dang /_'khor lo dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mtshon 
[\[183b.7\]]rtse gcig pa dang /_rgya shug gi tshig gu dang /_tha na yungs kar spar gang 'phen par byed na yungs kar ji snyed lus la phog pa de snyed kyi ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar ji snyed lus la ma phog pa de snyed kyi nyes byas su 'gyur te/_de ltar phyi rol du 'phangs pas so/_/ji ltar de gnyi ga 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]dang ldan pas she na/_dge slong khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la ral gris 'debs na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ral gris ji lta ba de bzhin du shang lang dang /_ral gri so gcig pa dang /_ral gri so gnyis pa dang /_mdung dang /_'phangs 
[\[184a.2\]]mdung dang /_chu gri dang /_rtsa'i nyag ma dang /_tha na phyags mas rdeg par byed na nyag ma ji snyed lus la phog pa de snyed kyi ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nyag ma ji snyed lus la ma phog pa de snyed kyi nyes byas su 'gyur te/_de ltar gnyi ga dang ldan pas so/_/brnangs pa dang /_thal lcag gis 
[\[184a.3\]]rig sngags sgrub par byed pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/rdeg pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed 
[\[184a.4\]]kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos nye ba 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu phyung /_rdzogs par bsnyen par byed pa de'i tshe na de dag drug sde dag la sten par byed/_
[\[184a.5\]]snyen par byed/_bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de nas 'char kas smras pa/_bcu bdun sde dag tshur sheg_/'di dang 'di gyis shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_ci khyod kho bo cag gi slob dpon yin nam mkhan po yin/_mi byed do/_/des glen pa dag khyed gzhan ci zhig byed ces de 
[\[184a.6\]]dag las gcig la brdeg par gzas pa dang /_de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag la brdeg par gzas so/_/bdag cag la brdeg par gzas so zhes phyis gan du 'gyel te ngu bar brtsams so/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ci'i phyir gzhon nu dag la 
[\[184a.7\]]brdeg par gzas/_'char kas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bos gcig la brdeg par gzas pa dang thams cad sa la 'gyel te ngu'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcu bdun sde dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gcig la brdeg par gzas na ci'i phyir thams cad sa la 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]'gyel te ngu /_de dag gis smras pa/_gal te ma ngus na gang la ci brdeg gtol med do/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la brdeg par gzas par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed 
[\[184b.2\]]pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin 
[\[184b.3\]]du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa/_'char ka khyod khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la brdeg par gzas pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[184b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams 
[\[184b.5\]]la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong 
[\[184b.6\]]gang khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la brdeg par gzas na tha na thal mos kyang rung ste ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni khros shing khro ba'i 
[\[184b.7\]]zil gyis non nas so/_/dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o/_/brdeg par gzas na zhes bya ba ni brdeg par bsham na'o/_/tha na thal mos kyang rung ste zhes bya ba ni tha na thal lcag tsam gzas kyang rung ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_yi 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]dgas ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[185a.2\]]de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_nang gis zin pa dang /_phyi rol du 'phangs pa dang /_de gnyi ga dang ldan pas so/_/ji ltar nang gis zin pas she na/_dge slong khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la sor mo gcig gis brdeg par gzas na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sor 
[\[185a.3\]]mo gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_sor mo lngas brdeg par gzas na ltung byed lngar 'gyur ro/_/khu tshur dang /_gru mo dang /_phrag pa dang /_mgo dang /_glo dang /_rgyab dang /_rked pa dang /_brla dang /_pus mo dang /_rje ngar dang /_tha na rkang pa'i mthe bos brdeg par gzas na 
[\[185a.4\]]ltung byed du 'gyur te/_de ltar na nang gis zin pas so/_/ji ltar phyi rol du 'phangs pas she na/_dge slong khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la mda' 'phen pa gzo bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mda' 'phen pa gzo ba ji lta ba de bzhin du lcags mda' dang /_mda' 
[\[185a.5\]]phyed lcags las byas pa dang /_mde'u ste'u ka ma dang /_mde'u be'u so lta bu dang /_mde'u zur bzhi ma dang /_mde'u ka ra bI ra'i 'dab ma lta bu dang /_mde'u bye'u snying ma dang /_'khor lo dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mtshon rtse gcig dang /_rgya shug gi tshig 
[\[185a.6\]]gu dang /_tha na yungs kar spar gang gzas par byed na yungs kar ji snyed gzas pa de snyed kyi ltung byed du 'gyur te/_de ltar phyi rol du 'phangs pas so/_/ji ltar de gnyi ga dang ldan pas she na/_dge slong khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la ral gris gdab par gzas 
[\[185a.7\]]par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ral gris ji lta ba de bzhin du shang lang dang /_ral gri so gcig pa dang /_ral gri so gnyis pa dang /_mdung dang /_'phangs mdung dang /_chu gri dang /_rtswa'i nyag ma dang /_tha na phyags mas brdeg pa gzas par byed na nyag ma ji snyed gzas pa de snyed kyi 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/phyags mas ji lta ba bzhin du thur ma'i chags pa dang /_thag pa'i chun pos brdeg pa gzas pa yang de bzhin te/_de ltar gnyi ga dang ldan pas so/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/
[\[185b.2\]]gzas pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dga' bo la lhan cig gnas pa'i dge slong chos zhes bya ba ngo tsha shes pa/_'gyod pa dang ldan pa/_bsdams 
[\[185b.3\]]pa/_bslab pa 'dod pa zhig yod pa des de ji srid du gnas ngan len kun du spyod par mi shes pa de srid du de dang lhan cig gnas so/_/gang gi tshe des de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par shes pa de'i tshe na de rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te/_bcom ldan 
[\[185b.4\]]'das kyi bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' zhig byed do/_/de de'i gan du song ste mkhan po gdugs la spyod du mchi'o zhes zhus pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]thos nas smras pa/_bu chos kho bo'i stan yang khyer la song shig_/ci slob dpon yang gdugs la spyod 
[\[185b.5\]]du bzhud dam/_glen pa khyod kyis kho bo la so sor brtag gam/_kho bos mi shes pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa gang yod/_bdag slob dpon la so sor rtogs par mi bgyid de/_'di ltar ci slob dpon yang gdugs la spyod du bzhud dam zhes zhu bar byas te gdan 'tshal te mchi'o/_/des 
[\[185b.6\]]de'i stan khyer te nyin mo spyod du song nas/_des de'i stan de shing ljon pa'i drung du bzhag ste dben pa'i phyogs su 'dug nas yid la byed pa bskyed par brtsams so/_/de'i 'og tu nye dga' 'ongs nas chos kyis thag ring po kho na nas de mthong nas smras pa/_slob dpon gdan shing ljon pa'i drung du 
[\[185b.7\]]bzhag gis der bzhud la bzhugs shig_/nye dga' der song nas mgo g.yogs te 'dug pa dang /_des der mos pa ma rnyed nas stan las langs te phyogs bzhir rnam par blta bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na bu mo zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rib ma dral ba mthong ba nas des chos la chos 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]rib ma 'dral bar byed do zhes bos pa dang /_chos kyis de la smras pa/_slob dpon rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi mdo dgongs shig_/glen pa khyod mdo sde'i mtha' la rton par gyur tam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi rtswa yang yal bar mi 'dor ro zhes ma gsungs sam/_
