[\[186a.2\]]kho bo rang nyid song la bzlog par bya'o/_/slob dpon nyid mkhyen no/_/nye dga' song ste smras pa/_bu mo khyod ci'i phyir rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rib ma 'dral bar byed/_bu mo des 'dzum phyung ba dang /_nye dga' de'i yan lag dang nying lag dag nas mnams te 'o byas nas/_de chos 
[\[186a.3\]]kyi gan du song ste dris pa/_bu chos khyod kyis cung zad mthong ngam/_slob dpon gzhug pa 'dzud pa 'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad mthong ngo /_/bu chos su la yang ma zer cig_/slob dpon ji srid du rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong ma mthong ba de srid kyi bar du su la yang mi 
[\[186a.4\]]mchi'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_kho bos khyod kyi mkhan po'i gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba 'chab par byed na khyod kho bo'i 'chab par mi byed dam/_chos kyis smras pa/_slob dpon khyod 'chab par mdzad kyang bdag ni 'chab par mi bgyid do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod 
[\[186a.5\]]pa dang /_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du dge slong gi gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba 'chab par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[186a.6\]]kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[186a.7\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod shes bzhin du dge slong gi gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba 'chab pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la 
[\[186b.2\]]nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du dge slong gi gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba 'chab na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong 
[\[186b.3\]]gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig pa'am/_gzhan dag gis brjod pas so/_/dge slong gi zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba zhes bya ba ni gnas ngan len gnyis te/_pham 
[\[186b.4\]]par 'gyur ba kun nas slong ba dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma kun nas slong ba'o/_/ci'i phyir de dag gnas ngan len ces bya zhe na/_ngo bo nyid dang kun nas slong ba las so/_/'chab na zhes bya ba ni mkhyud na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan 
[\[186b.5\]]song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar 
[\[186b.6\]]ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis dge slong pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la bcab pa'i sems skyed na ji srid du skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_skya rengs shar na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'byin pa 
[\[186b.7\]]mthong zhing de de la bcab pa'i sems skyed na ji srid du skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_skya rengs shar na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ltung byed kyi ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la bcab pa'i sems skyed na ji srid du skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]la skya rengs shar na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong so sor bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la bcab pa'i sems skyed na ji srid du skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_skya rengs shar na yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[187a.2\]]slong gis dge slong nyes byas kyi ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la bcab pa'i sems skyed na ji srid du skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_skya rengs shar na yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/bdag la gzhi 'dis bde ba la mi reg pa dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar 
[\[187a.3\]]chad du 'gyur na ltung ba med do/_/bdag la gzhi 'dis dge 'dun dbye ba dang /_dge 'dun 'khrugs pa dang /_dge 'dun gnyis su 'gyur ba dang /_dge 'dun tha dad par 'gyur na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis 
[\[187a.4\]]nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/gnas ngan len 'chab pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa drug pa/_sdom la/_bde dang me dang 'dun pa dang /_/rdzogs par ma bsnyen chos dang smras/_/dge tshul kha dog bsgyur 
[\[187a.5\]]ba dang /_/rin po che dang tsha ba'i dus/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dga' bo la lhan cig gnas pa dge slong chos zhes bya ba ngo tsha shes pa/_'gyod pa dang ldan pa/_bsdams pa/_bslab pa 
[\[187a.6\]]'dod pa zhig yod pa des ji srid du de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par mi shes pa de srid du de dang lhan cig gnas so/_/gang gi tshe des de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par shes pa de'i tshe na de rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[187a.7\]]bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' zhig byed do/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]dga' bo la smras pa/_slob dpon chos 'dis kho bo sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du tho btsams pa la ltos/_kho bos kyang 'di la nges par gnod pa cung zhig bya'o/_/
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]dga' bos smras pa/_dge slong 'di ni ngo tsha shes pa/_'gyod pa dang ldan pa/_bsdams pa/_bslab pa 'dod pa yin pas khyod kyis 'di la gnod pa ci zhig byar yod/_nges par 'di'i zan gcad par bya'o/_/de ni nus so/_/khyim bdag cig gis dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis zan 
[\[187b.2\]]la mgron du bos pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_deng chos 'di'i zan gcad par bya'o snyam mo/_/chos dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa/_mkhan po bdag bsod snyoms la mchi ba zhu'o/_/dga' bos smras pa/_chos kho bo cag deng khyim bdag cig gis zan la mgron du 
[\[187b.3\]]bos kyis tshur shog la 'di nyid du zan zo shig_/chos kyis smras pa/_bdag mkhan po dang lhan cig sngan cad mgron du bos pa 'ga'ang mchis sam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_chos kho bos gzhan thos la gzhan mthong ste/_kho bos ko khyod ngo tsha shes pa/_'gyod pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[187b.4\]]bsdams pa/_bslab pa 'dod pa yin par shes na khyod mkhan pos mi rung ba'i dngos po yang dag par 'dzin du bcug gam/_ci na gang gi phyir mkhan po'i chos dang ldan pa'i tshig gcod par byed/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba las slob dpon dang mkhan pos bsgo ba na khas blang bar 
[\[187b.5\]]bya'o/_/khas mi len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes ma gsungs sam/_de dge slong rab tu grags pas smad pas cang mi smra bar 'dug nas/_des smras pa/_lhung bzed dang chu tshags blangs te mchi'o/_/dga' bos smras pa/_der lhung bzed dang chu tshags kyis ci bya/_der snod bkrus 
[\[187b.6\]]pa las chu btsags pa dag 'thob kyis tshur shog 'dong ngo /_/chos de gnyis dang lhan cig 'phags pa dang bsod snyoms pa zhig gis mthong nas des smras pa/_chos gar 'gro/_mgron du bos par 'gro'o/_/zas kyi tshod shes par gyis shig_/chos kyis smras pa/_zan za bar 'gyur 
[\[187b.7\]]ram/_'on te zan bcad par 'gyur gtol med do/_/de de gnyis dang lhan cig mnyan yod du zhugs pa dang /_de gnyis srang du dong ste tshong khang du 'khod nas nye dga' khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste zan zos nas phyir 'ongs so/_/de'i 'og tu dga' bo yang khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]zan za zhing 'dug go/_/chos kyis nye dga' la smras pa/_slob dpon gdugs tshod la bab kyis bzhud do/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_der thams cad sta gon byas zin pas der song ste bza' ba las gzhan pa'i bya ba ci yang med kyis gdugs tshod kyi kha kho nar 'dong ngo /_/chos 
[\[188a.2\]]langs te rkang pa gnyis kyis grib tshod gzhal bar brtsams pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_glen pa khyod kho bo cag gi bslab pa la cung zad yid mi ches sam/_ci khyod kyis snying lam na kho bo cag dus ma yin par za bar 'gyur snyam mam/_kho bo la khyod dang lhan cig smra ba'am 'dug 
[\[188a.3\]]pa bde ba ma yin gyi 'di ltar kho bo gcig pu kho na smra'am 'dug na bdes khyod song shig_/chos kyis bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis lhung bzed dang chu tshags khyer te 'ongs par gyur na bdag bsod snyoms la rgyu bar 'gyur ba zhig na da ni ci byar yang med do snyam nas de gtsug lag khang du song 
[\[188a.4\]]ste/_ji srid du de'i lus la mdangs yod pa de srid du dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas nas/_gang gi tshe de'i lus las mdangs yal ba de'i tshe na glos phab ste nyal ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa chos gal te zan gzhan gyi yin zhes te lto yang gzhan gyi yin 
[\[188a.5\]]nam/_ci na ji tsam gyis dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed kyang mi nus pa de tsam gyi zan zos/_chos kyis smras pa/_sus zos/_khyod kyis ma zos sam/_ma zos so/_/ci'i phyir des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag ched du bsams te dge 
[\[188a.6\]]slong zan gcod du 'jud ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya 
[\[188a.7\]]ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod klan ka tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di la klan ka btsal bar 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]'gyur ro snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te dge slong la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog khyim dag tu 'dong dang der khyod la bca' ba dang /_bza' ba ji tsam 'dod pa sbyin du gzhug go zhes smras nas khyod kyis de la sbyin du ma bcug par de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bo la khyod 
[\[188b.2\]]dang lhan cig smra ba'am/_'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyis 'di ltar kho bo gcig pu kho na smra'am 'dug na bdes khyod song shig ces zer zhing zan gcod du 'jug pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma 
[\[188b.3\]]yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag 
[\[188b.4\]]par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang klan ka tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di la klan ka btsal 
[\[188b.5\]]bar 'gyur ro snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te/_dge slong la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog_/khyim dag tu 'dong dang der khyod la bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pa ji tsam 'dod pa sbyin du gzhug go zhes smras nas/_des de la sbyin du ma bcug par de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho 
[\[188b.6\]]bo la khyod dang lhan cig smra ba'am 'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyi/_'di ltar kho bo gcig pu kho na smra'am 'dug na bdes khyod song shig ces zer na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/klan ka tshol zhing ci 
[\[188b.7\]]nas kyang dge slong 'di la klan ka btsal bar 'gyur ro snyam pa zhes bya ba ni ci nas kyang dge slong 'di'i zan gcod du bcug par 'gyur ro snyam pa'o/_/de nyid rkyen du byas te zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o/_/dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o/_/'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]skad ces smras nas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog khyim dag tu 'dong dang zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu'o/_/der khyod la bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pa zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'o/_/ji tsam 'dod pa sbyin du gzhug go zhes smra 
[\[189a.2\]]nas zhes bya ba ni ci tsam gyis chog par ro/_/des de la sbyin du ma bcug par de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bo la khyod dang lhan cig smra ba'am 'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyis/_'di ltar kho bo gcig pu kho na smra'am/_'dug na bdes khyod song shig ces zer na zhes bya ba ni de 
[\[189a.3\]]skad ces zer na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing /_so sor ma 
[\[189a.4\]]bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad ched du bsams te dge slong gi zan gcod du 'jud na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nad pa'i byed du 'jud pa dang 
[\[189a.5\]]sman pas bstan pa byed du 'jud pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/zan gcod du 'jud pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[189a.6\]]'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/
[\[189a.7\]]mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[189b.2\]]bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_rjes su yi rang ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la 
[\[189b.3\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par byed/_yang dag par gzengs 
[\[189b.4\]]stod par byed/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed do/_/rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas cang mi smra'o/_/de nas mnyan yod 
[\[189b.5\]]pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis 
[\[189b.6\]]bzhes nas gang du gshegs par 'gyur/_shes ldan dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig_/btsun pa kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsnyen par dka' ba dang /_bzod par dka' ba lags pas bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu 
[\[189b.7\]]ba'i rngo mi thog go/_/shes ldan dag kho bo la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsnyen par dka' ba dang /_bzod par dka' ba nyid yin pas kho bos kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar mi nus so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo gal te btsun pa kun dga' bo la yang sangs 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsnyen par dka' ba dang /_bzod par dka' ba lags pas btsun pa kun dga' bos kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar mi spyod na btsun pa kun dga' bos mtshan ma'am/_bka' mchid kyis bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas 
[\[190a.2\]]par zhal gyis bzhes nas phyogs ga ge mor gshegs par 'gyur bar ji ltar mkhyen/_mtshan mas ni ji ltar/_bka' mchid kyis ni ji ltar mkhyen/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa'i phyogs gang du gshegs par bzhed pa'i phyogs de logs su 
[\[190a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das zhal gzigs shing bzhugs la de dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod par mdzad do/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das zhal gar gzigs shing bzhugs/_mi gang dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod par mdzad/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hAr 
[\[190a.4\]]zhal gzigs shing bzhugs la rgyal po'i khab pa'i mi dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod par mdzad do/_/de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te dong 
[\[190a.5\]]nas de dag gis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par 'gyur ro snyam nas de dag gis rgyal po'i khab tu 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes te dbyar gyi zla ba 
[\[190a.6\]]gsum po dag 'das nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ma ga d+hA dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ma ga d+hA 
[\[190a.7\]]dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa ma ga d+hA dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ma ga d+hA dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa ma ga d+hA dag tu 
[\[190b.2\]]ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyod cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ma ga d+hA dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo ba thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo 
[\[190b.3\]]bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod 
[\[190b.4\]]par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas mnyan 
[\[190b.5\]]yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab 
[\[190b.6\]]kyi bar ji tsam par bdag cag las na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas mnyan 
[\[190b.7\]]yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/de nas mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas mnyan 
[\[191a.2\]]yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das shul dag tu ji tsam du gshegs/_shes ldan dag 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po tsam du'o/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 
[\[191a.3\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos ji tsam du mchis/_shes ldan dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni lam dag tu rgyang grags bcur 'gro'o/_/de dag gis rgyang grags bcu bcur bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i tshogs dag bshams shing /_de dag gis 
[\[191a.4\]]zhal zas grang cha gang dag yin pa de dag ni de nyid kyi nyin mo sta gon byas/_drod bag gang dag yin pa de dag ni nyi ma re re zhing sta gon byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/_zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/_grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/_dbugs 
[\[191a.5\]]phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/_thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/_dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/_mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs 
[\[191a.6\]]kyis yongs su bskor ba/_glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor 
[\[191a.7\]]ba/_bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ded dpon ltar tshong 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs 
[\[191b.2\]]kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor 
[\[191b.3\]]ba/_nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_thags zangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_
[\[191b.4\]]dbang po rnams shin tu dul ba/_spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/_chu gter ltar ting nge ba/_sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/_glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus 
[\[191b.5\]]sku rnam par mdzes pa/_'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun du bzang ba/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po 
[\[191b.6\]]dang ldan pa/_kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_rta thul dang /_bzang ldan dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs pa nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[191b.7\]]rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te rgyal po'i khab ga la ba de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo don mthun gyi mdun du song ba dang /_ji tsam na lam kha brag mthong nas des bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs kyi bar du der bsdad do/_/
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod ci sdod/_btsun pa 'di ni shul kha brag lags te/_shul 'di ni drang la seng ge'i 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags/_shul 'di ni 'khyog la bde ba lags na shul gang 
[\[192a.2\]]nas mchi bar bgyi/_kun dga' bo lam drang po nas song shig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni seng ge'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shul drang po nas gshegs par brtsams nas ji tsam na lam de na ri brags shig yod pa der byon pa dang /_ri brags 
[\[192a.3\]]de nas byis pa khye'u gnyis shig lam kar 'ongs te rtse zhing 'dug go/_/de na gcig gi lag na ni rnga pa Ta ha thogs/_cig shos kyi lag na ni gzhu thogs so/_/de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs 
[\[192a.4\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i shul du gar gshegs/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das mi bsnyengs su gsol/_bdag cag gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bsel bgyi'o/_/de na dad pa skyes pa gcig gis ni rnga pa Ta ha brdungs/_dad pa skyes pa cig shos kyis ni gzhu 
[\[192a.5\]]bdungs te/_de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_khye'u 'di gnyis kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag skyed do snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khye'u gnyis phyir log 
[\[192a.6\]]shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni seng ge'i 'jigs pa bral ba yin no/_/de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis na gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[192a.7\]]ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas kha cig ni 'og logs su 'dong /_kha cig ni steng logs su 'dong bas gang dag 'og 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]logs su 'dong ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a 
[\[192b.2\]]chu zer dang /_ut+pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por dong ste/_sems can dmyal ba tsha ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab par byed la/_sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab par 
[\[192b.3\]]byed do/_/des sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag gang dag rgyun gcod par byed cing de dag 'di snyam du/_shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so/_/de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtang 
[\[192b.4\]]bar mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la/_gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te/_'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to snyam du sems 
[\[192b.5\]]so/_/de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do/_/gang dag steng logs su 'dong ba de dag ni 
[\[192b.6\]]rgyal chen bzhi pa dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_
[\[192b.7\]]dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_mi che dang /_mi gdung dang /_gya nom snang dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]stong pa dang /_bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrog par byed cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/_brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig rab tu 
[\[193a.2\]]bag yod par/_/chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba yang smras so/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi slad 
[\[193a.3\]]bzhin slad bzhin du rjes su 'dong ste/_de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su nub par 'gyur/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba 
[\[193a.4\]]lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur/_dud 'gror skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni long bur nub par 'gyur/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur/_mir skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mor nub par 'gyur/_stobs 
[\[193a.5\]]kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yon par nub par 'gyur/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yas par nub par 'gyur/_lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[193a.6\]]byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis 
[\[193a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi/_/tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgros nas byung gyur te/_/de yis 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]phyogs rnams thams cad snang bgyis pa/_/nyi gdugs bdal bar gyur pa ji bzhin no/_/yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa rab spangs pa/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par/_/rtsa lag dung 
[\[193b.2\]]ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/_/de slad ston pa rang blos dus mkhyen nas/_/thub pa khyu mchog dge sbyong skye dbang po/_/nyan pa'i skye bo som nyi ldan rnams la/_/the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang /_/dam pa dge ba dag gis bsal du gsol/_/tshwa chu'i ri rgyal lta 
[\[193b.3\]]bur brtan pa yi/_/sangs rgyas mgon rnams blo bur 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan rnams ji slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/skye bo'i tshogs rnams de ni nyan par 'tshal/_/btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/_rkyen ma 
[\[193b.4\]]mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_btsun pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[193b.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsel byas pa'i byis pa khye'u gnyis mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong ngo /_/kun dga' bo khye'u de gnyis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang /_legs par spyad 
[\[193b.6\]]pa 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum du log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing /_de gnyis lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyor cing 'khor nas srid pa tha ma dang /_gnas tha ma dang /_gzugs tha ma dang /_lus tha ma thob pa na las de nyid dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang /_legs par 
[\[193b.7\]]spyad pa de nyid kyis rab tu byung nas rang byang chub mngon du byed par 'gyur te/_gcig ni rang sangs rgyas rnga sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur/_cig shos ni rang sangs rgyas mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas shig tu mtshan mo gnas 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shing ljon pa yang rgan rims kyis bskor bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas drug sde dag gis shing ljon pa khong stong zhig thob nas/_de dag grang ba dag gis shing ljon pa khong stong de la me btang ba dang /_shing ljon pa 
[\[194a.2\]]khong stong de la sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa zhig gnas pa de du bas dkrugs nas steng gi yal ga la 'dzegs te 'phyang zhing 'dug go/_/drug sde dag gis de 'phyang zhing 'dug pa mthong nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_byung ngo byung ngo /_/don mthun gyis de thos nas bsams pa/_
[\[194a.3\]]seng ge byung ngo snyam nas don mthun skrag ste phyogs bzhir bros so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ci'i phyir don mthun 'di phyogs bzhir bros/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhugs shing ljon pa yang rgan rims kyis 
[\[194a.4\]]bskor bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/_drug sde dag gis zhugs shing ljon pa khong stong zhig thob nas de dag grang ba dag gis zhugs shing ljon pa khong stong de la zhugs btang ba dang /_zhugs shing ljon pa khong stong de la sbrul dug myur du khyab par bgyid pa zhig gnas pa de du bas dkrugs 
[\[194a.5\]]nas steng gi yal ga la 'dzegs te 'phyang zhing mchis pa drug sde dag gis mthong nas de dag gis byung ngo byung ngo zhes bgyis pa dang /_don mthun gyis de thos nas ci seng ge byung ngo snyam nas don mthun skrag ste phyogs bzhir bros so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song 
[\[194a.6\]]la don mthun la de bzhin gshegs pa ni seng ge'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin gyis/_phyir log shig ces bsgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas don mthun gyi gan du song ste/_shes ldan dag de bzhin gshegs 
[\[194a.7\]]pa ni seng ge'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin gyis/_phyir log shig ces smras nas de phyir log par gyur to/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa drug sde dag gis don mthun skrag par bgyis te/_phyogs bzhir bros pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]ba la gzigs/_dge slong dag da ltar du ma zad de/_'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di dag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs chen po skrag par byas te phyogs bzhir bros pa ngas dbugs phyung ste de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na mtshe'u zhig gi 'gram na shing 
[\[194b.2\]]bil ba'i tshal yod de/_shing bil ba'i tshal de na ri bong drug cig gnas so/_/shing bil ba'i tshal de nas shing bil ba zhig mtshe'u'i nang du rdib pa na sgra cal ces zer ba byung ngo /_/ri bong drug po de dag gis sgra de thos nas de dag lus chung bas skrag ste 'bros par brtsams so/_/
[\[194b.3\]]de dag 'bros pa wa dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/_ri bong dag gis smras pa/_cal cal zer ba byung ngo /_/de nas wa de dag gis kyang 'bros par brtsams so/_/de dag 'bros pa sbre dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes 
[\[194b.4\]]ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/_wa dag gis smras pa/_cal cal zer ba byung ngo /_/de nas sbre de dag gis kyang 'bros par brtsams so/_/de dag 'bros pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/_sbre dag gis smras pa/_cal cal 
[\[194b.5\]]zer ba byung ngo /_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag gis kyang 'bros par brtsams so/_/de dag 'bros pa phag dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag gis smras pa/_cal cal zer ba byung ngo /_/de nas phag dag gis kyang 'bros par 
[\[194b.6\]]brtsams so/_/de dag 'bros pa ma he dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/_phag dag gis smras pa/_cal cal zer ba byung ngo /_/de nas ma he dag gis kyang 'bros par brtsams so/_/de dag 'bros pa bse dag gis mthong nas de dag 
[\[194b.7\]]gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/_ma he dag gis smras pa/_cal cal zer ba byung ngo /_/de nas bse de dag gis kyang 'bros par brtsams so/_/de dag 'bros pa glang po che dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/_bse 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]dag gis smras pa/_cal cal zer ba byung ngo /_/de nas glang po che de dag gis kyang 'bros par brtsams so/_/de dag 'bros pa dom dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/_glang po che dag gis smras pa/_cal cal zer ba 
[\[195a.2\]]byung ngo /_/de nas dom de dag gis kyang 'bros par brtsams so/_/de dag 'bros pa dred dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/_dom dag gis smras pa/_cal cal zer ba byung ngo /_/de nas dred de dag gis kyang 'bros par brtsams so/_/
[\[195a.3\]]de dag 'bros pa gung dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/_dred dag gis smras pa/_cal cal zer ba byung ngo /_/de nas gung de dag gis kyang 'bros par brtsams so/_/de dag 'bros pa stag dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes 
[\[195a.4\]]ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/_gung dag gis smras pa/_cal cal zer ba byung ngo /_/de nas stag de dag gis kyang 'bros par brtsams so/_/de dag 'bros pa seng ge dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/_stag dag gis smras pa/_cal 
[\[195a.5\]]cal zer ba byung ngo /_/de nas seng ge de dag gis kyang 'bros par brtsams so/_/ji tsam na ri drung dang nye ba zhig na seng ge ral pa can cod pan lta bu dang ldan pa zhig 'dug pa des seng ge de dag 'bros pa mthong nas/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag_/khyed cag thams cad ni sder 
[\[195a.6\]]mo'i stobs can dang /_mche ba'i stobs can sha stag yin na ci'i phyir 'bros/_seng ge de dag gis smras pa/_cal cal zer ba byung ngo /_/shes ldan dag cal cal zer ba de ga las byung /_bdag gis kyang cal cal zer ba ga las byung mi shes so/_/seng ge des smras pa/_
[\[195a.7\]]shes ldan dag ma 'bros shig dang /_cal cal zer ba ga las byung ba brtag par bya'o zhes des stag dag la rmas pa/_khyed cag la sus smras/_stag dag gis smras pa/_gung dag gis so/_/des gung dag la rmas pa/_khyed cag la sus smras/_gung dag gis smras pa/_
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]dred dag gis so/_/des dred dag la rmas pa/_khyed cag la sus smras/_dred dag gis smras pa/_dom dag gis so/_/des dom dag la rmas pa/_khyed cag la sus smras/_dom dag gis smras pa/_glang po che dag gis so/_/des glang po che dag la rmas pa/_khyed cag 
[\[195b.2\]]la sus smras/_glang po che dag gis smras pa/_bse dag gis so/_/des bse dag la rmas pa/_khyed cag la sus smras/_bse dag gis smras pa/_ma he dag gis so/_/des ma he dag la rmas pa/_khyed cag la sus smras/_ma he dag gis smras pa/_phag dag gis so/_/
[\[195b.3\]]des phag dag la rmas pa/_khyed cag la sus smras/_phag dag gis smras pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag gis so/_/des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag la rmas pa/_khyed cag la sus smras/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag gis smras pa/_sbre dag gis so/_/des sbre dag la rmas pa/_khyed cag la sus smras/_sbre 
[\[195b.4\]]dag gis smras pa/_wa dag gis so/_/des wa dag la rmas pa/_khyed cag la sus smras/_wa dag gis smras pa/_ri bong dag gis so/_/des ri bong dag la rmas pa/_khyed cag la sus smras/_ri bong dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis 'jigs pa de mngon sum du 
[\[195b.5\]]mthong gis tshur shog dang cal cal zer ba de ga las byung ba bstan par bya'o zhes de dag gis seng ge de khrid de shing bil ba'i tshal de bstan nas cal cal zer ba de 'di nas byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /_ji tsam na shing bil ba'i tshal de nas yang bil ba zhig mtshe'u de'i nang du rdib pa na sgra 
[\[195b.6\]]cal ces zer ba byung nas seng ge des smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ni cal ba yin gyis ma 'jigs shig ces thams cad dbugs phyung ba dang /_lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_rab tu grags pas 'gro mi bya/_/bdag nyid kyis ni mngon sum bya/_/bil ba rdib pas 
[\[195b.7\]]nags tshal ni/_/rkang bzhi med par byas la ltos/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na seng ge ral pa can cod pan lta bu dang ldan pa gang gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs chen po skrag pa phyogs bzhir bros pa dag dbugs phyung bar gyur pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na ri bong drug po 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]gang dag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs chen po skrag par byas pa de dag ni drug sde dag yin te/_dge slong dag de ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di dag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs chen po skrag par byas te phyogs bzhir bros pa ngas dbugs phyung la/_da ltar yang 'di dag gis 
[\[196a.2\]]don mthun skrag par byas te phyogs bzhir bros pa ngas dbugs phyung ngo /_/'di ni re zhig byung ba yin te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' 
[\[196a.3\]]stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la don mthun la khyed cag las gang yang don mthun gyi mdun du ma 'gro shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid don mthun gyi mdun du gshegs so zhes bsgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las 
[\[196a.4\]]mnyan nas don mthun gyi gan du song te smras pa/_shes ldan dag de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/_khyed cag las gang yang don mthun gyi mdun du ma 'gro shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid don mthun gyi mdun du gshegs so zhes byung ngo zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas de bzhin 
[\[196a.5\]]gshegs pa nyid don mthun gyi mdun du gshegs pa dang /_ji tsam na seng ge ral pa can cod pan lta bu dang ldan pa zhig rngam ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dor cing byung ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du seng ge ral pa can cod pan lta bu dang ldan pa lnga 
[\[196a.6\]]sprul pa mdzad nas/_des de dag gi dri tshor nas skrag ste 'bros par brtsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir me sprul pa mdzad do/_/seng ge des phyogs bzhir 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur cing 'bar bar mthong zhing bcom 
[\[196a.7\]]ldan 'das nyid kyi zhabs kyi drung 'ba' zhig na zhi bar mthong nas/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung dang /_dra bas 'brel ba/_bsod nams brgya phrag du ma las 'khrungs pa/_
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas mgo la byugs te bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod sngon gyi nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te/_khyod da ltar drag shul can lag pa dmar bsnun pa dang rab tu snun pa la zhugs pa/_gzhan gyi srog 
[\[196b.2\]]'phrog pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod du 'jud pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed pa yin pas khyod 'di nas shi 'phos pa'i 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur/_skye ba ni cir 'gyur/_tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/_/chos thams cad 
[\[196b.3\]]ni bdag med pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes tshig gsum gyi chos bstan nas/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod nga la sems mngon par dad par gyis shig dang /_des dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag seng ge de la reg 
[\[196b.4\]]par byed pa na de sgra 'byin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed seng ge la ma reg shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag seng ge ni bzod par dka' ba dang /_bsnyen par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag de lta 
[\[196b.5\]]bas na dge slong gis seng ge la reg par mi bya'o/_/dge slong seng ge la reg par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshig gsum gyi chos thos nas zas za bar byed 
[\[196b.6\]]pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas de zas mi za ba la zhugs so/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi me ni rno ba yin pas/_de bkres pas nyam dmas pa na bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas nas dus la bab pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha 
[\[196b.7\]]rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/_gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis skyes pa'o/_/de dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pas skyes par mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon seng ge lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bsten te/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur 
[\[197a.2\]]bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon seng ge lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te/_do shal dang /_
[\[197a.3\]]se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste/_kha dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la phab pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon 
[\[197a.4\]]par gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_'di ltar sngon seng ge lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon seng 
[\[197a.5\]]ge lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas sngon seng ge lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa 
[\[197a.6\]]de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtog par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha 
[\[197a.7\]]rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/yang smras pa/_khyod mthus rab drag 
[\[197b.2\]]nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/_/ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i/_/mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/_/shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/_/de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing /_/go 'phang zhi ba 'phags 
[\[197b.3\]]pa dgyes thob ste/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur/_/'gro bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/_/srid pa stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa/_/thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/_/de nas gdung byas do shal rab 'phyang bas/_/zhabs 
[\[197b.4\]]la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas/_/dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/_/lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song /_/de nas sngon seng ge lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /_zhing pa lo thog 'byor pa lta bu dang /_dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal 
[\[197b.5\]]ba lta bu dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur gyur te cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang /_nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa 
[\[197b.6\]]de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas the tshom za ba'i yid kyis mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i dbang 
[\[197b.7\]]po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'am/_lha'i bu 'byor pa che ba/_mthu che ba gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du nye bar mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa nga la blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ongs pa 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]yang ma yin/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin/_lha'i bu 'byor pa che ba/_mthu che ba gzhan yang ma yin te/_dge slong dag 'di ltar khyed kyis ngas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge gang la tshig gsum gyi chos bstan pa de 
[\[198a.2\]]mthong ngam/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/dge slong dag de de nas shi 'phos te rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas de mdang sum nga'i gan du 'ongs te/_ngas de la chos bstan nas des bden pa mthong ste rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams 
[\[198a.3\]]cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sngon seng ge lha'i bus las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas seng ge rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur/_las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur/_las 
[\[198a.4\]]ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon seng ge lha'i bu nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung 
[\[198a.5\]]bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas sngon seng ge lha'i bus las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 
[\[198a.6\]]'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed 
[\[198a.7\]]na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de dge slong nyi khris bskor cing grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar 
[\[198b.2\]]rten cing bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na bram ze 'khor shin tu mang ba/_rig byed dang /_rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol du son pa/_yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams kyi ston par gyur 
[\[198b.3\]]pa zhig 'dug pa de 'jig rten thams cad kyis shin tu bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_rjed par byas/_mchod par byas so/_/gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'jig rten du byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe na de la phyin cad 'ga' yang bkur stir mi byed/_bla mar mi 
[\[198b.4\]]byed/_rjed par mi byed/_mchod par mi byed do/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston par mdzad pa na bram ze 'khor shin tu mang po de phyogs de nas song ba dang /_bram ze des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 
[\[198b.5\]]'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang smras pa/_dge sbyong 'di ni seng ge bzhin du 'jigs pa med pa dang /_bag tsha ba med par 'khor la chos ston par byed la/_nyan thos 'di dag ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phra mo dag bzhin du chos nyan par byed 
[\[198b.6\]]do/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de gsan to/_/gsan nas kyang bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze khyod kyis ngag gi las rtsub po smras kyis/_nyes pa nyes pa'i sgo nas shogs shig dang /_de lta na khyod kyi las de srab pa nyid dang /_yongs su zad 
[\[198b.7\]]pa dang /_yongs su mthar thug par 'gyur ro/_/bram ze des nyes pa nyes pa'i sgo nas bshags te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs so/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gi yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la seng ge zhes brjod pas/_kun du spyad pa gang yin pa de ni sngon seng ge lha'i bu 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la seng ge zhes brjod pas kun du spyad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar 
[\[199a.2\]]seng ge rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur nas da ltar gyi bar du yang seng ge rnams kyi nang du yang skyes par gyur to/_/'dis nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni shi zhing dus la bab nas/_rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/'dis yang 
[\[199a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni nga'i spyan sngar bden pa dag mthong zhing /_des bden pa dag mthong nas rang gi gnas su phyin to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las 
[\[199a.4\]]gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa 
[\[199a.5\]]rnams dang /_'dren ma rnams spangs te las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hA dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan 
[\[199a.6\]]da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i dus na drug sde dag gis mes gzhan la gtong bas rtse bar byed cing /_zla ba yang byed/_nyi ma yang byed/_mgal me'i 'khor lo yang byed nas gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni mes gzhan la gtong bas 
[\[199a.7\]]rtse bar byed cing /_zla ba yang byed/_nyi ma yang byed/_mgal me'i 'khor lo yang byed de/_byis pa khye'u 'di dag kyang mes gzhan la gtong bas rtse bar byed cing /_zla ba yang byed/_nyi ma yang byed/_mgal me'i 'khor lo yang byed na/_shes ldan dag byis pa khye'u 'di dag 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]dang /_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag la bye brag ni ci yod/_bsam pa ni ci yod/_tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod/_su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge 
[\[199b.2\]]slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed 
[\[199b.3\]]par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed mes gzhan la gtong bas rtse bar byed cing /_zla ba yang byed/_nyi ma yang byed/_mgal me'i 'khor lo yang byed pa bden nam/_btsun 
[\[199b.4\]]pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas 
[\[199b.5\]]rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 
[\[199b.6\]]'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang me la reg gam/_reg tu 'jud na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do/_/dge slong dag phyin cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten 
[\[199b.7\]]dag la bdug spos kyang gsol bar mi byed/_mar me yang sbar bar mi byed/_slob dpon dang mkhan po dag la yang chu dron 'bul bar mi byed/_lhung bzed kyi las kyang mi byed/_tshon gyi las kyang mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]mdzad pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge slong dag phyin cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la bdug spos kyang gsol bar mi byed/_mar me yang sbar bar 
[\[200a.2\]]mi byed/_slob dpon dang mkhan po dag la yang chu dron 'bul bar mi byed/_lhung bzed kyi las kyang mi byed/_tshon gyi las kyang mi byed/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar yang dge slong gang me la reg gam/_reg tu 'jud na ltung byed do zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos 
[\[200a.3\]]rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pas dge slong de dag slan cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang /_sen mo'i mchod rten dag la bdug spos kyang gsol bar mi bgyid/_mar me yang sbar bar mi bgyid/_slob dpon dang mkhan po dag la yang chab dron 'bul bar mi 
[\[200a.4\]]bgyid/_lhung bzed kyi las kyang mi bgyid/_tshon gyi las kyang mi bgyid do/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag gis ji ltar dus byin gyis brlab par bya ba mi 
[\[200a.5\]]shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ston pa dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba'i don nyid kyis dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag lhung bzed kyi 
[\[200a.6\]]las dang /_tshon gyi las dag byed pa na yang dang yang du brjed ngas pas me la reg nas de dag 'gyod pa skyes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dus yun ring du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/dge slong 
[\[200a.7\]]zhig na zhing rlung nad can du gyur nas de sman pa'i gan du song ste dris pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo la sman ston cig_/'phags pa zhugs sten cig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad do/_/'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can lags pas 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]'di ltar de nyid rkyen du mdzad nas rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na na ba'i dus ma gtogs so/_/
[\[200b.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong 
[\[200b.3\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni rjes su gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang mi na bar bdag nyid kyi phyir me la reg gam/_reg tu 'jud 
[\[200b.4\]]na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/mi na bar zhes bya ba ni na ba bzhag ste'o/_/bdag nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi ched du'o/_/me la reg gam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/_/reg tu 'jud na zhes bya ba ni 
[\[200b.5\]]gzhan no/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na 
[\[200b.6\]]dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis mes gzhan la gtong bas rtse bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/zla ba byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mgal 
[\[200b.7\]]me'i 'khor lo byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong me sbar bar byed na des dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/dus byin gyis ma brlabs par sbar bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong me gsod par byed na des dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/dus byin gyis ma brlabs par 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]gsod par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong bud shing skul bar byed dam/_bud shing 'dren par byed na des dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/dus byin gyis ma brlabs par bud shing skul bar byed dam/_'dren par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma dag 
[\[201a.2\]]ma spung bar byed dam/_mdag ma 'dru bar byed na des dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/dus byin gyis ma brlabs par mdag ma spung bar byed dam/_'dru bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong me ma mur spung bar byed dam/_'dru bar byed na des dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/dus 
[\[201a.3\]]byin gyis ma brlabs par me ma mur spung bar byed dam/_'dru bar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mer skra dang /_spu dang /_rus pa dang /_sen mo dag 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mer mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang /_rlugs pa dag 
[\[201a.4\]]'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/me la reg pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa bdun 
[\[201a.5\]]pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni kau shAm+bIr song 
[\[201a.6\]]ste yid dal du 'dug pa dang /_'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis dus la bab pa dang /_dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang na gnas pa de'i tshe na bcu bdun sde dag gdug pa dang pha rol gnon par gyur cing /_mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa 
[\[201a.7\]]yang yin pas de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag yun ring po nas drug sde dag gis tho btsams te/_ji ltar dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis tho btsams pa ltar yang gzhan dag gis tho ma btsams la/_ji ltar nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]tho btsams pa ltar yang dga' bos tho 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]ma btsams kyis tshur shog_/de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/de na gcig gis smras pa/_phu nu bo dag de'i phu nu bo dga' bo rtsod pa la mkhas pas bdag cag gis nye dga' gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya bar mi nus so/_/de brel ba bskyed par bya'o zhes de dag dga' bo'i 
[\[201b.2\]]gan du song ste smras pa/_gnas brtan phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag a rog gya/_gnas brtan gyi chos gos dag dri ma can du gyur to/_/bu dag kho bo rgas par gyur pas dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag gis kyang rgas pa'i phyir brnyas te phyin chad chos 
[\[201b.3\]]gos kyi las byed du mi btub bo/_/bdag cag gis gnas brtan gyi chos gos dag bkru bar bgyi yis chos gos dag tshur stsol/_dga' bos bcu bdun sde dag la chos gos dag byin no/_/de dag gis yang smras pa/_gnas brtan chos gos dag cig car bkrus chos gos thams 
[\[201b.4\]]cad tshur stsol/_dga' bo rnyang rnying dag gyon te chos gos thams cad bcu bdun sde dag la byin no/_/bcu bdun sde dag gis chos gos de dag 'gyur byed kyis btsal nas gnas mal bshams te/_gaN+DI brdungs nas dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa/_gnas brtan dge 'dun gyi bya ba 
[\[201b.5\]]cung zhig mchis te/_gaN+DI brdungs kyis tshur spyon/_dga' bos smras pa/_bu dag kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du ji ltar 'gro bar bya/_dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la 'dun pa 'bul lo/_/de nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na dge 
[\[201b.6\]]slong gleng ba po rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste nye dga' la rmas pa/_btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis bcu bdun sde dag gi lto dral te rgyu ma dag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i tshig smras pa gang yin pa de dran nam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag rma sos pa dag dral te ci bya/_de ni 
[\[201b.7\]]'das pa'i don yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i dus kho na las brtsams te 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do zhes de dag gis nye dga' la gya tshom du nan gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so/_/nye dga' gnas 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]nas dbyung ba'i las byas nas phu bo dga' bo'i gan du song ste ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_dga' bos smras pa/_nye dga' ci'i phyir ngu /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_lhung bzed nag po can dag gis kho bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so/_/dga' bos smras pa/_gang 
[\[202a.2\]]dag gis kho bo'i nu bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa de dag grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang /_khams gsum nas gnas nas phyung bar gyur cig_/'on kyang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa rnams la grong dang /_grong khyer med dam ci sdod cig dang bzod pa gsol bar 
[\[202a.3\]]bya'o/_/'di ltar de dag gis mi mthun pa kho nar las byas so/_/gang zhig der ma 'dus/_kho bo'o/_/slob dpon gyis der 'dun pa phul lo/_/ci kho bos bdag gi nu bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed par shes sam/_kho bo dge 'dun gyi bya ba de lta bu la 'dun pa mi 'bul gyis 
[\[202a.4\]]kho bos 'dun pa ma phul lo/_/kho bos 'dun pa nyes par phul lo/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la dge slong la 'dun pa phul nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas spong ba'i chos su byed cing 'di skad ces dge 
[\[202a.5\]]slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig_/khyod la mi sbyin no zhes zer zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la 
[\[202a.6\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la rmas pa/_dga' bo khyod dge 
[\[202a.7\]]'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la dge slong la 'dun pa phul nas/_de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas spong ba'i chos su byed cing 'di skad ces dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig_/khyod la mi sbyin no zhes zer ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/_dge slong 
[\[202b.2\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_
[\[202b.3\]]yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la dge slong la 'dun pa phul nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas spong ba'i chos su byed cing 'di skad ces dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig_/khyod la mi sbyin no zhes zer na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong 
[\[202b.4\]]gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu dga' bo'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o/_/bya ba chos dang ldan pa la zhes bya ba ni las chos dang ldan pa la'o/_/dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa 
[\[202b.5\]]la'o/_/'dun pa phul nas zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa byin nas so/_/de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o/_/khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni khros shing khro ba'i zil gyis non nas so/_/spong ba'i chos su byed cing zhes bya ba ni bsnyon pa'i chos su byed 
[\[202b.6\]]cing ngo /_/'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o/_/dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig_/khyod la mi sbyin no zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_
[\[202b.7\]]log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la dge slong la 'dun pa phul nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas spong ba'i chos su byed cing 'di skad ces dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig_/khyod la mi sbyin no zhes zer na thams cad du ltung 
[\[203a.2\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/'dun pa phyir sgyur ba'i ltung byed de lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//bar sdom la/_chos nyan pa dang sgra can zin/_/na dang dge slong 
[\[203a.3\]]sdig can la/_/don mthun gnyis su byas pa dang /_/mdun du btud dang dge tshul lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gtsug lag khang du lhags 
[\[203a.4\]]nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/_'phags pa dag chos bstan du gsol/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar deng shig dang /_bcom ldan 'das khyed cag la chos ston par mdzad do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags 
[\[203a.5\]]pa dag ston pa nyag gcig tu bas pas re zhig lha rnams la chos ston par mdzad dam/_'on te klu rnams la'am/_gnod sbyin rnams la'am/_mi rnams la chos ston par mdzad sus 'tshal gyis/_khyed cag gis kyang chos bstan du gsol/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom 
[\[203a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis kyang chos bstan par bya bar gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis kyang chos 
[\[203a.7\]]bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag nyin mo chos ston par byed do/_/de na gang dag bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba de dag ni nyin mo chos mnyan nas mtshan mo rtsol ba'i 'bras bus 'tsho ba rnams la shes ldan dag 'phags pa dag chos snyan pa snyan pa ston par mdzad cing sbrang 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]rtsi byed pa'i sbrang bu bzhin du chos sbrang rtsi lta bu ston cing stobs par mdzad do zhes rjod par byed do/_/rtsol ba'i 'bras bus 'tsho ba dag gis smras pa/_khyed cag las gang dag chos nyan pa de dag gi sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no/_/'o na khyod cag kyang ci'i phyir 
[\[203b.2\]]chos nyan par mi byed/_khyed cag ni bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba dag yin pas nyin mo chos nyan par byed kyi/_kho bo cag ni rtsol ba'i 'bras bus 'tsho ba dag yin pas gal te nyin mo las dag ma byas na ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur/_gal te 'phags pa dag mtshan mo chos ston 
[\[203b.3\]]par 'gyur na de lta na bdag cag gis kyang chos mnyan par bya'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtshan mo chos bstan par bya'o/_/de dag mtshan mo thams cad kho nar chos ston par byed cing de 
[\[203b.4\]]dag ngal ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtshan thams cad kho nar chos bstan par mi bya'o/_/de dag nam phyed kyi bar du chos ston par byed pa na de lta na yang ngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshes brgyad dang /_tshes bcu bzhi la chos bstan 
[\[203b.5\]]par bya'o/_/de dag tshes brgyad dang /_tshes bcu bzhi la chos ston par byed pa na bsod snyoms pa zhig gtsug lag khang du chos nyan du 'ongs nas dge slong rnams kyis nam phyed kyi bar du chos bstan pa dang /_bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa/_da ni 'gro ba'i dus ma yin gyis 'di 
[\[203b.6\]]nyid du 'dug par bya'o zhes de mtha' gcig tu song nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/der lhags pa'i khyim pa de dag kyang de nyid du nyal nas dge skos kyis mar me bsad par brtsams pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa zhugs mar ma dgum zhig dang bdag cag gis 
[\[203b.7\]]'bru mar dbul lo/_/dge skos kyis mar me gsos te song nas khyim pa de dag de na 'khod cing de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa che ge mo zhig gis ni chos snyan pa snyan pa dag bstan to/_/'phags pa che ge mo zhig gis ni chos ches snyan pa snyan pa dag bstan to zhes zer ro/_/de na dge slong 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]rgan zhugs brjed ngas pa zhig nyal ba des rmi lam na sngon gyi rnying pa dang lhan cig nyal bar rmi nas des ci dang ci dag cig brdol bar brtsams pa dang /_khyim pa de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyim pa ci dang ci dag brdol ba 'di su yin zhes de dag gis de bskyod 
[\[204a.2\]]par brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na rgan zhugs de phyis gan du nyal zhing ci dang ci dag brdol ba mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgan po rnams kyi gnas skabs kyang re zhig 'di 'dra na 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba gzhon nu dag yin pas 'di dag gi gnas skabs ji lta bur 'gyur zhes 
[\[204a.3\]]ma dad pa go bar byed do/_/bsod snyoms pa de nang par sngar langs te dgon pa'i gnas su song ba dang /_dge slong spong ba pa dag gis de mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa ji lta tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chos snyan pa snyan pa dag bstan cing skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon 
[\[204a.4\]]par dad par byas sam/_des smras pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chos snyan pa snyan pa dag bstan pas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs te por mngon par dad par byas so/_/rgan zhugs shig gis ni skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon par ma dad par byas so/_/ji ltar gyur/_
[\[204a.5\]]des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/_dge slong rnams rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig nyal bar byed pa dang /_snang 
[\[204a.6\]]ba la nyal bar byed pa las gyur to snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig nyal bar mi bya zhing /_snang ba la yang nyal bar mi bya'o/_/nyal bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni re zhig 
[\[204a.7\]]byung ba yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la dge tshul sgra can zin dang /_skul byed ces bya ba gnyis yod de/_dge slong blo bur du 'ongs pa zhig 'ongs pa na tshe dang ldan 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]pa sgra can zin nyin mo spyod du song ba'i gtsug lag khang du dge slong blo bur du 'ongs pa de'i gtsug lag khang du bskos nas dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyi lhung bzed dang chos gos phyi rol du phyung ste mtha' gcig tu bzhag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin nyin mo spyod pa nas phyir 
[\[204b.2\]]'ongs pa dang /_ji tsam na rang gi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos phyi rol du phyung ste mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa mthong nas de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/ji tsam na dge tshul skul byed 'ongs nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/sgra 
[\[204b.3\]]can zin gyis smras pa/_kho bo nyin mo spyod du song ba'i gtsug lag khang dge slong blo bur du 'ongs pa'i gtsug lag khang du bskos nas des kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos phyi rol du phyung ste mtha' gcig tu bzhag na sprin kha dog lnga pa 'dus pas kho bo dang mal gang du bsham par bya ba mi 
[\[204b.4\]]shes so/_/skul byed kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug tu yod/_gar yang rung bar nyol cig_/sgra can zin gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa skul byed khyod ni rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba yin pas lo ma ma yin pa'i spyil bu sprul te 
[\[204b.5\]]mal 'cha' bar byed mod/_kho bos ji ltar bya/_de'i tshe na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi snam phyi sa spos kyi byug pas bskus nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis bsams pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dus ma yin par bshang 
[\[204b.6\]]ba mdzad par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gnas med cing skabs ma yin gyis song la der nyal bar bya'o snyam nas de der song ste/_snam phyi sa'i zhabs rten la mgo bzhag ste nyal lo/_/de'i mtshan mo sprin kha dog lnga pa 'dus nas des char 'bab par brtsams pa dang /_snam phyi sa de dang 
[\[204b.7\]]ha cang thag mi ring ba na sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa'i gtso bo zhig gi tshang 'dug pa der char bab pa'i chus gang nas/_sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa'i gtso bo de bcom ldan 'das kyi snam phyi sa ga la ba der 'phags so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]ba'i chos nyid can yin pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gal te sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa'i gtso bo des sgra can zin rnyed par gyur na ming gi lhag ma tsam las par byed par 'gyur te/_shAkya nga rgyal can dag gal te gzhon nu sgra can zin bzang po 
[\[205a.2\]]rab tu byung bar ma gyur na/_rgyal po dngos brtsan par 'gyur ba zhig na/_de rab tu byung nas mgon med pa'i bya bas dus la bab bo zhes ma dad pa go bar byed par 'gyur bar thugs su chud nas glang po che'i sna 'dra ba'i phyag brkyang ste sgra can zin blangs nas nyid kyi gzims mal du bsnyal te 
[\[205a.3\]]bzhag go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig gnas gcig na gzims par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgung la 'chag pa dang bzhugs pa gnyis kyis shas cher mtshan mo 'da' bar mdzad do/_/
[\[205a.4\]]dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag nang par sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni gal te 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar bzhed na de'i tshe dge slong ma 'ongs pa 
[\[205a.5\]]rnams la ni gzhes par mdzad la/_dge slong 'ongs pa rnams ni phyir gtong bar mi mdzad pas/_tshe dang ldan pa skul byed bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal du song ba dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin bcom ldan 'das kyi gzims mal na nyal ba mthong ngo /_/
[\[205a.6\]]mthong nas kyang se gol gyi sgras tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin sad par byas te smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin khyod gang du nyal/_de sad pa dang ji tsam na bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi gzims mal na nyal bar mthong nas de myur ba myur ba kho nar langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi gzims mal 
[\[205a.7\]]nas babs pa dang /_skul byed kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gal te khyod la bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgongs su zin na sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa'i gtso bos khyod ming gi lhag ma tsam las par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge tshul 'di dag la ni ma yang med/_pha yang med/_byams pa dang mdza' bshes kyi tshogs gzhan 'ga' yang med de/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa khyed cag 'ba' zhig tu zad cing 'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i sgo nga dang ldan pa dag yin te/_gal 
[\[205b.2\]]te khyed cag gis 'di dag yongs su skyong bar mi byed na gzhan su zhig byed par 'gyur/_dge slong dag de lta bas na gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis tshun cad gnas gcig tu nyal bar rjes su gnang ngo /_/dge slong zhig la 'khru ba'i nad byung nas de mun pa'i nang du 
[\[205b.3\]]bshang ba byed pa na rkang pa gnyis la gos nas rkang pa gnyis brkyang ste nyal ba dang /_de'i gan du nang par sngar dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag 'ongs nas de dag gis dris pa/_mkhan po thugs bde'am/_des smras pa/_mi bde'o/_/ji ltar mi bde/_des skabs de rgyas par brjod 
[\[205b.4\]]nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na snang ba bya'o/_/snang ba byas pa dang /_de 'gyod pas mi nyal nas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyal bar bya 
[\[205b.5\]]ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/dge slong nad g.yog dag 'gyod pas mi nyal ba na de dag na bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis kyang nyal bar bya'o/_/der byin len stobs pas bya ba byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdzogs
