[\[205b.6\]]par ma bsnyen pas kyang der nyal bar bya'o/_/de dag nub gnyis 'das nas phyir 'byin par byed pa na nad pa la gnod par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nub gsum pa la yang nyal bar bya'o/_/nad pa 'gyod par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[205b.7\]]stsal pa/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya bar nyal bar bya'o/_/nad g.yog dag 'gyod pas mi nyal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyal bar bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/dge slong gnas brtan dag na bar gyur nas de dag langs shing rang nyid kyis byin len byas 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]te za bar mi nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gi nad g.yog dag gis lag pa bsnyal te byin len byas nas lhan cig 'dug ste bza' bar bya'o/_/de dag gi nad g.yog dag gzhon pa yin na yang de dag gis kyang de bzhin du bza' bar bya'o/_/
[\[206a.2\]]rdzogs par bsnyen pa dag med nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdzogs par ma bsnyen pas bza' bar bya'o/_/ji ltar rgan pa rnams la gsar bu rnams dang /_rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa rnams nad g.yog byed pa de bzhin du rgan pa rnams kyis kyang gsar bu rnams dang rdzogs 
[\[206a.3\]]par ma bsnyen pa rnams kyi nad g.yog bya'o/_/zla ba'i snang ba dang /_nyi ma'i snang ba byung nas dge slong dag 'gyod pas nyal bar mi byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag ni tha snyad du bya ba ma yin pas nyal bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[206a.4\]]'das kyis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong rnams kyis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa de dag gtsug lag khang nas phyir phyung nas chom rkun pa dag dang /_g.yon can dag 
[\[206a.5\]]dang /_seng ge dag dang /_stag dag dang /_gung dag gis bgrod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gtsug lag khang nas phyir 'byung bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis de dag khyams nas phyir phyung ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[206a.6\]]khyams nas phyir dbyung bar mi bya bar 'di ltar nyen kor du spang bar bya'o/_/dge slong zhig la dge tshul zhig yod de gtsug lag khang der dge slong sdig can 'ongs nas des dge tshul de la smras pa/_dge tshul khyod gang du nyal/_des smras pa/_sgo gang 'dir ro/_/dge tshul de'i mkhan 
[\[206a.7\]]po des thos nas/_des dge tshul de la dris pa/_khyod smras pa de ci/_des smras pa/_'di bdag la khyod gang du nyal zhes 'dri'o/_/mkhan po des dge tshul de bdag nyid kyi gnas khang du bsnyal nas/_mkhan po des kyang 'chag pa dang /_'dug pa dag gis mtshan mo 'da' bar 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]byas so/_/de nang par sngar langs nas dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag 'ongs te dris pa/_mkhan po thugs bde'am/_des smras pa/_mi bde'o/_/ci'i slad du/_des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_mkhan po bcom ldan 
[\[206b.2\]]'das kyis skyes bu dam pa ni gnyis te/_gang khur ma blangs pa len par mi byed pa dang /_gang khur blangs pa mthar phyin par byed pa'o zhes bka' stsal pas khur blangs pa 'di mthar phyin par bgyi 'tshal lo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[206b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te gnas par khas ma blangs pa rnams kyi nang du dge slong sdig can 'ongs shing dge slong sdig can de re zhig skrod par nus na de bskrad par bya'o/_/gal te skrod par mi nus na dge tshul khrid de gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o/_/gal te 
[\[206b.4\]]gnas par khas blangs pa rnams kyi nang du dge slong sdig can 'ongs shing dge slong sdig can de skrod par nus na des bskrad par bya'o/_/gal te skrod par mi nus na dge tshul dge slong mdza' bo'i gan du gzhag par bya'o/_/gal te dge slong mdza' bo med na gnas gcig tu lhan cig zla ba gsum 
[\[206b.5\]]'da' bar bya'o/_/dgag dbye byas nas gal te dge slong sdig can de skrod par nus na de bskrad par bya'o/_/gal te mi nus na dge tshul khrid de gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag lam du 'dong ba na de na dge tshul yang 'dong nas dge slong rnams kyis dge tshul de 
[\[206b.6\]]dag nub gnyis 'das shing don mthun gyi phyi rol du 'byin par byed pa na de dag chom rkun pa dag dang /_g.yon can dag dang /_seng ge dag dang /_stag dag dang /_gung dag gis bgrod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyi rol du dbyung bar mi bya bar 'di ltar don mthun 
[\[206b.7\]]gnyis su bya'o/_/don mthun gnyis su byas pa dang /_de dag dpung chung bas chom rkun pa dag dang /_g.yon can dag dang /_seng ge dag dang /_stag dag dang /_gung dag gis bgrod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te don mthun dpung chung na 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]gnyis su mi bya bar dge slong rnams kyis mi nyal bar tron bya'o/_/dge slong rnams mtshan thams cad du mi nyal bar tron byed pa ni ngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtshan thams cad du tron mi bya bar thun gsum mam/_gnyis sam/_gcig 
[\[207a.2\]]gam/_tha na skya rengs 'char kar tron bya'o/_/de lta na yang ngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyal bar bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis dge tshul dag lam kar rjes su bor te dong ba na de dag chom rkun pa dag dang /_g.yon can dag dang /_
[\[207a.3\]]seng ge dag dang /_stag dag dang /_gung dag gis bgrod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mdun du btang ste 'gro bar bya'o/_/dge tshul de dag nang par snga ba kho nar bkres par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag la g.yar tshus sbyin 
[\[207a.4\]]par bya'o/_/dge tshul de dag dro kar yang zan slong nas dge slong rnams kyis khyed cag da nang g.yar tshus byin zin na da yang slong ngam ci zhes zer nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge tshul dag ni me'i khams che ba yin gyis de dag la dro kar yang zan sbyin par bya'o/_/nye 
[\[207a.5\]]dga' la dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/_de de gnyis dang lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed nas/_dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gang zag 
[\[207a.6\]]rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal gyis khyod gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu ma nyal cig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_gang la nub gnyis rung ba de 
[\[207a.7\]]la nub gsum pa yang rung mod/_nub gsum pas chang 'thungs sam/_kun dong zos sam ci nyes/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]bka' stsal na/_ci'i phyir dge slong dag ched du bsams te nub gnyis las lhag par 'da' bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng 
[\[207b.2\]]gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_
[\[207b.3\]]nye dga' ngas dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs na/_khyod ched du bsams te nub gnyis las lhag par 'da' bar byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[207b.4\]]dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[207b.5\]]dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang gang zag rdzogs 
[\[207b.6\]]par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig ces bya ba la/_rdzogs par bsnyen pa ni 
[\[207b.7\]]gnyis te/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma'o/_/de las gzhan pa ni rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa'o/_/nub gnyis las lhag par zhes bya ba ni nub gnyis las 'das par ro/_/gnas gcig tu nyal na zhes bya ba ni gnas bzhi po thams cad g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /_
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]thams cad g.yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dang /_phal cher g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /_phal cher g.yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dag tu nyal bas skya rengs 'char bar byed na'o/_/thams cad g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni gnas khang ngam/_
[\[208a.2\]]'khor gyi khyams sam/_khang pa brtsegs pa dag go/_/thams cad g.yogs shing phal cher bskor ba ni sgo bcu pa dang /_sgo bcu gnyis pa dag go/_/phal cher g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni khyams ngos bzhi pa dag go/_/phal cher g.yogs shing phal cher bskor ba ni 
[\[208a.3\]]khyams ngos gsum pa dang /_'khor gyi khyams dag go/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du 
[\[208a.4\]]ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par 'du shes shing lhan cig nub gnyis 
[\[208a.5\]]las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la yid gnyis za bas lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par 'du shes pas 
[\[208a.6\]]lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/rdzogs par bsnyen pa la yid gnyis za bas lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor 
[\[208a.7\]]ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig nyal ba'i ltung byed de lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na sngon bong rdzi 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]dge slong 'chi ltas la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes 
[\[208b.2\]]zer ro/_/dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis sngon bong rdzi dge slong 'chi ltas la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom 
[\[208b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer ba thos nas dge slong rnams kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis sngon bong rdzi dge slong 'chi ltas dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa 
[\[208b.4\]]la bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 'chi ltas khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes 
[\[208b.5\]]so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/'chi ltas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[208b.6\]]rnam grangs du mar gsungs te/_de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis/_'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'chi ltas la tshe dang 
[\[208b.7\]]ldan pa 'chi ltas khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/'chi ltas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te/_de dag bsten na bar du 
[\[209a.2\]]gcod par 'gyur gyis 'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bzhams te bsgo'o/_/dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis de la bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes 
[\[209a.3\]]su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis sngon bong rdzi dge slong 'chi ltas dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo 
[\[209a.4\]]bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bsgo bar bya ste gnas mal bshams pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams 
[\[209a.5\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa 
[\[209a.6\]]bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas/_'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 'di la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs nas/_gal te dge 
[\[209a.7\]]'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas la 'chi ltas khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/'chi ltas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod 
[\[209b.2\]]pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te/_de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis/_'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya 
[\[209b.3\]]ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar 
[\[209b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas/_'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_'di la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes 
[\[209b.5\]]rjes su tha snyad du 'dogs te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas la 'chi ltas khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis 
[\[209b.6\]]shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/'chi ltas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam 
[\[209b.7\]]grangs du mar gsungs te de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis/_'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'chi ltas la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis 
[\[210a.2\]]bsgo ba mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'chi ltas la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo'o/_/gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan 
[\[210a.3\]]gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyod kyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi 
[\[210a.4\]]lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la smad pa'i las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams pa byas nas/_gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la 
[\[210a.5\]]dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang 
[\[210a.6\]]bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas/_'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung 
[\[210a.7\]]zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te/_'di la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/_'di la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la smad pa'i las bgyi ste/_ji srid du dge slong 
[\[210b.2\]]'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi/_phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol 
[\[210b.3\]]ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 
[\[210b.4\]]'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas/_'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 
[\[210b.5\]]'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te/_'di la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na 'di la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan 
[\[210b.6\]]ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la smad pa'i las bgyi ste/_ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[210b.7\]]cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi/_phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la smad pa'i las bgyi zhing ji srid 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi/_phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi 
[\[211a.2\]]bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi 
[\[211a.3\]]gtong ba la smad pa'i phrin las mdzad cing ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi/_phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du 
[\[211a.4\]]smad par bgyis shing mchog tu smad par bgyi lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/_dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la smad pa'i las byas 
[\[211a.5\]]shing /_ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de lta bu de thams cad kyi thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bya/_phebs par smra bar mi bya zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par byas shing 
[\[211a.6\]]mchog tu smad par byas so/_/dge slong de dag gis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la smad pa'i las byas shing ji srid du sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de lta bu de thams cad kyi thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 
[\[211a.7\]]'dre bar mi bya/_phebs par smra bar mi bya zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par byas shing mchog tu smad par byas kyang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i skabs de dge slong 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes 
[\[211b.2\]]bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chi ltas la rmas pa/_'chi ltas khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 
[\[211b.3\]]bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad 
[\[211b.4\]]do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan 
[\[211b.5\]]thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang 'di skad ces ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan 
[\[211b.6\]]pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer na/_dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag 
[\[211b.7\]]gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te/_de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta 
[\[212a.2\]]na legs/_gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtang bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/_yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo/_yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong 
[\[212a.3\]]na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'chi ltas sam/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba la/_bar du gcod pa'i chos 
[\[212a.4\]]zhes bya ba ni pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /_ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu dang /_ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang /_bslab pa'i chos mang po 
[\[212a.5\]]dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dag go/_/de dag bsten kyang zhes bya ba ni de dag lhag par spyad kyang ngo /_/bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni des dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes zer ba'o/_/de ltar bcom 
[\[212a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi'o/_/chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang /_nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o/_/bstan pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu bstan pa'o/_/bdag gis shes so zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni 
[\[212a.7\]]bdag gis kun shes so zhes zer na'o/_/dge slong de la zhes bya ba ni 'chi ltas la'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so/_/'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba ji skad sngar bstan pa ltar bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]ba na zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba na'o/_/gal te gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa de yongs su gtong na'o/_/de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba'o/_/gal te mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi gtong na'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par 
[\[212b.2\]]bsgo bar bya/_yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba ji skad du sngar bstan pa ltar bsgo bar bya ba ste/_yang dag par bsgo ba de ni de yin/_yang dag par bstan pa de ni de yin no/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro 
[\[212b.3\]]dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[212b.4\]]de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong ji tsam cung zad 'di skad ces ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer na thams 
[\[212b.5\]]cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bzhams te bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na gsol ba byed pa na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[212b.6\]]las brjod pa dang po brjod pa na ma rdzogs par gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na rdzogs par brjod pa na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las brjod pa gnyis pa brjod pa na ma rdzogs par gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na rdzogs par brjod pa na nyes byas su 
[\[212b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/las brjod pa gsum pa brjod pa na ma rdzogs par gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na rdzogs par brjod pa na gal te mi mthun pa dang chos ma yin pas sgo bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/mi mthun pa dang chos kyis sgo bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/mthun pa dang 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]chos ltar bcos pas sgo bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/mi mthun pa dang chos ma yin pa ltar bcos pas sgo bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/chos ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba de ltar sgo bar mi byed na ltung ba med do/_/chos ji lta ba 
[\[213a.2\]]dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba de ltar mthun pas sgo bar byed na rdzogs par brjod pa na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong des stan de la 'dug bzhin du 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la ltung byed kyi ltung ba byung ngo zhes brjod par bya ste/_gal te de skad 
[\[213a.3\]]brjod na de lta na legs/_gal te mi brjod na de phyin cad nas des 'chab pa'i nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na dge slong gis ji tsam du gzhi des ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags par gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang /_gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las nyams su myong bar 
[\[213a.4\]]byed na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed de lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod 
[\[213a.5\]]na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/'chi ltas de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa na ngu zhing nye dga'i gan du song ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_'chi ltas khyod ci'i phyir ngu /_'chi ltas kyis smras pa/_lhung bzed nag po can dag gis 
[\[213a.6\]]kho bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_gang dag gis 'chi ltas gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa de dag grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang /_khams gsum nas gnas nas phyung bar gyur cig_/'on kyang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa rnams 
[\[213a.7\]]la grong ngam/_grong rdal dag med dam ci/_sdod la bzod pa gsol cig ces nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]'chi ltas dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_kun du gnas par byed/_kun du longs spyod par byed cing de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed do/_/dge slong 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du de skad zer ba'i gang zag chos bzhin du ma byas pa sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de ma spangs pa dang gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_kun du gnas par byed/_kun du longs spyod par byed cing de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu 
[\[213b.2\]]nyal bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la 
[\[213b.3\]]sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod shes bzhin du de skad zer ba'i gang zag chos bzhin ma byas pa sdig 
[\[213b.4\]]pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de ma spangs pa dang gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_kun du gnas par byed/_kun du longs spyod par byed cing de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin 
[\[213b.5\]]pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas 
[\[213b.6\]]na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du de skad zer ba'i gang zag 
[\[213b.7\]]chos bzhin ma byas pa sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de ma spangs pa dang gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_kun du gnas par byed/_kun du longs spyod par byed cing de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga'am/_
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am/_gzhan dag gis brjod pas so/_/de skad zer ba'i gang zag ces bya ba ni 'chi ltas so/_/chos bzhin ma byas pa zhes bya ba ni chos dang mthun par ma byas 
[\[214a.2\]]pa'o/_/sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de ma spangs pa zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa gang yin pa de'o/_/gtam 'dre bar byed ces bya ba ni lung dbog pa sbyin par byed pa'o/_/phebs par smra bar byed ces bya ba ni dmigs kyis 'dri ba sbyin par byed pa'o/_/kun du gnas par byed ces bya 
[\[214a.3\]]ba ni gnas sbyin par byed pa'o/_/kun du longs spyod par byed cing zhes bya ba ni de las bsnyen bkur bdag gir byed cing ngo /_/de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal na zhes bya ba ni gnas bzhi po thams cad g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /_thams cad g.yogs shing phal cher 
[\[214a.4\]]bskor ba dang /_phal cher g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /_phal cher g.yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dag tu nyal bas skya rengs 'char bar byed na'o/_/gnas thams cad g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni gnas khang dang /_'khor gyi khyams dang /_khang pa brtsegs 
[\[214a.5\]]pa dag go/_/thams cad g.yogs shing phal cher bskor ba ni sgo bcu pa dang /_sgo bcu gnyis pa dag go/_/phal cher g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni khyams ngos bzhi pa dag go/_/phal cher g.yogs shing phal cher bskor ba ni khyams ngos gsum pa dang /_'khor gyi 
[\[214a.6\]]khyams dag go/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na 
[\[214a.7\]]dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad shes bzhin du de skad zer ba'i gang zag chos bzhin ma byas pa sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de ma spangs pa dang gtam 'dre bar byed na 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/phebs par smra bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/kun du gnas par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/kun du longs spyod par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de dang lhan cig gnas bzhi po dag tu nyal bas skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/na bar gyur pa 
[\[214b.2\]]dang /_sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de dang dbral bar 'dod pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu rtsa drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[214b.3\]]'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/nye dga' la dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa zhes bya ba gnyis shig yod de/_'dod chags dang 
[\[214b.4\]]bral ba med pa na dge slong rnams de gnyis dang lhan cig gzhogs stegs byed/_'phyar g.yeng byed/_tho 'tsham par byed/_kun du rtse bar byed/_ca co 'don par byed/_rgod pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_lus sgyur bar byed do/_/phyis de dag gis bsdam par bya ba'i ltung ba gang 
[\[214b.5\]]dag yin pa de dag kyang bsdam pa byas/_bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bshags pa byas te/_spro bar byed/_'bad par byed/_rtsol bar byed pa dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par 
[\[214b.6\]]bsgrubs so/_/dus gzhan zhig na dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa gnyis me tog dag thu zhing 'khod pa na nam mkha' las dge slong dag cig rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dong ba mthong nas de gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyed cag su dag yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag ming 'di zhes bya ba 
[\[214b.7\]]dag yin no/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyed cag gis kho bo cag gnyis dang lhan cig 'di dang 'di lta byas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_de lta yin mod kyi/_'on kyang kho bo cag gis bsdam par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bsdam pa byas/_bshags par bya ba'i 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bshags par byas te spro bar byed/_'bad par byed/_rtsol bar byed pa dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs so/_/de na dge tshul tsher ma dang /_
[\[215a.2\]]chen po pa gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so 
[\[215a.3\]]zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste/_
[\[215a.4\]]tsher ma dang /_chen po pa khyed gnyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/bcom 
[\[215a.5\]]ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/tsher ma dang chen po pa 'dod pa bar du gcod pa rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te/_de 
[\[215a.6\]]dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis/_tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa gnyis la tsher ma dang /_chen po pa khyed 
[\[215a.7\]]gnyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes de skad ces ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/tsher ma dang /_chen po pa 'dod pa bar du gcod pa rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te/_de dag bsten 
[\[215b.2\]]na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi/_tsher ma dang /_chen po pa khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bzhams te bsgo'o/_/dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa la bzhams te bsgo na/_de gnyis la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig 
[\[215b.3\]]pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[215b.4\]]slong dag khyed kyis dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bsgo bar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo 
[\[215b.5\]]nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa gnyis thos pa'i nyen kor nas spangs te mthong ba'i nyen kor du bzhag nas de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge tshul 
[\[215b.6\]]tsher ma dang /_chen po pa 'di gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa 
[\[215b.7\]]bdag cag gis shes so zhes mchi nas 'di gnyis la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 'di gnyis la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na/_
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyi dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa la tsher ma dang /_chen po pa khyed gnyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang 
[\[216a.2\]]dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes de skad ces ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[216a.3\]]'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/tsher ma dang /_chen po pa 'dod pa rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te/_de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis/_tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di 
[\[216a.4\]]thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis de gnyis la khyed gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las gsol ba mdzad lags kyis/_khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam 
[\[216a.5\]]pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las bya'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa 'di gnyis la sdig pa 
[\[216a.6\]]can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes mchi nas 'di gnyis 
[\[216a.7\]]la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_'di gnyis la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs nas de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi dge tshul tsher ma dang 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]chen po pa la tsher ma dang /_chen po pa khyed gnyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes de skad ma 
[\[216b.2\]]zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/tsher ma dang /_chen po pa 'dod pa bar du gcod pa rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[216b.3\]]rnam grangs du mar gsungs te/_de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis/_tsher ma dang /_chen po pa khyod gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen 
[\[216b.4\]]po pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis de gnyis la khyed gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i 
[\[216b.5\]]las mdzad par 'gyur ba las las brjod pa dang po yang mdzad lags kyis/_khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gnyis pa bya'o/_/las 
[\[216b.6\]]brjod pa gnyis pa byas nas kyang de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis de gnyis la khyed gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las las brjod pa gnyis pa yang mdzad lags kyis/_khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de 
[\[216b.7\]]skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gsum pa bya'o/_/las brjod pa gsum pa byas nas kyang /_de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis de gnyis la khyed gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]las brjod pa gsum pa yang mdzad lags kyis/_khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu mjug bsdu ba bya ste/_dge 'dun gyis bzod 
[\[217a.2\]]cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[217a.3\]]ltar mnyan nas dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/_de gnyis la bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu 
[\[217a.4\]]bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa sdig 
[\[217a.5\]]pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil ba'i las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams 
[\[217a.6\]]cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa gnyis thos pa'i nyen kor nas spangs te mthong ba'i nyin kor du bzhag nas de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge tshul tsher ma dang /_
[\[217a.7\]]chen po pa 'di gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]gis shes so zhes mchi nas 'di gnyis la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 'di gnyis la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha 
[\[217b.2\]]snyad 'dogs nas 'di gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/_'di gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]
[\[217b.3\]]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na/_gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la deng phyin cad dge tshul khyed gnyis bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[217b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la ston pa'o zhes ma zer cig_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gang yang rung ba'i phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du yang ma 'gro shig_/dge slong rnams dang dge tshul lhan cig nub gnyis tshun 
[\[217b.5\]]chad gnas gcig tu nyal du dbang ba gang yin pa de yang deng phyin chad khyed la med de/_mi gti mug can khyed gnyis bsnyil gyis gzhan du song shig ces bsnyil ba'i phrin las mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis de gnyis la khyed gnyis la dge 'dun 
[\[217b.6\]]gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las gsol ba mdzad lags kyis khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu ni thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las bya'o/_/las ni 'di ltar 
[\[217b.7\]]bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa 'di gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes mchi nas 'di gnyis la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo nas 'di gnyis la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu 
[\[218a.2\]]bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs nas 'di gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/_'di gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan 
[\[218a.3\]]gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la tsher ma dang /_chen po pa khyed gnyis deng phyin chad bcom ldan 
[\[218a.4\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la ston pa'o zhes ma zer cig_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gang yang rung ba'i phyi bzhin du yang ma 'gro shig_/dge slong rnams dang dge tshul lhan cig nub gnyis tshun 
[\[218a.5\]]chad gnas gcig tu nyal du dbang ba gang yin pa de yang der phyin chad khyed la med de/_mi gti mug can khyed gnyis bsnyil gyis gzhan du song shig ces bsnyil ba'i phrin las mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi 
[\[218a.6\]]gtong ba la bsnyil ba'i phrin las mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis de gnyis la khyed gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad 
[\[218a.7\]]par gyur pa las las brjod pa dang po yang mdzad lags kyis/_khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gnyis pa bya'o/_/las 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]brjod pa gnyis pa byas nas kyang de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis de gnyis la khyed gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las las brjod pa gnyis pa yang mdzad lags kyis/_khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces 
[\[218b.2\]]bsgo bar bya'o/_/de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gsum pa bya'o/_/las brjod pa gsum pa byas nas kyang de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis de gnyis la khyed gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 
[\[218b.3\]]'gyur ba las las brjod pa gsum pa yang mdzad lags kyis/_khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu mjug bsdu ba bya ste/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing 
[\[218b.4\]]gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang /_chen po pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 
[\[218b.5\]]'das las mnyan nas/_dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil ba'i las byas so/_/de gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas pa na ngu zhing nye dga'i gan du dong ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis ci'i phyir ngu /_de gnyis kyis 
[\[218b.6\]]smras pa/_lhung bzed nag po can dag gis bdag cag gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_gang dag gis khyed gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas pa de dag grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang /_khams gsum nas bsnyil bar gyur cig_/'on kyang bsnyil 
[\[218b.7\]]ba'i las byas pa dag la grong dang /_grong khyer dag med dam ci/_sdod la bzod pa gsol cig ces des de gnyis nye bar 'jog par byed/_nye bar sten par byed cing de gnyis dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed do/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]du de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul dag nye bar 'jog par byed/_nye bar sten par byed cing de dag dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/
[\[219a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_
[\[219a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod shes bzhin du de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul dag nye bar 'jog par byed/_nye bar sten par byed cing de dag dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[219a.4\]]kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' 
[\[219a.5\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge tshul zhig 
[\[219a.6\]]kyang 'di skad ces ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer na dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis 'di 
[\[219a.7\]]skad ces dge tshul khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni 'di skad mi gsung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa dge tshul 'dod pa bar du gcod pa rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te/_de 
[\[219b.2\]]dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis/_dge tshul khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtang bar bya ba'i 
[\[219b.3\]]phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/_yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo/_yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad dge tshul 
[\[219b.4\]]khyod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la ston pa'o zhes ma zer cig_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gang yang rung ba'i phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du yang ma 'gro zhig_/dge slong rnams dang dge tshul 
[\[219b.5\]]lhan cig nub gnyis tshun chad gnas gcig tu nyal du dbang ba gang yin pa de yang deng phyin chad khyod la med de/_mi gti mug can khyod bsnyil gyis gzhan du song shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul nye bar 'jog par byed 
[\[219b.6\]]dam/_nye bar sten par byed dam/_de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal na ltung byed do/_/dge tshul zhig kyang zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang /_chen po pa'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 
[\[219b.7\]]kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba la/_'dod pa dag ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag go/_/de dag bsten kyang zhes bya ba ni de dag lhag par spyad kyang ngo /_/bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar du gcod 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]par mi 'gyur te zhes zer ba'o/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi'o/_/chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am/_nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o/_/bstan pa zhes bya 
[\[220a.2\]]ba ni rab tu bstan pa'o/_/bdag gis shes so zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni bdag gis kun shes so zhes zer na'o/_/dge tshul de la zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang /_chen po pa la'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so/_/'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni bzhams te 
[\[220a.3\]]bsgo ba ji ltar sngar bstan pa ltar bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba na'o/_/gal te gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa de yongs su gtong na'o/_/de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba'o/_/gal te mi 
[\[220a.4\]]gtong na zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi gtong na'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/_yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba ji ltar sngar bstan pa ltar bsgo bar bya ba ste/_yang dag par bsgo ba de ni de yin no/_/yang dag 
[\[220a.5\]]par bstan pa de ni de yin no/_/dge tshul de la zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang /_chen po pa la'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so/_/deng phyin chad dge tshul khyod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la 
[\[220a.6\]]ston pa'o zhes ma zer cig_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gang yang rung ba'i phyi bzhin du yang ma 'gro shig_/dge slong rnams dang dge tshul lhan cig nub gnyis tshun chad gnas gcig tu nyal du dbang ba gang yin pa de yang deng phyin chad khyod la med de/_mi 
[\[220a.7\]]gti mug can khyod bsnyil gyis/_gzhan du song shig ces bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil bar bya ba ji skad sngar bstan pa ltar bsgo bar bya'o/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/shes bzhin du 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am/_gzhan dag gis brjod pas so/_/de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang chen po pa ji lta bar ro/_/nye bar 'jog par byed ces bya ba ni gnas sbyin par byed pa'o/_/nye bar sten par byed ces bya ba ni lhung bzed dang /_chos gos 
[\[220b.2\]]dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton dang /_dmigs kyis dri ba sbyin pas so/_/de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal na zhes bya ba ni gnas bzhi po thams cad g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /_thams cad g.yogs shing phal 
[\[220b.3\]]cher bskor ba dang /_phal cher g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /_phal cher g.yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dag tu nyal bas skya rengs 'char bar byed na'o/_/gnas thams cad g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni gnas khang dang /_'khor gyi khyams dang /_khang pa brtsegs 
[\[220b.4\]]pa dag go/_/thams cad g.yogs shing phal cher bskor ba ni sgo bcu pa dang /_sgo bcu gnyis pa dag go/_/phal cher g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni khyams ngos bzhi pa dag go/_/phal cher g.yogs shing phal cher bskor ba ni khyams ngos gsum pa dang /_'khor gyi 
[\[220b.5\]]khyams dag go/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma 
[\[220b.6\]]bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad shes bzhin du de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul nye bar 'jog par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nye bar sten par byed na ltung byed 
[\[220b.7\]]du 'gyur ro/_/de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/na ba dang /_sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de dang phral bar 'dod pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]bsnyil ba sdud pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po'i khab na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong zhes bya ba gnyis shig gnas pa 
[\[221a.2\]]de gnyis kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab kyi chu dron lnga brgya dang /_'bab chu dag dang /_mtsho dag dang /_lteng ka dag tu lhas dus dang dus su/_chu'i rgyun legs par 'bebs shing lo thog kyang shin tu phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_
[\[221a.3\]]nye dga' gnyis btul ba de'i tshe na de gnyis tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang /_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la ri rab kyi bang rim du 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' 
[\[221a.4\]]gnyis tshes brgyad dang /_tshes bcu bzhi dang /[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la ri rab kyi bang rim du 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed na/_bdag cag gnyis 'di na 'khod pas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur ma byas kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong ngo snyam mo/_/
[\[221a.5\]]de nas klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang yid 'ong gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis 
[\[221a.6\]]skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod do/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod pa de'i tshe na de gnyis lus dang longs spyod dag gis shin tu mngon par mtho bar gyur to/_/gang gi tshe de gnyis lus 
[\[221a.7\]]dang longs spyod dag gis shin tu mngon par mtho bar gyur pa de'i tshe na de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_rgya mtsho chen por 'jug tu 'dong ngo snyam nas/_de gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe bdag cag gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod pa de'i tshe na bdag cag 
[\[221b.2\]]gnyis lus dang longs spyod dag gis shin tu mngon par mtho bar gyur pas/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag cag gnyis rgya mtsho chen por 'jug tu mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i dbang po khyed gnyis ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs 
[\[221b.3\]]can snying po'i yul na gnas pa dag yin pas na/_ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la zhus shig_/de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_don gyis na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gnyis rgya mtsho chen por 'jug tu 'gror ma gnang ngo snyam mo/_/de gnyis gang 
[\[221b.4\]]gi tshe mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa de'i tshe na ni gzhal med khang pa'i cha lugs kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing /_gang gi tshe nyin mo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa de'i tshe na ni khyim bdag gi cha lugs kyis bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal 
[\[221b.5\]]po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas ga la ba der song ngo /_/rgyal rigs ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yin pas rgyal po de lam kar bsdad de mi dag pa'i mtha' can zhig la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la su dag bsnyen bkur byed pa ltos 
[\[221b.6\]]shig_/mi dag pa'i mtha' can des lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang /_ji tsam na khyim bdag gnyis shig bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[221b.7\]]nas kyang ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha khyim bdag gnyis shig bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid de/_de gnyis lha'i yul na gnas 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]pa dag lags gor ma bkum mo/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_khyim bdag de gnyis bdag gi yul na gnas pa yin pas/_de gnyis kyis bdag mthong na mngon du ldang bar 'gyur grang snyam nas de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 
[\[222a.2\]]'ong gnyis kyis ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ci lags re zhig dam pa'i chos la bsnyen bkur bgyi'am/_'on te rgyal po la bsnyen bkur 
[\[222a.3\]]bgyi/_klu'i rgyal po gnyis re zhig dam pa'i chos la bsnyen bkur gyis shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dam pa'i chos la gus par mdzad de/_dgra bcom pa dag kyang chos bla mar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal 
[\[222a.4\]]pa/_sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang /_/sangs rgyas gang dag ma byon dang /_/sangs rgyas mya ngan sel mdzad pa/_/da ltar mang po gang bzhugs dag_/thams cad dam pa'i chos la ni/_/gus par gnas gyur gnas 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin gus par gnas mdzad de/_/de ni 
[\[222a.5\]]sangs rgyas chos nyid yin/_/de phyir bdag la legs 'dod cing /_/bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byed na/_/'di la dam chos gus par bya/_/de gnyis kyis ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la mngon du ldang ba ma byas pa dang /_rgyal 
[\[222a.6\]]po khros te bsams pa/_khyim bdag 'di gnyis bdag gi yul na gnas pa dag yin na bdag la mngon du ldang ba mi byed do snyam nas/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la ma 
[\[222a.7\]]ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/_rab tu dang sems med pa dang /_/zhe sdang can dang 'khrugs pa yis/_/
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]yang dag rdzogs sangs bstan pa yi/_/dam chos kun shes bya mi nus/_/gang gis nyes rtsom brtul byas shing /_/rab dang med pa'i sems bsal te/_/kun nas mnar sems 'dir spong ba/_/des ni legs gsung shes par 'gyur/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_khyim bdag 'di 
[\[222b.2\]]gnyis la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mnyan pa yang rgyun dgum mo snyam mo/_/de nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas des 'od ma'i tshal nas 
[\[222b.3\]]phyir byung ba na zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/_gang gi tshe khyim bdag 'di gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe na 'di skad ces rgyal po'i zhal nas khyed gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces byung ngo zhes gyis shig ces smras te rgyal po song ngo /_/zho shas 'tsho ba dag 
[\[222b.4\]]gis/_lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po las mnyan nas de nyid du bsdad pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung nas/_de gnyis 'od ma'i tshal nas phyir byung ba na rgyal po'i zho 
[\[222b.5\]]shas 'tsho ba dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag gnyis rgyal po'i zhal nas khyod gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug cig ces byung ngo /_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis kyis bsams pa/_bdag cag gnyis yun ring po nas smon pa gang yin pa de tshegs 
[\[222b.6\]]chung ngus grub bo snyam du rig nas de nyid du chu'i 'od pa chen po kun du rab tu bskyed nas/_ngam grog chung ngu dag tu zhugs so/_/ngam grog chung ngu dag nas ngam grog chen po dag tu zhugs so/_/ngam grog chen po dag nas chu klung chung ngu dag tu zhugs so/_/chu klung chung ngu dag nas chu klung chen po 
[\[222b.7\]]dag tu zhugs so/_/chu klung chen po dag nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te/_gang gi tshe de gnyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe na lus dang longs spyod dag gis chos shin tu mngon par mtho bar gyur to/_/gang gi tshe de gnyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe na rgyal po'i khab kyi chu dron lnga brgya 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]po dag kyang bskam par brtsams/_'bab chu dag dang /_mtsho dag dang /_lteng ka dag tu yang lhas dus dang dus su chu'i rgyun legs par 'bebs par mi byed/_lo thog dag kyang shin tu rgud par gyur nas rgyal pos bsams pa/_rgyal po'i khab 'di na klu'i rgyal po 
[\[223a.2\]]ri bo dang /_yid 'ong zhes bya ba gnyis shig gnas pa de gnyis kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab kyi chu dron lnga brgya dang /_'bab chu dag dang /_mtsho dag dang /_lteng ka dag tu lhas dus dang dus su chu'i rgyun legs par 'bebs shing lo thog kyang shin tu phun sum tshogs par gyur na/_da ltar 
[\[223a.3\]]rgyal po'i khab kyi chu dron lnga brgya po de dag kyang bskam par brtsams/_'bab chu dag dang /_mtsho dag dang /_lteng ka dag tu yang lhas dus dang dus su chu'i rgyun legs par mi 'bebs/_lo thog dag kyang shin tu rgud par gyur pa las na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis nyams 
[\[223a.4\]]pa'am/_shi ba'am/_'bros pa'am/_sbrul khas sdigs pas bzung ba'am gcig tu ma gyur tam/_'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_mkhyen pa dang shes bya la bla na med pa'i mnga' brnyes pa yin gyis sangs rgyas 
[\[223a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la zhur 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 
[\[223a.6\]]'das la ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa rgyal po'i khab 'di na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong zhes bgyi ba gnyis shig gnas pa de gnyis kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab kyi chab dron lnga brgya dang /_'bab chu dag dang /_mtsho dag 
[\[223a.7\]]dang /_lteng ka dag tu lhas dus dang dus su chab kyi rgyun legs par 'bebs shing /_lo thog dag kyang shin tu phun sum tshogs par gyur na/_da ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi chab dron lnga brgya po dag kyang bskam par brtsams/_'bab chu dag dang /_mtsho dag dang /_lteng ka dag tu yang 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]lhas dus dang dus su chab kyi rgyun legs par mi 'bebs/_lo thog dag kyang shin tu rgud par gyur pa las na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis nyams pa'am/_gum pa'am/_bros pa'am/_sbrul khas sdigs pas bzung ba'am/_gcig tu ma gyur tam/_rgyal po chen po 
[\[223b.2\]]klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis ni nyams par yang ma gyur/_shi bar yang ma gyur/_bros par yang ma gyur/_sbrul khas sdigs pas bzung bar yang ma gyur te/_'di ltar khyod nyid kyis bskrad do/_/btsun pa bdag gis klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis mthong bar yang 
[\[223b.3\]]mi dran na bskrad par lta ga la 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po ngas khyod dran par bya'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dran par mdzad du gsol/_rgyal po chen po de'i tshe khyod kyis khyim bdag de gnyis la ji skad smras/_btsun pa bdag gis zho shas 'tsho ba dag la gang gi tshe khyim bdag 
[\[223b.4\]]'di gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe na 'di skad ces rgyal po'i zhal nas khyed gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces byung ngo zhes gyis shig ces mchid stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyim bdag de gnyis ni klu'i rgyal 
[\[223b.5\]]po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis yin no/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_btsun pa de'i tshe de gnyis gang du mchis/_rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta na bdag gi yul ma rung du bas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[223b.6\]]rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul ma rung bar mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar khyod kyis de gnyis la bzod pa gsol bar bya'o/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_btsun pa de gnyis ni rgya mtsho chen por zhugs la bdag ni 'di na mchis na bdag gis ji ltar de gnyis la bzod pa gsol bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 
[\[223b.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de gnyis tshes brgyad dang /_tshes bcu bzhi dang /[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la nga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'dir 'ong gis/_khyod kyang tshes brgyad dang /_tshes bcu bzhi dang /[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la 'dir shog shig dang ngas khyod la de gnyis bstan par bya'i khyod 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]kyis bzod pa gsol cig_/btsun pa ci lags/_bdag gis de gnyis kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi'am/_rgyal po chen po rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par mi bya ste/_'di ltar mi ma rabs dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba gang yin pa de ni mi gtso bo dag 
[\[224a.2\]]gi lag pa nas bzung ba yin gyis khyod kyi lag pa g.yas pa rkyong la klu'i dbang po gnyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces bzod pa gsol cig_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[224a.3\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_
[\[224a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis brda mdzad do/_/de nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste smras pa/_klu'i dbang po gnyis bzod pa mdzod cig_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bzod par bgyi'o/_/klu'i dbang po gnyis gal te bzod 
[\[224a.5\]]na bdag gi yul du tshur spyon cig_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bdag cag gnyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe na lus dang longs spyod dag gis ches shin tu mngon par mtho bar gyur pas da gal te bdag cag gnyis 'dir mchi bar gyur na 'dir bdag cag gnyis kyi 
[\[224a.6\]]go skabs nyid kyang ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_klu'i dbang po gnyis de lta na bdag gi yul ma rung du bas so/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul ma rung bar mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar khyod kyis lha khang gnyis rtsig tu stsol la gcig ni ri bo'i slad 
[\[224a.7\]]du/_cig shos ni yid 'ong gi slad du rtsig tu stsol cig dang der bdag cag gnyis kyi zho shas 'tsho ba dag gzhag par bgyi'o/_/zla ba drug drug cing dus ston bgyid du stsol cig dang der bdag cag gnyis kyang rang nyid mchis nas g.yar sngar brim par bgyi'o/_/de nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos lha khang gnyis rtsig tu btsug ste/_gcig ni ri bo'i phyir/_cig shos ni yid 'ong gi phyir rtsig tu bcug nas zla ba drug drug cing dus ston byed du bcug go/_/gang gi tshe der dus ston byung ba de'i tshe na grong khyer chen po drug po dag nas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag lhags te 'dug cing 
[\[224b.2\]]mthun par gyur to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po'i khab na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis kyi dus ston la bab pa dang /_lho lam nas gar mkhan zhig kyang rgyal po'i khab tu 'ongs nas des bsams pa/_gang gi skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur zhing rnyed pa mang po 
[\[224b.3\]]yang 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam nas des yang bsams pa/_gal te skyes bu gtso bo'i bsngags pa brjod na de lta na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur zhing rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de'i tshe na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs phal cher 
[\[224b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur nas gar mkhan des bsams pa/_re zhig lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa brjod na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[224b.5\]]zhing rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur bas bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya'o snyam nas de dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa/_'phags pa gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pas gzigs pa lnga po 
[\[224b.6\]]rigs dang /_rus dang /_yul dang /_dus dang /_bud med la gzigs pa dag gis 'jig rten la gzigs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug po dag lan gsum yongs su sbyang ba bgyid du stsal te/_glang po cher snang ba bsgyur nas shes bzhin du yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe 
[\[224b.7\]]na sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur cing 'jig rten gyi 'jig rten gyi bar gang na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyi 'od dag nyams su mi myong ba'i mun pa mun nag mun par byed pas gnag par gyur pa gang dag lags pa de dag kyang de'i tshe na snang ba rgya 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]chen pos khyab par gyur nas/_sems can gang dag der skyes pa dag gis rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba de dag gis kyang 'od des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/_/shes ldan dag sems 
[\[225a.2\]]can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes 'tshal bar gyur pa dang /_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu 'das nas yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa de'i tshe yang sa chen po shin tu g.yos par gyur cing /_'jig rten gyi 'jig rten gyi bar gang na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 
[\[225a.3\]]'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyi 'od dag nyams su mi myong ba'i mun pa mun nag mun par byed pas gnag par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe na snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur nas sems can gang dag der skyes pa dag gis rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba de dag 
[\[225a.4\]]gis kyang 'od des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/_/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes 'tshal bar gyur pa dang /_gang gi gdugs la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bltam par gyur pa 
[\[225a.5\]]de'i gdugs la rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gi bu yang btsas par gyur te/_mnyan yod na rgyal po chen po rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs byin gyi bu btsas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten gsal ba gsal ba ltar snang bas gzhon nu 'di'i ming gsal rgyal du 
[\[225a.6\]]gdags so snyam nas bu de'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bgyi bar btags pa dang /_rgyal po'i khab na rgyal po pad ma chen po'i bu btsas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing 'di btsun mo gzugs can gyi bu yin pas gzhon nu 
[\[225a.7\]]'di'i ming gzugs can snying por gdags so snyam nas bu de'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes bgyi bar btags pa dang /_kau shAm+bI na rgyal po chen po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas gzhon nu 'di'i 
[\[225b\]]
