[\[225b.1\]]ming shar bar gdags so snyam nas bu de'i ming shar ba zhes bgyi bar btags pa dang /_'phags rgyal na rgyal po chen po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu btsas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten rab tu snang bas snang bar gyur pas bu 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags 
[\[225b.2\]]so snyam nas bu de'i ming rab snang zhes bgyi bar btags pa dang /_gang gi tshe gdugs la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa de nyid kyi gdugs la shAkya gzhon nu bzang ldan la sogs pa lnga brgya dang /_bsnyen bkur ba 'dun byed la sogs pa lnga brgya yang btsas/_rta rgod ma lnga 
[\[225b.3\]]brgya las kyang rte'u bsngags ldan la sogs pa lnga brgya 'brangs lha rnams kyis kyang gter lnga brgya nye bar bstan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de bram ze ltas pa dang /_mtshan mkhan dag gis lung bstan pa/_gal te gzhon nu pho brang gi nang na bzhugs par gyur na 'khor los 
[\[225b.4\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/_chos kyi rgyal po/_chos dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun po de dag ni 'di lta bur 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[225b.5\]]rin po che dang /_dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni bdun pa yin no/_/'di la bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad 
[\[225b.6\]]pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/_chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[225b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa dang /_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten du bang byu de'i tshe na thams cad du gangs ri'i ngos dang nye ba chu klung skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/_drang srong ser 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring bar shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu byung ste/_de bram ze ltas pa dang /_mtshan mkhan dag gis de skad lung bstan to zhes sgra grags par gyur pa dang /_nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po dag gis kyang gangs ri'i ngos dang nye ba chu klung skal ldan shing rta'i 
[\[226a.2\]]'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring bar shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu byung ste/_de bram ze ltas pa dang /_mtshan mkhan dag gis de skad lung bstan to zhes thos pa dang /_thos nas kyang nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_de nas gzhon nu bsten na dus 
[\[226a.3\]]su 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur bas gang bsten na gzhon nu bsten par 'gyur snyam nas de dag gis bsams pa/_rgyal po zas gtsang bsten par bya ste de bsten na gzhon nu bsten par 'gyur ro snyam nas de dag gis rgyal po zas gtsang bsten par brtsams te/_dus dang mthun pa'i dus su pho nya 
[\[226a.4\]]dang dkor sgrom dag gtong zhing bkur bar bgyid pa dang /_de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na don thams cad dang las kyi mtha' thams cad grub pas de'i phyir gzhon nu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gdags so snyam nas de'i mtshan don 
[\[226a.5\]]thams cad grub pa zhes bgyi bar gsol pa dang /_shAkya rnams kyi lha gnod sbyin shAkya spel ba zhes bya ba la phyag 'tshal du khrid pa na shAkya de thub cing des phyag byas pas shAkya thub pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_lha'i yang lha zhes bgyi bar mtshan gsol ba dang /_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[226a.6\]]sems dpa' sku chen por 'khrungs pa'i tshe rig pa'i gnas thams cad kyi mthar byon cing gzhon nu rol pa'i nang na rol par gyur pa dang /_rgan po dang /_nad pa dang /_shi ba gzigs nas thugs byung ste/_nags kyi nang du gshegs te lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa dang /_de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang dang /_shAkya 
[\[226a.7\]]legs par rab rtogs kyi bka' mchid gsol ba'i mi nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu bkye ste/_de dag gis nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bka' mchid 'tshal te mchi ba dang /_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lo drug tu dka' ba spyad de/_dka' 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]ba spyad pa ci yang med par rig nas ci bder dbugs rngub par mdzad/_ci bder dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing 'bras chan dang /_zan dron la sogs pa zhal zas rgya chen po dag kyang gsol bar mdzad/_zhun mar dang /_'bru mar dag gis sku dag kyang skud par mdzad cing chab dron pos kyang 
[\[226b.2\]]sku bsil bar mdzad pa dang /_grong sde 'dong du gshegs nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma gnyis las kyang lan bcu drug bzlas pa'i 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa gsol te/_klu'i rgyal po nag pos mngon par bstod pa na rtswa bkra shis 'tshong ba las rtswa gser gyi mdog 
[\[226b.3\]]lta bu dag bzhes nas byang chub kyi gzhi ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas nyid kyis rtswa ma 'khrugs pa'i gdan bshams nas skyil mo krung bcas te/_sku drang por bsrangs nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs nas/_ji srid zag med ma thob par/_/de srid skyil krung gzhig mi bya/_zhes 
[\[226b.4\]]thugs bskyed cing gsung brjod pa dang /_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo'i gung thun la bdud 'byung po dung phyur phrag gsum dang bye ba phrag drug gi 'khor dang ldan pa byams pa'i stobs kyis mngon par btul te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji ltar mngon par rdzogs 
[\[226b.5\]]par sangs rgyas pa rgya cher bstan du gsol/_dga' bos smras pa/_des khyod la ci bya/_gar mkhan gyis smras pa/_'phags pa gar thabs sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/dga' bos smras pa/_bkren pa khyod kho bo cag gis ston pa ltar 'chos sam/_mi smras phar song shig_/de nas gar 
[\[226b.6\]]mkhan de nye dga'i gan du song ste de skad dris na des kyang de skad lan btab bo/_/de nas 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so dang /_'dun pa dang /_'char ka dag gi gan du rim gyis song ste de skad dris na/_de dag thams cad kyis kyang so so nas de skad lan btab ste ma bstan to/_/de nas gar 
[\[226b.7\]]mkhan de dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag gi gan du song ste/_dang por dge slong ma sbom dga' mo la de skad ces dris pa dang /_sbom dga' mos smras pa/_des khyod la ci bya/_gar mkhan gyis smras pa/_gar thabs sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/kho mo la bca' ba'i rin sbyin nam/_gsol 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]lo/_/sbom dga' mo de mang du thos pa/_sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can yin pas/_des de la gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pas gzigs pa lnga po rigs dang /_rus dang /_
[\[227a.2\]]yul dang /_dus dang /_bud med la gzigs pa dag gis 'jig rten la gzigs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug po dag lan gsum yongs su sbyang ba byed du bcug ste/_glang po cher snang ba bsgyur nas shes bzhin du yum gyi lhums su bzhugs pa de'i tshe na sa chen po shin tu g.yos par gyur 
[\[227a.3\]]cing 'jig rten gyi bar gang na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyi 'od dag nyams su mi myong ba'i mun pa mun nag mun par byed pas gnag par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe na snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur nas/_sems can gang dag der skyes 
[\[227a.4\]]pa dag gis/_rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba de dag gis kyang 'od des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas/_shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/_/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes shes par gyur pa nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[227a.5\]]kyi mtshan mo'i gung thun la bdud 'byung po dung phyur phrag gsum dang /_bye ba phrag drug gi 'khor dang ldan pa byams pa'i stobs kyis mngon par btul te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dag mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo las rgya 
[\[227a.6\]]cher ji skad gsungs pa bzhin thams cad rgyas par bstan to/_/de nas gar mkhan des gar thabs sbyar nas yang bsams pa/_bdag gis 'dis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dad pa dang ldan pa rnams ni dad pa spel bar nus na gang gis ma dad pa dag kyang dad pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam 
[\[227a.7\]]nas/_de dge slong drug sde dag la snying na bas [{]glan ka [,]klan ka [}]tshol zhing de dag gi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang zhing song ba dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa zas zos zin zhing spangs pas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba bsod pa zhig rnyed cing de za bar 'dod nas des lag pa gnyis bsnyal te bca' 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]ba dang /_bza' ba bsod pa de byin len byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zan za ba na 'dun pas de'i mdun du tsog pur 'dug ste smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong 'dun pa zhes bgyi ba 'tshal ma 'tshal lags shing spangs te yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug 
[\[227b.2\]]par bgyis pa las bca' ba dang /_bza' ba rnyed cing 'tshal bar 'tshal na lhag por bgyi ste bdag la stsal du gsol/_'char kas de las kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas khyod kyir gyur gyis bzhud cig ces smras pa gar mkhan des mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag gis 'dis ma 
[\[227b.3\]]dad pa dag kyang dad par 'gyur bar nus so snyam nas de nas phyir song ngo //_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa/_de nas gar mkhan des rgyal po'i khab tu klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_yid 'ong gnyis kyi dus ston brtsams pa de'i nyin mo bla re bres te rdza rnga chen po 
[\[227b.4\]]brdungs pa dang /_skye bo phal po che'i tshogs der lhags te 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa'i tshe des gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pas gzigs pa lnga po rigs dang /_rus dang /_yul dang /_dus dang /_bud med la gzigs pa dag gis 
[\[227b.5\]]'jig rten la gzigs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug po dag lan gsum yongs su sbyang ba byed du bcug ste/_glang po cher snang ba bsgyur nas shes bzhin du yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe na sa chen po shin tu g.yos par gyur cing 'jig rten gyi 'jig rten gyi bar gang na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar 
[\[227b.6\]]rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyi 'od dag nyams su mi myong ba'i mun pa mun nag mun par byed pas gnag par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe na snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur nas/_sems can gang dag der skyes pa dag gis rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong 
[\[227b.7\]]ba de dag gis kyang 'od des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/_/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes shes par gyur pa nas/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo'i gung thun la bdud 'byung po dung 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]phyur phrag gsum dang /_bye ba phrag drug gi 'khor dang ldan pa byams pa'i stobs kyis mngon par btul te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dag mngon par 'gyur ba'i mdo las rgya cher ji skad gsungs pa dang 'dra bar de 
[\[228a.2\]]ltar bcos pa thams cad gar thabs su rgya cher sbyar te gar byed pa dang /_skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dad pa dang ldan pa dag dad pa mngon par 'phel bar gyur nas e ma'o gar byas so/_/e ma'o gar byas so zhes zer zhing gar mkhan des kyang rnyed pa mang po grub par gyur to/_/de nas gar mkhan des 
[\[228a.3\]]yang bsams pa/_bdag gis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dad pa dang ldan pa dag ni dad pa mngon par 'phel bar byas zin gyis/_da ni ma dad pa dag kyang dad par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas de'i 'og tu gar mkhan gcig gis 'char ka'i cha lugs su byas shing gar mkhan cig shos kyis 'dun 
[\[228a.4\]]pa'i cha lugs su byas te des kham phor thal bas bkang nas/_steng du bu ram gyi dum bu gnyis sam gsum bzhag ste 'char ka'i cha lugs can zan za ba'i mdun du tsog pur 'dug ste smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong 'dun pa zhes bgyi ba 'tshal ma 
[\[228a.5\]]'tshal zhing spangs te yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par bgyi ba las bca' ba dang /_bza' ba rnyed cing 'tshal bar 'tshal na lhag por bgyis te bdag la stsal du gsol/_'char ka'i cha lugs can des de nas bu ram gyi dum bu gnyis sam gsum po dag blangs te zos nas kham phor 
[\[228a.6\]]gyi thal ba 'dun pa'i cha lugs can gyis mgo'i steng du gtor te khyod kyir gyur gyis bzhud cig ces smras pa dang /_skye bo phal po che'i tshogs thams cad kyis ha ha zhes gad mo'i sgra chen po phyung ste/_ma dad pa dag kyang dad pa mngon par 'phel bar gyur nas e ma'o smyon thabs byas so/_/
[\[228a.7\]]e ma'o smyon thabs byas so zhes zer zhing gar mkhan des kyang rnyed pa mang po grub par gyur to/_/de na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dad pa dang ldan pa dag ni/_shes ldan dag ltos shig_/gar mkhan 'dis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]pas gzigs pa lnga po rigs dang /_rus dang /_yul dang /_dus dang /_bud med la gzigs pa dag gis 'jig rten la gzigs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug po dag lan gsum yongs su sbyang ba byed du bcug ste/_glang po cher snang ba bsgyur nas shes bzhin du yum gyi lhums 
[\[228b.2\]]su zhugs pa de'i tshe na sa chen po shin tu g.yos par gyur cing 'jig rten gyi 'jig rten gyi bar gang na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyi 'od dag nyams su mi myong ba'i mun pa mun nag mun par byed pas gnag par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe na snang ba rgya chen 
[\[228b.3\]]pos khyab par gyur nas sems can gang dag der skyes pa dag gis rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba de dag gis kyang 'od des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas/_shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/_/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so 
[\[228b.4\]]zhes shes par gyur pa nas/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo'i gung thun la bdud 'byung po dung phyur phrag gsum dang /_bye ba phrag drug gi 'khor dang ldan pa byams pa'i stobs kyis mngon par btul te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji ltar mngon par 
[\[228b.5\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dag mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo las rgya cher ji skad gsungs pa dang 'dra bar de ltar bcos pa thams cad gar thabs su rgya cher sbyar te gar byas so zhes zer zhing dad pa mngon par 'phel bar gyur to/_/skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad pa dag kyang shes ldan dag ltos 
[\[228b.6\]]shig_/gar mkhan 'dis dge sbyong hral po drug sde dag mi byed dgu byed pa de ltar bcos pa thams cad smyon thabs su rgya cher sbyar te bzhad gad byed do zhes dad pa mngon par 'phel bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na mthar gyis drug sde dag gis gar mkhan des bdag cag ltar bcos zhes grag go zhes 
[\[228b.7\]]thos nas de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis gar mkhan de mi dga' bar byas/_sring mo dag gi gan du gros byed du 'dong ngo zhes de dag dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag gi gan du dong nas smras pa/_sring mo dag bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]na sgra mi snyan zhes bya ba'i gar thabs byas pa gang yin pa de las cung zad ci dran pa bgro'o zhes de rnams de dag dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal du dong ste bgro bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na cung zad kyang ma brjed nas de dag gis rgyal po'i pho brang nas rgyan dang cha lugs blangs te gar 
[\[229a.2\]]mkhan de dang ha cang thag mi ring bar bla re bres nas/_nye dga' mgo ras kyis dkris te rdza rnga chen po brdungs pa dang /_gar la lta ba dang de'i nang nas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs phyir byung ste der lhags so/_/gar mkhan de yang der song ba dang /_ji tsam na lha'i gar thabs lta bu mthong nas 
[\[229a.3\]]des bsams pa/_'di dag lha dag gar byed pa yin nam/_'on te klu dag gam/_'on te gnod sbyin dag gam/_dri za dag gam/_mi 'am ci dag gam/_lto 'phye chen po dag gar byed pa yin snyam du rig nas ya mtshan skyes par gyur to/_/drug sde dag gis kyang gar byas nas cha byad 
[\[229a.4\]]brtul te dong ba dang /_gar mkhan des bsams pa/_'di dag su zhig yin snyam nas de dag gi phyi bzhin 'brang zhing song ba dang /_ji tsam na de dag 'od ma'i tshal du zhugs nas gar mkhan des sgor bsdad pa dang /_ji tsam na 'char ka rna ba bab pa blas bskus bzhin du sgor byung nas gar 
[\[229a.5\]]mkhan des de la smras pa/_'phags pa gar de khyod kyis bgyis sam/_'char kas smras pa/_kho bo cag gis khyod de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o/_/bkren pa khyod kho bo cag kho na'i sgyu rtsal gyis nye bar 'tsho la/_kho bo cag nyid ltar 'chos pas khyod gang dang gang du gar byed pa de dang 
[\[229a.6\]]der kho bo cag dong la khyod la tho btsam par bya ste/_kho bo cag gis rdza rnga chen po dang cha spyad gzhan yang ci yang bkur mi dgos par 'ong ngo /_/gar mkhan des smras pa/_'phags pa de ni bdag cag gis 'tsho ba lags kyis bzod pa mdzod cig_/'char kas smras pa/_gal te khyod kyi 
[\[229a.7\]]rnyed pa ci rnyed pa de dag thams cad kho bo cag la byin na bzod par bya'o/_/des bsams pa/_'di dag yang dang yang du tho 'tsham par 'gyur gyis sbyin no snyam nas/_des rnyed pa thams cad de dag la byin nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/ji tsam na de'i chung po grogs 'ongs nas des 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]de la dris pa/_grogs po khyod ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des smras pa/_kho bo chad pas bcad do/_/sus/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gis so/_/ci'i phyir/_des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_de shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni 
[\[229b.2\]]tshig go/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/_'di ltar gar mkhan dag la yang chad pas gcod par byed do zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed nas dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag mi mdzes pa de lta bu byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar 
[\[229b.3\]]byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba de ni dge slong dag khyim pa'i gos gyon pa las gyur pas de'i phyir dge slong gis khyim pa'i gos bgo bar mi 
[\[229b.4\]]bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la 
[\[229b.5\]]sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_
[\[229b.6\]]rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par 
[\[229b.7\]]gzigs pas 'dul ba la nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis gos sar pa zhig rnyed na kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am/_dmar 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]po'am/_ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha bsgyur bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis gos sar pa kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am/_dmar po'am/_ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha ma bsgyur bar spyod na ltung byed do/_/de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni drug sdes so/_/
[\[230a.2\]]gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_du gu la'i gos dang /_ko tam pa'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/_/sar pa zhig ces bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te/_gsar pas sar pa dang /_
[\[230a.3\]]rnyed pas gsar pa ste/_don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongs so/_/rnyed na zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so/_/kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am/_dmar po'am/_ngur smrig las gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba la/_sngon po zhes bya ba ni rams so/_/dmar po zhes bya ba ni 
[\[230a.4\]]btsag go/_/ngur smrig ces bya ba ni shing shun no/_/kha bsgyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni kha dog ngan par bya ba'o/_/gal te dge slong gis gos sar pa kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am/_dmar po'am/_ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha ma bsgyur bar spyod na zhes bya ba ni gyon na'o/_/ltung 
[\[230a.5\]]byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib 
[\[230a.6\]]par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad gos sar pa zhig rnyed na tha na lhung bzed kyi kha g.yogs kyang rung ste/_kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am/_dmar po'am/_ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha 
[\[230a.7\]]bsgyur bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis gos sar pa kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am/_dmar po'am/_ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha ma bsgyur bar spyod na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/kha ma bsgyur ba'i gos gyon pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//bar sdom la/_bya rgod phung po 'phong dang ni/_/rol mo lits+tsha chen po dang /_/sil snyan [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin ma yi/_/sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin/_/sangs 
[\[230b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol/_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos bsnams te/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs nas slad bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_
[\[230b.3\]]rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyis gter sbas pa lhas char phab pas phyogs der chu'i 'od pa bab cing de yang lam lam lam 'bar zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[230b.4\]]bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das sbrul dug drag po lags so/_/kun dga' bo sbrul dug myur du khyab par bya ba yin no/_/bde bar gshegs pa sbrul dug drag po lags so/_/de na ha cang thag mi ring ba na mi 'bras 
[\[230b.5\]]bu dang rtsa ba thu ba zhig 'dug pa des de thos nas des bsams pa/_bdag gis sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa ni mthong na sbrul dug drag po ni ma mthong bas/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi sbrul dug drag po ci 'dra/_bdag kyang phyogs 'dir nyin mtshan du rgyu bas bdag sbrul dug 
[\[230b.6\]]drag pos zin par gyur na mi rung gis ji ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de der song ba dang /_ji tsam na gter zhig lam lam lam 'bar zhing 'dug pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi sbrul dug drag po ni mdzes pa yin no/_/shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi sbrul 
[\[230b.7\]]dug drag po ni shin tu bzang ba yin te/_'di ltar sbrul dug drag po 'di lta bus ni pha dang ma sdug pa yang zin kyang sla'o/_/bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran mo dang /_las mi dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]sdug pa yang zin kyang bla'o snyam nas mi des gter de lo ma'i chun po dag gis g.yogs te/_khad kyis khad kyis rim gyis rang gi khyim du bskyas so/_/gang gi tshe lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra sdig pa'i grogs po lha sbyin gyis nye bar bskor 
[\[231a.2\]]bas pha chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po gzugs can snying po srog dang phral te/_rang nyid cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag por bzhag pa de'i tshe na des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag song la gang la 'du ba ni ci yod/_'god pa ni ci yod/_gang 
[\[231a.3\]]ni ci zhig gis 'tsho bar byed pa dag ltos shig_/de nas zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi de dag gis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra las mnyan nas/_rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi de dag gis phyogs su byul ba na mi de khyim gyi 'byor pa 
[\[231a.4\]]dag byed pa mthong nas/_de dag gis de la smras pa/_kye nang rje khyod dbul po rtsa ba dang 'bras bu thu ba rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag btsongs shing 'tsho ba dag sbyor bar byed pa yin na/_khyod kyi khyim gyi 'byor pa 'di ga las 'ongs/_khyod kyis gter ma rnyed dam/_des smras pa/_bdag 
[\[231a.5\]]gis gter ma rnyed de/_bdag nyid la 'byor pa 'di lta bu dag yod mod kyis sngan chad ni rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pa byung ba de'i phyir bdag gis ma phyung ngo /_/da ni rgyal po chos dang ldan pa byung bas/_de'i phyir bdag gis khyim gyi 'byor pa byed de rgyal po gzugs can snying po la pho brang 
[\[231a.6\]]'khor dang ljongs kyi mi dag rjes su dga' bar zad kyi de chos dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgra la ni pho brang 'khor dang ljongs kyi mi dag rjes su mi dga' yang de chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_kye nang rje rgyal po gzugs can snying po chos dang 
[\[231a.7\]]ldan pa ma yin na gang chos dang ldan pa de chos dang ldan pa ma yin par gyur la/_pha gsod pa gang yin pa de chos dang ldan par gyur tam/_khyod kyis kho bo cag su yin shes sam/_des smras pa/_shes te rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag yin pas khyed kyi mig gis rgyal po mthong ngo /_/
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]de dag gis smras pa/_kye nang rje kho bo cag [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyis ma bslu shig_/khyod kyis gter rnyed kyi phyed ni khyed khyer la phyed ni kho bo cag la byin cig_/des smras pa/_kho bos gter ma rnyed de/_'di ni kho bo nyid kyi yin mod kyi 'on kyang sum cha sbyin gyi kha rog par dengs shig_/de 
[\[231b.2\]]dag gis de spyos te lag pa gnyis phying ka log tu bcings nas gnya' zungs rgyud mos rgyal po'i drung du khrid de smras pa/_lha mi 'dis gter rnyed do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje nga su yin shes sam/_lha 'tshal te 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi ni 'jig rten skyong bar bgyid pa lags/_
[\[231b.3\]]khyod ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba 'jig rten skyong ba lnga pa lags te skye dgu skyong bar mdzad pa lags so/_/kwa'i nang rje khyod kyis gter rnyed kyi nga la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyis ma bslu bar bden pa smros la phyed ni khyod khyer cig_/phyed ni nga la byin cig_/lha bdag gis gter ma rnyed do/_/
[\[231b.4\]]kwa'i nang rje khyod kyis gter rnyed kyis sum cha nga la byin cig_/lha bdag gis gter ma rnyed do/_/rgyal po khros te blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gi rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i bka' lan gsum gyi bar du bcag pa de la chad pa ci yod/_de dag gis smras 
[\[231b.5\]]pa/_lha dgum pa la thug pa'i chad pa mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag ngas mi 'di yongs su btang gis/_'di'i nye du rnams kyang phyag sbal du chug la/_'di'i nor thams cad kyang rgyal po'i pho brang du phul cig_/de nas blon po rnams kyis lha bka' 
[\[231b.6\]]bzhin 'tshal zhes lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra las mnyan nas mi de'i nye du rnams kyang btson rar bcug_/de'i nor thams cad kyang rgyal po'i pho brang du phul/_mi de nyid kyang mi gos sngon po gyon pa/_lag na ral gri thogs pa dag gis kar bI ra'i me 
[\[231b.7\]]tog dmar po dag gis mgrin pa bcings te gsad sar khrid pa dang /_mi de byung rgyal du smras pa/_kun dga' bo sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das sbrul dug drag po lags so/_/kun dga' bo sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no/_/bde bar 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]gshegs pa sbrul dug drag po lags so/_/rgyal po de'i chos nyid ni gsad par bya ba'i mi gang gzhan dris pa la lan gzhan 'debs par byed de/_ji srid du rgyal po la ma zhus kyi bar du re zhig gsod par mi byed pas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha mi de 
[\[232a.2\]]gzhan dris na lan gzhan 'debs par bgyid do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khrid de shog shig_/blon po rnams kyis khrid de song nas/_rgyal pos dris pa/_kwa'i nang rje khyod ci zer/_des smras pa/_kun dga' bo sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[232a.3\]]sbrul dug drag po lags so/_/kun dga' bo sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no/_/bde bar gshegs pa sbrul dug drag po lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje smras pa de'i don ci/_lha je mi 'jigs pa stsal du gsol/_byin no/_/des skabs de rgyas par 
[\[232a.4\]]brjod nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/gal te sbrul dug myur du khyab par bgyid pas bdag zin par gyur na bdag gcig pu dus la bab par 'gyur ba zhig na/_sbrul dug drag pos bdag zin pas de'i slad du bdag dang /_nye du dang /_nor thams cad kyang tshul ma lags pas sdug 
[\[232a.5\]]bsngal bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob nas ring po ma lon pas des smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje khyod bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad dam/_lha mngon par dad do/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i 
[\[232a.6\]]bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra mchi mas brnangs par gyur nas/_des smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje de khyod kyis yin gyi song shig_/de nas rgyal pos zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/_mi 'di'i nye du rnams kyang thong la 'di'i nor thams cad kyang phyir byin cig_/zho shas 'tsho 
[\[232a.7\]]ba rnams kyis de'i nye du rnams kyang btang /_de'i nor thams cad kyang phyir byin no/_/de nas mi de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi khyim na dpal dang skal ba bzang po phun sum tshogs pa gang cung zad ci yod pa de thams cad bcom ldan 'das la brten pa yin pas bdag gis sangs rgyas 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol lo snyam nas/_de nas mi de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas 
[\[232b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das mi de la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang 
[\[232b.3\]]dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas mi de stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[232b.4\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig 
[\[232b.5\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas mi des de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chu ra bzhag ste/_
[\[232b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis btsun pa gdugs tshod g.yar dgongs 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol/_lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis 
[\[232b.7\]]yongs su bskor zhing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te mi de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas mi des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]par rig nas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/_stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas nas bcom ldan 
[\[233a.2\]]'das gdugs tshod gsol zhing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang 
[\[233a.3\]]bzhin thugs su chud pas/_'di ltar mi de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/des bden pa mthong nas gsol 
[\[233a.4\]]ba/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes 
[\[233a.5\]]dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho 
[\[233a.6\]]ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba 
[\[233a.7\]]ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags/_btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/_bdag 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas dad pas skyabs su mchi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_
[\[233b.2\]]yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/'di ni re zhig byung ba yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i 
[\[233b.3\]]tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na des bsod snyoms brgyus nas 'phong gi dpong sa mthong nas de der zhugs pa dang /_
[\[233b.4\]]'phong gi slob dpon ni med/_khye'u dag 'khod nas des dris pa/_khye'u dag ci byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa 'phong slob bo/_/'char kas smras pa/_bu dag legs te khyed cag gis sgyu rtsal mchog las rgal to/_/bu dag bltas g.yon 'phongs dang /_g.yas 
[\[233b.5\]]'phongs dang /_gom stabs dang /_'dzin stabs dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_mtshon rtse gcig 'phang ba gyis shig_/de dag gis g.yon 'phongs dang /_
[\[233b.6\]]g.yas 'phongs dang /_gom stabs dang /_'dzin stabs dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_mtshon rtse gcig 'phang bar brtsams pa dang /_'char ka lag pa gnyis 
[\[233b.7\]]'dril bar byed/_bzhin sgyur bar byed nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa ci'i slad du phyag gnyis 'dril bar mdzad/_zhal sgyur bar mdzad/_'char kas smras pa/_da dung khyed cag gi slob dpon gyis kyang mi shes na/_khyed cag gis lta shes par 'gyur re skan/_de 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa 'di la cung zad mkhyen pa mnga' 'am/_'char kas smras pa/_khye'u dag sa'i steng na gang kho bos mi shes pa'i las kyi gnas dang /_bzo'i gnas de gang yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa g.yar snga brim gyis g.yon 
[\[234a.2\]]'phongs dang /_g.yas 'phongs dang /_gom stabs dang /_'dzin stabs dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa 'phang ba mdzad du gsol/_'char 
[\[234a.3\]]kas g.yon 'phongs dang /_g.yas 'phongs dang /_gom stabs dang /_'dzin stabs dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba sus kyang byed mi nus pa byas shing rked chings kyis bcings te phub zlum thogs nas gcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa yang byas 
[\[234a.4\]]pa dang /_de dag ya mtshan skyes nas smras pa dang /_'phags pa legs so legs so/_/'char kas smras pa/_khye'u dag bzo'i gnas de ltar bslab par bya ba'am/_yang na slob dpon gzhan btsal bar bya'i 'bras bu med pa'i sbun pa 'phyar zhing 'khod de ci rung zhes smras te 
[\[234a.5\]]song ngo /_/ji tsam na de dag gi slob dpon 'ongs nas des smras pa/_khye'u dag 'khod de ci rung /_g.yon 'phongs dang /_g.yas 'phongs dang /_gom stabs dang /_'dzin stabs dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_
[\[234a.6\]]dbug pa dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig dang /_mtshon rtse gcig 'phang ba gyis shig_/de dag lag pa gnyis 'dril bar byed/_bzhin sgyur bar byed cing smras pa/_slob dpon yang da dung ci yang mi mkhyen na bdag cag gis lta 'tshal bar 'gyur re skan/_slob dpon gyis smras pa/_
[\[234a.7\]]khye'u dag sngon ma byung ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba 'di lta bu byung na 'ga' zhig 'dir 'ongs par ma gyur tam/_de dag gis smras pa/_mchis so/_/su/_'phags pa 'char ka ste/_des g.yon 'phongs dang /_g.yas 'phongs dang /_gom stabs dang /_'dzin stabs dang /_zhags 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]pa gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig dang /_mtshon rtse gcig 'phang ba sus kyang bgyi bar rngo mi thog pa de lta bu bgyis so/_/des de dag la smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phong gi dpong sa gang du 'phong bslab 
[\[234b.2\]]pa de'i drung du des kyang bslabs so/_/gal te de rab tu byung bar ma gyur na 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tu 'phong gi slob dpon gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang kho bos ci shes pa de je kho bo las slobs la/_lhag ma gzhan las slobs shig_/slob dpon des bsams pa/_de yang dang 
[\[234b.3\]]yang du bdag la tho 'tsham par 'gyur gyis de [(]bltar [,]ltar [)]'gro'o snyam nas/_de 'char ka'i gan du song ste smras pa/_'phags pa 'char ka bdag cag gi 'phong gi dpong sar byon par gyur tam/_'char kas smras pa/_son to/_/'phags pas khye'u dag cung zad tshar bkum mam/_'char 
[\[234b.4\]]kas smras pa/_tshar bcad do/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa de ni bdag gi 'tsho ba lags kyis khye'u dag tshar ma dgum shig_/bkren pa khyod kho bo cag gi sgyu rtsal gyis 'tsho la/_kho bo cag la bca' ba'i rin cung zad kyang mi sbyin nam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag ni 
[\[234b.5\]]dbul po lags so/_/'char kas smras pa/_bkren pa gal te mi sbyin na yang dang yang du kho bo song la tshar gcad par bya'o/_/des bsams pa/_'di la bca' ba'i rin ma byin na yang dang yang du song ste khye'u dag tshar gcod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de 'phong gi yo byad thams cad 
[\[234b.6\]]btsongs te de la bca' ba'i rin byin nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/ji tsam na de'i chung po grogs 'ongs nas des dris pa/_grogs po ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des smras pa/_kho bo chad pas bcad do/_/sus/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gis so/_/ci'i phyir/_des 
[\[234b.7\]]skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_des shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/_'di ltar 'phong gi slob dpon dag kyang chad pas gcod par byed do zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/'di yang re zhig byung ba yin te/_sangs 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed 
[\[235a.2\]]dang chos gos thogs te/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na des bsod snyoms brgyus nas rol mo'i dpong sa mthong nas de der zhugs pa dang /_rol mo'i slob dpon ni med/_khye'u dag 'khod nas des dris pa/_khye'u dag ci byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[235a.3\]]'phags pa rol mo slob bo/_/'char kas smras pa/_bu dag legs te khyed cag gis sgyu rtsal mchog las rgal to/_/bu dag bltas drug ldan dang /_drang srong pa dang /_sa 'dzin pa dang /_blo gsal dang /_'khor nyan dang /_bar ma pa dang /_ke shi ka gyis shig_/de dag gis 
[\[235a.4\]]drug ldan dang /_drang srong pa dang /_sa 'dzin pa dang /_blo gsal dang /_'khor nyan dang /_bar ma pa dang /_ke shi ka bya bar brtsams pa dang /_'char ka lag pa gnyis 'dril bar byed/_bzhin bsgyur bar byas nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa ci'i slad du phyag gnyis 'dril bar 
[\[235a.5\]]mdzad/_zhal sgyur bar mdzad/_'char kas smras pa/_da dung khyed cag gi slob dpon gyis kyang ma shes na khyed cag gis lta shes par 'gyur re skan/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa 'di la cung zad mkhyen pa mnga' 'am/_'char kas smras pa/_khye'u dag sa'i steng na gang kho bos mi 
[\[235a.6\]]shes pa'i bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas de gang yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa g.yar snga brim gyis drug ldan dang /_drang srong pa dang /_sa 'dzin pa dang /_blo gsal dang /_'khor nyan dang /_bar ma pa dang /_ke shi ka mdzod cig_/'char kas drug ldan dang /_
[\[235a.7\]]drang srong pa dang /_sa 'dzin pa dang /_blo gsal dang /_'khor nyan dang /_bar ma pa dang /_ke shi ka sus kyang bya bar mi nus pa byas pa dang /_de dag ya mtshan skyes nas smras pa/_'phags pa legs so legs so/_/'char kas smras pa/_khye'u dag bzo'i gnas de ltar bslab par 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]bya ba'am/_yang na slob dpon gzhan btsal bar bya'i 'bras bu med pa'i sbun pa 'phyar zhing 'khod de ci rung zhes smras te song ngo /_/ji tsam na de dag gi slob dpon 'ongs nas des smras pa/_khye'u dag 'khod de ci rung drug ldan dang /_drang srong pa dang /_sa 'dzin pa dang /_blo gsal dang /_'khor nyan 
[\[235b.2\]]dang /_bar ma pa dang /_ke shi ka gyis shig_/de dag lag pa gnyis 'dril bar byed/_bzhin sgyur bar byed cing smras pa/_slob dpon yang da dung ci yang mi mkhyen na bdag cag gis lta 'tshal bar 'gyur te skan/_slob dpon gyis smras pa/_khye'u dag sngon ma byung ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba 'di lta bu 
[\[235b.3\]]byung na 'ga' zhig 'dir 'ongs par ma gyur tam/_de dag gis smras pa/_mchis so/_/su/_'phags pa 'char ka ste/_des glu dang gar sus kyang brjod par rngo mi thog pa de lta bu bgyis so/_/des de dag la smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rol mo'i dpong sa gang du rol mo bslabs pa de'i drung du des 
[\[235b.4\]]kyang bslabs te/_gal te de rab tu byung bar ma gyur na 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tu rol mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang kho bos ci shes pa de je kho bo las slobs la lhag ma gzhan las slobs shig_/slob dpon des bsams pa/_de yang dang yang du bdag la tho 'tsham par 
[\[235b.5\]]'gyur gyis de ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de 'char ka'i gan du song ste smras pa/_'phags pa 'char ka bdag cag gi rol mo'i dpong sar byon par gyur tam/_'char kas smras pa/_son to/_/'phags pas khye'u dag cung zad tshar bkum mam/_'char kas smras pa/_tshar bcad do/_/des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[235b.6\]]pa de ni bdag gi 'tsho ba lags kyis khye'u dag tshar ma dgum shig_/bkren pa khyod kho bo cag gis sgyu rtsal gyis 'tsho la/_kho bo cag la bca' ba'i rin cung zad kyang mi sbyin nam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag ni dbul po lags so/_/'char kas smras pa/_bkren pa gal te mi 
[\[235b.7\]]sbyin na yang dang yang du kho bo song la tshar gcad par bya'o/_/des bsams pa/_'di la bca' ba'i rin ma byin na yang dang yang du song ste khye'u dag tshar gcod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des rol mo'i yo byad thams cad btsongs te de la bca' ba'i rin byin nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]go/_/ji tsam na de'i chung po grogs 'ongs nas des dris pa/_grogs po ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des smras pa/_kho bo chad pas bcad do/_/sus/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gis so/_/ci'i phyir/_des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_de shAkya'i bu'i 
[\[236a.2\]]dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/_'di ltar rol mo mkhan gyi slob dpon dag kyang chad pas gcod par byed do zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/'di yang re zhig byung ba yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la 
[\[236a.3\]]nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu ci dgyes par bzhugs nas yangs pa can ga la ba de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang 
[\[236a.4\]]pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so/_/nye dga' snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_lits+tsha bI'i khye'u rab tu mang po dag kyang yangs pa can nas byung ste/_yangs pa can gyi phyi rol du rgyan thams cad phyogs gcig tu 
[\[236a.5\]]bzhag ste rtse bar brtsams so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de mthong nas des de gnod sbyin gyi nor yin no zhes rgyan de dag thams cad khyer te song ba dang /_yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI'i khye'u de dag gis nye dga' la las ni lag pa nas bzung /_la las ni rkang pa nas bzung /_la las ni chos gos nas bzung ste 
[\[236a.6\]]'phags pa ci'i phyir kho bo cag gi rgyan 'phrog par byed ces zer ro/_/lits+tsha bI chen pos yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI'i khye'u dag gis nye dga' bzung ste tho 'tsham pa mthong nas/_des smras pa/_khye'u dag ci'i phyir 'phags pa nye dga' la tho 'tsham par byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_'dis bdag cag 
[\[236a.7\]]gi rgyan dag phrogs so/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa nye dga' ci'i slad du khye'u dag gi rgyan 'phrog par mdzad/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_kho bo gnod sbyin gyi nor 'di rnyed do/_/des smras pa/_'di 'dra ba gnod sbyin gyi nor lags re skan/_gzhon nu dag gi rgyan lags kyis ma 'phrog par 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]'or cig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de bor te rdul gyis gos pa'i chos gos dag gis gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' ci'i phyir rdul gyi tshogs kyis gos/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_lits+tsha bI chen po nad med par gyur cig_/kho bos gnod sbyin gyi 
[\[236b.2\]]nor thob pa des 'dor du bcug go/_/'di yang re zhig byung ba yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[236b.3\]]na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/lam gyi bar na yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal dag yod nas de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[236b.4\]]yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI dag gi dpe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams las blangs kyis de dag gi skyed mos tshal dag ci 'dra ba bltas 'dong ngo zhes de dag der zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na de na yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_khrus kyi tshal dag dang /_so phag dag dang /_
[\[236b.5\]]bsku ba dag dang /_phrug spyad dag dang /_sa gar dag dang /_skyu ru ra dag dang /_mgo bkru ba dag dang /_pi bang dang /_'od ma dang /_ma ha ti dang /_bal la ri dang /_su g+ho sha ka dag bzhag pa dag mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' je dang por khrus bya'am/_
[\[236b.6\]]'on te glu blang zhing bro brdung bar bya/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis yun ring po nas glu blangs shing bro brdungs kyis je glu blang zhing bro brdung bar bya'o zhes de dag gis glu blang zhing bro brdung bar brtsams so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gi skyed mos tshal du spyad pa'i rol mo'i sgra gang 
[\[236b.7\]]yin pa de ni lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i g.yul ngor spyad pa'i rol mo'i sgra yin pas de dag gis rol mo'i sgra dbyung bar brtsams pa dang /_yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI dag gis thos so/_/thos nas de dag dngangs te smras pa/_shes ldan dag pha gsod 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]pas ma sbran par dmag drangs te 'ongs so zhes de dag go bgos te phyir 'byung bar brtsams so/_/drug sde dag kyang skyed mos tshal de nas phyir byung ba dang /_de dag gis yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI dag go bgos te phyir byung ba mthong nas drug sde dag gis de dag la dris pa/_shes 
[\[237a.2\]]ldan dag gar 'dong /_de dag gis smras pa/_'dir pha gsod pa 'ongs pas de dang g.yul dgye ba'i phyir sur 'dong ngo /_/de ga la 'dug_/de dag gis smras pa/_'dir lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i g.yul ngor spyad pa'i rol mo'i sgra byung ngo /_/
[\[237a.3\]]shes ldan dag de ni kho bo cag gis bzhad gad byas pa yin na khyed cag de ltar bred ngas sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed kyi rol mo'i sgra'i yo byad de dag sgra phyung ngam/_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag gis sgra phyung ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[237a.4\]]dag yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI dag sngangs pas khyed la gnod pa byed na mi rung gis slar log shig_/de dag phyir log pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ji ste phyir log_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag de'u 
[\[237a.5\]]gsad do/_/sus/_yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI dag gis so/_/ci'i phyir/_de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[237a.6\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la 
[\[237a.7\]]sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu byas pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs 
[\[237b.2\]]pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang rin po che'am/_rin po cher smos pa rang gi lag gis len tam/_len 
[\[237b.3\]]du 'jud na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du ci dgyes par bzhugs nas mnyan yod ga la de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs 
[\[237b.4\]]pa na mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na shar gyi kun dga' ra ba na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa gas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na bdag gi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs 
[\[237b.5\]]zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mnyan yod nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de ngo tsha dang ldan pa yin pas des rgyan bkrol te/_thum por bcings nas bu mo'i lag tu byin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[237b.6\]]'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/de na ha cang thag mi ring ba na sna ma'i yal ga me tog rgyas pa zhig 'dug nas bu mo des de mthong nas bsams pa/_'di las me tog dag btogs te bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma dag gis 
[\[237b.7\]]gtor gyis 'thog tu 'gro'o snyam nas des rgyan de mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/_sna ma'i yal ga de las me tog dag btogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma dag gis gtor te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yun ring du chos bstan nas des 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te song ba dang /_rgyan gyi thum po de de nyid du brjed de lus so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos des rgyan de bor te song ba mthong nas des bsams pa/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang mod kyis 'di nyid rkyen du 
[\[238a.2\]]mdzad de gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyan de sbed du bcug nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' 
[\[238a.3\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa gas rgyan bskyud de de mchis nas bdag la blo skyes pa/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang mod kyi 
[\[238a.4\]]'di nyid rkyen du mdzad de gnang bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur ro snyam nas bdag gis rgyan de sbed du stsal to/_/kun dga' bo 'di ltar ngas gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de khyod kyis shes pa legs so/_/legs so/_/kun dga' bo de lta 
[\[238a.5\]]bas na kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa na 'dug pa'am/_gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa ma gtogs so/_/bud med kyi yul ni rgyan la nye bar spyod pa yin pas sa gas phyi de nyin par rgyan de dran nas/_des bu mo de la smras pa/_bu mo rgyan ga re/_bu mos smras pa/_
[\[238a.6\]]jo mo de nyid du bskyud do/_/des smras pa/_song la long shig_/de'i bu dag gis de thos nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_yum mdzod khang du bzhag par mkhyen nam/_ci ga las blangs te mchi bar 'gyur/_sa gas bu rnams la smras pa/_bu dag kho mo ni nor chud 
[\[238a.7\]]mi za ba yin no/_/de nas bu mo de tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gan du song ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_bu mo ci la 'ongs/_bu mos smras pa/_'phags pa jo mo'i rgyan bskyud do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_'di na 'dug gis 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]khyer te song shig_/bu mo des de khyer te song nas sa ga la smras pa/_jo mo rgyan de 'tshal te mchis pa 'di lags so/_/sa gas bu rnams la smras pa/_bu dag rgyan de khyer te 'ongs pa 'di yin te/_kho mos kho mo ni nor chud mi za ba yin no zhes ma smras sam/_bu 
[\[238b.2\]]de dag gis bu mo de la dris pa/_bu mo 'phags pa gang gis sbed du bcug par gyur/_bu mos smras pa/_'phags pa kun dga' bos so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa kun dga' bos gzigs pas des na thob par zad kyi/_gal te drug sde dag 
[\[238b.3\]]gis mthong bar gyur du zin na/_de dag gis bca' ba'i rin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis da bdag cag gis ma 'di nor chud za ba yin nam ma yin pa brtags na shes par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de 
[\[238b.4\]]dag gis ma'i sor gdub rgya blangs te/_khron pa'i nang du bcug pa dang /_sa gas bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu mo chu chus shig dang khrus bya'o/_/bu mo des chu bcu bar brtsams pa dang /_de'i bum pa'i nang du sor gdub rgya de chud nas/_sa ga khrus 
[\[238b.5\]]byed pa na sor gdub rgya de pang par lhung nas/_sa gas bu rnams la bstan te smras pa/_bu dag kho mos kho mo ni nor chud mi za ba yin no zhes ma smras sam/_yang de dag gis sor gdub rgya de chu klung gnas can gyi nang du 'phangs pa dang /_de nya bo ches mid nas nya bo 
[\[238b.6\]]che de nya pa dag gis rgya mos bcus te phyung ngo /_/sa ga'i bu mo mngag gzhug ma nya sha'i phyir tshong dus su song nas/_des nya pa las nya bo che de nyos te bshas pa dang /_ji tsam na de'i lto nas sor gdub rgya de byung ba mthong nas/_des sa ga la smras pa/_jo mo sor gdub 
[\[238b.7\]]rgya de 'di lags so/_/sa gas bu rnams la de bstan te smras pa/_bu dag kho mos kho mo ni nor chud mi za ba yin no zhes ma smras sam/_bu de dag gis smras pa/_yum nor chud mi za ba lags sam ma lags pa da dung yang brtag par bgyi'o zhes de dag gis de'i 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]di na ra dag gis sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu bkang ste lam po che'i bzhi mdor bor ba dang /_skye bo phal po che de nas 'gro bas mthong nas sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no zhes yongs su spangs te 'gro zhing 'ga' yang len par mi byed nas/_de dag gis smras 
[\[239a.2\]]pa/_'di na sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu di na ra dag gis gang ba 'dug na mi len tam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'di ni sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin gyi sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu di na ra dag gis gang ba ma yin gyis mi len to/_/de nas bu de dag lhags te ma la smras pa/_
[\[239a.3\]]yum khyod ni nor chud mi za ba lags mad do/_/thams cad du yang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga ni nor chud mi za ba yin/_bden no zhes sgra grags par gyur to/_/dge slong gis kun dga'i ra bar gtogs par sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu di na ra dag gis gang ba zhig lhung ba mthong nas 
[\[239a.4\]]phyogs der mi zhig 'ongs pa dang /_dge slong des mi de la smras pa/_kye nang rje sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu 'di khyod kyi ma yin nam/_'phags pa lags so/_/khyer te song shig_/des de khyer te myur ba myur bar song ba dang /_mi gzhan zhig mgo rdul gyis gang ste ngu zhing 
[\[239a.5\]]'ongs nas des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyis sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu zhig gzigs sam/_dge slong des smras pa/_mi zhig gis khyer te song ngo /_/des sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu de ma rnyed pa na smyos shing sems 'khrugs pas de dang der tshol ba na tshul ma yin pas sdug 
[\[239a.6\]]bsngal bar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du gya tshom du smra bar mi bya bar de la sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu ci 'dra ba zhig_/srang du pa zhig ces dri bar bya'o/_/gal te rtags la bab 
[\[239a.7\]]par smra na sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te rtags la ma bab par smra na sbyin par mi bya'o/_/de dag gis der bor te dong ba na de gzhan dag gis brkus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du bor te 'dong bar mi bya bar 'gro ba'i lam logs su sa'am/_lo ma'i 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]tshogs dag gis g.yog par bya'o/_/de dag gis de yal ba kho nar bor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de yal bar dor bar mi bya bar zhag bdun nam brgyad du der song ste bsdad par bya'o/_/gal te bdag po 'ongs shing rtags la bab pa smra na sbyin par bya'o/_/
[\[239b.2\]]gal te ma 'ongs na de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyi mdzod du bcug ste gzhag par bya'o/_/gal te bdag po zla ba drug 'das nas 'ongs shing /_rtags la bab par smra na sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te ma 'ongs na de'i 'og tu dngos po brtan por btsongs te gzhag par bya'o/_/gal te 
[\[239b.3\]]de'i tshe bdag po 'ongs par gyur na de la de dngos po 'dir btsongs kyis/_rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/gal te rjes su yi rang na de lta na legs/_gal te rjes su yi rang bar mi byed na sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te skyed slong na kho bo cag gis yongs 
[\[239b.4\]]su bskyangs pa gang yin pa de nyid drin che bar mi sems sam/_khyer te song shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de lta bas na kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa na 'dug pa'am/_gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_
[\[239b.5\]]bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/_dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[239b.6\]]dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang rin po che'am/_rin po cher smos pa rang gi lag gis len tam/_lan du 'jud na 
[\[239b.7\]]kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa na 'dug pa'am/_gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/dge slong gis kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa'am/_gnas khang du gtogs pa na rin po che'am/_rin po cher smos pa 'dug pa la 'di su'i 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]yin pa de len par 'gyur grang snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis blang bar bya ste/_de la de ni cho ga yin no/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/rin po che'am zhes bya ba la/_rin po che zhes bya ba ni nor bu 
[\[240a.2\]]dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_man shel dkar po dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang /_dmar po dang /_g.yas su 'khyil pa'o/_/rin po cher smos pa zhes bya ba la/_rin po cher smos pa zhes bya ba ni 
[\[240a.3\]]g.yul ngor spyad pa'i mtshon cha thams cad dang /_rol mor spyad pa'i yo byad thams cad do/_/rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni lag pas lag par ro/_/len tam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/_/len du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/_/kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa na 
[\[240a.4\]]'dug pa zhes bya ba ni kun dga'i ra ba'i phyi rol na'o/_/gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni kun dga'i ra ba'i nang na'o/_/ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa na 'dug pa'am/_gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa bzhag ste'o/_/
[\[240a.5\]]ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags 
[\[240a.6\]]na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/_/kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa dang /_gnas khang du gtogs pa na rin po che'am/_rin po cher smos pa 'dug pa la 'di su'i yin pa 
[\[240a.7\]]de len par 'gyur grang snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis blang bar bya ste/_de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba la/_de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni de la de ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na//_//bar sdom la/_nor bu mgul 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]rgyan pi bang dang /_/dung dang gzhu dang mda' dang ni/_/sku gzugs sku gdung bcas pa dang /_/sngon gyi tshul ni tha ma yin/_/dge slong gis nor bu len na bdar ba len na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_ma bdar ba len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/nor bu ji lta ba bzhin du mu tig dang /_
[\[240b.2\]]bai DUr+ya dang /_man shel dkar po dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_gser dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang /_dmar po dang /_g.yas su 'khyil pa dag kyang de bzhin no/_/tha na nor bu mching bu len na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mgul rgyan 
[\[240b.3\]]len na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mgul rgyan ji lta ba bzhin du gdu bu rgyan can dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_do shal dang /_se mo do yang de bzhin no/_/tha na sog ma'i phreng ba len na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis pi bang len na rgyud dang bcas pa len na ltung byed 
[\[240b.4\]]du 'gyur la/_rgyud med pa len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/pi bang ji lta ba de bzhin du 'od ma dang /_bal la ri dang /_ma ha ti dang /_su g+ho sha ka yang de bzhin no/_/tha na mchu sbrang len na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dung len na sgra 'byin pa len na ltung 
[\[240b.5\]]byed du 'gyur la/_sgra mi 'byin pa len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dung ji lta ba bzhin du rnga bo che dang /_rnga pa Ta ha dang /_rdza rnga yang de bzhin no/_/tha na rdza rnga kha gcig pa len na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gzhu len na rgyud dang bcas pa len na ltung byed du 'gyur 
[\[240b.6\]]la/_rgyud med pa len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gzhu ji lta ba bzhin du ral gri dang /_ral gri kyog po dang /_ral gri so gnyis pa dang /_mdung dang /_'phang mdung dang /_lcags kyo yang de bzhin no/_/tha na gzhu'u len na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[240b.7\]]gis mda' len na mde'u dang bcas pa len na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_mde'u med pa len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mda' ji lta ba bzhin du lcags mda' dang /_mda' phyed lcags las byas pa yang de bzhin no/_/tha na mda' ltar bcos pa len na yang nyes byas su 'gyur 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]ro/_/dge slong gis sku gzugs len na sku gdung dang bcas pa len na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_sku gdung med pa len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ston pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste len na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 
[\[241a.2\]]'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa gas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas nor chab mi 
[\[241a.3\]]'tshal bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[241a.4\]]'dzin gyi ma sa ga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi 
[\[241a.5\]]khams la mi 'gyur gyis/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can 
[\[241a.6\]]rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[241a.7\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe na/_rgyal po kr-i kI zhes bya ba rgyal srid 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba/_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_thab mo dang /_
[\[241b.2\]]'thab pa dang /_'khrugs long dang /_nang 'khrugs rab tu zhi ba/_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang bral ba/_sA lu dang /_bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du 'jud pa/_chos dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po 
[\[241b.3\]]chos kyi rgyal srid byed du 'jug pas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten rgyar dpag tshad gcig pa/_'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa byed du bcug go/_/de na bud med rgan mo skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa gcig cig_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag 
[\[241b.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kI dpyid kyi dus kyi tshe shing ljon pa me tog kha bye zhing 'bras bu rgyas pa/_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_
[\[241b.5\]]shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i tshal gseb dag tu/_btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung nas/_rgyal po de myur ba myur bar yang bA rA Na sIr zhugs so/_/btsun mo'i 'khor gyis sna ma'i yal ga dag la mu tig gi chun po dpyangs te khrus bya bar brtsams 
[\[241b.6\]]pa dang /_des rgyal po myur ba myur bar bA rA Na sIr zhugs pa thos nas/_de yang brtad pa dang bcas pas mu tig gi chun po brjed de bor nas bA rA Na sIr zhugs so/_/bud med rgan mo des mu tig gi chun po de mthong nas/_des mu tig gi chun po de smyug ma la btags te 
[\[241b.7\]]bzhag go/_/bud med kyi yul ni rgyan la nye bar spyod pa yin pas/_des phyi de nyin par rgyan de dran nas/_des rgyal po la gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos zho shas 'tsho ba dag der btang nas/_de dag gis mu tig gi chun po smyug ma la btags pa de mthong ba dang /_de 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]dag gis bud med rgan mo de la dris pa/_mu tig gi chun po 'di sus smyug ma la btags te bzhag_/rgan mos smras pa/_kho mos so/_/de dag gis mu tig gi chun po de rgyal po la phul ba dang /_rgyal pos zho shas 'tsho ba dag la smras pa/_khyod cag 
[\[242a.2\]]gis de ga las rnyed/_de dag gis smras pa/_bud med rgan mo zhig gis smyug ma la btags te bzhag pa de nas bdag gis rnyed do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bud med rgan mo de bos shig_/de dag gis de bos te smras pa/_lha bud med rgan mo de 'di lags so/_/
[\[242a.3\]]rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod kyis mu tig gi chun po 'di smyug ma la btags te bzhag pa bden nam/_rgan mos smras pa/_lha mad do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod de la 'dod pa ma skyes sam/_rgan mos smras pa/_lha bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par 
[\[242a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan snga nas skyabs su mchi ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs pas bdag gzhan gyi rdzas la 'dod pa'i chos skyed par ga la 'gyur/_rgyal po dga' nas des de la mu tig gi chun po de nyid bya dgar byin te/_khyod kyir gyur gyi song shig 
[\[242a.5\]]ces smras so/_/rgan mo des mu tig gi chun po de khyer te btsongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas te zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam 'di skad ces/_bdag dge 
[\[242a.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nor chud mi za bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na bud med rgan mo gang yin pa de ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga 'di nyid yin te/_'dis de'i tshe smon lam de ltar btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas nor chud mi za bar gyur to/_/
[\[242a.7\]]dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag pa yin/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /_'dren ma rnams spangs te las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la btsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/longs pa'i gzhir gtogs pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[242b.2\]]'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po drug bcu pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal/_ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po'i khab na chu dron gsum yod pa gcig tu ni ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs 
[\[242b.3\]]can snying po khrus byed/_gnyis par ni btsun mo'i 'khor khrus byed/_gsum par ni grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mi dag khrus byed do/_/ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bsams pa/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi 
[\[242b.4\]]dge 'dun dang bcas pa la rnam pa du ma'i sgo nas yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs na khrus kyis ma bstabs kyis/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la khrus kyis bstabs par bya'o snyam du rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[242b.5\]]song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[242b.6\]]pa rgyal po'i khab 'di na chab dron gsum mchis pa gcig tu ni bdag khrus bgyid/_gnyis par ni mchis 'brang gi 'khor khrus bgyid/_gsum par ni grong rdal gyi mi dang yul mi dag khrus bgyid na/_btsun pa gang du bdag khrus bgyid pa der 'phags pa dag 
[\[242b.7\]]kyang khrus mdzad cing /_gang gi tshe 'phags pa dag khrus mdzad pa de'i tshe na bdag sdod par bgyid la/_gang gi tshe bdag khrus bgyid pa de'i tshe yang 'phags pa bdag gis gzhes par mdzad du gsol/_gang du mchis 'brang gi 'khor khrus bgyid pa der yang 'phags ma 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]dag khrus mdzad cing /_gang gi tshe 'phags ma dag khrus mdzad pa de'i tshe yang mchis 'brang gi 'khor sdod par bgyid la/_gang gi tshe mchis 'brang gi 'khor khrus bgyid pa de'i tshe yang 'phags ma dag gis gzhes par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 
[\[243a.2\]]'das kyis ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[243a.3\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/drug sde dag la blo skyes pa/_dga' bo nye dga' ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po dad pa dang ldan pa ni yin na dad pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa bltas khrus byed du 'dong ngo zhes 
[\[243a.4\]]de dag der khrus byed du dong nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' gal te bdag cag thams cad cig car khrus byas na myur du zin par 'gyur gyis/_gnyis kyis khrus bya zhing bzhis grogs bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu gnyis kyis khrus bya zhing bzhis grogs bya'o/_/
[\[243a.5\]]de'i 'og tu yang gnyis kyis khrus bya zhing bzhis grogs bya'o/_/de ltar bya'o zhes de dag las gnyis kyis khrus bya bar brtsams te bzhi grogs byed cing 'dug go/_/de'i tshe ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang der khrus byed du 'phags nas des mi 
[\[243a.6\]]gsang la gtogs pa la smras pa/_kwa'e nang rje song la da ltar sus khrus byed ltos shig_/mi des lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas der song ste bltas na/_ji tsam na drug sde dag khrus byas pa mthong 
[\[243a.7\]]nas de rgyal po'i gan du song ste smras pa/_lha 'phags pa drug sde dag khrus bgyid do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khri'u tshugs shig dang bsdad par bya'o/_/des khri'u btsugs nas rgyal po bsdad pa dang /_ji tsam na yun ring zhig lon nas rgyal pos yang mi gsang la 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]gtogs pa la smras pa/_kwa'e nang rje song la da ltar su khrus byed ltos shig_/mi des lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas der song ste bltas na/_ji tsam na yang drug sde dag khrus byed pa mthong nas de rgyal 
[\[243b.2\]]po'i gan du song ste smras pa/_lha 'phags pa drug sde de dag nyid khrus bgyid do/_/rgyal po yang khri'u btsugs pa de nyid la bsdad pa dang /_ji tsam na yun ring zhig lon nas yang rgyal pos mi gsang la gtogs pa la smras pa/_kwa'e nang rje song la da ltar su khrus byed ltos 
[\[243b.3\]]shig_/mi des lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas der song ste bltas na/_ji tsam na da dung yang drug sde dag khrus byed pa mthong nas de'i rgyal po'i gan du song ste smras pa/_lha da dung yang 'phags pa drug sde 
[\[243b.4\]]de dag nyid khrus bgyid do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'o na ni de dag yun ring por nga la tho 'tsham par byed kyis chu 'on cig dang dbang bskur ba'i khrus kyis khrus bya'o/_/de dag gis chu blangs nas rgyal pos de nyid du dbang bskur ba'i khrus kyis khrus byas nas 
[\[243b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa ma mnyan pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[243b.6\]]dga' bo ci'i phyir rgyal po gzugs can snying po chos mnyan pa ma mnyan par song /_btsun pa rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di drug sde dag gis tho btsams so/_/ci'i phyir/_des skabs de rgyas par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nyes 
[\[243b.7\]]dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag khrus byed pa las gyur pas/_de'i phyir dge slong rnams kyis khrus mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis khrus mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis khrus mi bya'o zhes bka' 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]stsal nas/_dge slong dag phyin chad khrus mi byed pas de dag dri ma'i rdzab kyis gos pa'i lus dri nga bar gyur nas bram ze dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag dri nga ba 'di su lags/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_kho bo cag go/_/'phags 
[\[244a.2\]]pa dag ci'i slad du khrus mi mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/ci khyed cag dri ma'i rdzab 'chang bas dag par 'gyur ram zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na 
[\[244a.3\]]zla ba phyed phyed cing khrus bya bar gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing khrus bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas so ga'i dus la bab pa dang /_dge slong dag tsha bas snyom nas de dag skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_lus ma thob 
[\[244a.4\]]par gyur nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci'i slad du khyed skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_lus ma thob par gyur/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tsha bas snyom mo/_/ci'i slad du khrus 
[\[244a.5\]]mi mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na tsha ba'i dus ma gtogs so/_/dge slong dag na bar gyur nas de dag sman pa'i gan du 
[\[244a.6\]]dong ste dris pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo cag na na kho bo cag la sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa dag gdugs re re zhing khrus sten cig dang des sos par 'gyur ro/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa dag khyed kyi ston pa thugs 
[\[244a.7\]]rje dang ldan pas de nyid rkyen du mdzad nas gnang bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na na ba'i dus ma gtogs so/_/
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]dge slong dag gis dge 'dun dang mchod rten gyi las dag byas nas de dag 'jim rdzab kyis gos shing 'bags bzhin du 'khod nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag 'ongs te dris pa/_'phags pa dag ci'i slad du khyed cag 'jim rdzab kyis gos shing 'bags bzhin du 'khod/_khrus 
[\[244b.2\]]mdzad na ci nongs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na las kyi dus ma gtogs so/_/dge slong dag lam du song zhing 'ongs par 
[\[244b.3\]]gyur pa na de dag lus ngal bas glos phab ste nyal ba na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag 'ongs te dris pa/_'phags pa dag bstan pa la gcig tu brtsal bar bgyi ba lags na ci'i slad du glos phab ste gzims shing dge ba'i phyogs la tron mi mdzad/_dge slong rnams 
[\[244b.4\]]kyis smras pa/_kho bo cag lam du song zhing 'ongs pas tsha bas snyom nas glos phab ste nyal zhing dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed mi nus par gyur to/_/khrus mdzad na ci nongs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[244b.5\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na lam gyi dus ma gtogs so/_/rlung byung nas dge slong dag rdul gyis rdul can du gyur nas de dag de kho na bzhin du 'khod pa na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag 'ongs te de dag gis mthong nas dris pa/_
[\[244b.6\]]'phags pa dag ci'i slad du rdul gyis gos shing bzhugs/_khrus mdzad na ci nongs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rlung 
[\[244b.7\]]gi dus ma gtogs so/_/char bab nas dge slong dag mngon par ldar nas de dag de kho na bzhin du 'khod pa dang bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te dris pa/_'phags pa dag ci'i slad du char gyis mngon par ldar cing bzhugs/_khrus mdzad 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]na ci nongs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na char gyi dus ma gtogs so/_/rdzi char byung nas dge slong dag lus 
[\[245a.2\]]khra bor gyur nas de dag de kho na bzhin du 'khod pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te dris pa/_'phags pa dag ci'i slad du lus khra bor gyur cing bzhugs/_khrus mdzad na ci nongs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i 
[\[245a.3\]]skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rdzi char gyi dus ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs 
[\[245a.4\]]pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te nga'i nyan thos rnams 
[\[245a.5\]]kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing khrus bya bar gsungs pa de las 'dums par byed na dus ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/de la dus ni 'di yin te/_so ga rnams kyi zla ba lhag ma phyed dang gnyis dang /_dbyar rnams 
[\[245a.6\]]kyi dang po dang /_zla ba phyed dang gsum po 'di dag ni tsha ba'i dus so/_/lhag ma ni na ba dus so/_/las dus so/_/lam dus so/_/rlung dus so/_/char dus so/_/rdzi char dus te/_de la de ni dus yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
